I keep expecting you to leave me in one castle or another for safekeeping, but you drag me along from camp to camp. Have you grown fond of me, Stark? Is that it? I've never seen you with a girl.", "For now. They won't be able to hold it. Euron Greyjoy's navy burned their ships, we emptied the larders before we left. Eventually they'll be forced to abandon their position and march all the way across Westeros.", "They don't fear the Freys, though. They fear the Lannisters. We gave you the Riverlands to hold the Riverlands. If we have to ride north and take them back for you every time you lose them, why do we need you?", "That's exactly why I came here. I love Cersei. You can laugh at that if you want. You can sneer. It doesn't matter. She needs me. And to get back to her, I have to take Riverrun. I'll send for your baby boy.", "We don't have a fortnight. If the North falls, we fall. Three days. The remaining forces in the Westerlands will take the river road east. We'll meet at Lord Harroway's Town and march together to Winterfell.", "You think you're getting a reward. Let me explain something to you. When my father sees me, the first thing he's going to ask is what happened to my hand. And I'm going to tell him this man chopped it off.", "Tarth, Tarth, Tarth. Crescent moons and starbursts. Lord Selwyn Tarth. Your father. Do you have any brothers and sisters, my lady? It's a long way to King's Landing. Might as well get to know one another.", "We couldn't. He was a useless, old coward, but the Freys supported us. Now they're all dead. Whoever killed them is no friend of ours. We need allies. Stronger, better allies. We can't win this war alone.", "We could end this war right now, boy, save thousands of lives. You fight for the Starks, l fight for the Lannisters. Swords or lances, teeth, nails - choose your weapons and let's end this here and now.", 'Childhood must have been awful for you. Were you a foot taller than all the boys? They laughed at you, called you names? Some boys like a challenge. One or two must have tried to get inside Big Brienne.', "Cersei had several ideas. Whipping you through the streets and beheading you in front of the Red Keep. Flaying you alive and hanging you from the walls of King's Landing. I talked her out of those.", 'What gods are those? The trees your husband prayed to? Where were the trees when his head was getting chopped off? lf your gods are real and if they are just why is the world so full of injustice?', "Are you sure we're not related? Ever since I've returned, every Lannister I've seen has been a miserable pain in my ass. Maybe you're a Lannister, too. You've got the hair for it if not the looks.", "I'm being sent to deal with the Blackfish. Apparently Walder Frey can't manage it on his own because he's 400 years old. Sent me with an army to the Riverlands and a siege that could last months.", "grabs the spear as he rides by and brings it up to position. JAIME's horse is galloping full speed on the edge of the river kicking up water. TYRION is watching JAIME's attempt to kill DAENERYS.", 'Dying paupers, I assume. Men with no families to complain. You found them moaning in the poorhouse and had them carted back to your garret and opened up their bellies to see what was inside.', "No, I don't think you care about your teeth. If you fight them, they will kill you. Do you understand? I'm the prisoner of value, not you. Let them have what they want. What does it matter?", "She has Euron Greyjoy's fleet and 20,000 fresh troops. The Golden Company from Essos, bought and paid for. Even if we defeat the dead, she'll have more than enough to destroy the survivors.", "Why? I lived with him at court since he was a boy, don't forget. Could hardly escape the little tulip. Skipping down the corridors in his embroidered silks. I knew him far better than you.", "Unless they're about me. It's all true about Renly. His proclivities were the worst kept secret at court. It's a shame the throne isn't made out of cocks. They'd have never got him off it.", "No. I didn't have your gift. He couldn't take a step without stepping on me. I was awful, a complete liability. Until one of the outlaws decided to take on a sixteen-year-old squire.", "No, I don't, but I'm telling you anyway because you're my prisoner. You don't have a choice. The love she had for her children, I was a little awed by it. Reminded me of my sister.", 'I broke a sacred oath and stabbed my king in the back I killed my own cousin When the gods judged my brother guilty, I helped him escape their justice What atonement do I deserve?', "Ah. But you fought them off. But maybe you wished one of them could overpower you, fling you down, tear off your clothes. But none of them were strong enough. I'm strong enough.", "All of them out there are enemies. They're waiting a night to make sure he's really dead and as soon as they see the stones on his eyes they'll set to work on tearing us apart.", "There it is. There's the look. I've seen it for seventeen years on face after face. You all despise me. Kingslayer. Oathbreaker. A man without honor. You've heard of wildfire?", "Catelyn Stark's dead. So if I told you to leave the capital right now and find Sansa, if I told you to find that murderous little bitch and bring me her head, would you do it?", "Kingslayer. What a king he was. Here's to Aerys Targaryen, the Second of His Name, Lord of the Seven Kingdoms, Protector of the Realm, and to the sword I shoved in his back.", 'Stark? You think the honorable Ned Stark wanted to hear my side? He judged me guilty the moment he set eyes on me. By what right does the wolf judge the lion? By what right?', "When you are, you need to enter a formal plea for mercy and ask to be sent to the Wall. Father's agreed to it. He'll spare your life and allow you to join the Night's Watch.", "Only a fool makes threats he's not prepared to carry out. Now let's say I threatened to hit you unless you shut your mouth, but you kept talking. What do you think I'd do?", "Cersei is the mother of the king. She has the king's ear and his trust. And the king has been speaking regularly with the High Sparrow about Queen Margaery and Ser Loras.", "You've got the second largest army in Westeros. You'll bring them into the city, stop queen Margaery's humiliation before it starts, and take her back into Crown custody.", "The Blackfish is an old man. A good death is all he can hope for. But you, you have a child now, I've heard. A son you sired on your wedding night. You're a potent man.", 'I want you to be my ranking general in the wars to come. I want you to swear allegiance to Cersei and I want you to help her destroy her enemies. All of her enemies.', "The boy won't talk. And if he does, I'll kill him. Him, Ned Stark, the King... the whole bloody lot of them, until you and I are the only people left in this world.", "They're not good at anything. I know the Ironborn. They're bitter, angry little people. All they know how to do is steal things they can't build or grow themselves.", "Do you know, I've never been with any woman but Cersei. So in my own way, I have more honor than poor old dead Ned. What was the name of that bastard he fathered?", "You knew when you were needed and when to go away. It's a rare talent. Most of my squires, they mean well, but young men with big jobs, they tend to overdo them.", "You swore a solemn vow, remember? You're supposed to get me to King's Landing in one piece. Not going so well, is it? No wonder Renly died with you guarding him.", 'All the Kingsguard will be on duty, of course. Ser Boros will be stationed here. Ser Preston will be stationed here beside the primary entertainment. Your Grace?', "Cause you're going to come with me and help me with something important. And when we return, I'm going to give you a much better girl, and a much better castle.", "We're at war. Daenerys Targaryen could come take it back the day after you move in. Besides, think of the upkeep. The more you own, the more it weighs you down.", 'Corns. I never used to get corns. Of course I used to ride everywhere, not march around like a common foot soldier wearing the same shit boots for over a year.', "I'm sure we'll have a tournament to celebrate the new title, if you accept. It would be good to have you in the field. The competition has become a bit stale.", "Half a million. The population of King's Landing. You were in charge of the ravens at Harrenhal. Did you- did you get a bird off to Brienne's father in Tarth?", 'How are they better allies? How are they different from the Freys? They both broke their promises and murdered their former friends as soon as it suited them.', "The child is the reason she'll never give an inch. All the worst things she's ever done, she's done for her children. It's not impossible that she'll win.", "Of course my sister wants Sansa dead. The girl is still a suspect in Joffrey's murder, so there is that complication. What the hell are you doing here?", "I'll remind you that our houses are at war. I'm sorry if this conflict has inconvenienced you, but rebelling against the Crown does have consequences.", "What happens to your name? Who carries the lion banner into future battles? Your nephews? Lancel Lannister? Others whose names I don't even remember?", 'We both know who would pay the most. Or make you pay the most if he found out you had captured me and sent me back up north for a summary execution.', "I apologize for the way the Freys treated you. A man of your birth deserved better. You have my word you'll be properly fed and clothes from now on.", "They're not putting your mother in a cell ever again Not while I'm here Why haven't you gone to see her? Everything she endured, she did it for you", "The siege is now under my command. The next time the Blackfish looks out from those ramparts, he'll see an army at his gates, not whatever this is.", "Perhaps, but she didn't. Catelyn Stark hated me just like you hate me. But I didn't hate her. I admired her. Far more than her husband or her son.", "Get back inside where it's safe. I'm looking for my brother. You remember my brother, don't you, Lord Stark? Blond hair, sharp tongue, short man.", "It's like stepping into a dream you've been dreaming for as long as you can remember, and finding out that the dream is more real than your life.", "When we make camp tonight, you'll be raped. More than once. None of these fellows have ever been with a noblewoman. You'd be wise not to resist.", "This one suits me fine. Don't worry. I'm not interested. If I faint, pull me out. I don't intend to be the first Lannister to die in a bathtub.", "They're a bit occupied at the moment. I was sent here to reclaim Riverrun currently defended by the Tully rebels, so you can see the conundrum.", "All right. Try to talk some sense into the old goat. He won't listen, but his men might. Not everybody wants to die for someone else's home.", "The same women who murdered Myrcella have overthrown House Martell and taken control of Dorne We've got a lot to discuss All of us together", "To tell you the truth, this isn't so bad. Four walls. A pot to piss in. I was chained to a wooden post covered in my own shit for months.", "You know why I'm here. This castle belongs to House Frey. You're trespassing. In the name of King Tommen, I order you to surrender or- -", 'They call it the Sapphire Isle. Do you know why? Every sapphire in Westeros was mined on Tarth. Sapphires are gemstones. The blue ones.', "He said it was just a fleabite. The fault is mine. Bronn is merely a soldier following my orders. If anyone should be punished it's me.", "Winter is here. We can't win a war if we can't feed our men and our horses. The Tyrells have the grain, the Tyrells have the livestock.", "Thank you for coming. The other lords of the Reach look to you for guidance now more than ever. They might not have come if you hadn't.", 'And what side will you be fighting for? You were the only man to defeat Robert Baratheon in battle. Not even Rhaegar Targaryen could --', "I already have. Look at you. You're ready to chop my head off. Do you think you could? Do you think you could beat me in a fair fight?", "What do you want me to do? Kill the guards? Sneak you out of the city in the back of a cart? I'm the Lord Commander of the Kingsguard.", "Yes, brilliant speech. They'll be talking about it for days to come. I thought you were a realist. Didn't realize you'd die for pride.", "There was nothing to be afraid of until you told father. [In a whisper, mimicking] We're Lannisters. Lannisters don't act like fools.", 'What do you think is more important to Lord Bolton? Getting his pet rat a reward or ensuring Tywin Lannister gets his son back alive?', "Give my regards to the Night's Watch. I'm sure it will be thrilling to serve in such an elite force. And if not, It's only for life.", "My bloody honor is beyond repair, but my answer is still no. I don't want Casterly Rock. I don't want a wife. I don't want children.", 'As did I. Do you know the last order the Mad King gave me? To bring him your head. I saved your life so you could murder my brother?', "Lord Selwyn would pay his daughter's weight in sapphires if she's returned to him. But only if she's alive, her honor unbesmirched.", "The truth is Casterly Rock isn't worth much anymore. Well, it is to me. My fond childhood memories won't keep Cersei on the throne.", "Yes, and I'm not looking forward to seeing more of them. But I'm loyal to the queen and you're loyal to Sansa and her dolt brother.", "Will I be walking naked in the streets? Or will I spend a few months in the sept dungeons first to teach me about the gods' mercy?", "I came to Winterfell because-I'm not the fighter I used to be. But I'd be honored to serve under your command, if you'll have me.", 'Every day around the world, men, women, and children are murdered by the score. Who gives a dusty fuck about a bunch of beetles?', "You already insulted one great house. It won't happen twice. Every last sparrow will die before Margaery walks down that street.", "This ship's sailing to Oldtown. We'll get off earlier, not far from Sunspear. Row ourselves to the Dornish shores in the night.", "You'll take no action at all. When the Tyrell armies come, you will stand down. Are you expressly forbidden from standing down?", "Do you want me to apologize? I won't. We were at war. Everything I did, I did for my house and my family. I'd do it all again.", "She's always been good at using the truth to tell lies. I wouldn't be too hard on yourself. She's fooled me more than anybody.", "Let me show you how. Hit me again, over the ear. And again and again. You're stronger than you look, it shouldn't take long.", "Even Lannisters can't survive without allies. Where are our allies now? You saw what happened to Walder Frey and his family.", "I've been a member of the Kingsguard since before you were born. You don't have to do this. You don't have to do anything.", "She's dead like her son, her grandchildren, her whole house. And if we don't find a way out of this war we'll follow them.", "Does he understand what we're saying I mean, to the extent that he ever understood complete sentences in the first place", "It wasn't so simple. I was sleeping with my sister and you had one friend in the world who was sleeping with his sister.", "Sturdy old thing. How many kings' asses have polished it, I wonder? What's the line? The King shits and the Hand wipes.", "This same mob spat at my sister not long ago, and if you turn on us, they'll cheer to see your head mounted on a spike.", "They stopped liking it at the end. That was a proper battle. D'you remember Thoros of Myr charging through the breach?", "Nothing made you happier. You'd think being tormented from birth would have given you some affinity for the afflicted.", "I'm here by the king's command to take back this castle. Have him bathed and fed. Unless you'd like to take his place.", "We'll breach them and kill every last one of you. But if you surrender, I'll spare the lives of your men. On my honor.", "They didn't deserve to die. But Lady Olenna chose to betray the queen and support the Targaryen girl. So here we are.", 'At her until she kicked me out. She thinks I was an idiot to trust you. A lot of people seem to think that, actually.', "Lord Bolton's traveling tomorrow as well. He's going to the Twins for Edmure Tully's wedding. You're to remain here.", 'You know what they call me? Kingslayer. Oathbreaker. Man without honor. Now you want me to break another sacred vow.', "Your mother's worried about you. Threats have been made. Dorne is too dangerous for you. I've come to take you home.", 'When the war is won the queen will need a new warden of the south. I can think of no better man than Randyll Tarley.', "We'll say he was lying. We'll say he was dreaming. We'll say whatever we like. I think we can outfox a 10-year-old.", 'Anyone can see us on the bridge, but cross by water and the current could take us or I could escape down the river.', "What he built. The towers. He built it for us. He meant it for us. They're going to try to take it away, all of it.", "I'm Lord Commander of the Kingsguard The Lord Commander of the Kingsguard does have a position on the Small Council", "She loved her children. I suppose all mothers do, but Catelyn and Cersei, there's a fierceness you don't often see.", 'If they think Daenerys will win. No one wants to fight on the losing side. Right now, we look like the losing side.', "It survives through me. I'll leave the Kingsguard. I'll take my place as your son and heir if you let Tyrion live.", "The answer is no. There are three men in the kingdoms who might have a chance against me. You're not one of them.", 'I can hold a sword, but all my instincts are wrong. How can I protect the king when I can hardly wipe my own ass?', "No, but motivating reluctant farmers to hand over their harvest, I've heard you guys have a real talent for that.", "Bit of a quandary for you. If you kill me, you fail Lady Stark. But if you don't kill me, I'm going to kill you.", "Sorry to interrupt. We're here for Queen Margaery and Ser Loras Tyrell. Give them to us and we'll be on our way.", "Poor lad. That was my brother's doing, I seem to recall. I remember you. You'd never squired for anyone before.", "is quickly walking down the hall leading to CERSEI's room. As he approaches, QYBURN exits the queen's chambers.", "passes by QYBURN without saying a word and barges into CERSEI's quarters. CERSEI stand and walks over to JAIME.", 'We enjoy a good fight. Gets our juices flowing. The Flayed Man of House Bolton. A bit gruesome for my taste.', "They have deep-water ports for the ships. Stannis left the castle unoccupied, and that's where she was born.", 'What do you want me to do? Kidnap my sister-in-law? And take her where? Where would she be safer than here?', "I can't save you this time either. My training has proved that I can't beat a stable boy with my left hand.", "He has our son! He stole our son! He's torn our family apart. How should we treat people who tear us apart?", 'Every day I was a prisoner, I plotted my escape. Every day. I murdered people so I could be here with you.', 'opens the carriage. It is filled with gold bars and coins. He picks up a large sack and hands it to BRONN.', 'Sail right past the Iron Fleet and into a new life? Sounds a lot less likely than Cersei winning this war-', "There's a locked door at the top of the stairs. Knock on it twice, and then twice again. Varys will open.", "You won. One fewer brother. Must be proud of yourself. There's really nothing you wouldn't do, is there?", "Are you going to order him to kill me? I'm the only one you have left. Our children are gone, our father", "Do you know how long it's going to take us to get to King's Landing walking through fields and forests?", "I was in chains if you recall. Our little match would have ended quite quick if my hands weren't bound.", "The Golden Company is not here. They're in Essos. How is a mercenary company in Essos going to help us?", "I was thinking of us. You're a bit late to start complaining about it now. What has the boy told them?", "You're much uglier in daylight. What's your name? I'm Jaime Lannister of Casterly Rock, son of Tywin.", 'Fighting bravely for a losing cause is admirable. Fighting for a winning cause is far more rewarding.', "He murdered my father. If I ever see him, I'll split him in two. And then I'll give him your regards.", "We can't beat the Dothraki. We don't have the numbers. We don't have the support of the other houses!", 'Threaten? As in, "I\'m going to open your Lord from balls to brains and see what Starks are made of”?', "You did well sewing up this mess. You're far better at this sort of work than Grand Maester Pycelle.", "A family trait. Now, the Starks are feasting us at sundown. Don't leave me alone with these people.", "Tell me... If I'd stabbed the Mad King in the belly instead of the back, would you admire me more?", 'He said the same thing he\'d been saying for hours... "Burn them all." If that\'s all, your Grace...', 'I saw the youngest of the Greyjoy lads at Winterfell. It was like seeing a shark on a mountaintop.', "We don't have time for this. We should be preparing the city for a siege. The Dothraki are coming.", "Tell Robb Stark I'm sorry I couldn't make his uncle's wedding. The Lannisters send their regards.", 'I made a deal for you to keep your ungrateful head on your ungrateful neck a little while longer.', "opens the door and step into the queen's room. CERSEI is seated near a window speaking to QYBURN.", "I thought you might say that. But since we're short on time, Come on, girls. See you at sundown.", "Are you really mad enough to blame him for that? He didn't decide to kill her. He was an infant.", 'We are not kidnapping their princess. We are rescuing my niece, bringing her back to the family,', "Cause you didn't set up a proper perimeter. You just allowed 8,000 men to approach unchallenged.", "Tyrion's my brother. Our brother. There'll be a trial. We'll get to the truth of what happened.", "I was your sister's prisoner once. She hit me on the head with a rock if I remember correctly.", 'That was only one of them. She has two more. If she decides to use them, to really use them --', "Because an army of dead men is marching on the Seven Kingdoms. Tyrion claims he'll have proof.", "Was!... the Hand of the King. Now I'm not sure what he is... Lord of somewhere very far away.", "It's just that I, I was sixteen once. I also had to replace someone's squire on short notice.", "Come to say goodbye, Lady Stark? I believe it's my last night in this world. Is that a woman?", 'Because I visited Winterfell. I would have noticed your dour head smacking into the archways.', "It's the duty of the Lord Commander to fill those pages. And there's still room left on mine.", "You threw your life away. You threw it away. It's not a joke. You understand that, don't you?", "It seems he had some trouble on the road. You wouldn't know what happened to him, would you?", 'Oh. Oh. Was he the one on guard duty? He was in my way. Any knight would have done the same.', "Ah, Renly. Really? He wasn't fit to rule over anything more important than a 12-course meal.", "My brother owes him a debt. He's not safe here. You're keeping him from harm. It's chivalry.", "You clearly have no intention of saving your men's lives. Why did you come to treat with me?", "Even if the boy lives, he'll be a cripple, a grotesque. Give me a good clean death any day.", "You should. But instead, you're sitting here watching me fail at dinner. Why might that be?", 'I expect to command all the Lannister forces before long. You can be the right hand I lost.', 'reaches forward and takes CERSEI and kisses her. While they embrace CERSEI speaks to JAIME.', "We fought dead things and lived to talk about it. If this isn't the time to drink, when is?", "He preferred curly-haired little girls like Loras Tyrell. You're far too much man for him.", "I'll pay her bloody ransom. Gold, sapphires, whatever you want. Just get her out of there.", 'Summoned to court to answer for the crimes of your bannerman Gregor Clegane, the Mountain', "Look- Look- Look me in the eye. Don't look away. Don't look- Look at me! Just look at me.", 'Thank you for fighting on my behalf, Lady Stark. I would have come to your defense, but-', "Well, I'm proud of you. I am. You fulfilled your oath to Catelyn Stark against all odds.", "I heard you the first time. Quite the little climber, aren't you? How old are you, boy?", "With whom? You? Men talk. Soon as someone discovers I can't fight, he'll tell everyone.", "What do you think I'm doing? The galley's waiting in the bay bound for the Free Cities.", 'Ladies, have you met Ser Bronn of the Blackwater, hero of the Battle of Blackwater Bay.', "I'm not talking about father. Tyrion didn't kill Joffrey. He had nothing to do with it.", "That's an honor I can do without. Their days are too long, their lives are too short.", "You've become a real she-wolf in your later years. There's not much fish left in you.", "I don't blame him. And I don't blame you, either. We don't get to choose who we love.", "It's a tough decision - take the bridge and risk being seen or cross the great water.", 'Start a war. Burn cities to ash. Free their worst enemies. The things we do for love.', "Thank the gods you're here, Stark. About time we had some stern northern leadership.", "This isn't a trial. It's a farce. Cersei has manipulated everything and you know it.", "He likes to do this when I'm on duty... He makes me listen as he insults my sister.", "I took you for a fighter, a man Pardon. Woman of honor. Was I wrong? You're afraid.", 'Well, my golden lion days are done, but whore-mongering is still an option for you.', 'I have these, you know, on your feet when you walk too far. What do you call them?', "We received a threatening message. The princess's necklace in the jaws of a viper.", "It won't stop with Edmure. You'll force me to storm the castle. Hundreds will die.", 'One of our men interfered, speared him through the leg before I could finish him.', "I'm not Father. I'm the Kingslayer. When people find out I can't slay a pigeon...", 'My brother tells me you can keep your mouth shut. Unusual talent for a sellsword.', "I swore by all the gods that if her daughters were alive, I'd return them to her."]

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: ["You knew her well, my lords, my lady. You knew she was a troubled woman. She always loved Lord Baelish. She told me herself. From the moment he arrived at the gates of Riverrun, a boy of eight carrying everything he owned in a little sack. She confessed to me she never loved Lord Arryn. She did as her father commanded, as so many of us have. When the gods finally allowed her to be with Lord Baelish, she was so happy. For a time. My aunt was a jealous lady. She was terrified that Lord Baelish didn't love her anymore. That he would abandon her for a younger woman. And then...one day she saw him kiss me.", "It was a peck on the cheek, Lord Royce, nothing more. Lord Baelish is my uncle now, in truth, by marriage. He's always been so kind to me. I was so happy to be here, to be free. All because of him. But my aunt turned on me. She cursed me. Called me a whore. Promised to throw me through the Moon Door. When Lord Baelish tried to calm her, she struck him. She said she didn't want to live anymore. She stood on the edge of that Moon Door. He tried to reason with her. Promised her she was the only one he had ever loved, but she stepped through those doors and she was...*begins sobbing*", "Lord Baelish has told many lies. All to protect me. Since my father was executed, I have been a hostage in King's Landing. A plaything for Joffrey to torture or Queen Cersei to torment. They beat me, they humiliated me, they married me to the Imp. I had no friends in King's Landing...except one. He saved me. Smuggled me away when he had the chance. He knew I'd be safe here in the Eyrie with my own blood, my Aunt Lysa. The Lannisters have friends everywhere. Even the Vale. He made me swear not to tell anyone my true name.", "We must prepare for that eventuality. Every direction the threat comes from, this is the best place to be. We need to start building up our grain stores with regular shipments from every keep in the north. If we don't use it by winter's end we'll give it back to them, but if the entire north has to flee to Winterfell there won't be enough time to bring wagonloads of grain with them.", "Sometimes when I'm trying to understand a person's motives, I play a little game. I assume the worst. What's the worst reason you have for turning me against my sisterThat's what you do, isn't it? That's what you've always done turn family against family, turn sister against sister. That's what you did to our mother.", "You've known him for the space of a single conversation, you and your trusted advisors, and you sit around and make your plans on how to defeat a man you don't know. I lived with him. I know the way his mind works. I know how he likes to hurt people. Did it ever once occur to you that I might have some insight?", "I love you, little brother. I always will. You'll be a good king. But tens of thousands of Northmen fell in the Great War defending all of Westeros. And those who survived have seen too much and fought too hard ever to kneel again. The North will remain an independent kingdom, as it was for thousands of years.", 'JON SNOW, BRIENNE, TORMUND, and DOLOROUS EDD are eating at a table. SANSA looks at the meat on her fork. JON SNOW, DOLOROUS EDD, and TORMUND eat vigorously. BRIENNE looks around at the men eating. TORMUND stares intently at BRIENNE. BRIENNE looks away. TORMUND smiles. DOLOROUS EDD notices their interaction.', "It's carrying silk and it's supposed to bring back wine in exchange. But it's not coming back. The captain's tired of risking his life so King's Landing lords and ladies can get drunk on better wine than they deserve. He's going to stay in Dorne. Wait out the winter where it's beautiful and warm.", "You should be on your knees thanking me. We're standing in Winterfell again because of me. You didn't win it back. Jon didn't win it back. He lost the Battle of the Bastards. The Knight's of the Vale won the battle and they rode north for me while you were off where, traveling the world?", "Growing up at Winterfell, all I ever wanted was to escape, to come here to the capital. See the southern knights and their painted armor and King's Landing after dark- all the candles burning in all those windows. I'm stupid. A stupid little girl with stupid dreams who never learns.", "Of course. More than anything. But maybe it would be better to wait. I've been thinking how dangerous it would be. Not just for me, but for you. You've been so kind. I'd feel terrible if anything happened to you. I can't tell you how touched I am by your concern for my welfare.", "The other things he did, ladies aren't supposed to talk about those things, but I imagine brothel keepers talk about them all the time. I can still feel it. I don't mean in my tender heart it still pains me so. I can still feel what he did in my body standing here right now.", "I'm a virgin, I swear it. He loves you, Aunt Lysa. All he says is that I'm stupid. I'm a stupid little girl with stupid dreams who never learns and I'm a terrible liar, so I should always tell the truth. And I swear to you that he has never touched me. Not once, not ever.", "Winterfell didn't just fall into our hands. We took it back, and the Mormonts and the Hornwoods and the Wildlings and the Vale, all of us working together. Now, I'm sure cutting off heads is very satisfying, but that's not the way you get people to work together.", 'You will watch as my soldiers take turns raping your sister. You will watch as my dogs your wild little brother. Then I will spoon your eyes from their sockets and let my dogs do the rest. Come and see. Ramsay Bolton, Lord of Winterfell and Warden of the North.', "Would you like to hear about our wedding night? He never hurt my face. He needed my face, the face of Ned Stark's daughter. But the rest of me, he did what he liked with the rest of me as long as I could still give him an heir. What do you think he did?", "Don't be afraid. The queen has raised the drawbridge. This is the safest place we can be. Joffrey's not hurt. He's fighting bravely. His knights have rallied behind him. They will save the city. Shall we sing a hymn? Gentle mother, fount of mercy...", "You're right. It's not my wedding. Anyway, from what I can tell, the dressmakers in Highgarden will be far superior to the ones in King's Landing. They'd never make me anything as dull as this for my wedding. Loras likes green and gold brocade.", "We'll never get him back. Rickon is Ned Starks trueborn son, which makes him a greater threat to Ramsay than you, a bastard, or me, a girl. As long as he lives, Ramsay's claim to Winterfell will be contested, which means he won't live long.", "May I ask, how are we meant to feed the greatest army the world has ever seen? While I ensured our stores would last through winter, I didn't account for Dothraki, Unsullied and two full-grown dragons. What do dragons eat, anyway?", "We could sheep shift Lord Desmondo s bed. You cut a little hole in his mattress and you stuff sheep dung inside. Then you sew up the hole and make his bed again. His room will stink, but he won't know where it's coming from.", 'You freed me from the monsters who murdered my family and you gave me to other monsters who murdered my family. Go back to Moat Cailin. My brother and I will take back the North on our own. I never want to see you again.', "And how long have you loved him, Myranda. Did you imagine that he would be with you forever, is that it? Then I came along and ruined it. I am Sansa Stark of Winterfell. This is my home and you can't frighten me.", 'Tyrion is not like the other Lannisters. He was always kind to me, but it\'s too great a risk. "The Seven Kingdoms will bleed as long as Cersei sits on the Iron Throne. Join us. Together we can end her tyranny."', "I don't know how they did things in that city, but in this city, handmaidens wait on ladies, not the other way around. And I don't have time to answer a thousand questions and teach you how to do your job.", "My family still has friends in the North. All I have to do is give a signal and they'll rescue me. Climb to the top of the Broken Tower, light this candle, and put it in the window. Promise me, Theon.", 'The castles committed no crimes. And we need every fortress we have for the war to come. We should give the Last Hearth and Karhold to new families, loyal families who supported us against Ramsay.', "When you brought me back to Winterfell, you told me there's no justice in the world, not unless we make it. Thank you for all your many lessons, Lord Baelish. I will never forget them.", "I'm sorry, Your Grace. You're right, I'm stupid. Of course you'll be in the vanguard. They say my brother Robb always goes where the fighting is thickest. And he is only a pretender.", "Jon is every bit as much Ned Stark's son as Ramsay is Roose Bolton's. Ant there are also the Tullys. They're not Northern, but they will back us against the Boltons without question.", "Do you know what they did to my brother? How they sewed his direwolf's head onto his body? And my mother. They say they cut her throat to the bone and threw her body in the river.", "Witty remarks won't make a difference. That's why we're down here, none of us can do anything. It's the truth. It's the most heroic thing we can do now look the truth in the face.", "My name is not Alayne. It's Sansa Stark, eldest daughter of Lord Eddard Stark. Lord Royce, we met when you came to Winterfell. You were escorting your son Ser Waymar to the Wall.", "Pardon, Your Grace. I'm sure your dress will be beautiful, Myrcella. I'm counting the days until the fighting is done and I can pledge my love to the King in sight of the gods.", "Joffrey. Joffrey did that. He promised he would be merciful and he cut my father's head off. And he said that was mercy. Then he took me up on the walls and made me look at it.", "I don't believe you anymore. I don't need you anymore. You can't protect me. You won't even be able to protect yourself if I tell Brienne to cut you down. And why shouldn't I?", "I'm done with all that. I came here every day when I was a girl. I prayed to be somewhere else. Back then I only ever thought about what I wanted, never about what I had.", "Which charges confuse you? Let's start with the simplest one you murdered our aunt, Lysa Arryn. You pushed her through the Moon Door and watched her fall. Do you deny it?", "I don't want someone brave and gentle and strong. I want him! He'll be the greatest king that ever was, a golden lion, and I'll give him sons with beautiful blond hair.", "You're the military man, but I know her. If you're her enemy, she'll never stop until she's destroyed you. Everyone who's ever crossed her, she's found a way to murder.", 'You have to be smarter than Father. You need to be smarter than Robb. I loved them, I miss them, but they made stupid mistakes, and they both lost their heads for it.', "Because he was trying to protect us. He never wanted us to see how dirty the world really is, but Father couldn't protect me and neither can you. Stop trying.", "Who cares about your stupid dancing teacher? I can't go. I'm supposed to marry Prince Joffrey. I love him and I'm meant to be his queen and have his babies.", "That's not how the game works. You're not supposed to just blurt out the right answer. You've got to invent a story about where the ship is going and why.", "Even if I wanted to, Arya would never go along. She always loved Jon far more than she ever loved me, and she'd kill anyone who betrayed her family.", "You are too kind, Ser Loras. You probably don't remember the first time we met. At the Hando s tourney, you gave me your favor. A rose, a red rose.", "Do you know how happy Cersei would be if she saw us fighting? This is exactly what she wants. This is what she's always wanted, to tear us apart --", "If you look outside the walls of your city, you'll find thousands of Northmen who will explain to you why harming Jon Snow is not in your interest.", "She is here to reclaim the Iron Throne and the Seven Kingdoms. The north is one of those seven kingdoms. This isn't an invitation, it's a trap.", "Tell me why Bran and Rickon should be dead while you still breathe the air. Tell me to my face Theon, tell me that they weren't your brothers!", 'If you had asked for my advice earlier, I would have told you not to attack Winterfell until we have a larger force, or is that obvious, too?', "You're right. We can't trust him. He attacked my father in the streets. He tried to destroy my house and my family, the same as he did yours.", "Jon isn't Tormund. Jon isn't Davos, the Red Woman, or Stannis for that matter. Jon is Jon. He's my brother. He'll keep me safe. I trust him.", 'As soon as we heard about the Wall, I called all our banners to retreat to Winterfell. Lord Umber when can we expect your people to arrive?', "No. I had never left Winterfell before I came to King's Landing. But it sounds wonderful. I can't wait to see it. And to leave this place.", 'Meat and mead at my table And I pledge to ask no service of you that might bring you dishonor I swear it by the old gods and the new Arise', "I remember when you were born, my lady. You were named for my Aunt Lyanna. It was said she was a great beauty. I'm sure you will be, too.", "He is. A fool - you're so clever to see it. He'll make a much better fool than a knight. He doesn't deserve the mercy of a quick death.", "Winterfell is our home It's ours and Arya's and Bran's and Rickon's Wherever they are, it belongs to our family We have to fight for it", "What about the North? It was taken from us, and we took it back. And we said we'd never bow to anyone else again. What about the North?", "I don't believe you. If they catch you, they'll put your head on a spike just like my father's. You'd risk that just to confuse them?", 'The Umbers gave Rickon to our enemies. They can hang. But the Karstarks declared for Ramsay without knowing they had another choice.', "The North remembers. They remember the Stark name. People will still risk everything for it, from White Harbor to Ramsay's own door.", "Good. If it weren't for you I'd still have a family. If I could do to you what Ramsay did to you right here, right now, I would.", "Arya, leave him alone. My prince, my poor prince, look what they did to you. Stay here, I'll go back to the inn and bring help.", "I-I can't. I never meant-my father was a traitor. My brother as well. I have traitor's blood. Please don't make me say anymore.", 'Your name is Theon Greyjoy. Last surviving son of Balon Greyjoy, Lord of the Iron Islands, do you hear me? Theon. Promise me.', "Well, there was Ser Dontos. You used him to get me out of King's Landing, but you would never trust him to kill the king.", 'He did. I hope he comes back soon. I remember how happy he was to see me. When he sees you, his heart will probably stop.', "Have you forgotten what happened to our grandfather? The Mad King invited him to King's Landing and roasted him alive.", "You're telling me we don't have enough food, especially not if the armies of the north come back to defend Winterfell.", "I know what Ramsay is. I know what he'll do to me. If I'm going to die, let it happen while there's some of me left.", "To come to my aid? Did you know about Ramsay? If you didn't know, you're an idiot. If you did know, you're my enemy.", "If they haven't contributed the right amount of grain to the stores then I'm afraid they'll have to make due with --", "You're the son of the last true Warden of the North. Northern families are loyal. They'll fight for you if you ask.", 'He hated me, the man who hit me. I saw it in his eyes. Hated me. He never met me before, but he wanted to hurt me.', "Father never talked about her. Sometimes I'd find him down here, lighting the candles. They say she was beautiful.", 'Your words will disappear. Your house will disappear. Your name will disappear. All memory of you will disappear.', "Only a fool would trust Littlefinger. I should have told you about him, about the Knights of the Vale. I'm sorry.", "I warned Jon this would happen. He can't leave the north and expect it to just sit and wait for him like Ghost.", "The poison. I don't understand. The Lannisters gave you wealth, power. Joffrey made you the Lord of Harrenhal.", "He already hurts me every night. All day I'm locked in this room and every night he comes. It can't be worse.", "If we don't take back the North, we'll never be safe I want you to help me But I'll do it myself if I have to", 'That I defend my family from those who would harm us. That I defend the North from those who would betray us.', "Shae. Please excuse her, Lord Tyrion. She's not from here. But I trust her, even though she tells me not to.", "No, this is the way he is, the way he's always been. He never asked for my opinion. Why would he start now?", "Because I'm a terrible liar. You said so yourself. Please, Lord Baelish. Tell me what to do. Tell me when.", "I am safe. I'm at home, surrounded by friends. I have Brienne to protect me from anyone who would harm me.", 'And what did you do? Did you come running to the rescue? Did you fight off the Lannisters and save father?', 'That the woman who murdered my mother, father and brother is dangerous? Thank you for your wise council.', 'You stand accused of murder. You stand accused of treason. How do you answer these charges Lord Baelish?', "I'm building my home, Winterfell. At least I think I am. I haven't been back there in a very long time.", "to Petyr* I'm sorry, Lord Baelish. I have to tell the truth. *to the council* I'll tell you everything.", "He's not a generous man. He wouldn't give you anything unless he thought he was getting something back.", "What if you're wrong? What if Stannis never attacks Winterfell, or he does and the Boltons defeat him?", "Don't you wish we could go back to the day we left? I want to scream at myself, “Don't go, you idiot”", 'They died fighting for Ramsay. Give the castles to the families of the men who died fighting for you.', 'We need his men. Without the Vale, Ramsay Bolton would still hold this castle. Littlefinger saved us.', "You've declared for other houses before, Lord Baelish. It's never stopped you from serving yourself.", 'My father was a traitor. My mother and brother are traitors, too. I am loyal to my beloved Joffrey.', "This is his writing, his signature. He pledged to fight for Daenerys Targaryen. He's bent the knee.", 'You had Aunt Lysa send a letter to our parents telling them it was the Lannisters who murdered Jon.', 'A monster has taken our home and our brother. We have to go back to Winterfell and save them both.', 'Your Grace, whatever my traitor brother has done, I had no part. You know that. I beg you, please', 'I beg pardon, ser. I should have come to you after to thank you for saving me. You were so brave.', 'I would remind you that House Glover is pledged to House Stark. Sworn to answer when called upon.', "You've been so consumed with the enemy to the north, you've forgotten about the one to the south.", 'As it please Your Grace, I ask mercy for my father, Lord Eddard Stark, who was Hand of the King.', 'I spent a lot of time thinking about what as ass I was to you I wish I could change everything', 'If you still have any affection in your heart for me, please do me this kindness, Your Grace.', "I'm so sorry, Aunt Lysa. I never should have hit Robin, I know it. I promise it won't happen-", "We just have to make it to Castle Black Once we're with Jon, Ramsay won't be able to touch us", 'Keep them open for as long as you can. There are still people coming in from the countryside.', "Stay, Lady. I probably shouldn't have any more. Father only lets us have one cup at feasts.", 'My father always said Northerners are different. More loyal, more suspicious of outsiders.', "You'll have as many as we can spare. Hurry back to Last Hearth and bring your people here.", 'Change my linens, wash my clothing, scrub the floor, empty my chamber pot, brush my hair.', "He didn't. He didn't want anything. He just takes an interest because he loved my mother.", "I don't know! I don't know anything about battles! Just don't do what he wants you to do.", 'We still have a wall between us and the Night King. Theres nothing between us and Cersei.', "I never did anything with them at all. Girls didn't take part in that where I came from.", "On our way down to King's Landing, with my father and Arya and… where are you taking me?", "And I was sorry when I heard of Lord Renly's death, Lady Margaery. He was very gallant.", 'My sister used to do that when she was angry with me. And she was always angry with me.', "My mother, fat? She never let me have my pudding until I'd finished all my proper food.", 'I did what I had to do to survive, my lady. But I am a Stark. I will always be a Stark.', "Stannis who lost the Blackwater, who murdered his own brother, who doesn't have a head?", 'and BAELISH are walking along the upper section of the courtyard having a conversation.', "You left your home to come here. And I'd be queen someday. Please make father say yes.", "I don't know why she wants me here. She's always saying how stupid I am. She hates me.", "He plays with people. He's far better at it than you. He's been doing it all his life.", 'And what happens afterwards? We defeat the dead, we destroy Cersei. What happens then?', "No no, stop it, stop it, both of you. You're spoiling it. You're spoiling everything!", "So he's your most trusted advisor now? Because he secured 62 men from a ten year old?", "He doesn't mean Lady, does he? No no, not Lady! Lady didn't bite anyone! She's good!", "Good afternoon, Lord Tyrion. I was just trying on a gown for King Joffrey's wedding.", "Do you think it's really Tyrion? It could be someone trying to lure you into a trap.", "You're very kind, my lords, but Jon is our king. He is doing what he thinks is best.", "Lord Glover wishes us good fortune, but he's staying in Deepwood Motte with his men.", "No, you can't make me. I will starve myself. I will die before I have to go there.", "You think he's going to fall into your trap. He won't He's the one who lays traps.", "No need to seize the last word, Lord Baelish. I'll assume it was something clever.", 'I would have given them bread if I had it. I hate the king more than any of them.', "I don't pray anymore. It's the only place I can go where people don't talk to me.", 'I listened to their complaints, which is my responsibility as Lady of Winterfell.', 'Joff-King Joffrey, he-His Grace is very fair and handsome and as brave as a lion', "Ser Dontos. The king's nameday celebration. I'm sorry. I should have remembered.", "Probably never. My family doesn't live there anymore and someone burned it down.", "Ride for Riverrun. My uncle will talk to you and you'll know how to talk to him.", 'Training. Well, while you were training I suffered things you can never imagine.', 'To provide proof of my betrayals. To provide justification after she murders me.', "No, I'm afraid not. It's not high up in the mountains. It's down on the ground.", 'You conspired with Cersei Lannister and Joffrey Baratheon to betray our father.', "I was trying to remember what everything looked like. I'll never see it again.", 'Joffrey never let anyone question his authority. You think he was a good king?', "and ARYA are walking through the hall to SANSA's quarters having a discussion.", 'I trust you with my life. If you trust him with yours, we should let him stay.', "They're delicious. Where did you get the lemons? You can't grow them up here.", "This isn't a strange place. This is my home. It's the people who are strange.", "Careful. You've ruined it. Now I'm going to have to rebuild the whole thing.", "You think they'll be safe here if Roose Bolton remains Warden of the North?", 'You did it to take power in the Vale. Earlier, you conspired to murder Jon.', "Why would he say no? He'd be the second most powerful man in the kingdoms.", "I don't know. I don't remember. Everything happened so fast. I didn't see.", 'They would have thrown you through the Moon Door if they found you guilty.', 'begins smiling then walking towards ARYA. SANSA reaches out and hugs ARYA.', "You're a Lannister. I am the disgraced daughter of the traitor Ned Stark.", 'I lie awake all night staring at the canopy thinking about how they died.', 'This is good soup Do you remember those kidney pies Old Nan used to make?', "They're killers. And Arya was one of them. What do you think she's after?", "The Boltons have Winterfell. . The marriage proposal, it wasn't for you?", 'Theon, you have to tell me, do you have any idea where Bran and Rickon--', 'sees ARYA in the courtyard speaking with BRIENNE and stops to watch her.', 'Glover has 500 men. Royce has 2,000. Offend them and Jon loses his army.', "It's a pleasure to make your acquaintance, Lady Arryn. My name is Al...", "Joffrey won't let me leave. He's got too many reasons to keep me here.", "But you're a bastard, a true born will always have the stronger claim.", "I heard him say 5,000 once when he was talking about Stannis's attack.", 'I made it like the one Father used to wear. As near as I can remember.', "If Ramsay wins, I'm not going back there alive. Do you understand me?", 'You are. You are. They respect you, they really do, but you have to--', 'All dwarfs are bastards in their father\'s eyes." What does that mean?', 'I should have thanked you the moment you arrived. That was a mistake.', "I shouldn't have to tell you to do things. You should just do them.", "I don't see what all the fuss is about. Why do men love it so much?", "Your father's last living true born son. You're Lord of Winterfell.", 'Do you know what she is now? Do you know what the Faceless Men are?', "Well, don't get used to it. You're still very strange and annoying.", 'Brienne has been loyal to me, always. I trust her more than anyone.', 'I only meant… it would be bad luck to kill a man on your name day.', "It's just strange. In his own horrible way, I believe he loved me.", 'Tyrion is a good man. He was never anything but decent towards me.', 'So is Lord Tyrion. They were both to be brought to this gathering.', 'No. Do you trust the carriage driver or the knights escorting us?', "I can't marry him. You can't make me. He's a traitor. A murderer.", "You're angry. Sometimes anger makes people do unfortunate things.", "I haven't played with dolls since I was eight. May I be excused?", 'They are your guests under your protection. You asked them here.', "He's such a splendid fighter. Do you have any idea when we might", 'How do I make the best of my circumstances? I have to marry him.', "I'm not afraid of the pain. Not after what Joffrey's done to me.", 'And I vow...that you shall always have a place by my hearth and…', 'Did you bend the knee to save the North or because you love her?', 'The Dragon Queen. Your divided loyalties would become a problem.', "If they'd have executed you, what would they have done with me?", "So there's no punishment for treason and no reward for loyalty?", "Do you think Joffrey will like me? What if he thinks I'm ugly?", "I didn't know I needed a new handmaiden. You're not from here.", 'She has, my lord, but King Joffrey sent for me to see him off.', 'She could want me dead because she thinks I wronged my family.', "Goodbye Lord Royce, and thank you for all you've done for me.", "I won't let him I'll tell him the truth about Bran and Rickon", 'A raven came from the Citadel. A white raven. Winter is here.', 'So does Hand of the Queen. Depending on the queen, I suppose.', "Will you pardon me, my lord? I'd like to visit the godswood.", 'I thought you still mourn the death of my beloved Aunt Lysa.', "His father's dead. Ramsay killed him. And now he has Rickon.", 'My uncle the Blackfish has reformed it and retaken Riverrun.', "Well, he's not making it easy. The northern lords are proud.", 'To kill me for marrying our enemies and betraying my family.', "Bran has no interest in ruling and he can't father children.", "I'm sorry if I offended you, Ser. Why won't he speak to me?", 'Yes, he chose her… and then he kidnapped her and raped her.', 'Cersei told you her army was coming north to fight for you?', "Men do stupid things for women. They're easily manipulated.", "Jeyne Poole's mother had five children, all of them girls.", "My grandfather and uncle were murdered here, weren't they?", "Ser Loras would never do that! There's no honor in tricks.", "I can't take it. It's very, very kind of you, but I can't.", "Knocking things down isn't fixing them. It's ruining them.", 'So where are we going? To a land where you trust everyone?', 'You heard them. We need more men and my uncle has an army.', 'drops the papers in her hand on a table and looks at ARYA.', 'Lord Tyrion was kind, he was gentle, he never touched me.', "You haven't fed them in seven days. You said it yourself.", "You're abandoning your people. Your abandoning your home.", "Stop them. Don't let them do it. Please! It wasn't Lady!", "Please let me go home. l won't do any treason, l swear –"]

Name: arya stark
Sentence: ["One time the boys were shooting arrows with Ser Rodrick. I came out here after and Bran had left his bow behind just lying on the ground. Ser Rodrick would have cuffed him if he saw. There was one arrow in the target. There was no one around, just like now. No one to stop me. So I started shooting. And every shot I had to go out there and get my one arrow and walk back and shoot it again. I wasn't very good. Finally I hit the bullseye. It could have been the 20th shot or the 50th. I don't remember. But I hit the bullseye and I heard this.", "is in the kennels observing PETER BAELISH and a Winterfell servant having a conversation. The servent is whispering in BAELISH's ear. ARYA can't hear the conversation. ARYA sees BAELISH hand the servant a raven scroll. The servant turns to leave. BAELISH senses someone is watching him and he looks to where ARYA stood but she has already vanished. BAELISH turns and leaves the kennels.", "Father has been charged with treason. He conspired with Robert's brothers against my beloved Joffrey and tried to steal his throne. The Lannisters are treating me well and providing me with every comfort. I beg you, come to King's Landing, swear fealty to King Joffrey and prevent any strife between the great houses of Lannister and Stark. Your faithful sister, Sansa.", "I know. Don't be afraid. I used to be like you. I was sick. I was dying. But my father never gave up on me. He loved me. More than anything in the world, just like your father loves you. So he brought me here. My father prayed to the many faced god. And I drank the water from this fountain. It healed me.", "I looked up and he's standing right here smiling down at me. I knew what I was doing was against the rules. But he was smiling so I knew it wasn't wrong. The rules were wrong. I was doing what I was meant to be doing and he knew it. Now he's dead. Killed by the Lannisters with your help.", "is on the upper level looking down at BAELISH. He is having a conversation with ROBETT GLOVER and YOHN ROYCE. She can't hear what's being said. BAELISH finishes his conversation and walks away from the men. ARYA disappears behind the corner and continues following BAELISH.", 'Iit took a while but I finally saved enough to buy myself an oyster cart. Now every morning I make my way down to the canals. I pass the fish mongers and the bakers. I usually see Lhara, my first customer of the day on my way home. Then I turn left onto Moonsinger Lane--', 'The northern lords will read it. They wouldn\'t think much of Lady Sansa if they knew how she did Cersei\'s bidding. What would little Lyanna Mormont say? She\'s younger than you were when you wrote this. Are you going to say, "But I was just a child"?', 'is pushing BRAN in his wheelchair and SANSA is next to them. The Stark children are walking back through the gate of Winterfell. Men are milling around doing various jobs. BRIENNE and PODRICK see the Stark children all back at Winterfell together.', "My father is Hand of the King! I'm not a boy. I'm Arya Stark of Winterfell and if you lay a hand on me, my father will have both your heads on spikes! Now are you going to let me by or do I need to smack you on the ear to help with your hearing?", 'And you were stupid enough to believe them. I remember you standing on that platform with Joffrey and Cersei when they dragged father too the block. I remember the pretty dress you were wearing. I remember the fancy way you did your hair.', 'That\'s your pretty handwriting. Septa Mordane used to crack my knuckles because I couldn\'t write as well as you. "Robb, I write to you today with heavy heart. Our good King Robert is dead. Killed from wounds he took in a boar hunt --', "is walking down the hallway. She pauses, peers around a corner and looks towards the door of BAELISH's quarters. BAELISH appears and unlocks his door. Before he walks in MAESTER WOLKAN approaches him. She continues watching the men.", "You were the first person on my list, you know. For killing Syrio Forel, remember him? Probably not. I've gotten a few of the others. The Many Faced God stole a few more for me. I'm glad he left me you. Do you know who I am?", "A man called the Hound. Sandor Clegane. He tried to sell me but was wounded in a fight. He begged me to kill him but I wouldn't. I left him in the mountains to die. I wanted him to suffer, I hated him.", "The queen loves her son more than anything. And he was taken from her before she could say good-bye. She wouldn't just cry. She would be angry. She would want to kill the person who did this to her.", "It's a hundred feet wide. How could we have passed it? If we hit the Red Fork, we can follow it west to Riverrun. My mother grew up there. My grandfather, he's a lord. He'll protect us.", 'is glancing around Winterfell. Men are working building tools and cutting wood. ARYA looks over and sees a Winterfell flag sigil hanging from the wall. The two guards are still arguing.', "You want it? l'll give it to you. l already killed one fat boy. l bet you never killed anyone. l bet you're a liar. But l'm not. l'm good at killing fat boys. l like killing fat boys.", "No, I mean, what are you doing up here? You joined the Brotherhood. You went beyond the Wall with Jon. You're here now. Why? When was the last time you fought for anyone but yourself?", 'Thank you, Nymeria. Septa Mordane says I have to do it again. "My things weren\'t properly folded", she says. Who cares how they\'re folded?! They\'re going to get all messed up anyway.', "approaches the main gate on foot. Two guards are huddled by a brazier getting warm. There's indistinct chatter. One of the men notice ARYA walking to the gate and approach her.", "We were just watering the horses. We'll be on our way. Forgive my father. He was wounded fighting in the war. Our cottage burned down while he was gone and my mother with it.", "You're doing it wrong. You need to burn away that horrible bit there. Otherwise it's gonna get infected and fester. I know you don't like fire, but if you don't do it right-", 'looks down at the Valyrian dagger and unsheathes it. She approaches BRIENNE flipping the knife several times in her fingers. BRIENNE takes the dagger and examines it.', 'You murdered Mycah. The butchers boy. My friend. He was twelve years old. He was unarmed. And you rode him down. You slung him over your horse like he was some deer.', "Are you scared I'll show it to Jon and he'll be angry? No. That's not Jon. He'll understand. You were just a scared little girl all alone with the wicked Lannisters.", "My name is Lana. I'm an orphan. When I was 8 I begged enough money to buy my first bucket of oysters, and I sold that bucket and made enough money to buy 2 more.", 'I stabbed him in the gut. I tried to find my mother and brother. I never did. They were murdered by Walder Frey. An outlaw kidnapped me. A man called Polliver.', "I'm getting into this castle one way or another. If I'm not who I say I am, I won't last long. But if I am, and Sansa finds out that you turned me away...", 'Even a smith\'s apprentice can do better than "really bad." What do they look like? What do they smell like? How do they move? How hard are they to kill?', "They say he rides into battle on the back of a giant direwolf. They say he can turn into a wolf himself when he wants. They say he can't be killed.", 'is standing look at a statue of Ned Stark holding his sword. ARYA hears a sound and turns to see SANSA approaching. SANSA stops when she sees ARYA.', "Have you lost your mind? When the Lannisters find this place, you think they'll spare the smiths? They'll cave your head in with your own helmet.", "I don't care what you swear because you're a liar. You lied to Gendry, you lied to me. You'll lie to anyone. I hope the Lannisters kill you all.", 'collects her sword. SANSA walks away. BAELISH remains on the balcony staring at ARYA who looks up at him. BAELISH bows to ARYA and walks away.', 'Joffrey. Cersei. Walder Frey. Meryn Trant. Tywin Lannister. The Red Woman. Beric Dondarrion. Thoros of Myr. Ilyn Payne. The Mountain.', "That's your stupid pride talking. It's why you'll never be a great killer. I'd have killed Joffrey with a chicken bone if I had to.", "I'm not lying! They said you found the bastard and the wolves are fighting the lions and the savage... something about the savage.", "You're so dangerous, aren't you? Saying scary things to little girls. Killing little boys and old people. A real hard man you are.", "My name is Arya Stark. I want you to know that. The last thing you're ever going to see is a Stark smiling down at you as you die.", "He says every swordsman should study cats. They're quiet as shadows and as light as feathers. You have to be quick to catch them.", 'keeps glancing at the men. They look uneasy. They bring her inside of the gate. They indicate towards a cart near the entrance.', "Father used to watch us from up here. He wouldn't say much. You probably don't remember. You were inside knitting all the time.", "And I know why, too. I heard what your brother did to you. Pressed your face to the fire like you're a nice juicy mutton chop.", 'I was never going to be as good a lady as you. So I had to be something else. I never could have survived what you survived.', 'Joffrey. Cersei. llyn Payne. The Hound. Joffrey. Cersei. llyn Payne. The Hound. Joffrey. Cersei. llyn Payne. The Hound.', "You think I'm gonna escape? Where would I go? I'd be dead by nightfall without you. My family's gone. I've got no one.", "Jon. She knows who you are. Who you really are. You'll always be a threat to her. And I know a killer when I see one.", "Westeros. My family home is Winterfell. I'm the youngest daughter of a great lord. Eddard Stark. He died in battle.", "And if Jon doesn't come back, you'll need their support, so you can work together to give you what you really want.", 'Did they. With a knife at your throat? Did they put you on a rack and stretch you until your bones started to pop?', 'Oysters, clams, and cockels! Oysters, clams, and cockels! Oysters, clams, and cockels! Oysters, clams, and cock--', 'I close my eyes and I see them up there. All of them standing there. Joffrey, the Queen and... and my sister.', 'When people ask you what happened here, tell them the North remembers. Tell them winter came for House Frey.', "You're scared, aren't you? What are you scared of? You didn't commit any crimes. No one's going to hang you.", "Syrio says every hurt is a lesson and every lesson makes you better. Tomorrow I'm going to be chasing cats.", 'steps forward and throws her arms around BRAN. SANSA smiles in the background. ARYA lets go and steps back.', "You were Yoren's prisoners when he was taking me to the Wall. He told me he'd fuck me bloody with a stick.", "Nymeria, it's me, Arya. I'm heading north, girl, back to Winterfell. I'm finally going home. Come with me.", "You go on down the road. Just keep on singing so we know where you are. Leave us be and I won't kill you.", 'At least I could have been there to watch. I wanted to see the look in his eyes when he knew it was over.', 'Me too. I was angry when I heard someone else had done it. However long my list got he was always first.', "I want to. But I can't. I need to find my brother and mother. And my sister. I need to find her, too.", 'Her father was Eddard Stark Her mother was Catelyn Stark She had one sister, Sansa, and four brothers', 'Which one is the Many-Faced God? I see the Stranger. I see the Drowned God. I see the Weirwood Face.', 'After he was executed I fled the capital. Had to kill a stable boy. Drove my sword through his back.', "I didn't betray him. I didn't betray Robb. I didn't betray our entire family for my beloved Joffrey.", 'Tell them to stop. Come on. He wants to be one of you. He wants to join the Brotherhood. Stop them!', "No! I've been here for weeks. I'm not scrubbing one more corpse until you tell me why I'm doing it.", 'My mother served Lady Dustin for many years, my lord. She taught me how to speak proper Properly.', "He was my friend. Polliver stole my sword and put it right through his neck. He's still got it.", 'Cersei, Walder Frey, The Mountain, Meryn Trant. Cersei, Walder Frey, The Mountain, Meryn Trant.', 'The greatest swordsman who ever lived. Syrio Forel, the First Sword to the Sealord of Braavos.', 'Visenya Targaryen was a great warrior. She had a Valyrian steel sword she called Dark Sister.', "You've got to go. They'll kill you for what you did to Joffrey. Go on... run. Go! Leave now!", 'is watching the sparring session from across the courtyard. She begins to approach Brienne.', 'I hate them! I hate all of them. The Hound, the Queen and the King and Joffrey and Sansa.', 'I know him. The small one. His name is Polliver. He captured us and took us to Harrenhal.', "You said that I could be your apprentice. You said you'd teach me how to a Faceless Man.", 'I was trying to learn. I asked Mycah to practice with me. I asked him. It was my fault.', "You're thinking it right now. You don't want to be, but the thought just won't go away.", "smiles and looks at SANSA. SANSA doesn't smile back. The smile fades from ARYA's face.", "My name's not Arry. It's Arya. Of House Stark. Yoren is taking me home to Winterfell.", "Why don't you have any money? Didn't you steal anything from Joffrey before you left?", 'Joffrey. Cersei. Ilyn Payne. Ser Meryn. The Hound. What are you going to do with me?', "That doesn't look like him. It should have been carved by someone who knew his face.", "We're probably going to die soon. I want to know what it's like before that happens.", 'So change it. It would all just be farting, belching, and slapping without you.', "Gendry's an armorer's apprentice. Hot Pie, tell Gendry what makes it a battle.", "Someday I'm gonna put a sword through your eye and out the back of your skull.", "They killed Jory. My father is hurt. I don't care about stupid wooden swords.", 'Barrowton, my lord. House Dustin. Two crossed longaxes beneath a black crown.', "I don't need to take a piss… Lommy and Hot Pie can't know. No one can know.", "When Beric's sword went up in flames, you looked like a scared little girl.", 'You protected him for most of his life. You think you could have saved him?', "The Many Faced God. You said you didn't know what I would see at the docks.", "He wants to be a knight of the King's Guard. He can't be one now, can he?", 'If we were going north, we should have come to the Red Fork River by now.', "You're a long way from home. I'm sure you've had some adventures, though.", "It wasn't just Aegon riding his dragon. It was Rhaenys and Visenya, too.", "I wouldn't need a cabin. Please, I could work, scrubbing the floors, or…", "I've devoted my life to him now. You don't want to hurt anymore. Drink.", "Are you dying because of your leg? Is that why you're sending us home?", "Why are you helping him? He takes us prisoner and now he's our friend?", 'How do you sleep when you... when you have those things in your head?', "He's taking his army to attack my brother. I need him dead right now.", "Nothing isn't better or worse than anything. Nothing is just nothing.", 'A girl will poison the rum. Lady Crane is the only one who drinks it.', "That's not true! She just... Bit him a little. He was hurting Mycah.", "You can't. I've got my lessons with Syrio. I'm finally getting good.", 'How long after I give you the name does it take you to kill someone?', 'Could you bring back a man without a head? Not six times. Just once.', "You'd be like a kitten to him. He'd kill you with his little finger.", "You're fine with murdering little boys, but thieving is beneath you?", 'You always liked nice things. It made you feel better than everyone.', 'So was I. I would have let them kill me before I betrayed my family.', "Sometimes fear makes them do unfortunate things. I'll go with anger.", 'looks down at the dagger. She steps forward and takes it from BRAN.', "I'm just the executioner. You passed the sentence. You're the Lady.", "You said I'd shut many eyes forever. You were right about that too.", "Say another word about killing my brother and I'll cut your throat.", "No one knows. It's where all the maps stop. That's where I'm going.", "But he's going to tell Tywin. He's getting away. It has to be now.", "No one's going to believe you're a hog farmer if you eat them all.", "Send for Maester Llewyn or Ser Rodrick. They'll tell you who I am.", "You should make mine first. And make sure it's stronger than this.", 'If the captain dies, the thin man pays his family a lot of money.', "I'm not spending my final hours with you two miserable old shits.", "Stupider. Night's Watch doesn't take girls, everyone knows that.", "The younger actress. She's jealous because Lady Crane is better.", "Essos is east and Westeros is west. But what's west of Westeros?", "Sansa can keep her sewing needles. I've got a needle of my own.", "You're a liar. And if you told the truth, Mycah would be alive.", "Robb needs good men, too. We're leaving tomorrow. And then you-", "The lion's not his sigil, idiot. He's a stag, like his father.", "That fleabite's got you walking a lot slower than you used to.", "Well who are you? What are you doing here? How'd you get here?", 'Do you have any stale ones from yesterday? Or any burnt ones?', "You're not doing this for your god. You're doing it for gold.", "You swore to serve both of my mother's daughters, didn't you?", 'In winter, we must protect ourselves. Look after one another.', "If you got within a mile of a battle, you'd fill your pants.", 'Please. I crossed the Narrow Sea. I have nowhere else to go.', "Go ask Jon Snow then, the King in the North. He's my brother", "He didn't beat the hound. You did. I want to train with you.", "But what about Riverrun? It's not south. It's west of here.", 'Jaqen got us out of Harrenhal, so why are you complaining?', 'What happened to the actress? The one who wanted you dead.', "That was a nice ax you made for him. You've gotten better.", 'Syrio says a water dancer can stand on one toe for hours.', "You're practicing for a fight. You should practice right.", "People coming. You can shit later, there's people coming!", 'So why would a captain make the wager in the first place?', 'Oysters, clams, and cockels! Oysters, clams, and cockels!', "I believe that's the nicest thing you've ever said to me.", "What are gold cloaks doing this far from King's Landing?", "I knew fear when I saw it in you. You're afraid of fire.", 'retrieves a raven scroll from her pocket and unrolls it.', "Were you with other girls before that in King's Landing?", 'They were insulting Jon and you sat there and listened.', "I was there standing in the crowd near Baelor's statue.", "Oh, I don't know about that. I can imagine quite a lot.", "Did... Forgive me, my lord. I shouldn't ask questions.", 'He didn\'t say. He just said, "Walk through the gates."', "A girl is Arya Stark of Winterfell and I'm going home.", 'Take care of yourself, Hot Pie. Try not to get killed.', "I'm not the Red Woman. Take your own bloody pants off.", 'No. I mean yes. My mother was a lady, and my sister -', "Face, tits, balls- I hit 'em right where I wanted to.", 'Oysters clams and cockles! Oysters clams and cockles!', "He was not on her list anymore She'd taken him off it", "You wouldn't be safe. Not while she's looking for me.", 'The Hound does whatever the Prince tells him to do.', "You're one of them now. I should have let you burn.", "Gendry's a smith. He was apprenticed in the armory.", "You can't let him go. He's a murderer. He's guilty.", 'But you did. You took the gold and you gave him up.', 'Let me wash it out and help you sew it up at least.', 'Left onto Ragman Lane, where I do most of my trade.', 'If a girl could use one of the faces from the hall…', 'If Jon Snow is gone who is in charge of Winterfell?', 'Why would a cutthroat have a Valyrian steel dagger?', "Leave me be. My father's a lord. He'll reward you.", "Tywin Lannister was right here, and now he's gone.", "Syrio didn't have a sword. Or armor. Just a stick.", "It'll only take a second. It won't hurt that much.", 'I came to kill Cersei. Your queen got there first.', "That's Jaime Lannister. The queen's twin brother.", "He's a liar and a coward and he killed my friend.", 'No goodo s ever come? Who asked questions before?', "I don't know his name. They call him the Tickler.", "That's a lie! I hit Joffrey. Mycah just ran away.", 'Mine never wanted to. Said fighting was for boys.', "That's a pretty song. I've never heard it before.", 'It suits you, Lady Stark. Jon left you in charge?', "I wasn't playing. And I don't want to be a lady.", 'But how you can let her marry someone like that?', "Now that Bran's awake will he come live with us?", "And I don't have to go with you if I don't want.", "Back to King's Landing to Joffrey and the queen.", "I don't think I could remember all of the lines.", "Don't fight someone like her in the first place.", 'Did the Lord of Light tell you that or did she?', "I'm Arya Stark. I'm going to kill Queen Cersei.", "Hey, where's everyone going? What's happening?", "I need him now. Lord Tywin's marching tonight.", "Mine neither, but our stories aren't over yet.", 'How did you survive a knife through the heart?', 'Could l have one? A lemon one or any of them.', 'Show me how. I want to be able to do it, too.', "You're wrong. I know a killer. A real killer.", 'If he were here right now, what would you do?', 'Arya Stark left him to die He was on her list', 'Cersei Lannister, Gregor Clegane, Walder Frey', "He didn't. He trusted you to hold it for him.", "You can't stay here. You have to keep moving.", "You wouldn't let anyone kill him, would you?", 'The little lady wants away from your stench.', "You're the worst shit in the Seven Kingdoms.", "You shouldn't be sitting out here like this.", "Nobody does. That's where all the maps stop.", 'stares at BRAN. ARYA turns to look at SANSA.', "I didn't see them, but I think one was fat.", "I'll fetch more wood for the fire, my lord.", 'How did you kill those guards? Was it hard?', 'What do we do with them after we wash them?', 'He was never a traitor! Joffrey is a liar.', 'Rhaenys rode Meraxes. Visenya rode Vhagar.', "I'm not joking. A man can go kill himself.", 'You just said you were serving Lord Beric.', "And you're sure we're going the right way?", "I told you, I'm no - . Do that again and -", 'Which name would you like a girl to speak?', "Oh, no, I couldn't. You don't have enough.", 'Why would I go there? The Boltons have it.', "It's a long story. I imagine yours is too.", 'You remember the last time you were here?', "What are you doing? We're about to leave."]

Name: davos
Sentence: ["Quite little, Your Grace. Verging on none. You could have freed me yesterday or tomorrow, but you came to me now before this boy is put to the knife because you knew I'd counsel restraint. You came to hear me say it because you believe it yourself. You're not a man who slaughters innocents for gain or glory. When my son was five he said to me, 'I don't ever want to die. ' I wanted to say to him, 'You won't, child. You won't ever.' I hated the idea of him lying awake in the dark, afraid. I think mothers and fathers made up the gods because they wanted their children to sleep through the night.", "But if destiny has brough Daenerys Targaryen back to our shores, it has also made Jon Snow King in the North. You were the first to bring Dothraki to Westeros. He was the first to make allies with Wildlings and northmen. He was named Lord Commander of the Night's Watch. He was named King in the North. Not because of his birthright. He has no birthright. He's a damn bastard. All those hard son's of bitches chose him as their leader because they believe in him.", "If it weren't for you and your men, we wouldo ve lost the war with the dead. This country owes you a debt it can never repay, but let us try. There is land in the Reach. Good land. The people that used to live there are gone. Make it your own. Start your own house with the Unsullied as your bannermen. We've had enough war. Thousands of you, thousands of them. You know how it ends.
