We need to find a better way.", "They may well be loyal, but how many rose up against the Boltons when they betrayed your family? I may not know the North, but I know men. They're more or less the same in any corner of the world and even the bravest of them don't want to see their wives and children skinned for a lost cause. If Jon's going to convince them to fight alongside him, they need to believe it's a fight they can win.", "Because you deserve it. My son was always on me trying to teach me to read. Gods, I was stubborn about it. Made it this far without reading, seemed to me I could make it to the grave. I wish I had listened to them. This is my own poor way of saying thank you for teaching me to be a grown up. I'll be gone for a few days, Princess. I'll want to hear all about the dance of dragons when I'm back.", "You want to spend your last few years on the sea, stealing from Pentoshi cheesemongers and Midanese silk merchants, then go. They're out there waiting for you. That's easy. What I'm offering you is hard. Come with me and plunder the greatest city in Westeros. You'll be the richest man in Lysene. And the most famous. They'll be singing songs about you as long as men have voices to sing.", "Of course. Almost got beheaded by a First Sword of Braavos. I tried to explain to him the difference between pirates and smugglers, but he didn't seem any more interested in the distinction than your father. I suppose if you work for the Iron Bank of Braavos and each one of your gold barges is worth half a kingdom, you tend not to be overly concerned with the kind of distinction...", "Your uncle, Lord Commander Mormont, made that man his steward. He chose Jon to be his successor because he knew had the courage to do what was right, even if it meant giving his life. Because Jeor Mormont and Jon Snow both understood that the real war isn't between a few squabbling houses. It's between the living and the dead. And make no mistake, my lady, the dead are coming.", "You never thought you'd find yourself in your position. Being responsible for so many lives at such a young age. I never thought I'd be in my position. I was a crabber's son, then I was a smuggler. And now I found myself addressing the lady of a great house in time of war. But I'm here because this isn't someone else's war. It's our war.", "Your Grace, the world has got so far bent. I've seen things crawl out of nightmares, but my eyes were open. I don't know if Robb Stark died because of the Red Woman's sorcery or because at war men die all the time, but I do know that uniting the Seven Kingdoms with blood magic is wrong. It is evil. And you are not an evil man.", "Wait, that's enough. “The shield that guards the realm of men.” That's what you swore to be. Now I'm not a learned man, but the best way of helping the most people might not be sitting in a frozen castle at the edge of the world. It just might mean wading in the muck, getting your boots dirty, and doing what needs to be doing.", "Fermented crab. One bucket of this triples the brothel's earnings for the week. A man thinks he's done, he's ready to go back to his loving family, but before he gets his britches up his lady of the hour pops a tiny spoon of that into his mouth. Five minutes later, he's back in the race. Here, have a taste.", "We're willing to use blood magic to put you on the throne, but we're not willing to pay men to fight? Now the Red Woman's magic is real. Her visions and prophecies may be, too, but I've never heard of visions and prophecies winning a war. Soldiers win wars. Soldiers on the ground. It's dirty on the ground.", "You are now. Look, I made it through most of my years without ever getting near a fight, but then I survived the Battle of the Bastards. Right outside these walls. If I can live through that, you can live through this. They'll outfit you with weapons at the forge. Right that way.", "You want me to have a god, fine. King Stannis is my god. He raised me up and blessed me with his trust. He gave you a future I could never have imagined. You know how to read, you'll be a knight someday. You think your fire god commanded all that? It was Stannis. Only Stannis.", "Her gratitude is lovely, but that's not my point. The Northmen are loyal to Jon Snow, not to her. They don't know her. The Free Folk don't know her. I've been up here a while, and I'm telling you, they're stubborn as goats. You want their loyalty, you have to earn it.", "As long as the Boltons hold Winterfell, the North is divided. And a divided North won't stand a chance against the Night King. You want to protect your people, my lady. I understand. But there's no hiding from this. We have to fight and we need to do it together.", "Begging your pardon, I think it's a problem for now. There's only one reliable leader left in Westeros. Stannis. He's got the birthright. He's in his prime. He's a tried and tested battle commander. And he doesn't just talk about paying people back, he does it.", "Aye, old Balerion's definitely better than anything your cousin Rylene's got on offer. But now that I'm your father's Hand again, I have to keep him informed. The king does not have time for this drudgery. 'To all the lords and knobble men of Westeros.'", "This is the payment that was demanded by King Stannis for my crimes. I consider it an honest accounting. He's an honest man and he's your best chance to get back the money you've sunk into Westeros. Which is a lot, I imagine. Wars are expensive.", "All those things you don't believe in, he faced those things. He fought those things for the good of his people. He risked his life for his people. He took a knife in the heart for his people. He gave his own --", 'Never got the chance. She did it to herself. Or her god did it to her. Lord of Light. We play his game for him, we fight his war and win, and then he fucks off. No signs, no blessings. Who knows what he wants?', 'scoops up a bit of fermented crab and offers it to the guards. Both men reach out and take a pinch. The guards sniff the crab and put it in their mouth. They both recoil from the taste and look at each other.', "Our army outnumber theirs five-to-one. Those walls have never been breached, and the men guarding the walls, when they see you, they don't see a liberator, they see a stranger come to set their city on fire.", "It's from Maester Aemon of the Night's Watch. Their Lord Commander is dead. Took a ranging party north and never made it back. One lad did, though. What he saw beyond the Wall- it's coming for all of us.", "And tho- and thowg V-v-visenya Targaryen rod- rode Vhagar- Vhag-' Fuck me. 'Visenya Targaryen rode Vhagar, the smallest of the dragons, though still large enog- enough- enough to swallow a horse whole.", "Well, strictly speaking, I didn't do the thieving. That would be the pirates. I just moved what they stole from one place to another. {DAVOS removes his right glove to show the stubs of his fingers.", "A proposal is what I'm proposing. On the off chance that we survive the Night King, what if the Seven Kingdoms, for once in their whole shit history, were ruled by a just woman and an honorable man?", "It's crucial that we let them charge at us. They've got the numbers, we need the patience. If we let him buckle our center, he'll pursue. Then we'll have him surrounded on three sides.", "You can't stop him alone. You need someone to rebuild your army for you, someone to convince this lord and that lord to fight for you, to bring sellswords and pirates to your side.", "Easterners have a difference sense of time, I've often found. Once I was waiting for Salladhor Saan here in Braavos. Together, we were going to run three shiploads of the finest--", 'A band of 20 men, maybe less. They were in and out before anyone spotted them, burnt our food stores to the ground, all our siege weapons were destroyed, dozens of tents were--', "Stannis has just begun the fight. His bannermen will rally to his cause. There's no man in the Seven Kingdoms more honorable than Stannis Baratheon. Or more worthy of loyalty.", "It wasn't the Boltons defeated Stannis. It was Stannis himself. I loved the man. He lifted me up and made me something. But he had demons in his skull whispering foul things.", "He was the most experienced commander in Westeros. He chose this place for a reason. Those mountains are a natural fortification. There's a stream down there for the horses.", "Of course you do. Every time you leave harbor, you're leaving on a promise. A promise that somewhere on the seas, somebody's got some gold and you can take it from them.", "Renly wronged you. Renly declared himself king when the throne belonged to you. He raised an army, stole your bannermen. This boy has done you no harm. He's an innocent.", 'The Street of Steel, with your armor and your knights? Pfft. You lived in the fancy part of town. And here we are now. Two boys from Flea Bottom in the castle of a king.', "Because you're a smart gambler. Stannis has proved himself in war. Twice. His baby brother has never set foot on a battlefield. Neither has the false king, Joffrey.", "That's not his way. He knows the North is watching. If the other houses sense weakness on his part, they'll stop fearing him. He can't have that. Fear is his power.", "I wish I had a God, truly! I'm not mocking you, but I've seen men pray to every God there is. Pray for wind, pray for rain, pray for home. None of it works!", "That's good. The Blackfish is a legend. His support would mean a great deal. Stark, Tully, a few more houses, almost starts to look like a winning side.", 'It reminds me of where I come from and where I am now. It reminds me of your justice. It was an honest punishment and you were good with the cleaver.', "The shit that poured from their privy pipes flowed down the side of Aegon's Hill along Tanner's Row and right in front of my front door on Gin Alley.", "I did it for my son. I didn't want him to step over a river of shit every time he stepped through his front door. I wanted him to have a better life.", "Aim for that star. Don't stop. There's bread and water. Go slow with it. If you finish it off, no matter how thirsty you get, don't drink seawater.", 'walks to the side of the shop and inspects a rack of swords. He pulls one, nods in approval and puts it back in its place. He turns back to GENDRY.', "I don't know Maybe we'll never know What does it matter? You go on You fight for as long as you can You clean up as much of the shit as you can", 'The only way for what? They all died anyway! You told everyone Stannis was the one. You had him believing it, all of them fooled. And you lied.', "Not to defeat Cersei. You could storm King's Landing tomorrow and the city would fall. Hell, we almost took it and we didn't even have dragons.", "You saved their bloody lives. If they're going to live in the Seven Kingdoms, safe behind our wall, they ought to fight for the damn place.", "40 horses died in the night. We'll lose more come sunset. We're running out of food. We can't open the supply line until the snow clears.", "It's not enough I didn't know Lord Commander Snow for long, but I have to believe he wouldn't have wanted his friends to die for nothing", "and TYRION are standing on the beach of King's Landing. DAVOS is securing a small row boat. TYRION is looking up towards the city walls.", 'Sounds like a charmer. Of course, the casual mention of a Dothraki horde, a legion of Unsullied and three dragons, a bit less charming.', "King's Landing hasn't been home for twenty years. I spent most of my life dodging the royal fleet. And now I'm sailing right at them.", "If we don't put asside our enmities and band together we will die. And then it doesn't matter whose skeleton sits on the Iron Throne.", 'My son wishes me to change it. Three mermen with tridents, something like that. I understand why the older families look down at me.', 'To His Grace King Stannis Baratheon. Invaded- inv- invit- invited to the name day celebration for Rylene Florent on the first nigit-', 'Westeros is not the world, Your Grace. We need to look east for ships and men. 10,000 skilled soldiers fight for the Golden Company.', 'This is Stannis of the House Baratheon, King of the Andals and the First Men, Lord of the Seven Kingdoms and Protector of the Realm.', "Forgive me, Your Grace, I never claimed to be an expert in military matters. But if we can't march forward, and we won't march back…", 'Not so long ago, the Starks and the Karstarks were slaughtering each other on the battlefield. Jon Snow brought peace to the houses.', "I do not judge people for the gods they worship. If I did, I'd have thrown you in the sea before you ever set foot on Dragonstone.", "I understand. But since you haven't yet unnamed me Hand of the King, it is my duty to advise you against it. You're gonna need me.", "Your Grace, you are the rightful king. Not only by blood. You're an honorable man, a just man. And there is still a war to fight.", 'Aside from the Starks and the Boltons, the most powerful houses in the North are the Umbers, the Karstarks, and the Manderlys.', "Your Grace, I'm honored, but my time on the sea was spent evading ships, not attacking them. The other lords won't be happy.", "Forgive me, Your Grace, I'm not a learned man, but is there a difference between kill and sacrifice? The boy is your nephew.", "Uh, Your Grace. Wouldn't it be better to wait? When Jon Snow returns with the wildlings, we could have thousands more men.", "Unless there's a thaw, we can't press forward to Winterfell, and we don't have enough food to get us back to Castle Black.", "I beg your pardon, my lady, but they know that a Stark beheaded their father. I don't think we can count on them either.", "I walk. Think and walk. Think and walk until I'm far enough away from camp that no one can hear me shitting my guts out.", "Fuck him, then Fuck all of them I'm not a devout man, obviously Seven Gods, drowned gods, tree gods, it's all the same", "I haven't been here in years. Why should they recognize me? Sometimes I hardly do. Nothing fucks you harder than time.", "You were dead And now you're not That's completely fucking mad, seems to me I can only imagine how it seems to you", "Unpleasant man. He thinks you're a traitor. What's your life going to be like on the Wall with Thorne in command?", 'No, thanks. It does sound delicious, but I better keep a clear head. I can never sleep the night before a battle.', "You're just Clovis, a smith who's come to pay his respects before he heads off to work at the Winterfell forges.", 'Your Grace, the Lannisters are the true enemy. If, for the time being, you could make peace with your brother -', "Apologies. I have a Flea Bottom accent, I know. But Jon Snow is King in the North, Your Grace. He's not a lord.", 'Not for you? I saw you drink poison that shouldo ve killed you I saw you give birth to a demon made of shadows', "Row for a full day and night and you'll reach Rook's Rest. You'll want to stop there. Don't. She'll find you.", "That happened once, weeks ago. You're your father's daughter, no mistake. Bloody relentless, the both of you.", "Friends, please. We've been cutting each other's throats long enough. Torgo Nudho. Am I saying that properly?", "I'm sure he doesn't, but we do if we're going to war. If not Renly, Your Grace, join forces with Robb Stark.", "She's a foreigner preaching her foreign religion. Some believe she whispers orders in your ear and you obey.", 'Many years ago I helped King Stannis out of a difficult situation. He rewarded me with a lordship. And this.', 'He worshipped the gods of his fathers and their fathers before him. They were the gods of your fathers, too.', 'We have. These projects will begin as soon as the Master of Coin and Lord of Lofty Titles provides funding.', "Have you now? . How does the Night's Watch vow go again? I bet you've got it memorized since you got here.", "You can't lead a raid beyond the wall. You're not in the Night's Watch anymore. You're King in the North.", "He sees something in you. . Might not be apparent from his tone, but it's the truth. He believes in you.", "Well, life's been good since you hacked them off, Your Grace. And it's four less fingernails to clean.", "I can smuggle you in, but if the Goldcloaks were to recognize you, I'm warning you, I'm not a fighter.", "As my father used to say, it's better to be a coward for a minute than dead for the rest of your life.", "The Umbers and the Karstarks have already declared for the Boltons, so we're not doing so well there.", 'I figured I could wait to die freezing my balls off out there or wait to die nice and warm in here.', 'I looked in shops, taverns, brothels. I should have known to come straight to the Street of Steel.', 'is still standing behind the guards. He retrieves his gold pouch again and holds it up shaking it.', "Boys, I've been running from men like that ll my life In my learned opinion, we open that door --", "There's a path to the left that hugs the cliff. The guards hardly ever patrol it. Too many steps.", "He's young yet. I promise you the gold. I promise you the glory. I cannot promise you the queen.", 'You do not need to burn the boy. If what you say is true, a drop of his blood killed Robb Stark-', 'To the offices of the Iron Bank of Braavos from Stannis Baratheon the one true king of Westeros.', "His name is Gendry. He's a good lad. A poor lad from Flea Bottom who happens to be your nephew.", "I'm not asking the Lord of Light for helpI'm asking the woman who showed me that miracles exist", "I'm sorry about your brother, Your Grace, I wanted to let you know that people grieve for him.", "I've never known bells to mean surrender. They want to play music with us? Let's play. Drums.", 'and JON near the end of the path. MISSANDEI is standing along the path looking at the ocean.', 'turns and notices the two guards approaching the boat. He turns and loudly addresses GENDRY.', "He'll have seen we didn't come Thorne will have made it official by now Castle Black is his", 'I am true to Your Grace and always will be, but surely there are other ways, cleaner ways.', 'Your father lacks an appreciation of the finer points of bad behavior. So do the Braavosi.', "Tonight, the Night's Watch elect a new Lord Commander. Ser Alliser Thorne is going to win.", "We still have a hard march to Wintefell and we won't be marching anywhere in this weather.", "Thank you, Ser Alliser We'll discuss amongst ourselves and come back to you with an answer", 'But if the Army of the Dead makes it passed the Wall, do we have enough men to fight them?', 'Lord Varys knows what you had for breakfast three days ago. There are no surprises here.', "I'm sorry about your son. Didn't get the chance to tell you before. Good lad. Loyal lad.", 'Thus ending the dragonslaying career of Ser Byron Swann. I made you something, Princess.', "I'm not much of a hunter I'll need some food if I'm gonna make it south without starving", "Ah. I hear it's beautiful down there. Palm trees and butterflies. I haven't been myself.", "As long as the Boltons rule the North, , the North will suffer. Just one man's opinion.", "As long as Stannis lives, the war is not over. Who's the real power in King's Landing?", 'I loved that girl like she was my own. She was good. She was kind. And you killed her!', "Don't be so sure. Safety is never a permanent state of affairs. Bad things are coming.", "Well, sons of lords don't like to break bread with sons of crabbers. Our hands stink.", "Many don't. You were seen taking the body of a wildling girl north of the Wall. Why?", "It's not what we'd hoped for. But we still have a chance if we're careful and smart.", "There's a chest of the good stuff left back at your house. I gave it to your wife.", "Salladhor Saan is an old friend, I've known him 30 years. I've never trusted him.", "First things first. It's a long march ahead. And then we have to take the castle.", "Keep your father's name to yourself. The situation is complicated enough already.", "I'd hurry to your favorite establishment or you'll put a whole in that chainmail.", 'If you mistrust fancy people so much, why were you in such a hurry to trust her?', "The king is a complicated man. But he wants what's right for the Seven Kingdoms.", "Stannis is our king. We follow where he leads, even if we don't like the path.", "This isn't our time, we should head back to Castle Black when the snow clears.", "Some of the Night's Watch feel you have too much affection for the wildlings.", "As is mine. You're not the young man, Salladhor. And correct me if I'm wrong", "To me? Gods, no. But if your Red Woman told him to leap from the crow's nest", "I am, child. I disobeyed my king, your father, and now I'm paying the price.", "If you take King's Landing with her by your side, the victory will be hers.", "You're speaking to the one true king boy. You'll address him as your grace.", "The King's Hand should never abandon the King, especially in a time of war.", 'I ask your leave to execute this woman for murder. She admits to the crime.', "I told you, Clovis, if we don't get out of here soon someone is going to --", "Go back to your room. You're not supposed to be here. If your father knew-", "He doesn't need to be thinking about harboring the bastard of a dead king.", 'and GENDRY enter the mouth of the cave. JON is walking along the corridor.', "You must keep the coast on your left side until you reach King's Landing.", "The last time I saw her, I told her I'd kill her if I ever saw her again.", 'Salladhor Saan will join our fleet. 30 ships. His men know how to fight.', 'Matthos taught me before he died so I could be of better service to you.', "I really wouldn't try anymore until you see how the first bite hits you.", 'Two meals a day. Cold for breakfast, hot for supper. I cannot complain.', "I will find you an army, Your Grace. I've been working day and night...", "How much more defeated do you want them to be? They're on their knees.", 'Well, many have already declared for him; Mace Tyrell, Randyll Tarly.', "Thank you, my lady. I'm sure it's a fine book, but it's wasted on me.", "I'll choose a dozen men to stay and guard the queen and the princess.", 'At least let me take Shireen. A siege is no place for a little girl.', 'Many fought bravely for your brother. Many fought for the Mad King.', 'A recent state of affairs. I was born in Flea Bottom just like you.', 'This is Stannis Baratheon, the one true king of the seven kingdoms.', "If they're half as ferocious as their lady, the Boltons are doomed.", "That was good of her. Of course you're serving her now, aren't you?", "Yeah. Nobody mind me. All I've ever done is live to a ripe old age.", "I'll be staying behind. I'm a liability out there as you well know.", "You'll have your gold when we take the treasury at King's Landing.", 'They were looking for me for twenty years. Do they know your face?', 'Your Grace, perhaps Queen and Princess Shireen could accompany me.', "You don't believe him. I understand that. It sounds like nonsense.", 'We heard your uncle attacked your fleet. We thought you were dead.', "It's too important for me. I need a smart person to do it. Go on.", 'If I may, how did a slave girl come to advise Daenerys Targaryen?', 'Strange that this Lord of Light asks you to work in the shadows.', "Aye, but we have the wind. She'll blow us straight to the gates.", 'I was in the battle at Blackwater. I was a captain and a knight.', "You think they ever met a pirate who didn't tell them that joke?", "I've been talking to your sworn brothers. Many of them love you.", 'and GENDRY are walking towards the boat DAVOS left on the beach.', 'The Life and Adventures of Elyo Grivas. First Sword of Braavos.', "It's better to wait for the right time than to risk everything.", "She does know her way around a man's head, I'll give her that.", 'And you take credit because you dropped a leech into the fire?', "He's the one true king. He has the blood right to that throne.", 'But the dragon only saw a dumb man, holding a mirrored shield.', "We need to fight, but we don't need to die Not if we have help", "I've been trying to stay out of those dungeons my whole life.", "I don't know, Your Grace. I can't see the future in the fire.", "Well, if you're a famous smuggler, you're not doing it right.", "Well, I am. When the battle comes, promise you'll protect me.", 'The northerners know more about their land than we ever will.', "You needn't ask your maester about my house. It's rather new.", 'Do you know of any magicthat could help him? Bring him back?', "This'll be it, now. Right now, we don't need to be fighting.", "King Snow, isn't it? No? That doesn't sound right. King Jon?", 'Someone once told me the night is dark and full of terrors.', 'Nothing is worth what this will cost you, not even the Iron', "You won those bannermen from Renly. Don't lose them to her.", "What are men of the Night's Watch doing in a Wildling camp?", 'Aye, the snows defeated Stannis as much as the Boltons did.', "A good heart? I've noticed you starring at that good heart.", 'And how many ships has the Lord of Light got in his fleet?', "If I was a good father, he'd still be here. Stannis lives?", "Noblemen of Westeros, the Nig- the Night's Watch implores-", "It's a tough road ahead, Your Grace. Won't they be safer -", 'Aye, you were wrong. How many died because you were wrong?', 'If you ever come back this way, I will execute you myself.', "You'll want to discuss this amongst yourselves. Perhaps --", 'Any ideas as to how we might change that state of affairs?', "First night of the full moon.' Why is there a G in night?", 'When you get to Flea Bottom, have a bowl of brown for me.', "How many ships did he bring to your 'cause? How many men?", 'Of course, there are several royal fleets at the moment.', 'You call me friend. You drank with me on my wedding day.', 'I need to speak to you - about what I saw in that cave.', "If the wind holds, we'll reach King's Landing in a day.", "You're not the only ones who owe your lives to Jon Snow", 'If he commands you to burn children, your Lord is evil!', "These weren't here before. They've barred the passage.", 'Stannis never gives up. Never. Now he will regroup ...', "I don't doubt it. But Jon doesn't have the Stark name.", 'No weapons, friends. I promise. What can I do for you?', "I can't say it was a pleasure doing business with you.", "We're leaving today. The king's got a lot on his mind.", "We'll hold off the rest of them for as long as we can.", "I swear it. I can't swear never to speak against her.", 'How many of your brothers do you think you can trust?', 'Last time I was here you killed my son with wildfire.', "The Hand of the King doesn't have much leisure time.", 'The one true king of Westeros... Stannis Baratheon.', "I didn't want to be a lord. I nearly didn't accept.", "Because it's right. And because I'm a slow learner.", "We're still getting a count, but hundreds are dead.", 'Fire kills Whites, you told me. What breathes fire?', "I'd say my parts are mixed, my lady, good and bad."]

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: ['We die today, brothers. We die bleeding from a hundred wounds with arrows in our necks and spears in our guts, but our war cries will echo through eternity. They will sing about the battle of Winterfell until the Iron Islands have slipped beneath the waves. Every man, woman and child will know who we were and how long we stood. Aggar and Gelmarr, Wex and Urzen, Stygg and Black Lorren. Ironborn warriors will cry out our names as they leap onto the shores of Seagard and Faircastle.', "I'm looking at spending the rest of my life being treated like a fool and a eunuch by my own people. Ask yourself, is there anything I wouldn't do to stop that from happening? The hounds will find the scent again. I'll beat them until they do. I'll whip every man here until I have both those boys in hand. And once I've got them, the pampered little shits It's better to be cruel than weak.", "If you serve me as loyally as you served Ned Stark, I will be as good to you as he ever was. Betray me, and you will wish you hadn't. Maester Luwin, send a raven to Pyke informing my father of my victory here. And one to Deepwood Motte to my sister. Inform her that she's to bring You are a maester of the Citadel, sworn to serve the Lord of Winterfell, are you not?", "You are fading from sickness. You are badly outnumbered and you're hundreds of miles from the sea. Lord Bolton implores you to protect your men and abandon this fortress you can no longer hold. Do this and he will be just and fair with you as he is being with me. The Boltons will give you safe passage to the stony shore.", "Yes, my captors were so very kind to me. You love reminding me of that. Everyone in this frozen pile of shit has always loved reminding me of that. You know what it's like to be told how lucky you are to be someone's prisoner? To be told how much you owe them? And then to go back home to your real father", 'First time I saw Winterfell, it looked like something that had been here for thousands of years and would be here for thousands of years after I was dead. I saw it and I thought, "Of course, Ned Stark crushed our rebellion and killed my brothers. "We never stood a chance against the man who lives here."', 'GREYJOY and other Iron Born are pulling their landing boat onto the beach wading through the surf. They pull the boat onto the sand. JON SNOW, MISSANDEI, DAVOS and Dothraki guards are waiting to meet them. JON sees THEON and both men freeze and stare at each other. JON steps forward towards THEON.', "Men who fought King Robert to free themselves from the yoke of the South, just like you're doing now. I'm his only living son. He'll listen to me. I know he will. I'm not a Stark. I know that. But your father raised me to be an honorable man. We can avenge him together.", 'I was helping you. You were trying to escape, there is no escape. Not ever. Theon Greyjoy tried to escape. The master knew. He knows everything. He hunted him, he caught him, he strapped him to a cross, and cut away piece after piece until there was no Theon left.', "I'm not protecting anyone. I just wonder if it's not wiser to wait. Why risk going against the North if they would be our allies? Rise up against them and they could destroy us. But if we pledge fealty to them, they'll give us Casterly Rock.", "There's nowhere to run. I'd never make it back to the Iron Islands. And even if I did, even if by some miracle I slipped through the lines and made it home, I'd be a coward. The Greyjoy who ran. The shame of the family.", "We can fight them in the fields as long as you like, but we won't beat them until you take King's Landing. And we can't take King's Landing without ships. My father has ships and men who know how to sail them.", "I always wanted to do the right thing. Be the right kind of person. But I never knew what that meant. It always seemed like there's like there was an impossible choice I had to make. Stark or Greyjoy.", "I was a little boy when I was torn away from my home and brought here. So I kept my word. I never ran away. If I find them soon enough, I won't hurt them. Well, I'll hurt them, but I won't kill them.", "Quit talking about your father. He's right about us. Our wives from the Iron Islands, they're for breeding. That's not enough for us. That's why we take saltwives, from the women we capture.", "No, we could. We could never hold it for more than a few days. As soon as Winterfell got word that we'd taken Torrhen's Square, the Starks would send their men to take it back. And then-", "The castle is mine. But these people are still yours. You'll yield to keep them safe, to keep them alive. That's what a good lord would do. Think carefully about what you want to say.", "Anyone who matters, , this is a big day for them. They haven't had much to get excited about since I left. It's a hard place the Iron Islands always has been. It's cold and it's wet.", 'My father has donned the ancient crown of Salt and Rock and declared himself King of the Iron Islands. He claims the North as well by right of conquest. You are all his subjects.', 'You act as if I volunteered to go. You gave me away, if you remember. The day you bent the knee to Robert Baratheon. After he crushed you. Did you take what was yours then?', "It's Prince Theon now. Get up. You have to get dressed. I've taken Winterfell. I took it. I'm occupying it. I sent men over the walls with grappling claws and ropes.", "Robb's in the Riverlands. My sister's in Deepwood Motte. She'll get here long before they do. And Ned Stark always said 500 men could hold Winterfell again 10,000.", "What you did in King's Landing, what you said... You couldo ve lied to Cersei about bending the knee to Daenerys. You risked everything to tell an enemy the truth.", "I will kill that man. I don't care how many arrows they feather me with, how many spears they run through me, I will kill that horn-blowing cunt before I fall.", 'My own father, your king, surrendered years ago to Robert Baratheon. I watched him bend the knee. There was no shame there. He fought with honor, as did you.', "Yes, you'll be very popular until some fat lord comes to visit with a big belly and a little prick and he can't get it up so he knocks all your teeth out.", 'Our Uncle Euron returned home after a long absence. He murdered our father and took the Salt Throne from yara. He would have murdered us if we had stayed.', "We won't beat them until we take King's Landing, and we can't take King's Landing without ships. My father has ships, and men who know how to sail them.", "I'm a Greyjoy. We've been Lords of the Iron Islands for 300 years. There's not a family in Westeros that can look down on us, not even the Lannisters.", 'Sansa of the House Stark comes here to be wed. A woman grown, trueborn and noble. She comes to beg the blessings of the gods. Who comes to claim her?', "You're not a boy anymore. They attacked your father. They've already started the war. It's your duty to represent your House when your father can't.", "No, don't go. Please, please. No, please don't leave me. Please, please. Please, please don't go! Please. Please. Don't leave me. Please don't go.", 'I will kill that man. I swear to the Drowned God, the Old Gods, the New Gods, to every fucking god in every fucking heaven, I will kill that man.', 'I was born on Pike to Balon Greyjoy. His third and last-living son. I am your prince. I swear it by the drowned god. What is dead may never die.', "I don't want to be forgiven I can never make amends to your family for all the things that I've done They'll keep you safer than I ever could", "You've always known what was right. Even when we were all young and stupid, you always knew. Every step you take it's always the right step.", "I have a proposal for my father. One that will make him king again. And me after him. You may stay at the castle tonight, if you're lucky.", 'You could do that, take the ship, head out on your own. And I will hunt you down, drag you back here in chains and hang you for a traitor.', "Really? If I was cooped up all day with no one but this old bat for company, I'd go mad. Anyway, you don't have a choice. Robb's waiting.", "You hear that? That's the mating call of the Northmen. They want to fuck us. Well, I haven't had a good fuck in weeks. I'm ready for one.", "She only has a few ships, and she couldn't sail them here. So, she's sailing to the Iron Islands instead, to take them back in your name.", "Why aren't you with the rest of them? Or did they send you to row me out and dump me halfway in the sea? That would be good for a laugh.", "All of us chose to follow Yara. We left the Iron Islands for Yara. She would never leave one of us behind. We're not leaving her behind.", 'I told you what would happen. All of you. I told you what would happen if you served me loyally. And what would happen if you did not.', "Your boy! Your last boy! You gave me away like I was some dog you didn't want anymore. And now you curse me because I've come home.", "If they haven't got the damn message yet, a few more days won't help. As you say. But it don't hurt to let 'em rot a while longer.", "Neither do I. But Robb's Lord of Winterfell, which means I do what he says and you do what I say. Hodor! Help Bran down the hall.", "Just march up to his gates and tell him you're crossing. We've got five times his numbers. You can take the Twins if you have to.", "That would have been hard to do. You weren't here. Last I heard, you were gallivanting around the world having a grand old time.", 'Pears and oranges. Wine from the Arbor. And the heir to Pyke of the Iron Islands. . The only living son of Balon Greyjoy. . Me.', 'And she is your rightful ruler. Those of you that have sailed under her, and there are many of you here, you know what she is.', "They weren't Bran and Rickon! I couldn't find them. It was two farm boys. I killed them and burned them so no one would know.", 'I deserved everything. I deserve to be Reek. I did terrible things. Turned on Robb. Captured Winterfell. Killed those boys.', "He won't find out. We've killed all the ravens. We have all the horses. I've taken Winterfell. And I will keep Winterfell.", 'Wait. Wait, wait, wait. I took it because I hated the Starks. I hated them for holding me prisoner. I wanted to hurt them.', "Anyone with a few coppers in his pocket can own you for the night. What's a dwarf like down below? I've always wondered.", "The giant? Hodor? Oh, that's all right, then. You let a halfwit escape with a cripple. And Rickon, too? The little one?", "They weren't “those boys”, they were Bran and Rickon. They were your brothers, you'd know them since they were born.", "A Lannister put his spear through your father's leg. The Kingslayer rides to Casterly Rock where no one can touch -", 'If there are any who still question whether your new lord means what he says, here is the answer to your question.', 'Lord Bolton took me captive after Winterfell. He sent me to treat with you in good faith as your fellow Ironborn.', "The Stony Shore, to raid their villages. There'll be spoils in it for you, and women, if you do your jobs well.", "When I was Ramsay's prisoner, Yara tried to save me. She's the only one who tried to save me. She needs me now.", 'My father fought for the freedom of his people! What did your father do? Fucked a cook and whelped a whore.', "You should give me the reins, I'm a better rider than you. I've been on horseback for the last nine years.", "I see you've finally learned how to address your betters. What do you want? I was brought here a captive.", "You should be proud of your brother's achievement. I took the great castle of Winterfell with twenty men.", "Tough little lad. In the Iron Islands, you're not a man until you've killed your first enemy. Well done.", 'You were gone. Yara was here. Being Ironborn. Leading Ironborn. Getting ready to bring us back to glory.', "No, I don't believe her! I know who I am! I'm Reek! Reek! Loyal Reek! Good Reek! I've always been Reek!", "He won't be. I'll stay with him. With the Ironborn. I took this castle from you. Let me defend you now.", "He murdered our father and would have murdered us. He'll murder you as soon as you have what he wants.", "And he sent me back to Pyke. I'm a Greyjoy. I can't fight for Robb and my father both. Where's Hodor?", 'And the truth about the farm boys I killed in their place The truth about Ser Rodrik, who I beheaded', "Lord Rickard Karstark is Robb Stark's bannerman. I betrayed Robb. That's why you're torturing me.", "I know I'm surrounded. I know that because I stood on the battlements and saw I was surrounded.", "I've come to escort you to the Godswood, my lady. If you please, my lady, will you take my arm?", "You haven't brought enough men. How am I supposed to defend Winterfell with just this lot?", "A cripple? You let a cripple escape? The boy can't walk, but somehow he slipped past you?", 'And whoever kills that fucking horn-blower will stand in bronze above the shores of Pyke!', "I've lived with him, hunted with him, fought at his side, he thinks of me as a brother.", "Father, I fought with Robb Stark. I know his men. He won't give up the North so easily.", 'Recognize you? How could I? The last time I saw you- you looked like a fat little boy.', "And yet that's the task my father has given me to prove that I'm a true Iron Islander.", "Yara did. She made a pledge. We're going to find her, and we're going to set her free.", 'Kill him, Robb. Send his head to his father. He cut down ten of our men. You saw him.', 'Your ancestors defeated ours and took the Iron Islands. We ask you to give them back.', 'I forget nothing. I remember my brothers. And I remember when my father was a king.', "The hounds have the scent. Come, Maester, don't look so grim. It's all just a game.", 'An order, from your future king. You can tell your grandchildren about this night.', "You will Go north, only north Jon is Lord Commander at Castle Black He'll help you", 'I would have taken you all the way to the Wall I would have died to get you there', 'Blood for blood. You need to make the Lannisters to pay for Jory and the others.', 'Why? What do you mean why? My father is Balon Greyjoy, Lord of the Iron Islands.', "I won't make it to the Wall. I won't make it ten feet past the Winterfell gates.", "I didn't murder the Stark boys. But I did things that were just as bad or worse.", "To what, to save your brother's life? It was the only thing to do, so I did it.", 'They lit the trench. Bran I just want you to know... I wish... The things I did', "You don't know what you're like. You need someone to teach you. Know who I am?", 'And how am I supposed to prove myself by pillaging piss-poor fishing villages?', "Yes. Have your men raise the white flag and open the gates. You're going home.", 'Think of all those southern girls he gets to stab with his right royal prick.', "So you and I can go down and tell them - how you've yielded Winterfell to me.", "He's not. He's dead. The Seven Kingdoms are at war. And Winterfell is mine.", "I'll tell you anything. Just take it off. Please. Please, just take it off.", 'All wildlings are liars and savages with no loyalty to anything or anyone.', 'My sword is yours in victory and defeat, from this day until my last day.', 'She broke her leg jumping from the ramparts I left her to die in the snow', "You've served this house faithfully, old man. But keep talking and I'll-", "I-- I didn't want them to take me. I was so scared. I didn't want them--", 'If I got justice, my burnt body would hang over the gates of Winterfell.', "Shh... Keep it down. You're not supposed to be inside the castle walls.", 'I am the Lord of Winterfell as Bran just informed you. Send the ravens.', 'Among them, but not one of them. I was his hostage, taken from my home.', 'He disrespected me in front of my men. That was his decision, not mine.', 'I treated the Stark boys with honor, and they repaid me with treachery.', 'Thank you, wise bald man. Thank you for explaining siege tactics to me.', "You may be right. But I've gone too far to pretend to be anything else.", "You'd better get out there. Wouldn't want her to set sail without you.", 'Why on earth would I trust the word of a lying little savage like you?', "There are and Euron is building more. He's going to offer them to you.", "Couldn't resist some northern ass? If you like redheads, ask for Ros.", "We shouldn't be lighting fires It's not safe He won't stop hunting us", "The Iron Fleet isn't all he's bringing. He also wants to give you --", 'They say hard places breed hard men, , and hard men rule the world.', 'Listen to your little lord, Farlen. He has more sense than you do.', "What's done is done. I've brought you a proposal from Robb Stark.", 'So you can bury it in my neck? Do you take me for a fool? Get up.', "You'll all go about your tasks as usual. And in a few days' time-", 'My brothers are dead. They died fighting Stark men, men like you.', "I've done a lot, haven't I? Things I never imagined myself doing.", "Trust me, My Lord. You're not living in the wilderness anymore.", 'They say every Ironborn man is worth a dozen from the mainland.', 'I told you to wait outside. . How did you get past the guards?', "You're the crew of the Sea Bitch? I'm your commander. Welcome.", "I want to fight for Winterfell, Lady Sansa, if you'll have me.", 'Famed for their skills at archery, navigation and lovemaking.', 'Well, you shall have it, then. But only if you serve me well.', "If I hadn't killed them, the Northerners would think me weak.", "You can't trick me. Tell him. Tell him you couldn't trick me.", "You won't stand a chance against the Lannisters on your own.", 'Euron has her. I came to ask the queen to help get her back.', "Theon of House Greyjoy. Who was… who was her father's ward.", "I've seen what his hounds do to a person This way is better", "It's for the queen, I bet. I hear she's [sleek as a mink?]", 'My men are bringing your people together in the courtyard.', 'The opportunity for Jon Snow to cut my throat in my sleep.', 'He was your brother. Your father is Lord Rickard Karstark.', "I'm Theon Greyjoy, son of Balon, heir to the Iron Islands.", 'Jon will have me killed the moment I step through the gate', "I've been Lord Stark's ward since I was eight years old.", 'The Lannisters are going to reject your terms, you know?', "Don't you worry about my hands. . The sea's in my blood.", 'Generous tipper. I guess gold is cheap for a Lannister.', 'What do you want then, other than your miserable life?', 'I am Theon Greyjoy...last living son of Balon Greyjoy.', 'Is this a joke? Winterfell is the heart of the North.', 'Girls will think of us with their lovers inside them.', "If it comes to that, you know I'll stand behind you.", "There's a thousand girls like you in King's Landing.", "What do you know of it, woman? I'm a proven warrior.", "You'll address me as Prince Theon or you'll be next.", 'Please. No. No! Mercy, please! Please, mercy! Mercy!', "Yes. I'm sorry, master. Forgive me. I didn't think -", "I shouldo ve listened to you. You're the only one --", "How? And don't tell me to put a spear in your hand.", 'I took it to bring glory to my house and my father.', 'No! No! No! Please, no! No! No! No, please! Please!', "Do what he says. Do what he says or he'll hurt you.", "I'll make you a Lord of the Iron Islands for this.", 'You should rule the Iron Islands. Let me help you.', 'Try smiling with your lips closed. . Hmm, better.', 'Serve me how? I need fighters, not kitchen sluts.', 'We will find no better leader. This is our queen.', "The Stony Shore's not far from Torrhen's Square.", 'He broke me. He broke me into a thousand pieces.', "The runt of the litter. That one's yours, Snow.", "He would have killed you and cut Bran's throat.", 'Or throw you in a dungeon. Or slit your throat.', 'Ser Rodrik, it grieves me that we meet as foes.', "I'm your son. Your only living heir. Who else?", 'Stop. Stop! Your captain commands you to stop!', 'The bards will sing songs of their sacrifice.', 'If my clothes offend you, I will change them.', "You don't give commands anymore, little lord.", 'No, no. I only heard he died after we docked.', 'No, you...You having a go at me? Is that it?', "You're an impudent little wench, aren't you?", "I'm his only living son. He'll listen to me.", 'You know things? Like what? How to eat dirt?', 'Come on. Come on. Come on. Come on. Come on.', "Who? the Imp? I'd call him half a nobleman.", "You're a very lucky girl. Do you know that?", 'I always wondered what you had under there.', 'Please, cut it off! Cut it off! Cut it off!', 'Sansa. Lady Sansa. She came to the kennels.', 'A ship? You give her thirty and I get one?', 'Thank you. Kind of you to come see me off.', 'Before I had to kill them- I treated them-', 'Where am I? Who are you? What do you want?', 'To take the North while it was vulnerable.', "Lord Ramsay, he said I'm to take your arm.", "The old man couldn't keep his mouth shut.", "It's the only way to throw off the hounds", 'I take orders from your father, not you.', "It's not so bad once you get used to it.", "And what's your counsel, trusted friend?", "You're my queen. I go where you command.", "You've never heard of the Iron Islands?", 'Impudent. It means rude. Disrespectful.', 'Or so Walder Frey would have you think.', "They'll be waiting for me on the docks.", "I'm not killing you. That's your price.", "With hunting, there's blood at the end.", 'Not Theon! Reek! Reek! My name is Reek!', 'And the truth about Rob, who I betrayed', "You think Uncle Euron's hunting for us?", 'Important enough for the likes of you.', 'The offer he makes, is one I proposed.', "I'll lock him in a cell until he rots.", "I can't, not unless the master says...", 'Have my things sent up to the castle.', "I'm the one who took you. What of it?", 'Right. Get the horses and the hounds.', 'Go back to Winterfell. Take him back.', 'Gold for the farmer. For his trouble.', 'Ser Rodrik, I sentence you to death!', "I'm a prince now, and you'd do well-", 'Mothers will name their sons for us.', 'Come on! Come on! Come on! Come on.', 'Not Theon. There is no Theon. Reek.', 'Am l your brother, now and always?', 'Take him to the cells. Lock him up', "No, please! No, no, no! No, don't!", 'Steady now. Make every shot count.', 'They have no value to me missing.', "I'll tell you everything, please.", "He'll see us. You don't know him.", "Jon. I didn't know you were here."]

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: ["You know, you remind me of another girl. A lovely thing I once acquired from an Elysium pleasure house. Beautiful, like yourself, and intelligent as yourself. But she wasn't happy. She cried, often. I asked her why but, we didn't have the kind of rapport that you and I have. Yes, it was quite sad. Girls from Elysium pleasure houses are expensive. Extremely expensive. And this one wasn't making me any money. I hate bad investments. Really, I do. They haunt me. I had no idea how to make her happy, no idea how to mitigate my losses. A very wealthy patron, he offered me a tremendous amount of money to let him transform this lovely, sad girl. To use her in ways that never occur to most men. And you know what occurs to most men. I would not say he succeeded in making her happy but my losses were definitely mitigated. . Take tonight off to mourn Mhaegen's child. I'll see you tomorrow. But you'll be happy? . That makes me happy.", "I saw her once. I was a boy, living with your mother's family. Lord Whent had a great tourney at Harrenhal. Everyone was there. The Mad King, your father, Robert Baratheon. And Lyanna, she was already promised to Robert. You can imagine what it was like for me, a boy from nowhere, with nothing to his name, watching these legendary men, tilting at the lists. The last two riders were Barristan Selmy and Rhaegar Targaryen. When Rhaegar won, everyone cheered for the prince. I remember the girls laughing when he took off his helmet and they saw that silver hair. How handsome he was. Until he rode right past his wife, Elia Martell, and all the smiles died. I've never seen so many people so quiet. He rode past his wife, and he lay a crown of winter roses in Lyanna's lap. Blue as frost. How many tens of thousands had to die because Rhaegar chose your aunt?", "Not what you were expecting? Has anyone ever told you the story of the Mountain and the Hound? Lovely little tale of brotherly love. The Hound was just a pup, six years old maybe. Gregor a few years older, already a big lad, already getting a bit of a reputation. Some lucky boys just born with a talent for violence. One evening... Gregor found his little brother playing with a toy by the fire... Gregor's toy, a wooden knight. Gregor never said a word, he just grabbed his brother by the scruff of his neck and shoved his face into the burning coals. Held him there while the boy screamed, while his face melted. There aren't very many people who know that story.", "You're so right. For instance, when I thwarted your plan to give Sansa Stark to the Tyrells. If I'm going to be honest, I did feel an unmistakable sense of enjoyment there. But your confidant, the one who fed you information about my plans, the one you swore to protect, you didn't bring her any enjoyment. And she didn't bring me any enjoyment. She was a bad investment on my part. Luckily, I have a friend who wanted to try something new. Something daring. And he was so grateful to me for providing this fresh experience.", "I won't force you to do anything. Don't you know by now how much I care for you? Say the word and we turn the horses round, but listen to me. Listen. . You've been running all your life. Terrible things happened to your family and you weep. You sit alone in a darkened room, mourning their fates. You've been a bystander to tragedy from the day they executed your father. Stop being a bystander, do you hear me? Stop running. There's no justice in the world. Not unless we make it. You loved your family. Avenge them.", "The mountains are impassable. If you want to get to the Eyrie, you need to go through the Bloody Gate. It doesn't matter how large your army is, if you attack this gate, you do it on this road, three men abreast and get slaughtered like goats. The first Lords of the Vale didn't have much, but they had these mountains and they knew how to use them. And the fortress they built here has never been overcome. Not once in a thousand years. Know your strengths, use them wisely, and one man can be worth ten thousand.", "And not long after that when I saw you escorting a certain foreign dignitary... Council business? Of course you would have friends from across The Narrow Sea. You're from there yourself, after all. We're friends, aren't we, Lord Varys? I'd like to think we are. So you can imagine my burden, wondering if the King might question my friendo s sympathies… To stand at a crossroads where turning left means loyalty to a friend, turning right, loyalty to the realm.", "When boys and girls live in the same home, awkward situations can arise. Sometimes, I've heard, even brothers and sisters develop certain affections. And when these affections become common knowledge, well, that is an awkward situation, indeed. Especially in a prominent family. But prominent families often forget a simple truth, I've found.", "I would do anything to undo what's been done to you. I know that I can't. Will you allow me to say one more thing before I go? Your great-uncle Brynden the Blackfish has gathered what remains of the Tully forces and retaken Riverrun. You might consider seeking him out. The time may come when you need an army loyal to you.", "Don't fight in the north or the south. Fight every battle everywhere always in your mind. Everyone is your enemy, everyone is your friend, every possible series of events is happening all at once. Live that way and nothing will surprise you. Everything that happens will be something that you've seen before.", "The other dagger, the one that took her life, I would have stopped that dagger with my own heart if I could have. I wasn't there for her when she needed me most. But I am here for her now. To do what she would have done, to protect her children. Anything I can do for you, Brandon, you need only ask.", "I was sorry when he died. Your father and I had our differences but he loved Cat very much. So did I. She wasn't fond of you, was she? Well, it appears she vastly underestimated you. Your father and brothers are gone, yet here you stand King in the North. Last best hope against the coming storm.", "I loved your mother more than you could ever know. Given the opportunity, what do we do to those who've hurt the ones we love? In a better world, one where love could overcome strength and duty, you might have been my child. But we don't live in that world.", 'The wiser answer was no, my Lord. Get a message to this paragon of yours... Discreetly. Send him to question Ser Hugh. After that, you might want him to visit a certain armorer in the city. He lives in a large house at the top of the street of Steel.', "A singularly bad idea. Do you see that boy there? One of Varys's little birds. The Spider has taken a great interest in your comings and goings. Now look there. That one belongs to the Queen. And do you see that Septa pretending to read her book?", "I don't want friends like me. My new friends are predictable. Very reasonable people. As for what happened to Joffrey, well, that was something my new friends wanted very badly. Nothing like a thoughtful gift to make a new friendship grow strong.", "There is another matter, your Grace. Something so urgent I couldn't trust the words to a raven. You once charged me with finding Arya Stark. To my shame I failed you. But I have found Sansa Stark. Alive, and well, and home again. In Winterfell.", "I have always found that to be the purest of motivations, but you won't have a chance to put your sword through Stannis, not today. You'll be cut to pieces before he sets foot on solid ground. If it is justice that you want, be smart about it.", "He'll let you go home? Joffrey's not the sort of boy who gives away his toys. You have a tender heart, just like your mother did at your age. I can see so much of her in you. She was like a sister to me. For her sake, I'll help get you home.", "He should, he's a dangerous man. But even the most dangerous men can be outmaneuvered. And you've learnt to maneuver from the very best. . I return before too long. . You'll be strong without me. . The North will be yours. Do you believe me?", "No. That very question was what started the War of the Five Kings. In a way, that dagger made you what you are today. Forced from your home, driven out to the wilds beyond the Wall. I imagine you've seen things most men wouldn't believe.", "The Eyrie is mine. The last time the lords of the Eyrie formed an alliance with the lords of the North, they brought down the greatest dynasty this world has ever known. I'd like to borrow one of your birds. Cersei will expect a reply.", "Stannis Baratheon is also a traitor, marching with his army on Winterfell. Let Stannis and Roose battle, let the enemies of the throne slaughter each other and when they're done seize Winterfell from whichever thief survives.", "I bring good news My friends in the North tell me Sansa has escaped Winterfell I expect she's headed to Castle Black where her brother serves as Lord Commander But she won't be safe there, not with the Boltons after her", "I understand that you don't like me, and while that saddens me greatly, I did not come here today seeking your affection. When you march on King's Landing, you may find yourself facing a protracted siege or open gates.", "Because I am her uncle. I married her Aunt Lysa shortly before my belovedo s untimely death. We're family now, and you're an outsider. Forgive me, Lady Brienne, but experiences made me wary of outsiders.", 'A piece of info that she know that I had. Neither silence nor lies were an option. But I have other information of which she is unaware. And as you say, our interests are aligned. I have a gift for you.', "The Lannister name doesn't mean what it once did. Tywin is dead. He kept his house in power through sheer will. Without him, Jaime has one hand and no allies, Tommen is a soft boy, not a king to fear.", "Not even thank you? If it weren't for me you'd have been slaughtered at that battlefield. You have many enemies, My King, but I swear to you I'm not one of them. I love Sansa as I loved her mother.", "At least it was, until the tournament on Prince Joffrey's last nameday. I bet on Ser Jaime in the jousting, as any sane man would. When the Knight of the Flowers unseated him, I lost this dagger.", "He never stops. Do you know Ser Hugh of the Vale? Not surprising. Until recently, he was only a squire... Jon Arryn's squire. He was knighted almost immediately after his master's untimely death.", "I'm waiting for word on an assignment that will take me far away from the capital. When I set sail, I might be able to take you with me. But you'll need to be ready to leave on a moment's notice.", "You're right. He wasn't involvedi n Joffrey's death. But you were. Do you remember that lovely necklace Dontos gave you? I don't suppose you noticed that a stone was missing after the feast.", 'A shadow? With a face? This woman swore to protect Renly; she failed. She swore to protect your mother; she failed. Why would I want somebody with your history of failure guiding Lady Sansa?', "Stannis takes Winterfell, he rescues you from the most despised family in the North. Grateful for your late father's courageous support for his claim, he names you Wardeness of the North.", "No no no no! Is that what they teach you up in the North? And you-- wherever you're from, do you have any idea how ridiculous you sound? Either of you understand a thing that I'm saying?", 'I delivered his bones myself. I presented them to Lady Catlyn as a gesture of goodwill from Tyrion Lannister. It seems like a lifetime ago. Do give Lord Tyrion my best when you see him.', 'Everything. My friendship with the Lannisters was productive. But Joffrey, a vicious boy with a crown on his head, is not a reliable ally. And who could trust a friend like that?', "Well, you could ask Varys where she is. He'll have an answer for you. Whether you believe it,,, Myself, I have always had a hard time trusting eunuchs. Who knows what they want?", "Shh. You don't want the queen to hear, do you? 1,000 gold cloaks are searching for you. And if they found you, how do you think they would punish the girl who murdered the king?", 'Lord Royce has served the Vale well He;s enjoyed a distinguished military career If we could trust his absolute loyalty, he would make a capable commander in the wars to come', "I've heard him called “Tywin Lannister's mad dog.” I'm sure you have as well. Can you think of any reason the Lannisters might possibly have for being angry with your wife?", "Stannis will be here in an hour. When he arrives, Renly's bannermen will flock to him. Your former companions will fight for the privilege of selling you to their new king.", "You shouldn't say that. You'll be good enough for many things. He'll still enjoy beating you. And now that you're a woman, he'll be able to enjoy you in other ways as well.", "I do. Once he liberates these lands from the Boltons he'll rally your father's bannermen to his cause. With the North behind him, Stannis can finally take the Iron Throne.", "A man with no motive is a man no one suspects. Always keep your foes confused. If they don't know who you are or what you want, they can't know what you plan to do next.", 'We\'ve met. With Renly Baratheon. What did he say about you? He said, "You\'re a loyalty comes free of charge." Someone appears to have paid quite a bit for it since then.', "No, it's quite all right. When I was a child I was very small and I come from a little spit of land called The Fingers, so you see, it's an exceedingly clever nickname.", "A bold move, my Lord, and admirable. But is it wise to yank the lion's tail? Tywin Lannister is the richest man in all the Seven Kingdoms. Gold wins wars, not soldiers.", "The realm? Do you know what the realm is? It's the thousand blades of Aegon's enemies. A story we agree to tell each other over and over till we forget that it's a lie.", 'For which I am extremely grateful to you, my lord. Lady Arryn and I have known each other since we were children. She has always been positively predisposed toward me.', "Saved you? My lady, he followed my orders. Every one of them. And he did it all for gold. Money buys a man's silence for a time. A bolt in the heart buys it forever.", 'And some are given a chance to climb, but they refuse. They cling to the realm or the gods or love. Illusions. Only the ladder is real. The climb is all there is.', "Always. You're a Stark. Dyeing your hair doesn't change that. You're Sansa Stark. The eldest surviving child of Ned and Catelyn Stark. Your place is in the North.", "Every ambitious move is a gamble. You gambled when you drove a dagger into Robb Stark's heart. It appears that your gamble paid off. You're Warden of the North.", 'After the Lannisters and the Starks, the Tyrells command the largest host. Their lands are the most fertile in the Seven Kingdoms, feeding horses and soldiers.', "Lord Royce may be as honorable as he thinks he is, but he's not alone in that castle. Do you trust all those knights and ladies, stable boys and serving girls?", 'On our way to the Fingers, we were set upon by a large force of Bolton men Seemed to know exactly when we were traveling and exactly whom we were transporting', "If you're still here come nightfall, I'll take you to see the last person Jon Arryn spoke with before falling ill. If that sort of thing still interests you.", 'I know. I know. But you must admit it looks suspicious. The king who executed your father, who tormented you for years, and you fled the scene of his murder.', "Stannis Baratheon garrisons at Castle Black. He'll march south to King's Landing before the winter snows block his way. But first, he has to take Winterfell.", 'One of two things will happen. Either the dead will defeat the living, in which case all our troubles come to an end. Or life will win out. And what then?', "Robb has surprised them all with his skills in battle, but he's not a mother. Consider it, Cat. You may not get another chance. I've brought you a gift.", "He has a larger army. He's the finest military commander in Westeros. A betting man would put his money on Stannis. . As it happens, I am a betting man.", "They're only numbers. Numbers on paper. Once you understand that, it's easy to make them behave. Trivial even. You want a real challenge? Try whores.", "Well well, this is an historic day. Something you don't know that I do. There's only one dagger like this in all of the Seven Kingdoms. It's mine.", 'Your tent"? Not "Our tent"? The king snores, perhaps? Or simply prefers solitude? Pressures of command, no doubt. Four kings vying for the throne.', 'Both girls are healthy and safe. For now. But you know the Queen and you know Joffrey. I fear for their longevity if they remain in the capital.', "You said King's Landing was your home. You are the property of the crown. Stealing you would be treason. If you were to tell just one person ...", "I assure you she's still a virgin. Tyrion never consummated the marriage. By the law of the land, she's no man's wife. Inspect her, if you must.", "She may not be the grandest ship in the world or the fastest, but she's mine. I've always wanted a ship. Now I want a dozen. Strange, isn't it?", 'Your marriage is quite interesting. Not only to me, but to the realm. The marriage of a wealthy girl always breeds interest, if nothing else.', "No, please don't. If the Hound so much as heard you mention it, I'm afraid all the knights in King's Landing would not be able to save you.", 'My sources are well placed. They tell me Roose Bolton plans to marry her to his son, Ramsay, a bastard recently legitimized by King Tommen.', "I have my observers, as I said, and it's possible that they saw Lord Arryn visit this armorer several times in the weeks before his death.", "The Tyrells have not yet declared for any of the surviving kings. Loras wants revenge. He blames Stannis for Renly's death. And Margaery-", "You're not marrying Roose Bolton. No, you'll be marrying his son and heir, Ramsay. One day he'll be Warden of the North and you will -", 'Sansa. Lady Brienne. When I heard you had escaped WInterfell, I feared the worst. You have no idea how happy I am to see you unharmed.', "I don't appreciate being made a fool of, dwarf. If Myrcella marries the Martell boy, she can't very well marry Robin Arryn, can she?", "I'll have to borrow it. The Lannisters will accommodate, I expect. We already owe Lord Tywin 3 million gold. What's another 80,000?", "So many men they risk so little. They spend their lives avoiding danger. And then they die. I'd risk everything to get what I want.", "You wouldn't risk a single Lannister soldier or a single coin from the Royal Treasury. What do you have to lose, a brothel keeper?", 'That is why it is critical to strike soon, while the victor still licks his wounds. Surely your Uncle Kevan could muster a force.', 'Perhaps I can help. The Knights of the Vale are some of the best fighters in Westeros, trained to battle in the ice and the snow.', "It was an establishment like no other. The sheer range of appetites catered to, desires that didn't exist until we invented them.", "Come, my lady. I know you've had a difficult day. But you're safe now. I promise you that. You're safe with me and sailing home.", 'Marrying his son to the last of the Starks gives him more legitimacy in the North than an alliance with a hated southern house.', "But we have a Kingdom to look after. I've hoped to meet you for some time, Lord Stark. No doubt Lady Catelyn has mentioned me.", "Which Lord Tyrion will say was stolen from him. The only man who could say otherwise has no throat, thanks to your boy's wolf.", "If war were arithmetic, the mathematicians would rule the world. I did notice your brother entering His Grace's tent just now.", 'Tell me, Lord Royce, how many people knew of my travel plans with Sansa Stark? I shared my intentions with you and no one else', "I'll try to keep you alive, for her sake. A fool's task, admittedly, but I've never been able to refuse your wife anything.", "I'm glad you like it. Some people are fortunate enough to be born into the right family. Others have to find their own way.", 'When you find yourself in bed with an ugly woman, best close your eyes, get it over with. Cut her throat. Be done with it.', 'Your husband was an honorable man. He should rest beside his family in the crypts beneath Winterfell. You may not believe', "We don't want our new friend wandering the countryside alone. The roads of these parts aren't safe. Why don't you stay?", 'Now what will I buy with 100 gold dragons? A dozen barrels of Dornish wine? Or a girl from the pleasure houses of Lys?', 'Am I? All those birds that whisper in your ear, such pretty little things. Trust me, we accommodate all inclinations.', "Do you want me to beg for my life? If that's what you want, I will. Whatever you ask that is in my power, I will do.", 'Early days, my friend. It is flattering, really, you feeling such dread at the prospect of me getting what I want.', 'Yes, and he gave you a priceless necklace that once belonged to his grandmother. The last legacy of House Hollard.', 'To go through all of that and make your way home again only to find such chaos in the world, I can only imagine --', "It wasn't the man that I chose, my Lord. It was Catelyn Tully. A woman worth fighting for, I'm sure you'll agree.", 'If only. I owe you a significant debt. Our redheaded friend. You secured her release when the queen detained her.', "Good. Good. I'm sure you've had quite a fright. Rest easy. The worst is past. Ser Dontos shouts up from his boat.", 'You still have many friends at court, Your Grace, many who believe Ned Stark erred by not supporting your claim.', 'A lot can happen between now and never. If you want to build a better home, first you must demolish the old one.', 'Must be strange for you, even after all these years… a man from another land, despised by most, feared by all.', "No one will come looking for you here. Isn't that what like you wanted? I'm truly sorry... about the locale.", "I rode north with the Knights of the Vale to come to your aid. They're encamped at Moat Cailin as we speak.", 'You look a bit lonely today. You should pay a visit to my brothel this evening. First boy is on the house.', 'Queen Margaery adores Sansa. Cersei is Queen Mother, a title whose importance wanes with each passing day.', 'They did. And perhaps that treason should be punished one day, after Stannis and Robb Stark are defeated.', "If you will allow me to represent your family's interests, I believe that an advantageous agreement TYWIN", 'His Grace went on about you at some length after you took your leave. The word "treason" was mentioned.', "I hope so too. I've become quite fond of Lady Sansa during our travels together. She's suffered enough.", 'Do you want to see your girls again? Sansa, more beautiful than ever? And Arya, just as wild as ever?', "He was the King's Hand. Perhaps Robert wanted them looked after. He was overcome with fatherly love.", "It doesn't matter what we want, once we get it, then we want something else. Your hair is different.", 'But you know something? I do believe that I have seen you even more recently than you have seen me.', "Let me bathe and dress for the occasion. Once I'm presentable, I'll call on the septon immediately.", "We have enough wheat for a five-year winter. If it lasts any longer, , we'll have fewer peasants.", "The mere suggestion that the Queen's brother tried to kill your boy would be considered treason.", "You know what kind of stories poor men enjoy the most? Ones about rich girls they'll never meet.", "I'm getting married to your Aunt Lysa. She's waiting for us at the Eyrie. You'll be safe there.", 'Command suits you. The northerns are all facing north worried about the threat beyond the wall.', 'It would be almost as brazen as attacking the Hand of the King in the streets of the capital.', "Cat, I've I've loved you since I was a boy. It seems to me that fate has given us this chance", 'Your home is the Vale The Lord of the Vale stands before us And only his judgment concerns me', 'Betrayed? I wanted him to serve as Protector of the Realm. I begged him to seize the moment.', "I know how hard it is to live with people you despise, believe me. But it won't be for long.", "The past is the past. The future is all that's worth discussing. The future of House Tyrell.", 'Ah, yes, that was poorly handled. Sometimes those with the most power have the least grace.', "I'm here on urgent business for the Queen Mother. Should I send word that I'll be delayed?", 'Yes. Earlier today, I distinctly recall seeing you talking to Lord Stark in his chambers.', "When they castrated you, did they take the pillar with the stones? l've always wondered.", 'Arranging for the ascension of King Tommen I, extricating Sansa, getting her here alive.', "It's not easy for ravens to fly in these storms. Perhaps Jon tried to send word earlier.", 'I am Lord Protector of the Vale and I command you to escort me safely back to the Eyrie.', "Tell me. Does someone, somewhere, keep your balls in a little box? I've often wondered.", "Jorah Mormont's a slaver, not a traitor. Small difference, I know, to an honorable man.", 'You honor me beyond words, Your Grace. I shall have to acquire some sons and grandsons.', "It's not a question of what I want. It's what you want. You want to go home, don't you?", 'No, his mother should have a long time ago. Consider it a step in the right direction.', "Please, Lady Brienne. No need for such formality. You are Catelyn Stark's sworn sword?", 'Only by reputation. They worship the God of Death, I believe. I never trust godly men.', 'Our lord has spoken Gather the Knights of the Vale The time has come to join the fray', 'The last man who wielded it meant to cut your throat, but your mother fought him off.', "Fish. The sigil of House Tully. Isn't that your wife's House - Tully - my Lord Hand?", "I have no doubt that upon my return, Robin's skills will have improved immeasurably.", 'Young Lord Robyn heeds my advice. And I have always counseled loyalty to the throne.', "An alliance makes sense. Together, they'd be difficult to defeat. He was named King.", 'I deny it! None of you were there to see what happened. None of you knows the truth.', "You'll need someone to share these burdens. I assure you, my price would be modest.", "No. She's one of mine. Is there someone in your service whom you trust completely?", 'Apparently, Her Grace believed that you two had some sort of special relationship.', "I'll send her away. I swear on my life. I swear to all the gods. Let her go, Lysa.", "I've heard very little about you. Which makes you quite a rare thing, as lords go.", "I thought that she'd be safest in here. One of several such establishments I own.", "Distrusting me was the wisest thing you've done since you climbed off your horse.", "Brothels make a much better investment than ship, I've found. Whores rarely sink.", "Strictly speaking, such a thing would not be in accordance with the King's laws.", 'So did Janos Slynt, and he was given Harrenhal, too. Until you snatched it away.', "No. But I pay them well, and they've seen what happens to men who disappoint me.", 'She imprisoned you. She tried to execute you. And you offer her son a princess?', 'Many who try to climb it fail and never get to try again. The fall breaks them.', 'Does it matter? If you fuck enough women, some of them will give you presents.', "But you carry on whispering in one king's ear and then the next. l admire you.", "Look around you. We're all liars here. And every one of us is better than you.", 'We both peddle fantasies, Brother Lancel. Mine just happen to be entertaining.', 'It is my belief that a moment of chaos affords opportunities lost soon after.', "I saw your mother not long ago. She's very eager to see you. And your sister.", "So a land so far from here, even Cersei Lannister can't get her hands on you.", 'hands the sheath of the knife to BRAN. BRAN slides the knife into the sheath.', 'Strange. I knew Cat from the time we were children. She never mentioned you.', 'All too well. I still carry a token of his esteem from navel to collarbone.', 'Ser Gregor Clegane. They call him the Mountain. The Houndo s older brother.', "With a single stroke, you'd make me one of the greatest lords in the realm.", 'The deed is done. Faded into nothing. Only speaking of it can make it real.', 'I know how hard it can be to lose both of your parents at such a young age.', 'I had it made a few weeks ago. What did I once tell you about the capital?', 'And what would you do, my friend, if you found yourself sitting up there?', "I can't believe he'd surrender the Northern crown without consulting you.", 'And every inn in the city is full and the whores are walking bow-legged.', "Ser Hugh of the Vale. He was Jon Arryn's squire. Look how far he's come.", "Yes, I could sing this song to Lysa, if I cared to. What's in it for me?", "If she's escaped the capital, Winterfell seems the logical destination.", 'Please accept my sincerest apologies. Ramka will take good care of you.', "Lady Sansa, I have known you since you were a girl. I've protected you.", 'So they say. There has been talk of other forces at work. Dark forces.', 'I know Cersei better than anyone here. If you turn your back on her --', "An old friend of the family. I've known your mother a long long time.", "I'm surprised you're surprised. This is the safest place in the city.", 'I have only loved one woman... only one, my entire life. Your sister.', "Do you think it's wise, your Grace, arresting the heir to Highgarden?", 'The Master of Coin finds the money. The King and the Hand spend it.', 'Forgive me. We have never talked properly. I wanted to remedy that.', "And on the night of your wedding, who was by the king's side then?", 'You will note that I am standing here talking to you, not Stannis.', 'I made a mistake, a horrible mistake. I underestimated a stranger.', 'Sansa, I beg you! I loved your mother since the time I was a boy.', "I'm a purveyor of beauty and discretion, both equally important.", 'Council business.
