We all have so much to discuss with Ned Stark.', "Let's start over, shall we? You be the man and you be the woman.", 'He had an interesting proposal for her concerning her daughters.', "Because he was a drunk and a fool and I don't trust drunk fools.", 'Ought we not... inform the Lords of the Vale about the ceremony?', 'Cersei sent for me. . We must not let her sniff out any trouble.', 'To find myself in a position where a simple word to the King --', 'Then you will take this Bolton boy, Ramsay, and make him yours.', "I'm not bringing these terms to him. I'm bringing them to you.", "I hope you know that I'm your friend, Sansa. Your true friend.", 'And tell me, Lord Renly, when will you be having your friend?', "And who would you have me be loyal to? Your brother's corpse?", 'All of these tents look the same to me. Would you be so kind-', "Cersei summoned me to King's Landing. I dared not refuse her.", 'You are family, too. Would Arya really murder her own sister?', 'The Lannisters will trade your daughters for the Kingslayer.', 'I see. And have you shared these suspicions with Lord Tywin?', 'And I will. You must believe me when I tell you that I will.', 'Jon is young and unmarried. Daenerys is young and unmarried.', "You must be one of the few men in the city who isn't a man.", 'A message for me, you say. Strange that the seal is broken.', "I've heard gossip that the Dragon Queen is quite beautiful.", 'Tell me, Ser Loras, what do you desire most in this world?', "There aren't. There aren't even two hundred. I've counted.", "Good news? Perhaps you'd like to share it with your wife?", "On your son Tyrion's directive, I met with Catelyn Stark.", "The gift of a great name. Sometimes that's all one needs.", 'Indeed. As reward for stabbing his own king in the heart.', 'You are now Hand of the King and Protector of the Realm.', 'So why did you call me here? Not for my wisdom, clearly.', 'flips the knife in his hand and extends it towards BRAN.', "Come. . Let's speak somewhere the dead can't hear us. .", 'Loras knew his mare was in heat. Quite crafty, really.', "l picture a gash. Like a woman's. ls that about right?", "And Harrenhal, I suppose that's off the table as well.", "I traveled here directly from Renly Baratheon's camp.", "Yes. A bit shabby, isn't it? You've been here before."]

Name: bran stark
Sentence: ["Just a cook in the Night's Watch. He was angry at the king for something, I don't remember. When the king was visiting the Nightfort, the cook killed the king's son, cooked him into a big pie with onions, carrots, mushrooms and bacon. That night he served the pie to the king. He liked the taste of his son so much, he asked for a second slice. The gods turned the cook into a giant white rat who could only eat his own young. He's been roaming the Nightfort ever since, devouring his own babies. But no matter what he does, he's always hungry.", "That's my grandfather, Lord Rickard. He was burned alive by the Mad King, Aerys. That's Lyanna, my father's sister. King Robert was supposed to marry her, but Rhaegar Targaryen kidnapped her. Robert started a war to win her back. He killed Rhaegar, but she died anyway. That's where l saw Father.", "I'm walking and running, but I'm not I'm not me. I'm running through the godswood, sniffing the dirt, tasting blood in my mouth when I've made a fresh kill, howling. Old Nan used to tell me stories about magical people who could live inside stags, birds, wolves.", "It means I can see everything. Everything that's ever happened to everyone. Everything that's happening right now. It's all pieces, fragments. I need to learn to see better. When the long night comes again I need to be ready.", 'I dreamt that the sea came to Winterfell. I saw waves crashing against the gates and the water came flowing over the walls. It flooded the castle. Drowned men were floating here, in the yard. Ser Rodrik was one of them.', "is sitting in a wheelchair. PETER BAELISH is sitting next to him. BAELISH unsheathes a Valyrian steel dagger and shows it to BRAN. It's the same dagger used in the attempt to assassinate BRAN years ago.", "I'm sorry for all that's happened to you. I'm sorry it had to happen here at our home. It was so beautiful that night. Snow falling just like now. And you were so beautiful in your white wedding dress.", "It wasn't for murder the gods cursed the Rat Cook or for serving the king's son in a pie. He killed a guest beneath his roof. That's something the gods can't forgive.", "The Gift, I think. Brandon The Builder gave all this land south of the Wall to the Night's Watch for their sustenance and support. Maester Luwin taught me that.", "You were at the Fist of the First Men. You were at Hardhome. You've seen the Army of the Dead. You've seen the Night King. He's coming for us. For all of us.", "The raven's been coming to me ever since I fell from that tower. He wants me to find him. I don't have my legs anymore. This is what I have now.", "I don't. Heard some of the men talking about the comet. . They say it's an omen. They say it means Robb will win a great victory in the South.", "First time I met you, you held a knife at me. We can't fight each other. We'll never make it to the Wall. I want you both to make peace.", 's eyes are pure white. They wash back to their normal color. He is sitting in front of the Weirwood. Maester Wolkan stands next to him.', 'I can see things that happened in the past. I can see things happening now all over the world. Why did you come to Winterfell?', 'We can send two orphan boys from Winterstown home with you to help watch over your flock if you can give them room and board.', "About himself. No one knows. No one but me. Jon isn't really my father's son He's the son of Rhaegar Targaryen and my aunt.", 'is sitting next to the Weirwood tree. SANSA and ARYA approach. BRAN turns to look at them. BRAN begins speaking to ARYA.', 'lt had three eyes. lt told me to come with him, so l did. We went down into the crypts and my father was there.', "I'm not really, not anymore. I remember what it felt like to be Brandon Stark, but I remember so much else now.", "No. You and Osha and Shaggydog head for the Last Hearth. The Umbers are our bannermen. They'll protect you.", "If we can't protect our own bannermen, why should they protect us? Go, Ser Rodrik. Take the men you need.", "No. We need to lure him into the open before his army destroys us all. I'll wait for him in the Godswood.", "It's the same as the one Daeron Targaryen built for his crippled nephew 120 years ago. I liked that one.", 'No, my dreams are different. Mine are true. I dreamt of my father dying. And Rickon had the same dream.', "Robb's at war and I'm going beyond the Wall. If something happens to us, you're the heir to Winterfell.", "He just got it. He's made many terrible mistakes. He's going to spend the rest of his life fixing them.", 'Everything Jojen told me is true. You saw what I did to Hodor. I have to find the three-eyed raven.', "You still would be, if you hadn't pushed me out of that window. And I would still be Brandon Stark.", "I can never be the Lord of Winterfell. I can never be lord of anything. I'm the three-eyed raven.", "I did though. It's true, isn't it... what Maester Luwin says about my legs? I'd rather be dead.", "You've lived beyond the Wall. What are you scared of? l'm a crippled boy and l'm willing to go.", "We can't risk it. If Theon tracks us here, he'll torture them until he finds out where we are.", 'Why do I want to return? So I can be a cripple again? So I can talk to an old man in a tree?', 'We appear to be missing a Master of Whisperers. And a Master of Laws. And a Master of War.', "For all we know, Castle Black's already under attack. If this many wildlings got through-", "He's on his way back to Winterfell with Daenerys Targaryen. You you saw this in a vision?", 'My uncle said the gates were sealed with ice and stone when the castles were deserted.', "I'm Brandon Stark of Winterfell and if you don't let me be, I'll have you all killed!", 'Uncle Benjen. The last letter Jon wrote me said you had been lost beyond the Wall.', "My Aunt Lyanna I've seen her statue in the crypt My father never talked about her", 'is staring at BAELISH. BAELISH stops speaking. The door opens and Meera appears.', "He'll come for me. He's tried before, many times, with many Three-Eyed Ravens.", "Don't worry, I'm not asking you to come with me. It won't be safe for Rickon.", "How many times have l told you? He's in King's Landing with Sansa and Arya.", 'What if I belong in the North? What if I fell from that tower for a reason?', 'Joffrey killed my father, your liege lord. Do you remember your vows, Ser?', 'reaches out and takes the knife, turning it and looking it over carefully.', "You won't be able to help us in this fight if I let them murder you first.", 'Everything you did brought you where you are now. Where you belong. Home.', 'Osha. The three-eyed raven, what do they say about it north of the Wall?', 'You said no harm would come! You said no harm would come. Theon, please.', "How are we going to get past the Wall? My uncle said it's 700 feet high.", "Even Hodor's not strong enough to climb the Wall with me on his back.", 'His real name is Wylis And he could talk and fight and -- and then --', 'produces the Valyrian dagger that BAELISH gave him and unsheathes it.', "Robert's Rebellion was built on a lie. Rhaegar didn't kidnap my aunt.", "Stop it. If that's everyone, I'm going to go for a ride before dark.", 'Sorry. But they come over the Wall and raid, steal, carry off women.', "Where are you going, huh? Aren't we better looking than the fat man?", 'You finally show me something I care about and then you drag me away', "I'm not his brother. He trusts you more than anyone. Now's the time.", 'An endless night. He wants to erase this world, and I am its memory.', "We don't know who might be after us. No one even knows we're alive.", "I can't do it by choice. I don't know how. It happens in my dreams.", 'Wait, I know that farm. I sent those two Winterfell orphans there.', 'He was with the wildlings. They tried to kill him but he got away.', 'Maester Wolkan built it for me so I can move around more easily.', "We don't have time for all this. The Night King has your dragon.", "He's one of them now. The Wall has fallen, the dead march south.", "You've been nasty to her every day. Of course she's nasty back.", "You were right. I can get inside Summer's mind whenever I want.", "I didn't see, but they have my brother's wolf. They have Ghost.", 'There are a lot of stories about this place. Horrible stories.', "Those weren't my favorites. My favorites were the scary ones.", "How can she protect the family, if she's not with her family?", "I won't. I'll never yield. We'll fight you and throw you out.", 'The Iron Islands. Sigil - a Kraken. Words - "We do not sow".', 'Dragonglass. A shard of dragonglass plunged into your heart.', "Waiting, for an old friend. It's time to tell Jon the truth.", "The dragons are all dead. They've been dead for centuries.", "I'm the Three-Eyed Raven now. I have to be ready for this.", "I've yielded Winterfell to Prince Theon. You all know me.", 'Why did you do that? Take me back there I want to go back', "Sigil - a stag. - A crowned stag now that Robert's King.", "You weren't sorry then. You were protecting your family.", "It's not just wolves. Sometimes in my dreams there's a-", 'It would take us two months to get to the Bay of Seals.', "I did ask him. He'd never heard of a three-eyed raven.", "Mother, I need to find it. It's here. It's calling me.", 'Sam the Slayer. Are you gonna slay me with that sword?', "I didn't have time to learn. I can't control anything.", "King Robb. And it's not his war. He didn't choose it.", 'No! You said no harm would come to them if I yielded.', "You helped us get beyond the Wall. You're a good man.", "I tried to kill it, but I couldn't. There was a boy.", "When I was looking through Summer's eyes, I saw Jon.", "You shouldn't be here It's not safe outside the cave", 'Words - "Ours is the fury". Lords - the Baratheons.', 'What are you doing down here? Come back up with us.', "I'm Brandon Stark! I'm Brandon Stark of Winterfell.", 'Perhaps I can find him. Do carry on with the rest.', "You've been fighting since you met. Just stop it.", "You're leaving now? It's the middle of the night.", 'Hodor, get his knife. Hodor. Cut me loose, Hodor.', 'Father said he was the best swordsman he ever saw', "You shouldn't envy me. Mostly I live in the past.", 'Family, duty, honor"... Is that the right order?', "Then how can you promise me she'll be home soon?", "I didn't like the way he was talking about Robb.", 'Tell us what medicine to get from your chambers.', "Summer, he's hurt. They've caught him in a trap.", 'I saw you as a boy You could talk What happened?', 'holds the knife out to ARYA. ARYA looks at BRAN.', "He saved my father's life during the rebellion.", "They're Night's Watch. Look. Jon might be here.", 'You were exactly where you were supposed to be.', "The Three-Eyed Raven says there's a war coming", 'I know he did Heard the story a thousand times', "I'll do anything, please! No, please stop it!", "What's in that tower? I want to go back there", "I saw the king! He's got hundreds of people!", 'Words - "A Lannister always pays his debts."', 'They burned it down. They burned everything.', "It's all right. The wolves will protect him.", 'To Hodor] Hush, Hodor. No, no more Hodoring.', 'You said, "I did warn you not the trust me."', 'Please, Sam. I have to go north. I have to.', "You're both very good at skinning rabbits.", 'Will you know how to find the last Hearth?', 'Hodor. Hodor, get his knife. Cut me loose.', 'We need to free Summer. And we need to go.', "But he's coming right now! Down our road!", 'Does it have anything to do with warging?', "I thought you might go to King's Landing.", "Where will they go? Their mother's dead.", "Seeing things that haven't happened yet?", "We couldn't risk going to the kitchens.", "And if Theon found out, he'd hang them.", 'It was you. You made the White Walkers.', 'How do you know there is an afterwards?', 'Theon. Did you hate us the whole time?', "Even in White Harbor, I'd want a kiss.", "I'm not alone, my brother is with me.", "You don't understand. You don't know.", "They can't do that north of the Wall?", "That's my father. And my Uncle Benjen", 'He saw me, the Night King! He saw me!', "I told you it's difficult to explain.", 'Why do you think I came all this way?', 'Is it true he saw the White Walkers?', 'Do you know where she is now? Today?', "You didn't give me an honest answer.", 'All of you should do as he commands.', "I didn't ask for black magic dreams.", 'What are you doing? Leave her alone!', 'A man gets lonely guarding the Wall.', "I saw that Hodor wasn't always Hodor", 'Someone very wealthy wanted me dead.', "So she was lying? They don't exist?", 'Please, stop this. Please stop him.', "I didn't want anyone to die for me.", "You're going to help me walk again?", 'No! No! Theon! Please. Ser Rodrik!', 'Your father is Howland Reed? Yeah.', 'Hodor, calm down. Hodor, be quiet!', 'You ever heard about the Rat Cook?', "I don't know. He was close, but --", "I don't know. No one's ever tried.", 'The Westerlands - sigil - a lion.', "I know. It's just a stupid dream.", "I've yielded Winterfell to Theon.", 'When my father died, I dreamt it.', 'Right now, I have to protect you.', "You don't have to do any of this.", "You're gonna get yourself killed.", 'Do you know who this belonged to?', 'Lord Tyrion, you will be my Hand.', 'Yes. Well, I mean I did like to.', "I can't. The saddle, the straps.", "They'll be after us with hounds.", 'No, it was the three-eyed raven.', "My brother, he's in the Night's-", 'Please! Please, leave her alone!', 'Jojen. Jojen! Look, Jojen, look.', 'Because it was meant to kill me.', 'Dornish bastards are named Sand.', 'He loved her. And she loved him.', "I'll never shoot another arrow.", "You're afraid. Just like Hodor.", "I'm not leaving without Summer.", 'Jojen and Meera, free them. Go!', 'The three-eyed raven taught me.', 'Cersei is on her list of names.', 'Ravens. We need to send ravens.', 'You held a knife to his throat.', 'Will I really be able to ride?', "I want to see where he's going", 'I became the Three-Eyed Raven.', 'You saw him? At Castle Black?', 'They already have stopped me.', 'You need legs to work a bow.', 'I wish I could. I really do.', "You're the three-eyed raven.", "I wasn't drowning I was home", "I'm sorry. I didn't mean to.", 'Yes. I need to speak to him.', 'I saw you at the crossroads.', "I don't really want anymore.", "And I don't want to be king.", 'Jon said he was a deserter.', "I don't want to see anyone.", 'Unbowed, unbent, unbroken".', 'Stop. Stop! Stop right now!', "I don't want to. I have to.", 'Hodor, take me to the tree.', 'I know where we have to go.', "There's no need to be rude.", 'Littlefinger gave it to me.', 'He needs to know the truth.', "No. I'm something else now.", 'He always knows where I am.', "I'm not Lord of Winterfell.", "Every night it's the same.", "I don't want to leave you.", 'Take us north of the Wall.', 'The east side of the keep.', "He's better than my father", 'He stabbed him in the back', "It's difficult to explain.", "And Jon - Jon's real name.", "He's never been a bastard.", 'The things we do for love.', 'Osha, what are you doing?', "Where's Rickon and Hodor?", "It's wasted on a cripple.", 'You have the sight, too?', 'What else have you seen?', 'How did you get past it?']

Name: sam
Sentence: ["Ser Alliser fought bravely, it is true. And when he was wounded, it is Jon who saved us. He took charge of the wall's defense. He killed the Magnar of the Thenns. He went North to deal with Mance Rayder, knowing it almost certainly meant his own death. Before that, he led the mission to avenge Lord Commander Mormont. Mormont himself chose Jon to be his steward. He saw something in Jon, and now we've all seen it, too. He may be young, but he's the commander we turned to when the night was darkest.", 'is walking through a dark library. He heads to the restricted section and unlocks the barred gate. He begins removing books and scrolls from shelfs and stuff them in his satchel. After retrieving what he needs, SAM quickly walks to the exit of the library. He pauses before he leaves and turns around. He glances back at the library. It is many stories tall lined with countless shelves of books. SAMWELL looks at the library one last time, turns and walks out of the door.', "His name was Aemon Targaryen. He came to us from King's Landing, a Maester of the Citadel, chained and sworn. And a sworn brother of the Night's Watch, ever faithful. No man was wiser or gentler or kinder. At the Wall a dozen Lord Commanders came and went during his years of service, but he was always there to counsel them. He was the blood of the dragon, but now his fire has gone out. And now his watch has ended.", "I didn't know I was going to kill it, but I had to do something I didn't have any choice, he was going to kill Gilly and take the baby. If someone had asked me my name right then, I wouldn't have known. I wasn't Samwell Tarly anymore. I wasn't a Steward in the Night's Watch or son of Randyll Tarly or any of that. I was nothing at all. And when you're nothing at all, there's no more reason to be afraid.", "He's not my child, Maester Aemon. She's one of Craster's wives. I remember every word of the oath. Night gathers and my watch begins. I am the shield that guards the realms of men. The realms of men. That means her as well as us. We didn't build five hundred miles of ice walls seve hundred feet high to keep men out. The night is gathering, Maester Aemon. I've seen it. It's coming for all of us.", "If Gilly stays here then she'll die. And the baby that she named after me will die. And I'll end up dying, too, trying to protect them. Which means that the last thing that I'll see in this world will be the look in her eyes when I fail them. I'd rather see a thousand White Walkers than see that.", "Oh ahem. The father's face is stern and strong / He sits and judges right from wrong / He weighs our lives, the short and long / And loves the little children / The mother gives the gift of life / And watches over every wife / Her gentle smile ends all strife /And she loves her little children.", "I'm not. It's seven hundred feet high, all made of ice. On a warm day you can see it weeping. Castle Black is nice enough. They keep a fire burning in the long hall day and night. And Hobb makes venison stew with onions. Very tasty. Sometimes, one of the brothers will sing. Dareon sings best.", "Oh, yes. Once you get south of the Riverlands, very different sorts of trees start to take over. Maple, elm, beech, poplar. The odd willow. And of course now that summer's over, you'll start seeing the autumn colors coming in. Still, you'll find more green here than anywhere else.", "Please. I want you to. My mother used it for sewing. She'd let me sit with her in her chamber while she sewed and I'd read to her. My father put a stop to it when he found out. It's the only thing I have of hers. She gave it to me before I left for the Wall.", "Archmaester, with respect, I've seen them--the Army of the Dead. The white walkers. W was sent here to learn how to defeat them, but everyone in the Citadel, those who will even talk to me, they all doubt the walkers ever existed in the first place.", "I'll be more use to you as a Maester. More use to everyone now that Maester Aemon's gone. The Citadel has the worldo s greatest library. I'll learn about history, strategy, healing. And other things. Things that will help when they come.", "I want you to tell me what it was like to have someone. To be with someone. To love someone and have them love you back. We're all gonna die a lot sooner than I'd planned. You're the closest I'll ever get to know it.", 'And though Daenerys maintains her grip on Slaver\'s Bay, forces rise against her from within and without. She refuses to leave until the freedom of the former slaves is secure." She sounds like quite a woman.', 'I shall take no wife" yes, that\'s in there, there\'s no denying that. "I shall father no children" it\'s very specific. But what our vows have to say about other...activities...is open to interpretation.', "Jon's taking a risk, but he has to. We don't stand a chance otherwise. Sometimes a man has to make hard choices, choices that might look wrong to others but you know are right in the long run.", "I didn't think I'd ever come back here after my father made me renounce my title and inheritance and, well, threaten to kill me if I didn't. A person just doesn't feel welcome at that point.", "Um- We represent all the great houses, but whomever we choose, they won't just rule over lords and ladies. Maybe the decision about what's best for everyone should be left to well, everyone.", "The thing is...my father doesn't like wildlings. He hoped I'd make a man of myself by “killing some bloody wildlings,” so it's probably a good subject to avoid if at all possible.", "I don't know if you're safe here. They're my brothers, but some of them were thieves before they came here. Some of them were rapers. You saw what they did at your father's keep.", "Yes, now that's very important. If he thinks that Little Sam is his grandchild, he'll take you in. He'll get an education. He'll learn to read. And you can help teach him. Huh?", 'is seated at a table surround by papers and candles. He is writing notes into a book. Gilly is seated across from him reading aloud from a tome. SAM JR. is playing on the bed.', "I don't know. I've been going through all the old manuscripts hoping to find something, and all I've learned is that the children of the forest used to hunt with dragonglass.", "And the archer. I got lucky with one of them. There are more. Many more. And for every one of them, the dead men, more than you could count. I wish you'd come with us.", "She's not safe out there. I should have known. You told us there were wildlings south of the Wall. If they're raiding the smaller villages, Mole's Town could be next.", "I've seen the army of the dead. I've seen the white walkers, and they're coming for us, for all the living. And when it's time we'll need every last man we can find.", "I wanted to ask you something. To ask something of you. Send me, Gilly, and the baby to Oldtown so I can become a Maester. That's what I'm meant to be, not this.", "Thousands and thousands of years ago, the First Men stood here where we're standing all through the long night. What do you think they were like, the First Men?", "Rabbits. Sometimes squirrels. I say “we,” it's my friend Jon mostly. Sometimes Edd. Oh, and Gilly. She's- - she's quite a good hunter as well. Um, huntress.", "It's not a sure thing. Ser Denys Mallister has commanded the Shadow Tower for 20 years, and people say he's a good man. He's running against Ser Alliser--", 'The Fist of the First Men. Think of how old this place is. Before the Targaryens defeated the Andals, before the Andals took Westeros from the First Men.', "No, truly. The thing about her that I find so interesting is that after all that Craster's done to her, she's still got hope that life might get better.", "This is different. They're brothers of the Night's Watch and I can't just stab them in the back and I can't run away, which is what we did at Craster's.", "There's a lot more Wildlings on the other side of the wall than this side. We've got us some weapons and things. This is the perfect place for us to be.", "Well, it's a family name. For instance, I'm Samwell Tarly. Samwell is my birth name and Tarly is my family name. You see? So my father is also a Tarly.", "We swore to be the Watchers on the Wall. We can't watch the Wall with 50 men. And we can't get more men without help from the Warden of the North.", 'Gilly, look at me. You know how to do a hundred things I can never do. You can build a fire with wet wood. You can cook. You can stitch a wound.', "I wanted to be one when I was young. Instead, I became a man of the Night's Watch. Far more adventure up here anyway. I wouldn't have met you.", "At the Citadel, I transcribed a High Septon's diary. He annulled Rhaegar's marriage to Elia. He wed Rhaegar and Lyanna in a secret ceremony.", "Come with us. There are steps carved into the south side of the Wall. Hodor can carry you to the top. We'll walk straight to Castle Black.", "Well, I'm hardly a new recruit. How many brothers can say they've killed a white walker and a Thenn? I might be the first in history!", "Look. I am a man of the Night's Watch, Gilly. I made a promise to defend The Wall and I have to keep it, because that's what men do.", "A Song of Ice and Fire. Archmaester Ebrose's history of the wars following the death of King Robert. I helped him with the title.", "Your name's Olly, right? Listen to me Olly, get me to the top and when we give a signal, bring us back down. Do you hear me?", "Um, Jon's the one to lead the fight against the dead. I know he is. But he can't do it alone, so I've come here to help him.", "I'd be dead if it wasn't for Jon. If you're his brother, you're my brother, too. And anything I can do to help you, I will.", 'Her name is Gilly. Brother Slynt knows her quite well. They cowered together in the larder during the battle for the Wall.', "I asked you if, in light of what I've seen in the North, if I could have access to the restricted area of the library.", "I promise to come back and visit whenever I can. You'll be safer here. Who's gonna protect you at Castle Black? Me?", 'A wildling girl, a baby, and Lord Janos. I found him there when the battle was over in a puddle of his own making.', "A mountain of it. Beneath the ground. Stannis told me, but I didn't think... This is important. Jon needs to know.", "And three for White Walkers. It's been a thousand years, but that's the only time they blow the horn three times.", "It's what the High Septon wrote in his private diary. I don't know why he'd lie. Is this something you can see?", 'The Targaryens used dragonglass to decorate their weapons without even knowing what the First Men used it for.', "You're alright. You're alright. I'll get help. Shh, shh. Maester Aemon is coming, he's gonna make it alright.", "But what he says about what they do...it's all true. It's exactly what the survivors of their raids report.", 'Hmm! Did you know that the youngest Lord Commander in history, Osric Stark, was elected at the age of 10?', "Maester Aemon became quite ill shortly after the election. He's since passed away. Which is why I'm here.", "It's a map of Dragonstone. The Targaryens built their first stronghold there when they invaded Westeros.", 'Anyone who tries to throw you out will be having words with me. From now on, wherever you go, I go too.', 'Well, no. There are thousands and thousands of books out there. This library is rather small, actually.', 'Oh, I found something at the Fist of the First Men. Buried treasure. Thousands of years old. I think.', "They'll never let you within a hundred yards of him. And if you did, even if you managed to kill him.", "The Wildlings are over the walls. Ser Alliser has fallen. The castle walls can't stand much longer.", 'Get your hands off her. Brother Derryk. Brother Brand. I believe you both have guard duty tonight.', "My father's not the most literate man. They say the Citadel has the largest library in the world.", "Seems a bit greedy for one man to have so many wives. Wouldn't two, or three, be enough for him?", "I've been around Ghost enough to know a direwolf when I see one. And I've heard all about Hodor.", "You didn't fail him, or him, or her. Every one of them is alive because of you, and no one else.", "And I certainly didn't expect to be introducing him to my family. So you know what to tell them.", 'We found them at the Fist. Someone buried them a long time ago. Someone wanted us to find them.', "I know, I'm sorry, but we need men and supplies. And Roose Bolton is the Warden of The North.", "You were friends with me when I first got here. And I wasn't winning any elections back then.", 'There is good farmland in the Gift. . Land that no one uses now. A dozen abandoned villages.', "I don't know. They'd pass wildling villages. They could try to find shelter at one of them.", 'The interesting thing is, our vows never specifically forbid intimate relations with women.', "He's made of Valyrian steel. How many Valyrian steel swords are left in the Seven Kingdoms?", "Oh, well, thank you, but, um, I'm not sure that I am. What happened to you beyond the Wall?", "It's Dragonglass. It's what I used to kill the White Walker. I hope you don't need them.", "I only said that the more time you spend practicing, the faster you'll be able to read.", "I'm sorry I let him treat you that way. I was afraid he'd turn you and Little Sam away.", 'Uh... the Archmaester is less than enthusiastic about the salutary effects of brothels.', "He won't just kill ya. They'll boil you. They'll filet you. They'll make it last days!", "Are you alright? Shh, you're alright. Yeah, of course you are my brave little fella.", "Try not to worry Olly. I've been worrying about Jon for years. He always comes back.", "If you step back and think about it, the thing about Gilly that's so interesting is", "If Jon is alive, then Castle Black's where he'll be. It's the safest place for you.", "You can't protect me forever. There won't be anywhere to hide if the castle falls.", 'You thought of a name yet? It would be easier to refer to him if he had a name.', 'I wish I could have convinced him to come back with me. I tried. Really, I did.', 'Whilst Lord Janos was hiding with the women and children, Jon Snow was leading.', 'turns to collect his work and leave. The maesters begin talking to one another.', "I could take up Jon's duties while he's gone, my lord. It would be no trouble.", "Oh, yes. Yes. A good amount. North of the Wall, you don't hunt, you don't eat.", "It doesn't get so cold down in the Reach. And there were servants, of course.", "I suppose it's a rather philosophical difference between a wink and a blink.", "Bigger. So big you can't even see the top sometimes. It's hidden in clouds.", "What I know is what I saw. And if you saw it, too, you'd run the other way.", "That's right. She'll clean and cook and look after the other girls' babies.", "Anyway, there's nothing for him to interpret. We didn't. So what's it like?", 'If Ser Alliser is chosen as the new Lord Commander… he hates the wildlings.', 'And the thing about you that I find so interesting is absolutely nothing.', "I killed a White Walker. I killed a Thenn. I'll take my chances with you.", 'What kind of man would I be if I ran away when I saw someone hurting you?', 'I travelled south under orders from the Lord Commander. He wants me to- -', "Oh, oh. Right. I'm sorry. I just wanted to make sure you weren't hurt. .", "But you're the only one that saw it. And they all think you're just a...", "I'm not being silly. There's 100 men lying awake at night picturing you.", 'looks up from his work annoyed. He remains silent and continues working.', 'The Archmaester has done some research on this subject and it turns out-', "They haven't heard of you either. . But we need men and they have some.", "I'm not sure that it does anything. It's beautiful, though, isn't it?", 'Of course I couldo ve known. They were raiding the villages close by.', 'Wildlings are people, just like us. There are good ones and bad ones.', "Of course I'm afraid, there's a band of Wildlings coming to kill us.", "I'll stay too. He's always been good to me. I can't leave him now.", "I will not. They wouldo ve… I don't know what they would have done", "Let's see, there's Duncan, Kevan, Jo,n Guymon, Feldan, Tristifer.", 'I remember when you disobeyed orders and rode south to help Robb.', "I can't just hide here with you while they're fighting out there.", "They've already done the worst thing to me they could ever do.", "She's pregnant. . We have to take her with us, when we leave.", "You'll be safe down here. I'll check on you as soon as I can.", "Not to worry. Men brawl from time to time. It's only natural.", 'I, I wanted to give you something. It belonged to my mother.', 'No. They were tiring out. I had them in the palm of my hand.', "Yes. And once I have my chain, I'll return to Castle Black.", 'That makes you the only person south of the Twins who does.', "Well, you're better than me at everything. Except reading.", "You deserve this. You do. I couldn't be happier for you.", "He apologizes for not being here. He's not feeling well.", "You're Jon's brother. The one who fell from the window.", "This venison, it's very tasty. Is it from today's hunt?", 'You left me. When the white walkers came, you left me.', "No one's going to hang you. You've done nothing wrong.", 'Gilly go on, Get back to your room and lock the door.', 'I was wondering if you had considered my proposition.', "It's getting dark. We could stay here for the night.", "To Castle Black. I'm a brother of the Night's Watch.", 'No...she just had a baby! ...and she never offered.', "To...you can't do that. No one gave you any orders.", 'And Qhorin Halfhand is the greatest ranger alive.', "Hush, now. You're home. Carry him inside. Gently.", "Woah! It's me. It's me. I promised you, didn't I?", 'Lord Ashford. . Lady Caulfield. . Lord Smallwood.', "Of course I will. And I'll take care of you, too.", "This is Gilly, she's one of Craster's daughters.", 'The First Men made these marks. Help me with it.', "That's a lovely idea, but Mormont's a last name.", "Little Same. As if I'd cut their throats myself.", "There'll be arrows for all of us soon I imagine.", "I'm so so sorry. I didn't know until I got back.", "He'll make you a Stark with the stroke of a pen?", "Well, it wasn't a very large piece of parchment.", 'Nothing like the sight of a woman walking away.', 'The Lord Commander, , we are sworn to protect -', "I could try. . What? I've read about it. A bit.", "Beautiful, isn't it? Gilly would love it here.", 'So... are you all right? No one bothering you?', "I'm sorry Maester, I didn't mean it like that.", "I can't steal her, she's a person not a goat.", "I'm not giving it away. I'm giving it to you.", "Craster's? You think Bra nmight have found...", 'What? Why in the world would you want to go-', 'Well, I suppose someone had to be the first.', 'I know how this must look. What I meant was-', 'Yes, well, I suppose that life is irregular.', "She won't mind. Looks better on you anyway.", 'The army of the dead. And when they come -', 'His little brother, Aegon. He became king.', "He's not dead. No, Jon's a great fighter.", "Well, I mean, there's no real difference.", 'I worry about it sometimes. All the time.', 'Bored of you? I... I want to protect you.', 'to Olly* Get me to the top! You hear me?!', 'From Lord Commander Snow at Castle Black.', "It's Jon and the Halfhand. They're back.", 'What about me? Gilly? I worry about you.', "You have to trust me. It's for the best.", 'Well then. *hands Pyp a loaded crossbow*', "Without Mance? You're going to kill him?", 'Oh, yes. Yes, please. Thank you, Mother.', 'He was last spotted flying east, toward-', 'But the more wood, the bigger the fire.', "That's the only thing they think about.", 'I told you. Wherever you go, I go, too.', "I don't believe you're mentioned, ahem.", "I'm not cut out for this sort of work.", 'What? No. This is just the way I talk.', "Don't you think he should have a name?", 'Oh, and this, this is our son Samwell.', 'Keep it safe for me. Til I come back.', "It's not a very nice word, I suppose.", "He's seen some adventures, hasn't he?", 'to Grenn* We need more men down here.', "I haven't seen a girl in six months.", 'Where do you think Jon is right now?', "He's beautiful. Does he have a name?", "Maybe you'd be safer in Mole's Town.", 'And find a weapon, Olly. Fight them!', 'Three?! Who taught you, your mother?', 'How hard can it be to build a fire?', 'I should never have left her there.', "I...I didn't mean in the same room.", "Yes, well, I'm not nothing anymore.", "It's where they train the maesters.", "We've been fighting them for years.", 'I told them I met you in the North.', 'Oh, of course. Sorry. Long journey.', "I wasn't sure if you'd remember me.", 'You were with her? How many times?', "I'll be back. I just want to look.", 'I should neverhave taken her away.', 'With a dagger made of dragonglass.', "They're... they're ready for you.", 'Alright, alright! Enough of that.', 'What the maesters call obsidian -', "It's beautiful. You're beautiful.", "Oh! I don't know what that means.", "He's got a Valyrian steel sword.", "Go inside. Go back inside. I'll-", 'Maester Aemon. How did you know-', "But you'd be Lord of Winterfell.", "Talla? Gods, you're a woman now.", "I'm-- I'm to be the new maester.", 'Oh, Pyp. Open the fucking gate!', 'Yes, well, best get used to it.', 'But… you killed a White Walker.', 'Archmaester, I was wondering...', 'Sources in the restricted area?', 'stops working and turns around.', 'The maesters call it obsidian.', 'Are you going to give him one?', 'No. No, no, no. Not very well.', "Please don't name him Randyll.", "But you're going to stop them?", "Don't say that, Maester Aemon.", 'I said get your hands off her.', 'Oh, um, Mother, this is Gilly.']

Name: bronn
Sentence: ["I put yourself at risk. Important difference. It's your head Queen Cersei's offered a bag of gold for, it's not mine. Now, thanks to me, she's got two traitors' heads coming right through her door. She can lop them both off as soon as she gets tired of the clever words that pour out their pieholes. All thanks to Ser Bronn of the fucking Blackwater. If that's not looking after myself, I don't know what is.", "There's nothing like a good fight to get you in the mood for fucking. . And there's nothing like a fuck-mad Dornish girl to clear your head for the next fight. It's how the two work together. And we're gonna do a lot of fighting, I am sure. Well, I am. But I don't imagine we'll get to stick around for the rest. Not after we've kidnapped their princess.", "I don't know if you've ever seen a battle, old man, but things can get a bit messy. 'Cause when we're flinging things at Stannis, he's flinging them right back at us. Men die, men shit themselves, men run, which means pots falling, which means fire inside the walls, which means the poor cunts trying to defend the city end up burning it down.", "I'd be a bloody fool if he didn't frighten me. He's freakish big and freakish strong. And quicker than you'd expect for a man of that size. Maybe I could take him, dance around until he's so tired of hacking at me, he dropped his sword, get him off his feet somehow. But one misstep... and I'm dead. Why should I risk it?", "Aye, we talked about it. Have you ever been in a city under siege? Maybe this part's not in your books. See, it's not the fighting that kills most people. It's the starving. Foodo s worth more than gold. Noble ladies sell their diamonds for a sack of potatoes. Things get bad enough, the poor start eating each other.", "Oh. Well, he'd fuck her, that's for sure. And she's fuck him, don't you think? The way she looks at him. The way all women look at him is frankly irritating. I preferred working with the little brother on that account. Come on, you're the one with the magic cock.", "The Dornishman's wife was as fair as the sun and her kisses were warmer than spring. The Dornishman's blade it was made of black steel and its kiss was a terrible thing. The Dornishman's wife would sing as she bathed in a voice that was sweet as a peach...", "You want Shae, keep her. Wed one and bed the other. All you have to do is get a son in the Stark girl. He'll be Lord of Winterfell one day. You can rule the North in his name. You'll have two women and a whole kingdom of your own.", "If and may and could. It's bloody cold up north. Lollys is soft and warm. And close. If I gave you the choice between fucking Lollys and fighting the Mountain, you'd have your britches down and your cock out before I could blink.", 'Aye. But only when Lady Arryn demanded the trial take place that day. You were his first choice. He named you for his champion because he knew you would ride day and night to come fight for him. You gonna fight for him now?', "Brothers oh brothers, my days here are done, the Dornishman's taken my life. Bur what does it matter, for all men must die, and I've tasted the Dornishman's wife! Yes I've tasted the Dornishman's wife!", "I've been all over the world. And if there's one thing I've learned, it's that meanness comes around. People like your sister, they always get what's coming to them eventually. One way or another.", 'You just won the biggest prize in the world. What could you possibly have to be upset about? Come on. You can tell me. Queen of Thorns give you one last prick in the balls before saying goodbye?', "It's warm in here. We've got beautiful women and good brown ale. Plenty for everyone. And all you want is to put one of us in the cold ground with no women to keep us company.", "If you could get real soldiers to man the catapults, then maybe you'd hit your target one time in ten, but all the real soldiers are in the Riverlands with your father.", "There's no cure for being a cunt. But the boy's at that age. And he's got nothing to do all day but pick wings off flies. Couldn't hurt to get some of the poison out.", "You waste time trying to get people to love you, you'll end up the most popular dead man in town. You want to fuck that Stark girl. You just don't want to admit it.", "You learned to fight like a good little boy. I'll bet that thrust through the MadKing's back was pretty as a picture. You want to fight pretty or you want to win?", "No. Oh, he hated the little twat, sure. But who didn't? And poison's not his style. Or murder, for that matter. You want to know for sure, why don't you ask him?", "That's exactly who I am. And you're a grub in fancy armor who's better at beating little girls than fighting men. Now, I have an appointment with Lord Tyrion.", "The Master of Coin looks forward to helping the Master of Ships, but first he has to ensure we're not wasting coin, or soon there won't be no more coin.", "If I could tell you how many crazy old men I've seen pushing carts around army camps making grand claims about jars full of pig shit. No offense meant.", "And now my pockets are empty. You've given me a taste for the finer things. And if you want me to carry on protecting you, you'll need to pay more.", "Lesson number one, assume everyone wants to hit you. ‘Cause they do, Pod. Everyone wants to hit a fucking squire. Do it again. Come on, don't sulk.", "The thieves, they love a siege. Soon as the gates are sealed, they steal all the food. By the time it's all over, they're the richest men in town.", "Always wanted a Dornish stallion. Beasts can run a day and night without tiring. We'll ride to the Water Gardens with a nice breeze in our face.", 'Have your lads start digging perimeter trenches. Set pickets every hundred yards. And work double-time on those siege towers and trebuchets.', "A cloak slows you down in a fight. Makes it hard to move quietly. And the gold catches the light, so you're nice and easy to spot at night.", "If I'm putting something of a lit together, a one-handed man, , who happens to be one of the most recognizable faces in Westeros, is not -", "No, I do not. Dragons are where our partnership ends. I'm not going to be around when those things start spitting fire on King's Landing.", 'Seems to me the smart place to meet travelers is in a tavern. That way, one party is late, the other party can drink some ale inside.', "Listen to me, cunt. Till I get what I'm owed, a dragon doesn't get to kill you. You don't get to kill you. Only I get to kill you.", 'hesitates for a moment. He turns his horse and rides to man the artillery crossbow. JAIME draws his sword and rides into battle.', "If we live that long. Men without cocks. You wouldn't find me fighting in an army if I had no cock. What's left to fight for?", 'stops walking and holds his torch out. TYRION steps from around a pillar and looks at JAIME. JAIME looks angrily at BRONN.', "Well, he's not living anymore. And all his pots of wildfire didn't help him, did they? Men win wars, not magic tricks.", "I've never seen Valyrian steel before. She's a beauty. The problem is, if you fight with an edged blade, I'll have to.", "She's gone. I know you don't want to believe it, but she is. Now, go drink till it feels like you did the right thing.", 'stands up and walks away. JAIME continues sitting on the shore looking at the smoke and fire from the distant battle.', 'Oh, speaking of builders, all the best brothels burned down. The Master of Coin is willing to fund reconstruction.', 'And just in case the Martells of Dorne are looking to spill some Lannister blood, it may as well be yours, eh?', "Right here is where I fuck his wife. She's a screamer, that one. If they don't hear her, they won't hear us.", "It's a fine place, isn't it? A fine place. I never thought I'd end up settling down in a place like this.", 'Shae is a whore. Are you gonna marry her? Eh? How did marrying a whore work out for you the first time?', "One of each will do. But if you want me to kill the Mountain for you, it'd better be a damn big castle.", "So, she wants to murder someone, but she can't send her soldiers. If it's the Dragon Queen she's after-", "What's to stop him from docking down the coast and telling the locals that Jaime Lannister's in Dorne?", 'I know. Why are you here? Why not send 40 of me, or an army? Unlike most folks, you actually got one.', 'Now, that is a sorry attempt at a siege. Someone needs to teach those sad twats how to dig trenches.', 'As much as I appreciate a walk in the sunshine, your lordship, I am wondering why you sent for me.', "What you're here for. There's no way this little visit could possibly mean anything good for me.", "Boys, there's no need for this. Just, point us in the right direction. We'll find our way home.", "Back away. Keep backing away till you're outside this establishment. Then back away some more.", "It wasn't me she was aiming at. She was trying for my little brother. Now he was a real pest.", "And I bet he swore all kinds of oaths to get it. But you won't be around if he breaks them.", "Because if someone follows me without an invitation, I'm the last person they ever follow.", "We are. But I'm a sellsword. I sell my sword. I don't loan it out to friends as a favor.", 'and JAIME are walking by the dragon skulls. Both men have sparring swords in their hand.', 'All the more reason for you to train. Unless you plan on fighting Dothraki 12 year olds.', "You don't want me cleaning me nails. You don't want me looking your way. Why am I here?", 'What are you saying? These ladies enjoyed him so much, they gave him the time for free?', "I'm not sure you understand how much people hate your family in this part of the world.", 'Our ship capsized in the night. We managed to swim ashore. It was a near thing, really.', 'She does. Unless she happens to perish before her father. Then Lollys gets the castle.', "You know what I think? I think you're a good person. And your sister is a mean person.", 'Oh, look at these two shining warriors. Ser Taryn Mant and... Ser Whosit of Whocares.', 'I have. The Dornish are crazy. All they want to do is fight and fuck. Fuck and fight.', 'Second time, I was nine. Got in a scrap with a few older boys. They won. Third time-', "People think you're pulling the king's strings. They blame you for the city's ills.", "Don't feel sorry for him. He'll be halfway up your arse before the night's through.", "Seeing as it's his grandson's ass on the throne, I imagine he'll forgive that debt.", "Well, now let's see. First time, I was five. My mam smacked me with an iron poker.", "Oh, is that why you're so fucking glum, eh? All your new riches weighing you down?", "Men shit themselves when they die. Didn't they teach you that at fancy lad school?", "You're a commander, not a damned infantryman. These fuckers are about to swamp us.", "l'm guessing the lady and l can tell more unpleasant stories than your lordship.", "Unless Lord Twatbeard made up a bunch of numbers to hide what he's really up to.", "You once said if anyone ever asked me to sell you out, you'd double their price.", "I've had an exciting life. I want my death to be boring. How do you want to go?", "Come on, Pod. Let's you and me go have a drink while the fancy folks talk, eh?", 'What? Ladies fall from their horses and snap their pretty necks all the time.', 'In my own keep, drinking my own wine, watching my sons grovel for my fortune.', "From, uh, Ser What's-his-name? l don't know. Ginger cunt, three tents down.", "You're a lord, she's a lady. And a beauty at that. I don't see the problem.", 'I spent my life around soldiers. What do you think they spend that gold on?', "Give me 10 good men and some climbing spikes... I'll impregnate the bitch.", "Careful, now. We don't want to get blood all over your pretty white cloak.", "You set your brother free, didn't you? I bet your sister didn't like that.", "That's like saying I have a bigger cock than anyone in the Unsullied army.", "I don't think you want people to see how you look swinging that thing yet.", 'She once gave me a castle and a wife, then rectified me right out of them.', 'No? Two knights, off to rescue a princess. Sounds like a good song to me.', 'You promised me a lordship and a castle and a highborn beauty for a wife.', "Now, that's the truth, isn't it? You want to learn that sort of fighting?", 'Oh, aye. And he has company. Filthy old stoat. Almost hate to interrupt.', 'No great hurry. Dornish women are the most beautiful women in the world.', 'You just sit there, a rich slab of beef, and all the birds come pecking.', "Do you like 'em? Eh? Gloves are doeskin. Softer than a virgin's thighs.", 'I like you, pampered little shit that you are. I just like myself more.', "I saw you kill a man with a shield. You'll be unstoppable with an ax.", "Maybe they're trying to curry some favor with the new Master of Coin.", "Aye, I'm your friend. And when have you ever risked your life for me?", "Good thing we're friends or we'd be fucking you in the ass right now.", "The lads will escort you. The streets aren't safe at night, my lord.", "And if I fight with an edged blade, I'll have no one left to pay me.", 'Then how come an old cunt like me can still sneak up and murder you?', "Don't you worry about me. I'm doing all right. Looking after myself.", "Of course they seemed to like it. They're paid to seem to like it.", 'How do you plan on finding a single Dornishman in a city this big?', 'Your first? You need a woman. Nothing like a woman after a fight.', 'You pay me to kill people who bother you. Evil notions come free.', "My lonesome bachelor days are over. I'm to wed Lollys Stokeworth.", "I've been doing this sort of thing a long time. I'm good at it. .", "Wonderful. Wouldn't feel right to leave Dorne without a new scar.", 'Now, listen to me, Pod. See how your feet are about a yard apart?', "If he's so damned important, how come they sent you to meet him?", 'Well, if you ever see the little fucker, , give him my regards.', 'Fucked in the arse. . Hiya! . Morning, lads. Glad we found you.', "Well now, in King's Landing there was an absolutely gorgeous...", "She doesn't want me. She wants your golden fingers up her twat.", "Yes, I'm sure Queen Cersei's reign will be quiet and peaceful.", 'You hear lots of things playing dice with Lannister soldiers.', "No. It's just the unknown thieves we need to worry about now.", "I've never borrowed money before. I'm not clear on the rules.", "There's this knight, Leygood, got thunderbolts on his shield.", 'That was me knocking your ass to the dirt with your own hand.', 'All right, can we stop talking about the fucking dragons now?', "Chevalteesh. I'd swap all your books for a few good archers.", 'Do you know how long it will take us to dig all those holes?', "It's an opinion I share with some of the finest men I know.", "Don't wait too long. I've a noble woman to marry back home.", "No need to call me ser just because I'm an anointed knight.", "The little king's backed up. Clogged from balls to brains.", "We had a deal and wearing a gold cloak wasn't part of it.", "What are you waiting for, a kiss? Ready the lady's horse.", 'Aye. But your lot like to give the singers a good ending.', "Good thing. I'd be out of a job. What about your father?", 'Compliments of Lord Tyrion. His axe from the Blackwater.', "They stole a night's march on us. They're a mile north.", 'Your brother ever tell you how I came into his service?', 'pauses and strains to hear a noise far in the distance.', 'Welcome, my lords. Your friends arrived before you did.', 'The whole shit-stained world could drink off that one.', 'Why are we on a merchant ship? Why no Lannister sails?', 'Accent gave me away? Flea Bottom. Whelped and whipped.', "I've seen quite a few women in all the Seven Kingdoms.", "My head… You don't even wanna know what's going on in…", "Podrick fucking Payne. I thought you'd be dead by now.", "We wouldn't be having this conversation if we didn't.", 'Mind yourself. JAIME; If I still had my right hand...', 'I know what "in" means. Do you know how to use that?', 'You seem concerned with it. You must really like me.', "Why not? I'd fuck her. You'd fuck her, wouldn't you?", 'turns and walks away leaving JAIME and TYRION alone.', "Oh, well. l, uh, think l'll go and find myself one.", "There's that mind of yours you keep going on about.", "openly laughs in DICKON's face and looks at JAIME.", 'Me and the lads rounded up all the known thieves.', "Why don't you let them have some time alone, son?", 'I am the only man you ever met who shot a dragon.', "There's a Braavosi knife game l could teach you.", "Eh, you don't want to know about the third time.", 'How many Dornishmen does it take to fuck a goat?', 'Some accomplished diplomacy that was. Now where?', 'He tells me you shit gold just like your father.', "No one knows she's there but you, me, and Varys.", 'The captain to that ship… What was he, Braavosi?', "I've been sent to escort you all to the meeting.", 'l would have killed the man who did that to me.', 'Not after what he did to your birthday present.', 'Falyse. Aye, I did know about the older sister.', "That still doesn't explain why you're doing it.", "Was there? My memory's not what it was earlier.", 'Am I going to be happy at the end of this walk?', "Oh, no. Not me. I'm just an upjumped sellsword.", "You've got one hand. My money's on the old boy.", "I'd probably go to sleep, but I'm getting old.", 'They certainly do, my dear. They certainly do.', 'Well, l imagine that was the end of all that.', 'I still enjoy it when they call me "my lord."', "Well, I imagine he isn't using them properly.", "I think that's a very presumptuous statement.", "Trouble is, I've never had much imagination.", "Getting a bit old to be a squire, aren't we?", "I'm a knight now. Knights are worth double.", "It started that way, aye. Now I'm a knight.", "I wouldn't say I had a single sort of girl.", 'I have gold. What can I buy with gratitude?', 'I was very sorry to hear about your father.', 'Lollys will be marrying Ser Wyllis Bracken.', "You don't even have to do anything, do you?", 'Come on! You can suck his magic cock later.', 'And one of these explains how to beat him?', "All right, let's start with your footwork.", "I think we're about to be the downtrodden.", "She's not bad with second-timers, either.", 'This song really is all about the ending.', "lf you're lucky, no one will notice you.", 'One more drink before the war? Shall we?', 'You fight pretty good for a little girl.', "I'm glad to hear it. The pie looks good.", 'There is still the question of my prize.', 'What the fuck were you doing back there?', 'lt was a woman. She swung an axe at me.', "Without question? No. I'd ask how much.", 'Tonight, then. Looks like dull reading.', 'That would have been a shit way to die.', "I said Dornish women. I didn't say you.", 'You saw the dragon between you and her?', 'Welcome, friends. This roundo s on me.', 'The most beautiful woman in the world.', 'For three chickens, l should hope so.', "I've been doing that for a while now.", "It's against my code to hurt a woman.", 'You must have shown it to her by now.', "We don't have that many men, either.", 'Been spending time with fancy folks.', 'What if you took off that bit there?', "What's the youngest you've ever had?", "You haven't been to see him yet, eh?", 'I hope to hear them sing it one day.', 'Once we got the princess, then what?', 'Sorry, ladies. Another time perhaps.', 'Killed the right people, I suppose.', "Maybe I'll come visit you sometime.", "Don't say it. Don't fucking say it.", "How about that one? It's available.", "Oh, you won't be swinging it at me.", "The strong live and the weak don't.", "I don't want to wear a gold cloak.", "Let me guess. He's not a magician.", 'We made a deal, your sister and I.', 'Prince. Sorry about the other day.', 'They have their eyes on you, cunt.', "I'm not much for shoveling weight.", 'Best well jump back in that river.', 'Our lord here used to be married.', "Come on, I'm here later. Come on.", "He's a squire. You don't pay him."]

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: ["Why? You ask that? You, who killed your mother to come into the world? You are an ill-made, spiteful little creature full of envy, lust, and low cunning. Men's laws give you the right to bear my name and display my colors since I cannot prove that you are not mine. And to teach me humility, the gods have condemned me to watch you waddle about wearing that proud lion that was my father's sigil and his father's before him. But neither gods nor men will ever compel me to let you turn Casterly Rock into your whorehouse. Go, now. Speak no more of your rights to Casterly Rock. Go.", "When the testimony's concluded and a guilty verdict rendered, Tyrion will be given the chance to speak. He'll plead for mercy. I'll allow him to join the Night's Watch. In three days' time, he'll depart for Castle Black and live out his days at the Wall. You'll remove your white cloak immediately. You will leave King's Landing to assume your rightful place at Casterly Rock. You will marry a suitable woman and father children named Lannister. And you'll never turn your back on your family again.", "And a temple is comprised of stones. One stone crumbles and another takes its place. And the temple holds its form for a thousand years or more. That's what the Iron Bank is... a temple. We all live in its shadow and almost none of us know it. You can't run from them. You can't cheat them. You can't sway them with excuses. If you owe them money and you don't want to crumble yourself, you pay it back. Vesting the Tyrells in the crown will help a great deal in this respect.", "And I'm sure if those same spies snuck into our own encampments, they would report growing discontent amongst the Southern lords. This is war, no one's content. We've underestimated the Stark boy for too long. He has a good mind for warfare, his men worship him. And as long as he keeps winning battles, they'll keep believing he is King in the North. You've been waiting for him to fail. He is not going to fail, not without our help. So how do we stop him?", "We'll find you accommodations more suited to your name and as a reward for your accomplishments during the battle of Blackwater Bay. And when the time is right, you will be given a position fit for your talents so that you can serve your family and protect our legacy. And if you serve faithfully, you will be rewarded with a suitable wife. And I would let myself be consumed by maggots before mocking the family name and making you heir to Casterly Rock.", "Hmm. I taught my son Jaime to read. The maester came to me one day, told me he wasn't learning. He couldn't make sense of the letters. He reversed them in his head. The maester said he'd heard tell of this affliction and that we simply must accept it. Ha! After that, I sat Jaime down for four hours every day until he learned. He hated me for it, for a time. For a long time. But he learned. Hmm. Where is your father? Is he alive? Who was he?", "No. Of course not. A wise king knows what he knows and what he doesn't. You're young. A wise young king listens to his counselors and heeds their advice until he comes of age. And the wisest kings continue to listen to them long afterwards... Your brother was not a wise king. Your brother was not a good king. If he had been, perhaps he'd still be alive. Now, as the king, you will have to marry. Do you understand why?", 'Yes. Strength. King Robert was strong. He won the rebellion and crushed the Targaryen dynasty. And he attended three small council meetings in 17 years. He spent his time whoring and hunting and drinking until the last two killed him. So, we have a man who starves himself to death, a man who lets his own brother murder him, and a man who thinks that winning and ruling are the same thing. What do they all lack?', "We'll ride at nightfall. I want a full night's march before he knows we're on the move. Clegane, you'll maintain a garrison here at Harrenhal. Track down this brotherhood and destroy them. The girl has proven herself a good servant. She'll stay on with you. See that he doesn't get drunk in the evenings. He's poor company when he's sober, but he's better at his work.", "Harrenhal was built to withstand an attack from the land. A million men could have marched on these walls, and a million men would have been repelled. But an attack from the air with dragon fire, Mmm-mmm. Harren and all his sons roasted alive within these walls. Aegon Targaryen changed the rules. That's why every child alive still knows his name", "They have my son! Get out, all of you. Not you. You were right about Eddard Stark. lf he were alive, we could have used him to broker a peace with Winterfell and Riverrun, which would have given us more time to deal with Robert's brothers. But now – madness. Madness and stupidity. l always thought you were a stunted fool. Perhaps l was wrong.", 'We are not the Seven Kingdoms until Dorne returns to the fold. The king is dead. The Greyjoys are in open rebellion. A wildling army marches on the Wall. And in the East, a Targaryen girl has three dragons. Before long, she will turn her eyes to Westeros. Only the Dornish managed to resist Aegon Targaryen and his dragons.', "Yeah. A good king must be just. Orys I was just. Everyone applauded his reforms. Nobles and commoners alike. But he wasn't just for long. He was murdered in his sleep after less than a year by his own brother. Was that truly just of him? To abandon his subjects to an evil that he was too gullible to recognize?", "Yes. But what is wisdom? Hmm? A house with great wealth and fertile lands asks you for your protection against another house with a strong Navy that could one day oppose you. How do you know which choice is wise and which isn't? You've any experience of treasuries and granaries or shipyards and soldiers?", 'Jugglers and singers require applause. You are a Lannister. Do you think I demanded a garland of roses every time I suffered a wound on a battlefield? Hmm? Now, I have seven kingdoms to look after and three of them are in open rebellion. So tell me what you want.', 'Hmm. Baelor the Blessed was holy. And pious. He built this sept. He also named a six-year-old boy high septon because he thought the boy could work miracles. He ended up fasting himself into an early grave because food was of this world and this world was sinful.', "Jaime cannot marry or inherit lands. Tyrion's sentence will be carried out tomorrow. You have, on several occasions, made great claims about your commitment to this family's future. Your role in that future is more vital now than it ever was.", "Tyrion! Put down the crossbow. Who released you? Ah, your brother ,I expect. He always had a soft spot for you. Come, we'll go and talk in my chambers. Is this how you want to speak to me? Shaming your father has always given you pleasure…", "Do you know what legacy means? It's what you pass down to your children and your children's children. It's what remains of you when you're gone. Harren the Black thought this castle would be his legacy. The greatest fortress ever built.", "The house that puts family first will always defeat the house that puts the whims and wishes of its sons and daughters first. A good man does everything in his power to better his family's position regardless of his own selfish desires.", 'The Karstarks have marched home. The young wolf has lost half his army. His days are numbered. Theon Greyjoy murdered both his brothers. That makes Sansa Stark the heir to Winterfell. And I am not about to hand her over to the Tyrells.', 'Twenty thousand unwashed Northerns have known about his escape for weeks. Collectively, you control more spies and informants than the rest of the world combined. Do you mean to tell me that none of you has any notion of where he is?', "To the Starks of Winterfell! Who have twenty thousand men and my son! I judged you might be good for something more than brutalizing peasants. I see I overestimated you. If you ever put my son's life at risk again, I'll Leave us.", "Yes. But you refused to die. I respect that, even admire it. You fight for what's yours. I'd never let them execute you; is that what you fear? I'd never let Illyn Payne take your head. You're a Lannister. You're my son.", 'Rule. You will serve as Hand of the King in my stead. You will bring that boy king to heel, and his mother too, if needs be. And if you get so much as a whiff of treason from any of the rest – Baelish, Varys, Pycelle…', 'When you were nine years old, I was called to the capital. I decided to take your brother with me and not you. You insisted that you would not be left at Casterly Rock under any circumstances and if you recall-', "Pretentious name for a band of outlaws. We can't allow rebels behind our lines to harass us with impunity. We look like fools and they look like heroes. That's how kings fall. I want them dead, every one.", "No one will stay here. Ser Gregor will head out with 500 riders and set the Riverland on fire from Godo s Eye to the Red Fork. The rest of us will regroup at Harrenhal. And you will go to King's Landing.", 'Good. Let them remember what happens when they march on the south. All the Stark men are dead. Winterfell is a ruin. Roose Bolton will be named Warden of the North until your son by Sansa comes of age.', "There's nothing to refuse. This is a plot. Plots are not public knowledge. And the Tyrells won't carry this one out until after Joffrey's wedding. We need to act first and kill this union in its crib.", "When I was Hand of the King under your father's predecessor, the skulls of all the Targaryen dragons were kept in this room. The skull of the last of them was right here. It was the size of an apple.", "The years punish us as well, I promise you that. My stomach remains quite strong, however. The only thing that might turn it are details of your grandson's nocturnal activities. Do you deny them?", "To end the war. To protect the family. Do you want to write a song for the dead Starks? Go ahead, write one. I'm in this world a little while longer to defend the Lannisters, to defend my blood.", 'There will be a trial for my son. And as custom dictates, three judges will render a verdict. I will preside. Mace Tyrell will serve as the second judge. I would like you to be the third.', "You'll leave for the Eyrie as soon as possible and bring Lysa Arryn into the fold. Then the young wolf can add his own aunt to the list of people who have taken up arms against him.", "The day that you were born. I wanted to carry you into the sea and let the waves wash you away. Instead, I let you live. And I brought you as my son. Because you're a Lannister.", "If you refuse to marry Loras to Cersei, I will name him to the Kingsguard. I'm sure you're familiar with the Kingsguard vows. He will never marry. He will never have children.", 'standing up* The gods have made their will known. Tyrion Lannister, in the name of King Tommen of the House Baratheon, First of His Name, you are hereby sentenced to death.', 'The tallest towers, the strongest walls. The Great Hall had thirty-five hearths. Thirty-five. Can you imagine? Look at it now. A blasted ruin. Do you know what happened?', 'I sent you here to advise the king. I gave you real power and authority. You chose to spend your days as you always have, bedding harlots and drinking with thieves.', "For 40 years I've tried to teach you. If you haven't learned by now, you never will. Go. If serving as a glorified bodyguard is the sum of your ambition, go serve.", 'Well, let him have it. The name suits our purposes far more than that useless pile of rubble. The Lord of Harrenhal will make a worthy suitor for the widow Arryn.', 'And a boy with his affliction should be grateful for the opportunity to marry the most beautiful woman in the kingdoms and remove the stain from his name.', 'I would have my grandson protected by a skilled warrior who takes his vows seriously. So, shall I draw up the order? Or do you consent to this marriage?', "No, a king who runs will not be king for long. He's a Lannister. He'll stand and fight. Stannis, two days from the capital and the wolf at my doorstep.", 'You say that as if you were the first man alive to think it. Yes, a crisis is an opportunity. What other brilliant insights have you brought me today?', 'You wanted to be rewarded for your valor in battle. Sansa Stark is a finer reward than you could ever dare hope for. And it is past time you were wed.', "There are three living smiths who know how to rework Valyrian steel. The finest of them was in Volantis. Came here to King's Landing at my invitation.", "Mm, I think so as well. You've got the right temperament for it. But what makes a good king? Hmm? What is a good king's single most important quality?", 'Your hatred for my family is rather well known. You arrive at the capital, an expert in poisoning, some days later my grandson dies of poisoning.', "Yes, I think you would, Reginald. And because you're my cousin, I might even let you wake from that sleep. Go, I'm sure your wife must miss you.", "You're my daughter! You will do as I command and you will marry Loras Tyrell and put an end to the disgusting rumors about you once and for all.", "I know you're building a strong case against Tyrion. And as a mother, that is your right. But as a judge, I cannot discuss the trial with you.", "But this is the one I'll be remembered for. The War of the Five Kings, they're calling it. My legacy will be determined in the coming months.", 'Now, if the rumors about my children were true, then Joffrey is no king at all and House Tyrell is throwing its prized flower into the dirt.', 'Because we have been told as much by the many experts who serve the realm by counseling the king on matters about which he knows nothing.', 'You are betrothed to Loras Tyrell. Still betrothed to Loras Tyrell and you will marry Loras Tyrell as soon as Tommen marries Margaery.', 'This letter detailing our infantry movements was meant for Lord Damon of House Marbrand. It was sent to Lord Marlyn of House Dormand.', "You won't be breaking anything. There is a precedent to relieve a Kingsguard of his duties. The king will exercise that prerogative.", 'Not long ago, the Tyrells sided with Renly Baratheon. Declared themselves enemies of the throne. Now they are our strongest allies.', 'But to slaughter them at a wedding. Explain to me why it is more noble to kill ten thousand men in battle than a dozen at dinner.', "This isn't about your wedding. Renly Baratheon had a wedding. Your wife needs a child, a Lannister child, as soon as possible.", 'You can drink, you can joke, you can engage in juvenile attempts to make your father uncomfortable, but you will do your duty.', 'The Tower of the Hand is where I work. To walk from there to here would take time, time I could otherwise spend productively.', 'Yes, and the creature to whom it belonged died 300 years ago. Curiosities on the far side of the world are no threat to us.', "Ha! The last time the scouts assured us of Stark's movement, he lured us into a trap. Which is why my son is his prisoner.", 'I bring them into the royal fold and this is how they repay me, by trying to steal the key to the North out from under me.', "Any man who must say, 'I am the king' is no true king. I'll make sure you understand that when I've won your war for you.", 'From now on, I will see to it that you are appropriately consulted on important matters whenever necessary. Your Grace.', "He's a boy and he's never lost a battle. He'll risk anything at any time because he doesn't know enough to be afraid.", "We need each other. You help me serve justice to the king's assassins and I will help you serve justice to Elia's.", 'Smart. More than I can say for this lot. Get these prisoners to work. Bring the girl. I need a new cupbearer.', "He loved us. He was a good man, but a weak man. A weak man who nearly destroyed our house and name. I'm cold.", "Aren't most girls more interested in the pretty maidens from the songs? Jonquil with the flowers in her hair?", 'Lowborn girls say "m\'lord," not "my lord. " If you\'re going to pose as a commoner, you should do it properly.', "I know you don't like them. I didn't like your husband. Used to pat me on the back a lot. I didn't trust him.", "I'm performing my sworn duty as Hand of the King. If Tyrion is found guilty, he will be punished accordingly.", 'You remind me of my daughter. Where did you learn all this stuff about Visenya and her Valyrian steel sword?', 'Please give him our regards. With any luck, the gout will abate with time and he will be able to walk again.', 'Tyrion of the House Lannister, you stand accused by the Queen Regent of regicide. Did you kill King Joffrey?', "I believe we can dispense with the bedding, Your Grace. I'm sure Tyrion did not mean to threaten the king.", 'Your sister has learned that your new friends the Tyrells are plotting to marry Sansa Stark to Ser Loras.', 'Other knights protected the king while you were a prisoner. They will continue to do so when you go home.', "I will also invite you to sit on the small council to serve as one of the new king's principal advisors.", "I don't care if you hanged a hundred. A man tried to kill me. I want his name and I want his head.", "Grand Maester, you examined King Joffrey's corpse. Was it without question poison that killed him?", 'Careful now, girl. I enjoy you, but be careful. Take that back to the kitchen. Eat what you want.', "Do you intend on mistreating her? The girl's happiness is not my concern, nor should it be yours.", "There, you see? You will wed her, bed her, and put a child in her. Surely you're capable of that.", 'One of only two Valyrian steel swords in the capital, Your Grace, freshly forged in your honor.', "Noblemen in my part of the country don't enjoy the same lifestyle as our counterparts in Dorne.", 'The trial begins this afternoon. We only have the morning for affairs of state. Shall we begin?', "And what? You'll kill your own father in the privy? No. You're my son. Enough of this nonsense…", 'The boy may lack experience and sense, but he does have a certain mindless provincial courage.', "l do hope your savages are going to be of some use, otherwise we've wasted good steel on them.", "A red salmon. I think a Maidenpool girl would remember that. You're a Northerner, aren't you?", 'You spoke with Tyrion in this very brothel on the day that you arrived. What did you discuss?', "Dragons haven't won a war in 300 years. Armies win them all the time. She must be dealt with.", "You're my son. Oh, one more thing. You will not take that whore to court. Do you understand?", "Put the book away, girl. Maybe you should devise our next battle plan while you're about it.", "You're welcome to attend the meetings of your small council, Your Grace. Any or all of them.", 'Are we so well-manned that we can afford to discard able young bodies and skilled laborers?', 'What would it take to make the common soldier stupid enough to try his luck with the Hound?', "Do you think you'll be the first person dragged into a sept to be married against her will?", 'The Tyrell name will fade. And Highgarden will go to the children of Joffrey and Margaery.', "I am the King's Hand. My place is here. I don't expect to see the Rock again before I die.", "Well, then you'd better start riding. Go, before I change my mind and send her your head.", 'Burn the villages, burn the farms. Let them know what it means to choose the wrong side.', 'The Tyrells are our only true rivals in terms of resources and we need them on our side.', 'The boy is heir to Highgarden. Tyrion will secure the North, you will secure the Reach.', "Girl, fetch me the History of the Greater and the Lesser Houses. It's the one on this-", "Not another word. My children. You've disgraced the Lannister name for far too long.", 'When you hear them whispering "Kingslayer" behind your back, doesn\'t it bother you?', 'Is rich, the most beautiful woman in all seven kingdoms and the mother of the king.', 'People who spend their money on this sort of nonsense tend not to have it for long.', 'Eventually, if it comes to that.
