Can your little birds find their way into Meereen?', "If your name wasn't Lannister, you'd be scrubbing out pots in the cook's tent. Go!", "Joffrey didn't die on his watch. Dismissing him was as insulting as it was stupid.", 'Shall we stick golden roses in half the meat pies to commemorate your generosity?', 'Huh! The scouts were wrong. There were 2,000 Stark bannermen, not 20 [thousand].', "The Starks understand winter better than we ever will. The cold won't beat them.", "He's a Lannister. He might be the lowest of the Lannisters, but he's one of us.", "He was a well-read stonemason. Can't say I've ever met a literate stonemason.", "He'll do no such thing. This one's a girl, you idiot, dressed as a boy. Why?", "Silence! You will not speak unless called upon. You're dismissed, Ser Meryn.", 'This man stands accused of murdering King Joffrey. What do you know of this?', 'Ah, the late King Renly. Rather a short reign. Murdered by a woman, I hear.', "The uncertainty makes you uncomfortable. All right. I'll remove it for you.", 'When the battle commences, you and your wildlings will be in the vanguard.', "You're small for your age. I suppose you've been underfed your whole life.", "Men at war commit all kinds of crimes without their superiors' knowledge.", 'Do you swear by all the gods that your testimony will be true and honest?', "Not wine, water. We'll be here for some time. Girl, where are you from?", "Yes, you will. You're still fertile. You need to marry again and breed.", 'The original weapon was absurdly large. Plenty of steel for two swords.', 'Yes, but why? To further the family line. Do you know how that happens?', "What happens to my dynasty if I spare the life of my grandson's killer?", 'You spend too much time worrying about what other people think of you.', 'I will not breathe further life into a malicious lie by discussing it.', 'Do you know how much gold was mined in the Westerlands this past year?', 'Robert had me funding him. Wars swallow gold like a pit in the earth.', 'The crown owes the Iron Bank of Braavos a tremendous amount of money.', 'Grand Maester, perhaps some essence of nightshade to help him sleep.', "You're a fool if you believe he's the most powerful man in Westeros.", 'Find her. Bar the gates of the city. Seize every ship in the harbor.', "Yes, you will become king. What kind of king do you think you'll be?", 'When soldiers lack discipline, the fault lies with their commander.', 'House Tyrell rebelled against the Iron Throne. Against my grandson.', "Oh, one more thing. The next whore I catch in your bed, I'll hang.", 'It is said that the men of the Mountain clans are great warriors.', "Enough. We'll go back to my chambers and speak with some dignity.", "The lion doesn't concern himself with the opinions of the sheep.", 'No jugglers, no jousting dwarves, no seventy-seven-course meals.', 'Perhaps Highgarden has a high tolerance for unnatural behavior.', 'Here. Men love to blame demons when their grand plans unravel.', 'It would appear to be a position that best suits your talents.', 'Shall I explain to you in one easy lesson how the world works?', 'A one-handed man with no family needs all the help he can get.', "You don't need to make formal alliances with people you trust.", "You're too smart for your own good. Has anyone told you that?", "Fully agreed. Which is why I'm naming you new Master of Coin.", 'Have her brought to the Tower of the Hand before the wedding.', 'Never mind that now. We have something important to discuss.', "Not another word. We've been over this, the matter's closed.", 'You left us no choice. The honor of the House was at stake.', 'Ser Meryn. Ser Meryn. Escort the prisoner back to his cell.', 'Evidently not. Why are these prisoners not in their cells?', 'The war is over. The king is safe. The king is never safe.', 'Mmm. Lord Tyrell, be a good man. Fetch my quill and paper.', 'This is Shagga Son of Dolf, Chieftain of the Stone Crows.', 'Thank you, Your Grace, for the courage of your testimony.', 'Wolfsbane. A rare substance. This is no common assassin.', "I'll have an answer by nightfall. That'll be all, girl.", "Do you think I'd be in my position if I had lost a war?", 'I believe you still have some work to do on that score.', 'Here I stand unarmed, unguarded. Should I be concerned?', 'Maester Pycelle assured me your wounds were not fatal.', "It's bad manners to refuse a lordo s offer. Sit. Eat.", "I don't care what people believe. And neither do you.", "If you're going to give her one, you need to perform.", 'One way or another, you will get that girl pregnant.', "You'll return to Casterly Rock and rule in my stead.", 'The Iron Bank is the Iron Bank. There is no someone.', 'Was this one of the poisons stolen from your store?', 'I did. I grew up with him. I watched him grow old.', 'Your brother is dead. Do you know what that means?', 'Yes, but has anyone explained the details to you?', "Now that's what you want people to think of you.", 'And what do they say of Robb Stark in the North?', "You can't serve in the Kingsguard with one hand.", 'And who are the Lords of Maidenpool? Remind me.', 'Your uncle is clearly quite drunk, Your Grace.', 'If you think your bloody honor comes before...', 'When will the wedding take place in your mind?', 'Our last working mine ran dry three years ago.', "There'll be no more discussion on the matter.", "I've condemned no one. The trial is not over.", 'You are being counseled at this very moment.', 'Mmm. This will be my last war. Win or lose.', 'The king is tired. See him to his chambers.', 'To whom does House Dormand owe allegiance?', 'From someone who no longer had need of it.', 'I hear you studied poisons at the Citadel.', "I'm sure he would enjoy speaking with you.", 'The rumors of your demise were unfounded.', "Hmm. She's a heroine of yours, I take it?", 'You really think a crown gives you power?', 'Good. One more time, where are you from?', "You're a sharp little thing, aren't you?", 'We find Sansa Stark a different husband.', "Tyrion will do as he's bid. As will you.", 'Which he got from me. Do you disapprove?', 'Have you nothing to say in your defense?', 'Correct. A student of history, are you?', "I don't believe I asked you a question.", "Doesn't matter. The answer is the same.", 'You are not on trial for being a dwarf.', 'And who are these Companions of yours?', 'My cupbearer can read better than you.', "I'm sure I knew that when I was a boy.", 'How did you come to be in his service?', "No, it's not an opinion, it's a fact!", "The wolf rushes into the lion's jaws.", 'We could arrange to have you carried.', 'The crown may call its first witness.', "It won't be murder. It'll be justice.", 'What, are you afraid of a dead whore?', 'Our business concerns her, too. Sit.', "You'll have to train your left hand.", "I'm not worried about the Iron Bank.", 'The crown may call its next witness.', 'Bah, Tyrion. Put down that crossbow.', "You shot me. You're no son of mine.", 'blows on his paper to dry the ink.', 'Try harder. What do we have, then?', 'No one leaves the capital! No one!', "No, he'll be punished accordingly.", 'A stonemason who could read? Hmm.', 'I could arrange for this meeting.']

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: ["I was in King's Landing after the sack, khaleesi. You know what I saw? Butchery. Babies, children, old men. More women raped than you can count. There's a beast in every man and it stirs when you put a sword in his hand. But the Unsullied are not men. They do not rape. They do not put cities to the sword unless they're ordered to do so. If you buy them, the only men they'll kill are those you want dead.", "You have a good claim. A title. A birthright. But you have something more than that. You may cover it up and deny it, but you have a gentle heart. You would not only be respected and feared, you would be loved. Someone who can rule and should rule. Centuries come and go without a person like that coming into the world. There are times when I look at you and I still can't believe you're real.", 'There\'s other news. From Yunkai. Without the Unsullied to enforce your rule, the Wise Masters have retaken control of the city. They\'ve re-enslaved the freedmen who stayed behind and sworn to take revenge against you. And in Astapor, the council you installed to rule over the city has been overthrown by a butcher named Cleon who\'s declared himself "His Imperial Majesty."', "Perhaps you should fly to Winterfell, Your Grace. You have many enemies in the North. Thousands fell fighting your fatherAll it takes is one angry man with a crossbow. He'll see your silver hair on the kingsroad and know that one well-placed bolt will make him a hero. The man who killed the conqueror.", "Neither did I. I was a cynic, just like you. Then I saw a girl step into a great fire with three stone eggs. When the fire burned out I thought I'd find her blackened bones. Instead I found her. Daenerys. Alive and unhurt. Holding her baby dragons. Have you ever heard baby dragons singing?", "For a man on horseback, the curved blade is a good thing, easier to handle. It's a good weapon for a Dothrakan. But a man in full plate... the arakh won't get through the steel. That's where the broadsword has the advantage. Designed for piercing plate.", "This isn't Westeros, where men honor blood. Here they only honor strength. There will be fighting after Drogo dies. Whoever wins that fight will be the new khal. He won't want any rivals. Your boy will be plucked from your breast and given to the dogs.", "Herding the masters into pens and slaughtering them by the thousands is also treating men like beasts. The slaves you freed, brutality is all they've ever known. If you want them to know something else, you'll have to show it to them.", "They're not your children. I know they call you the Mother of Dragons and I know you love them, but you didn't grow them in your womb. They didn't suckle at your breast. They are dragons, Khaleesi. And if we stay in Qarth, we'll die.", "Or perhaps you'll lead Grey Worm and me to the slaughter, cutting the head off our army. The masters of Yunkai will pay you your fee and you won't have to split it three ways cause you've already slaughtered your partners.", "Proudest moment of my life. One knee in the dust, the king's sword on my shoulder, listening to the words. 'In the name of the Warrior, I charge you to be brave.' All I could think of was how badly I had to piss.", "Eastern Market, Western Market When Khal Drogo died, she was supposed to come here and join the Dosh Khaleen, the widows of the dead khals That's where they would have taken her, the Temple of the Dosh Khaleen", "I surrendered to this sickness the moment I first saw it. I knew it would kill me or I'd kill myself before it could. Daenerys Stormborn convinced me otherwise. The only place for me is with her.", "On the field, with ease. But they won't meet us on the field. They have provisions, patience, and strong walls. If they're wise, they'll hide behind those walls and chip away at us, man by man.", 'If we go south to the land of the Lazarheen, the Lamb Men will kill us and take your dragons. If we go west to the Dothraki Sea, the first Khalasar we meet will kill us and take your dragons.', 'Malakko says the statue is too heavy to carry. Kovarro says that Malakko is an idiot. They can pry out the gems, the rest is pure gold. Very soft. He can chop off as much as we can carry.', "Rich men do not become rich by giving more than they get. They'll give you ships and soldiers and they'll own you forever. Moving carefully is the hard way, but it's the right way.", "You're the Queensguard, Ser Barristan. Your place is by the Queen. If we are truly her loyal servants, we'll do whatever needs to be done. No matter the cost, no matter our pride.", "You could sail for Westeros and leave it all behind. A boy sits on the Iron Throne. A boy many believe to be a bastard with no right to it. They've never been more vulnerable.", 'Careful, Khaleesi. Xaro owns this city and the warlocks have a thousand eyes watching for you. I found one. A ship with a good captain. She leaves for Astapor tomorrow.', 'The prince is riding. I have heard the thunder of the hooves. Swift as the wind he rides. His enemies will cower before him… and their wives will weep tears of blood.”', 'The stallion who mounts the world.” The stallion, is the khal of khals. He shall unite the people into a single khalasar. All the people of the world will be his herd.', "Is it 'we' already, Ser Barristan? If you want to sit on the throne your ancestors built, you must win it. That will mean blood on your hands before the thing is done.", "You won't order them to murder babies. You'll see they're properly fed and sheltered. A great injustice has been done to them. Closing your eyes will not undo it.", "Dragons don't understand the difference between what is theirs and what isn't. Land, livestock, children... Letting them roam free around a city was a problem.", 'Daario Naharis killed his captains and dumped their heads at your feet when he grew tired of their commands. How could you ever have faith in a man like that?', "In full plate metal for sixteen hours. Never occurred to me till the fighting was over. I was very nearly the first man knighted to piss on the king's boots.", "I can't think of a worse way for him to go. The Night's Watch was his life. He would have died to protect every one of those men, and they butchered him.", 'Drogo will have no use for dragon eggs in the Night Lands. Sell them. You can return to the Free Cities and live as a wealthy woman for all your days.', "Our cause? Forgive me, Ser Barristan, but I was busy defending the khaleesi against King Robert's assassins while you were still bowing to the man.", 'Only that the desert around their walls is called the Garden of Bones. Every time the Qartheen shut their gates on a traveler, the garden grows.', 'Only by the broken swords on their banners. They\'re called the Second Sons. A company led by a Braavosi named Mero, "The Titan\'s Bastard."', "It's hard to say. It could be enough. But we're not fighting to make you Queen of King's Landing. Ten thousand men can't conquer Westeros.", 'Without you there to rule, Khaleesi, I fear the masters will simply bide their time, wait for the invaders to leave and reassert control.', "I know him as one of the greatest fighters the Seven Kingdoms has ever seen and as the Lord Commander of Robert Baratheon's Kingsguard.", "It's no lie. His name was Qotho. He was bloodrider to Khal Drogo. Take me to Slaver's Bay, put a sword in my hand, I'll prove my worth.", 'Khaleesi, my Queen, l vow to serve you, obey you, to die for you if need be, but let him go, Khaleesi. l know what you intend. Do not.', 'It was just as you said. They did not believe until it was too late. Their slave soldiers threw down their spears and surrendered.', "Don't be. All I've ever wanted was to serve you. Tyrion Lannister was right. I love you. I'll always love you. Goodbye, Khaleesi.", "That's what the warlock wants. He told you so himself. If you enter that place, you will never leave again. His magic is strong.", 'Ser Jorah Mormont of Bear Island. I served your father for many years. Gods be good, I hope to always serve the rightful king.', "The Dothraki follow strength above all, khaleesi. You'll have a true khalasar when you prove yourself strong. And not before.", "We're still not far from Pentos, your Grace. Magister Illyrio has extended his hospitality. You'd be more comfortable there.", "I didn't. His mouth hardly stopped moving between Volantis and Meereen. It was all I could do not to throw him in the sea.", "Forgive me, Khaleesi, but your ancestor Aegon the Conqueror didn't seize six of the kingdoms because they were his right.", "It's tempting to see your enemies as evil, all of them, but there's good and evil on both sides in every war ever fought.", "I've been flogged if it makes you happy. I'm the best you've got. If I win at the Great Pit how much can you sell me for?", 'The city of a thousand years, and all that men had learned; The Doom consumed it all alike, and neither of them turned.', "The common people pray for rain, health and a summer that never ends. They don't care what games the high Lords play.", 'Forgive me, Khaleesi. No one can survive in this world without help. No one. Let me help you, please. Tell me how.', "If they spot us and we're unarmed, we'll say we're traders heading for the Western Market But if they see weapons…", "We don't need Yunkai, khaleesi. Taking this city will not bring you any closer to Westeros or the Iron Throne.", 'None of that matters now. The longer we sit here bantering the longer Daenerys is out there in the wilderness.', "You've been here for how many days now? I've fought for her for years. Since she was little more than a child.", "In something greater than ourselves, I mean. The Gods. Destiny. Do you believe there's a plan for this world?", "I don't know that either. But I've seen what happens when it goes far enough. I'll end things before that.", "I forfeited the right to claim this sword. It's yours. May it serve you well and your children after you.", 'Make your own way. Find your own ship. You only need one. The allies we need are in Westeros, not Qarth.', "I wouldn't be here to help you if Ned Stark had done to me what you want to do to the masters of Yunkai.", "There's 100,000 of them down there We can't fight our way out We wait till dark, and then we'll find her", 'Yeah, I imagine I would, too. Hours spent jabbering about backstabbings - and betrayals the world over.', "I don't know anything about that. I just started feeling better. I assumed it was the rest that did it.", "But you did forgive, despite my failures. When I heard you'd named Tyrion your Hand, it broke my heart.", "Even a queen doesn't have that power. We must go quickly. l've heard there's a good port in Asshai.", "This is further east than I've ever been. But, yes, Khaleesi, everything ends, even the red waste.", 'Do you think these slaves will have better lives serving Kraznys and men like him or serving you?', 'My friends...We wandered off from the Western Market and got lost Could you show us the way back?', "We'll be in Astapor by nightfall. Some say the Unsullied are the greatest soldiers in the world.", 'King Robert is fool enough to meet them in open battle, but the men advising him are different.', "A khal who cannot ride is no khal. The Dothraki follow only the strong. l'm sorry, my Princess.", "The Dothraki have never crossed the Narrow Sea. They fear any water their horses can't drink.", "I've been by your side longer than any of them, Khaleesi. Let me stand for you today as well.", "He's a foreign dwarf that barely speaks the language. Why would the Meereenese listen to him?", "We've got a long walk ahead of us. I'll get some wood for a fire. Try to get some rest, huh?", 'I fought beside them once, long ago. Now Ned Stark wants my head. He drove me from my land.', "You know I would die for you. I will never abandon you. I'm sworn to protect you, to serve.", 'A single rider. A champion of Meereen. They want you to send your own champion against him.', 'pulls the sword halfway out of the sheath and inspects the blade, turning it in his hands.', 'If you heard a Dothraki horde was approaching your city, you might do the same, Khaleesi.', "They can be trusted to kill you if they're well paid. The Yunkish are paying them well.", "The Dothraki don't believe in money. Most of their slaves were given to them as gifts.", "Khal Pono perhaps, Khal Jhaqo They don't like the idea of a woman leading a Khalasaar.", "I wouldn't be here if I hadn't. I return to your service, my queen, if you'll have me.", 'Your brother Rhaegar was the last dragon. Viserys is less than the shadow of a snake.', 'If you cross the sea with an army you bought and a foreign husband who paid for it...', "I know the opportunity before you seems like the last you'll ever have, but you musT-", "Still, she'll have to wade through that muck if she wants to rule the Seven Kingdoms.", "You're not Lord here. You're just another exile. And I take my orders from the queen.", 'The old houses will flock to whichever side they think will win, as they always have.', "We walk, up the coast. With luck, we'll find a fishing village. Maybe another boat.", "They're not meaningless if half the city you intend to take is listening to them.", 'You said whoever wins would fight at the Great Pit in front of the queen. I won.', 'A small gift for the new Khaleesi. Songs and histories from the Seven Kingdoms.', "Until my last breath, I will remember. After I have forgotten my mother's face.", "Wine Come down to my stall tomorrow, I'll give you a cask of the Arbor's finest", 'Have you ever seen a dragon, Khaleesi? I believe what my eyes and ears report.', "Don't ask me to stand aside as you climb on that pyre. l won't watch you burn.", 'Do those people have any better ideas about how to put you on the Iron Throne?', "No no, don't trouble yourself. Enjoy the market. I'll rejoin you soon enough.", "They're dragons, Khaleesi. They can never be tamed. Not even by their mother.", "My place is by your side. I shouldn't have left you alone with these people.", 'If they find a body with a stab wound, the whole city will be looking for us', 'They are too weak to fight, as are your people. You must be their strength.', "We? You're a Lannister. The Queen intends to remove your family from power.", 'If you rule a city and you see the horde approaching, you have two choices', "Don't let them see you carrying a sword in Vaes Dothrak. You know the law.", 'The second. Thoros of Myr went in alone, waving that flaming sword of his.', 'Khaleesi, please, I just need a moment of your time. I brought you a gift.', 'He was a good man. He deserved a better son. Were you with him at the end?', 'You asked me to find a cure so I could serve you. Allow me to serve you.', 'According to your new friend who earned your trust by cutting his hand?', "I'll have the boys butcher a goat for supper. I need to ride to Qohor.", "It's not the only thing. They're quite good at killing the better men.", "Have you ever seen a war where innocents didn't die by the thousands?", "You only joined us a few days ago. I can't speak to your intentions.", "We need each other right now After we're done needing each other --", 'The road running through the Horse Gate, they call that the godsway', "He was in the right of course. It didn't make me hate him any less.", 'Rhaegar fought valiantly, Rhaegar fought nobly, and Rhaegar died.', 'The Dothraki do things in their own time, for their own reasons.', "You'll be fair to them. You won't mutilate them to make a point.", 'I suppose no one on the small council could speak sense to him.', "Makes me sad You'll disappoint her before long She'll move on", 'King Joffrey Baratheon is dead. Murdered at his own wedding.', "I've been all over the world There's no escaping men like us", "There's one on every mile marker between here and Meereen.", "It's not a question of approval, it's a question of trust.", "You'll be safer in the crypt. These things we're fighting-", "I am. Queen Daenerys Targaryen. She's the Queen I serve.", "You're heavier than you look. Did any of them touch you?", "I'll find it for you. A sound ship with a good captain.", "With the queen's permission I'll go north and take one.", 'nods to TYRION. DAENERYS appears and walks up to JORAH.', "I brought shame to my house. I broke my father's heart.", "I'll wield it in his memory to guard the realms of men.", 'He still is. A man of great honor. And I betrayed him.', "Don't worry. I'll catch you. The horde's easy to find.", 'Khal Drogo says there is a place for you. Back there.', 'No guards. The warlocks kill with sorcery, not steel.', "No? Doesn't the Lord of the Kingsguard traditionally-", "I'm sure you've visited many brothels in many cities.", "Please, listen to me. You're the future of our house.", 'Selling to one... Some poachers I caught on my land.', "Don't know anything else that can melt a ram's horn", "You didn't get much discipline as a child, did you?", "I am. And one other suggestion, if you'll allow me.", 'Ah well, having a few dragons makes things easier.', "You're right. Another lovely day on the high seas.", 'It suffered for a reason. I sold men into slavery.', 'I fight and die for your glory, oh glorious Queen.', "It's forbidden to carry weapons in the sacred city", "There's no need. I've been dead to them for years.", "I've heard that your father was a famous warrior.", "You're a Targaryen. You're the Mother of Dragons.", "Tyrion? Tyrion. Tyrion. Tyrion. You're all right.", 'I killed a Dothraki blood rider in single combat.', 'It was supposed to last us the rest of our lives.', 'As have we all. He owns his and learns from them.', 'You want the entire horde to stop? For how long?', 'Rein in your tongue. She is still your Khaleesi.', 'To win Westeros, you need support from Westeros.', 'How many wars have you fought in, Ser Barristan?', 'Khaleesi, this man has been sentenced to death.', 'Khaleesi, a dragon is worth more than any army.', 'If I ever kill you your eyes will be wide open.', 'The Second Sons have faced worse odds and run.', 'stops examining the sword and looks up to JON.', "There is no word for ‘thank you' in Dothraki.", 'You are not your brother. Trust me, Khaleesi.', "He's a dangerous man, khaleesi. They all are.", 'You command the Unsullied. What do you think?', 'resheaths the blade and hands it back to JON.', 'He never lived, my princess. The women say –', "You didn't conquer them. You liberated them.", 'What business would you have with the Queen?', "l don't want you alone with this sorceress.", 'We were hoping some of your men could help.', 'Shall we return to the Khalasar, Khaleesi?', "I suppose that's why they send them there.", 'The Dothraki have two things in abundance', "It's true, but it also keeps a man alive.", 'Vaes Dothrak. The city of the horselords.', 'As soon as I heard. Do you know anything?', 'Let me fight for her and I belong to you.', "You can go, but you can't have the eggs.", "Put the sword down. They'll kill us all.", "Don't you want to know what we're doing?", "They'll come or l'll have their heads.", 'He seems to like the warmth, Princess.', "You're learning to talk like a Queen.", 'I had no money and an expensive wife.', 'The Dragon Queen. Daenerys Stormborn.', 'You need to drink, child... And eat.', "A trick I never learned, I'm afraid.", 'Everything ends, even the red waste.', 'The Unsullied are a means to an end.', "Stone Men! Don't let them touch you!", 'Queen Daenerys has outlawed slavery.', 'You returned the favor, as I recall.', 'But the mind behind all those words-', 'We have all we need to win this war.', "I don't think she wants to eat dog.", 'In another place, with another man.', 'And what is she to do for soldiers?', "Why would I? The man's a sellsword.", 'I am not your travelling companion.', "It's hard to be a cynic after that.", 'First we have to conquer the world.', 'Perhaps our paths will cross again?', "That's what you call a few guards?", 'I sold men into slavery, Khaleesi.', "I'm not taking you to your sister.", 'Two hundred thousand if not more.', 'What do you know about my father?', 'Your father wanted to execute me.', 'Even the bravest men fear death.', "I didn't come here for lessons.", 'They probably came ashore for--', "Don't worry it didn't touch you", 'Have you ever done this before?', "They could, they just wouldn't.", 'He will die tonight, Khaleesi.', 'To see you on the Iron Throne.', 'You have them? Where are they?', 'Which men do you have in mind?', 'The second time thanks to you.', 'Take all the gold and jewels.', "They're not men. Not anymore.", 'I owe my life to her and you.', 'and JON glance at each other.', "He's already gone, Khaleesi.", 'Time enough for that later –', 'Khaleesi, please be careful.', 'Your people are in Westeros.', 'King Robert wanted her dead.', "I'm taking you to the Queen.", 'She truly is a queen today.', "You don't need to see this.", 'They are not to be trusted.']

Name: varys
Sentence: ["As a boy, I traveled with a troupe of actors through the Free Cities. One day in Myr, a certain man made my master an offer too tempting to refuse. I feared the man meant to use me as I'd heard some men used small boys. But what he wanted was far worse. He gave me a potion that made me powerless to move or speak, yet did nothing to dull my senses. With a hooked blade he sliced me, root and stem, chanting all the while. He burned my parts in a brazier. The flames turned blue and I heard a voice answer his call. I still dream of that night. Not of the sorcerer, not of his blade. I dream of the voice from the flames. Was it a god? A demon? A conjurer's trick? I don't know. But the sorcerer called and a voice answered. And ever since that day, I have hated magic and all those who practice it. But you can see why I was eager to aid in your fight against Stannis and his Red Priestess. A symbolic revenge of sorts.", "The kind the realm needs. Incompetence should not be rewarded with blind loyalty. As long as I have my eyes, I'll use them. I wasn't born into a great house. I came from nothing. I was sold as a slave and carved up as an offering. When I was a child, I lived in alleys, gutters, abandoned houses. You wish to know where my true loyalties lie? Not with any king or queen, but with the people. The people who suffer under despots and prosper under just rule. The people whose hearts you aim to win. If you demand blind allegiance, I respect your wishes. Grey Worm can behead me or your dragons can devour me. But if you let me live, I will serve you well. I will dedicate myself to seeing you on the Iron Throne because I choose you. Because I know the people have no better chance than you.", "But influence is largely a matter of patience, I have found. Once I had served the sorcerer's purpose, he threw me out of his house to die. I resolved to live to spite him. I begged. I sold what parts of my body remained to me. I became an excellent thief and soon learned that the contents of a man's letters are more valuable than the contents of his purse. Step by step, one distasteful task after another, I made my way from the slums of Myr to the small council chamber. Influence grows like a weed. I tended mine patiently until its tendrils reached from the Red Keep all the way across to the far side of the world where I managed to wrap them around something very special.", "Tyrion Lannister is one of the few people alive who could make this country a better place. He has the mind for it, he has the will, he has the right last name. And you- you are a complication. I know you love him. And I know it's true love not bought by gold and silver. I'm not asking you to leave him for money. I'm asking you to leave because your presence in the capital endangers him. This will never be your home, my lady. Find a true home somewhere far from here while there's still time.", "I understand Well, that makes perfect sense from your perspective I have a different perspective, of course I think it's important that you try to see things from my perspective just as I will try to see them from yours Because that is the only way that I can make you and Dom happy That is how you pronounce it -- Dom? I'm afraid I don't really speak the language Such a handsome boy Those big, brown eyes Good luck keeping the ladies away", 'The home of my colleague. Ilyrio Mopatis. A merchant. He and I met many years ago, through mutual friends. A group of people who saw Robert Baratheon for the disaster he was. We tried to do what was best for the realm by supporting the Targaryen restoration. And thus began the chain of mistakes that has led us both here. Things have gotten worse, not better. Westeros needs to be saved from itself.', 'l want you to serve the realm! Tell the queen you will confess your vile treason, tell your son to lay down his sword and proclaim Joffrey as the true heir. Cersei knows you as a man of honor. lf you give her the peace she needs, and promise to carry her secret to your grave, l believe she will allow you to take the black and live out your days on the Wall with your brother and your bastard son.', "Diamonds. I'd tell you to beware carrying so much wealth, but you know how to protect yourself. Get on one of those ships. Sail to Pentos or Lys or Myr. You can buy a house with these diamonds, a very large house. Hire servants. Start a new life, a good life, far from here. The mysterious foreign beauty. You'll have suitors lining up.", "When l was still a boy - before they cut my balls off with a hot knife - l traveled with a group of actors through the free cities. They taught me that each man has a role to play. The same is true at court. l am the master of whisperers. My role is to be sly, obsequious and without scruples. l'm a good actor, my lord.", "If the wrong ears heard what I'm about to tell you, off comes my head. And who would mourn poor Varys then? North or South, they sing no songs for spiders. But there are things you must know. You are the King's Hand and the King is a fool... your friend, I know, but a fool... and doomed unless you save him.", "No, you won't. But you could help another climb those steps and take that seat. The Seven Kingdoms need someone stronger than Tommen, but gentler than Stannis. A monarch who can intimidate the high lord and inspire the people. A ruler loved by millions with a powerful army and the right family name.", "A man named Stannis Baratheon was anointed as the chosen one by one of your priestesses. He, too, had a glorious destiny. He attacked King's Landing and was soundly defeated by the man standing beside me. Last I had heard, he'd been defeated again, this time at Winterfell and this time for good.", "Children are blameless I have never hurt them Your boy is in no immediate danger, this I swear to you But between us, dear, you did conspire to kill the queen's soldiers We both know the penalty for that crime How will poor Dom get on without his mother? And with his breathing problem", 'It\'s what I told myself when I watched them beg for mercy, "I\'m not the one doing it." As the pitch of their screams rose higher, "I\'m not the one doing it." When their hair caught fire and the smell of the burning flesh filled the Thone Room, "I\'m not the one doing it."', 'One day, I will. The dark arts have provided Lord Stannis with his armies and paved his path to our door. For a man in service to such powers to sit on the Iron Throne, I can think of nothing worse. And tonight, I believe you are the only man who can stop him.', "Everyone's well aware of your enduring fondness for Lord Stark's wife. If the Lannisters were behind the attempt on the Stark boy's life and it was discovered that you helped the Starks come to that conclusion... To think... A simple word to the Queen...", 'I understand your misgivings, my Lord. Truly, I do. It is a terrible thing we must consider, a vile thing. Yet, we who presume to rule must sometimes do vile things for the good of the realm. Should the gods grant Daenerys a son, the realm will bleed.', "I am glad your new friend was able to accompany you to the capital. Friends are such an important part of life. Unfortunate that your father didn't want her to come. But rest easy my lord, I am very good at keeping secrets for my good friends.", "We break bread with them, but that doesn't make us family. We've learned their language, but we'll never be their countrymen. If you let yourself believe that a foreign girl with no name could spend her life with the son of Tywin Lannister-", "Robb Stark and most of his bannermen are in Riverrun for the funeral of his grandfather Lord Hoster Tully. In Stark's absence, Roose Bolton holds Harrenhal, which would seem to make him Lord of Harrenhal, in practice if not in name.", "Who said anything about him? You have a choice my friend. You can stay here at Ilyrio's palace and drink yourself to death, or you can ride with me to Mereen, meet Daenerys Targaryen, and decide if the world is worth fighting for.", "That's all right I know who you are and what you've done You've done a lot You've sacrificed your body for a cause, which is more than most people do And you've helped the Sons of the Harpy murder the Unsullied and the Second Sons", "Yes, from your perspective, this is a problem There is a third option, though A ship leaving tomorrow for Pentos I've already booked passage for a woman and her young son I'll even throw in a bag of silver to help you start again", "Boys have been conquerors before. But the man giving Cersei sleepless nights is the king's the late king's brother. Lord Stannis has the best claim to the throne. He is a proven battle commander and he is utterly without mercy.", 'No, I will not. How long do you imagine your father and sister would let me live if they suspected me of lying? I have no pet sellsword to protect me. No legendary brother to avenge me. Only little birds who whisper in my ear.', "And it does provide answers But they're usually the wrong answers My job is to find the right answers Do you know how I do that? I do it by making people happy I'd like to make you happy, Vala That's your name, isn't it, Vala?", 'And we find them repulsive, which is why we surround ourselves with large, comfortable boxes to keep them away. And yet, no matter what we do, people like you and me are never really satisfied inside the box. Not for long.', 'And I heard the most awful rumor about a certain lord with a taste for fresh cadavers. Must be enormously difficult to accommodate that inclination. The logistics alone... to find beautiful corpses before they rot.', 'She commands an army of Unsullied, my queen. Some 8,000 strong. She has a company of sellswords-- the Second Sons. She has two knights advising her-- Jorah Mormont and Barristan Selmy. And she has three dragons.', "I have known more kings and queens than any man living. I've heard what they say to crowds, and seen what they do in the shadows. I have furthered their designs, however horrible. But what I tell you now is true", 'How unspeakable of me to go on and on, when all you want to do is rest. I will leave you. . Welcome to Kings Landing, my dear. The city is made brighter by your presence. We have a council meeting, my lord.', 'and TYRION are sitting on the stairs of the Throne Room alone. VARYS has a sealed raven scroll in his hand tapping it on the stone. TYRION is drinking a glass of wine having a discussion with VARYS.', 'The Queen is not the only one who has been watching you closely. There are few men of honor in the capital. You are one of them. I would like to believe I am another, strange as that may seem.', 'Robert was an improvement on your father, to be sure. There have been few rulers in history as cruel as the Mad King. Robert was neither mad nor cruel. He simply had no interest in being king.', 'Knowledge is my trade, my Lady. Did you bring the dagger with you, by any chance? My little birds are everywhere. Even in the north. They whisper to me the strangest stories. Valyrian steel.', "You've been a good influence on our mutual friend, you know. He used to drink from sundown to sunup, visit three brothels a night, gamble away his father's money. Now it's just the drinking.", "Not me. When I see what desire does to people, what it's done to this country, I am very glad to have no part in it. Besides, the absence of desire leaves one free to pursue other things.", "Though I'm afraid we'll have to ask one of our leather-clad friends back in to carry it Far too heavy for me The boat sails at dawn You need to decide now A new life for you and Dom or…", "I'm afraid your friend has been relieved of his command of the City Watch. The gold cloaks are now firmly in the hands of your father or your sister. It varies from cloak to cloak.", 'Three great men sit in a room. A king, a priest and a rich man. Between them stands a common sellsword. Each great man bids the sellsword kill the other two. Who lives, who dies?', "But if it's swordsmen who rule, why do we pretend kings hold all the power? When Ned Stark lost his head, who was truly responsible? Joffrey? The executioner? Or something else?", 'Ah, yes, to pursue his enduring love of the Lady Arryn and the title that comes with her. Sad, really. Is that all it takes to make our friend lose interest in poor Sansa Stark?', "Yes. After we received word of Robb Stark's death. He didn't seem gladdened by the news. Perhaps his marriage to Sansa Stark had made him more sympathetic to the northern cause.", "You might be disappointed in the results. The storms come and go. The big fish eat the little fish. And I keep on paddling. Come, my lord. We shouldn't keep the queen waiting.", "The gods alone know. The fools tried to kill his son. What's worse, they botched it. The wolf and the lion will be at each other's throats. We will be at war soon, my friend.", 'You have many admirable qualities, self-pity is not one of them. Any fool with a bit of luck can find himself born into power. But earning it for yourself, that takes work.', "You're quite good at being Hand, you know? Jon Arryn and Ned Stark were good men. Honorable men. But they disdained the game and those who played. You enjoy the game.", "There are many who know that without you this city faced certain defeat. The king won't give you any honors, the histories won't mention you, but we will not forget.", "Where before there was nothing but love. Ser Mandon Moore tried to kill you on your sister's orders. If it weren't for your squire's bravery, you'd be a dead man.", "No man can be in all rooms at all times. I have many little birds in the North, my lord, but I haven't heard their songs since Theon Greyjoy captured Winterfell.", 'No longer. He appears to be fully devoted to her. As for Ser Barristan, it would seem he took his dismissal from the Kingsguard a bit harder than anticipated.', "Perhaps. And perhaps we've grown so used to horror we assume there's no other way. If you sat on the Iron Throne, would you spread misery throughout the land?", 'Anything you bring back will be useless unless Cersei grants us an audience and is somehow convinced not to murder us the moment we set foot in the capital.', 'When you imagine yourself up there, how do you look? Does the crown fit? Do all the lords and ladies simper and bow, the ones who sneered at you for years?', "My Lord Hand. Commander. I must compliment you on the gold cloaks' performance these last few weeks. Did you know there has been a marked drop in thievery?", 'Sansa pleaded so sweetly for your life. lt would be a shame to throw it away. Cersei is no fool. She knows a tame wolf is more use to her than a dead one.', 'Some dear friend, no doubt. But which one? There were many. Lord Arryn was a kind and trusting man. There was one boy... all he was he owed to Jon Arryn.', "I suppose it's hard for a fanatic to admit a mistake. Isn't that the whole point of being a fanatic? You're always right. Everything is the Lordo s will.", "The birds sing in the west, the birds sing in the east. If one knows how to listen. They tell me you've already found favor with the Mother of Dragons.", 'If only. A grand old city, choking on violence, corruption, and deceit. Who could possibly have any experience managing such a massive, ungainly beast?', "That's what I used to tell myself about her father. I found the traitors but I wasn't the one burning them alive. I was only a purveyor of information.", 'I\'m afraid I do, my lord. He said, "Perhaps you should speak more softly to me, then. Monsters are dangerous and just now kings are dying like flies."', "Oh, you should be. He's a dangerous man. But everyone has their weaknesses. Your current employer hides his very well, but not as well as he thinks.", "And, unlike your current employer, I protect those who work for me. I don't abuse them to satisfy royal whims or force them to abuse each other.", 'Cersei controls fewer than half the Seven Kingdoms. The lord of Westeros despise her. Even before your arrival, they plotted against her. Now...', "Information is the key. You need to learn your enemies' strengths and strategies. You need to learn which of your friends are not your friends.", "She has three dragons. But even if what they say is true, it'll be years before they are fully grown. And then there will be nowhere to hide.", "Ha, I'm sure you have. Ugly old thing. Yet it has a certain appeal. The Lysa Arryn of chairs. Shame you had to settle for your second choice.", "And yet I have seen things and heard things, things you have not, things I wish I had not. I don't believe I've ever told you how I was cut.", 'I have no proof, only whispers. Before all this nastiness, I was going to tell you the story of how I was cut. Do you want to hear it still?', 'Do you know, I have no idea where they are? And we had been so close. But enough about me. How have you been since we last saw each other?', 'The same sort as Jon Arryn. The tears of Lys, they call it. A rare and costly thing, as clear and tasteless as water. It leaves no trace.', "Shae has been noticed. Sansa's maid saw you with her. She already told your sister. It's only a matter of time before your father hears.", 'Yes. The Volantene masters are very organized. . Flies for dung shovelers. . Hammers for builders. . Tears for whores. Lest they forget.', 'Two or three ships escaped. The rest sunk our captured. Ellaria and the sand snakes dead or captured. The Greyjoys are dead or captured.', "All I've ever wanted. The right ruler on the Iron Throne. I still don't know how her coin has landed. But I'm quite certain about yours.", "Hello, my old friend. It's been a long time. I have no doubt the revenge you want will be yours in time if you have the stomach for it.", "That is good to hear. Though I'm sure many captains say the same while their ship is afloat. You look well suited for battle, my lord.", 'For all our sakes, I hope you are wrong. My little birds tell me that Stannis Baratheon has taken up with a red priestess from Asshai.', 'A blessing then. I suffered an early mutilation myself. Some doors close forever... others open in the most unexpected places. May I?', 'Until your marriage to Khal Drogo, Your Grace, I knew nothing about you, save your existence and that you were said to be beautiful.', "I wondered why you weren't there to meet our guests. You begged us to summon the King in the North. Don't you want to see him again?", "Power resides where men believe it resides. It's a trick, a shadow on the wall. And a very small man can cast a very large shadow.", "Thwarting you has never been my primary ambition, I promise you. Although who doesn't like to see their friends fail now and then?", 'I saved your life. If they catch you, they catch me. I cannot say I feel overly guilty about leaving you in that “fucking crate”.', 'The realm prospers from such events, my Lord. They give the great a chance at glory, and the lowly a respite from their woes.', "I'll walk the rest of the way myself. I can't go off on a secret mission in the company of the most famous dwarf in the city.", "Oh, I doubt that. Give us common folk one taste of power we're like the lion who tasted man. Nothing is ever so sweet again.", "Peace. Did you know that your son is marching south with an army of Northmen? Loyal lad. Fighting for his father's freedom.", "Somewhat less wild these days. It seems they've stopped killing each other and started following this King-Beyond-the-Wall.", "And why do you think the Lord of Light singled out this Jon Snow aside from the visions you've seen in the flames, that is?", 'And l admire you, Lord Baelish. A grasper from a minor House with a major talent for befriending powerful men – and women.', 'Who is important enough to Littlefinger to merit a featherbed besides Littlefinger? Could he be bringing one of his girls?', 'Your father has promised to hang the next whore he finds you with. Have you ever known your father to make an idle threat?', 'The Sons of the Harpy planned their attack in the fighting pits very carefully, which means they take orders from someone', 'And you, an honest servant of the lord, why should I trust you to know any more than the priestess who counseled Stannis?', "I was grievously sorry to hear of your troubles on the Kingsroad. We are all praying for Prince Joffrey's full recovery.", "Have gone home. Your father paid them quite handsomely. I'm afraid we won't be seeing each other for some time, my lord.", 'In the last fortnight since our pact with the Masters, how many killings have been carried out by the Sons of the Harpy?', "I'm worried for all of us. They say every time a Targaryen is born, the gods toss a coin and the world holds its breath.", "If you shaved your beard with a straight razor, you'd say the razor worked. That doesn't mean it won't cut your throat.", "Strange. You spoke so highly of Jon Snow but when he arrives you hide on a cliff. I didn't take you for a bashful girl.", 'You walk as though the paving stones were your personal property I used to steal from people like you when I was a boy', 'Well played, My Lord Hand. But should I be worried? Janos Slynt, Pycelle - The Small Council grows smaller every day.', "A thousand blades taken from the hands of Aegon's fallen enemies, forged in the fiery breath of Balerion the Dread.", "Of course she does. Respect is how the young keep us at a distance, so we don't remind them of an unpleasant truth.", 'Though I suppose beauty is a subjective quality, no? Is it true that Ser Marlon of Tumblestone prefers amputees?', "I think you believe in what you see and in what those you trust have seen. You probably don't entirely trust me.", "Good. If you don't mind my saying, I don't think you should return to Westeros. I'm not sure you'd be safe here.", 'My birds tell me the Hound slaughtered five of our soldiers. I believe the phrase "fuck the king" was uttered.', "The Masters have retaken both cities Outside of Meereen, the whole of Slaver's Bay has returned to the slavers", 'Ah. "The Great Sieges of Westeros." Thrilling subject. Shame Archmaester Ch\'Vyalthan wasn\'t a better writer.', 'Closer to fifty. The Targaryens built this city to withstand a siege and to provide escape if necessary.', "Your Grace, he's already destroyed a good portion of our fleet. To send our remaining ships after him --", "reaches over to TYRION's cup of wine, picks it up and begins to drink from it. He grimaces as he drinks.", 'Theon Greyjoy? Forgive me, my lord, but how? He grew up a ward of Winterfell. He fights for Robb Stark.', 'Huh. Prodigies appear in the oddest of places. And what did Littlefinger say about this loss of income?', 'You look lovely today, my dear You really do How you climbed all those steps without breaking a sweat', "She once served another who wanted the Iron Throne. It didn't end well for Stannis Baratheon, did it?", 'This morning, I heard a song all the way from Qarth beyond the Red Waste. Daenerys Targaryen lives.', 'The good masters of Astapor And the wise masters of Yunkai With help from their friends in Volantis', 'Are we really going to spend the entire road to Volantis talking about the futility of everything?', "We're talking about the same Podrick? The quiet boy in Lord Tyrion's service? Seems a bit simple?", 'But what do we have left once we abandon the lie? Chaos. A gaping pit waiting to swallow us all.', 'Littlefinger looks at you and sees a collection of profitable holes. I see a potential partner.', "My little birds have already taken wing Soon they'll return, singing songs of men in gold masks", 'His Grace has many cares. He entrusts some small matters to us that we might lighten the load.', 'Daenerys has taken up residence in Meereen. She has conquered the city and rules as its queen.', 'A child with two seasoned warriors counseling her and a powerful army at her back, Your Grace.', "I would like you to tell me if working for Lord Baelish has been all you'd hoped it would be.", "She hasn't seen anyone since we returned. Hasn't left her chambers, hasn't accepted any food.", "I don't believe in saviors. I believe men of talent have a role to play in the war to come.", 'And she never will be... with the right counsel. You need to find a way to make her listen.', "Pity. Such a pity. What of your daughter's life, my lord? ls that a precious thing to you?", 'We were just speaking of your bravery in the victory against the Stark auxiliary forces.', "You'll be pleased to know our mutual friend is doing quite well in Lady Sansa's service.", "You overestimate our influence. Jon and Daenerys don't want to listen to lonely old men.", 'I heard you suffered a terrible head wound. The northerners are such fearsome warriors.', "I think you are. You have your father's instinct for politics, and you have compassion.", "To find so lovely creature working in your father's kitchen. It almost beggars belief.", 'No, no, many still love you. Sansa came to court this morning to plead for your life.', 'No one weeps for spiders or whores. I have friends across the sea who could help her.', "Only Varys. I'm not actually a nobleman. No one is under obligation to call me lord.", "Sorry I was busy learning who funds the Sons of the Harpy Some things you can't rush", "I've always hated the bells. They ring for horror. A dead king, a city under siege.", 'And I think you remember all of them. I think your true talents are wasted on them.', 'You seem quite knowledgeable about the Unsullied. Did you spend much time in Essos?', 'You take great offense at dwarf jokes, but love telling eunuch jokes. Why is that?', 'Delay," you say. "Move fast, " I reply. This is no longer a game for two players.', 'Your father has named Lord Tyrion to serve as Hand in his stead while he fights -', "I remember that storm. All the dogs in King's Landing howled through the night.", 'His Valyrian is terrible He only wants to give you money, so your baby can eat', "Considering the city was on the brink of civil war, I'd say it's a good start.", "You can't. Cersei has offered a lordship to the man who brings her your head.", 'People follow leaders. And they will never follow us. They find us repulsive.', "I had a choice, Your Grace--serve Robert Baratheon or face the headman's axe.", "What have you done? Quickly. Trust me, my friend, I've brought you this far.", "She'll come back. She has to. My heart's been broken too many times already.", 'Pity what happened to him, just when his life seemed to be going so nicely.', 'Given the circumstances, my lord, I believe extreme measures are warranted.', 'Oh, no one disputes that, my lord, not even the multitudes who despise you.', "No. I only know what it's like to pick up your shit and throw it overboard.", 'You were quite good, you know. At ruling. During your brief tenure as Hand.', 'Peace. Prosperity. A land where the powerful do not prey on the powerless.', "I hope I deserve this. Truly, I do. I hope I'm wrong. Goodbye, old friend.", 'In the Summer Isles, they worship a fertility goddess with sixteen teats.', 'Ooh. "The Queen mustn\'t know." I love conversations that begin this way.', 'Now the last time I saw you, you were talking to the Hand of the King.', "l must be one of the few men in this city who doesn't want to be King.", "Have you? Do you spend a lot of time wondering what's between my legs?", 'Am l? That is good to know. Do you lie awake at night fearing my gash?', 'drinks again and sets the cup down next to TYRION. TYRION picks it up.', 'Yes, best be careful. You might accidentally consume some solid food.', 'To see you again after so many years is a blessing. Your poor hands.', "He's found one bastard already. He has the book. The rest will come.", "A man with great ambition and no morals… l wouldn't bet against you.", 'And it seems the Grand Maester has found his way into a black cell?', "Of course. I'm missing something obvious you're about to point out?", 'The first to arrive and the last to leave. I admire your industry.', 'Someone who inspires priests and whores is worth taking seriously.', 'The likelihood of you being spotted here increases a hundredfold.', 'Our Iron Born and Dornish allies were attacked on route to Dorne.', 'Your father has named Lord Tyrion to serve as hand in his stead.', 'The Wall has kept them out for thousands of years. Presumably --', "You are the King's Hand, Lord Stark, we serve at your pleasure.", 'Does it? He has neither crown nor gold nor favor with the gods.', 'They say he burns his enemies alive to honor the Lord of Light.', "I'm afraid foreigners aren't welcome at such exclusive affairs.", 'Ser Jorah Mormont. He is serving as adviser to the Targaryens.', 'You do me wrong, my lord. Your blood is the last thing l want.', 'You have one name. As do I. Here only the family name matters.', "Oh, I'm sure. Lord Redwyne likes his boys very young, I hear.", 'The peasants say, a long summer means an even longer winter.', 'They joined our side, my queen, because they believe in you.', 'Men decide where power resides, whether or not they know it.', 'Power is a curious thing, my lord. Are you fond of riddles?', 'Sandor Clegane has been spotted in the Riverlands, my lord.', 'I thought we were so happy together until you abandoned me.', 'And if Stannis does attack the Mud Gate, what is our plan?', "I'm not sure how many new ways I can find of saying this.", 'And how many Masters have been butchered by the free men.', "I have an ear for accents. I've lost my accent entirely.", 'Not at all. But I was never interested in girls, either.', "I didn't do it for you. I did it for the Seven Kingdoms.", "So it's safe to say that a fragile peace has taken hold.", 'Because we are talking about the future of our country.', 'I would expect nothing less from the Mother of Dragons.', 'Ah. You can read. Rare for a woman in your profession.', 'She is a sweet young thing. None of this is her fault.', 'Yes, but showed great promise in other areas as well.', "If anyone recognizes you, you'll lose more than that.", 'Sounds like quite the hero. Where would we find him?', 'Of course Man can be fickle, but birds always trust', 'So here we stand in mutual admiration and respect.', "Disturbing news from far away. Haven't you heard?", 'l am flattered, of course, to be pictured at all.', "You're afraid. Why? Nothing dangerous down there.", 'You already drank yourself across the Narrow Sea.', 'You are many things, my friend, but not a coward.', 'Astapor and Yunkai have stopped asking us for aid', "I don't know how you stand it in all that leather", "I think you're mistaking business with pleasure.", "l could. But will l? No. As l said, I'm no hero.", 'Your Grace, Lady Sansa is your aunt by marriage.', 'Refuse the Kingslayer? A dangerous proposition.', 'We need friends in Westeros. And we need ships.', "It's a sealed scroll for the King in the North.", 'No rumor, my Lord. The princess is with child.', 'She did fly away on a dragon and not come back', "A difficult situation. They know we're coming.", "You're worried for her. I admire your empathy.", "If we're going to play, you'll have to start.", "I'm not entirely sure what you're suggesting.", "You don't believe in the old powers, my lord?", 'For now is the best we get in our profession.', "Go on. They'll be missing you in the kitchen.", 'I did what I did for the good of the realm.', "If I don't return, you'll know I was wrong.", 'Fair point. How do you propose to find one?']

Name: brienne
Sentence: ["When I was a girl, my father held a ball. I'm his only living child, so he wants to make a good match for me. He invited dozens of young lords to Tarth. I didn't want to go, but he dragged me to the ballroom. . And it was wonderful. None of the boys noticed how mulish and tall I was. The shoved each other, and threatened to duel if they thought it was their turn to dance. And whispered in my ear how they wanted to marry me and take me back to their castles. . My father smiled at me and I smiled at him. I'd never been so happy. . Till I saw a few of the boys sniggering. And then they all started to laugh, they couldn't keep the game going any longer. They were toying with me. ‘Brienne the Beauty', they called me. Great joke. And I realized I was the ugliest girl alive. A great lumbering beast. I tried to run away, but Renly Baratheon took me in his arms. “Don't let them see your tears,” he told me. “They're nasty little shits. The nasty little shits aren't worth crying over.” He danced with me and none of the other boys could say a word. And he was the king's brother after all.", "strikes at ARYA who quickly sidesteps and parries the attack. BRIENNE attacks again and ARYA sidesteps, dodges multiple strikes and parries BRIENNE while smiling. ARYA strikes at BRIENNE and hits her hand causing BRIENNE to flinch and lose her two-handed grip on her sword. BRIENNE regains composure and starts to circle ARYA. BAELISH and SANSA are still watching from the upper balcony. ARYA is waiting for an attack with her sword behind her back. BRIENNE strikes and ARYA blocks her attacks, spins and stabs behind her back and hits BRIENNE in the knee causing BRIENNE's sword to strike the dirt. BRIENNE kicks ARYA in the stomach and sends ARYA to the ground. ARYA quickly gets back to her feet. BRIENNE overpowers ARYA and ARYA drops her sword on the ground. BRIENNE strikes again but ARYA dodges, draws her Valyrian dagger and puts it near BRIENNE's neck. BRIENNE and ARYA both stop fighting and sheathe their weapons smiling.", "Not him. He seems trustworthy. A bit brooding, perhaps. I suppose that's understandable, considering. The others, though. Davos and the Red Woman helped a man murder his own brother with blood magic. And when Stannis paid for his crime, where were they? Already out looking for a leader with better prospects. And that wildling fellow with the beard --", "Yes, Pod, he liked men, I'm not an idiot. He didn't love me, he didn't want me, he danced with me because he was kind and he wouldn't see me hurt. He saved me from being a joke. From that day until his last day. And I couldn't save him in return. Nothing's more hateful than failing to protect the one you love. One day, I will avenge King Renly.", "I do not know your son, my lady. But I could serve you, if you would have me. You have courage. Not battle courage, perhaps, but, I don't know, a woman's kind of courage. And I think that when the time comes, you will not hold me back. Promise me that you will not hold me back from Stannis.", "Lady Sansa, before your mother's death, I was her sworn sword. I gave my word I would find you and protect you. I will shield your back and keep your council, and give my life for yours if need be. I swear it by the old gods and the new.", 'In the name of Renly of House Baratheon, First of his Name, Rightful King of the Andals and the First Men, Lord of the Seven Kingdoms, and Protector of the Realm, I, Brienne of Tarth, sentence you to die. Do you have any last words?', 'Ser Jaime kept his word to your niece Catelyn Stark. He sent me to find Sansa, to help her as Catelyn wanted. He gave me this sword to protect her. That is what I have done and I will continue to do until the day I die.', 'But I know Ser Jaime. He is a man of honor. I was his captor once. But when we were both taken prisoner and the men holding us tried to force themselves on me, Ser Jaime defended me. And lost his hand because of it.', "Will you shut your mouth? I didn't ask for advice. I don't want anyone following me. I'm not a leader. All I ever wanted is to fight for a Lord I believed in. The good lords are dead and the rest are monsters.", "Us? The only reason you're here is that Jaime Lannister told me you weren't safe in the capital. You're hundreds of miles from King's Landing. No one knows what you look like. No one cares. You're safe.", "Ser Jaime Lannister. Knighted and named to the Kingsguard in his 16th year. At the sack of King's Landing, murdered his king Aerys II. Pardoned by Robert Baratheon. Thereafter known as the Kingslayer.", "A shadow with the face of Stannis Baratheon. I swear to you by all the gods it was Stannis. He plunged his sword through Renly's heart and disappeared. One day, my lady, I will avenge our king.", "I do not fight for the Boltons. I'm Brienne of Tarth. I was Kingsguard to Renly Baratheon. I was there when he was murdered by a shadow with your face. You murdered him? With blood magic?", "Bit of comfort never hurt anyone. We've been sleeping in ditches the last few weeks. I think we can treat ourselves to a featherbed for the night and a hot meal not cooked by you.", "Starting tomorrow, we'll train with the sword twice a day, before we ride in the morning and after we camp for the evening. . And I'm going to show you how to ride properly.", 'Lady Sansa, I offer my services once again I will shield your back and keep your council and give my life for yours if need be I swear it by the old gods and the new', "The Kingslayer won't last the night. The more they drink, the angrier they'll get. And when the Karstarks draw their swords Who wants to die defending a Lannister?", "Without him, my lady, you would not be alive. He armed me, armored me, and sent me to find you and bring you home because he'd sworn an oath to your mother.", "Perhaps you should have stayed with him. It's not going to be a pleasant journey for you. It could take weeks to get to the Wall, depending on the weather.", "Mine said the same. But I kept fighting the boys anyway. Kept losing. Finally my father said, “If you're going to do it, you might as well do it right.”", 'begins striking at PODRICK while he blocks her blows. BRIENNE hits PODRICK in the stomach with the hilt of her sword and PODRICK lands on the ground.', 'A shadow with the face of Stannis Baratheon. I know it was Stannis. I know it in my heart. Stannis is a man, not a shadow. And a man can be killed.', 'I just wanted to congratulate you both and wish you good fortune. The country has been at war too long. I hope your reign is long and peaceful.', "I fought for my king. Soon I'll fight for him on the battlefield. Die for him if I must. And, if it please you, Brienne's enough. I'm no lady.", "Yes. Most kind of them. You're a Stark bannerman, Lord Bolton. I am acting on Lady Stark's orders to return Jaime Lannister to King's Landing.", "When Catelyn Stark released you, we both made a promise to her. Now it's your promise. You gave your word. Keep it and consider the debt paid.", 'Then I am yours, my lady. I will shield your back and give my life for yours, if it comes to that. I swear it by the Old Gods and the new.', "All my life I've been hearing, 'Jaime Lannister, what a brilliant swordsman.' You were slower than I expected. And more predictable.", "I don't serve the Starks. I serve Lady Catelyn. I told you I'd take you to King's Landing, and that's what I'm going to do. Stay.", 'I knew him as well as anyone. As a member of his Kingsguard, he trusted me with everything. He would have been a wonderful king.', "Should I fail to persuade the Blackfish to surrender, and if you attack the castle, honor compels me to fight for Sansa's kin.", 'Lady Sansa desires to take her ancestral seat back from the Boltons and assume her rightful position as Lady of Winterfell.', "Her mother's dead, grandfather's dead, Walder Frey is the new lord of Riverrun. The Brotherhood isn't going to Riverrun.", "My name is Brienne of Tarth. Please inform Ser Jaime Lannister I've come to speak with him. Tell him I have his sword.", "Better off with the Boltons who murdered her mother and brother? Sansa's in danger even if she doesn't realize it.", "Well, Lady Sansa's brother's at Castle Black. If I were her, that's where I'd go. Feel free to stop at any point.", 'I do no such thing. Take Riverrun without bloodshed. Ride south with your mission complete and your army intact.', "Wary of strangers, as she should me. I saw her riding on the East Trail with Littlefinger. We'll follow them.", 'Allow me to enter Riverrun under a flag of truce. Let me try to persuade the Blackfish to give up the castle.', "All my life men like you have sneered at me. And all my life I've been knocking men like you into the dust.", "If Lady Stark is unhappy with any aspect of my service, I'm sure she'll let me know. She's an honest woman.", 'Yes, all of your lords were very kind to you. All except me. Sorry you have to squire such a nasty person.', 'and PODRICK are sparring. BRIENNE kicks PODS foot out from under him and he lands face first in the dirt.', "I saw her with a man I don't think he hurt her She didn't want to leave him, he didn't want to leave her", "I'm here to take you to King's Landing and bring back Lady Stark's daughters in exchange. Dull is fine.", "My lord, I am Brienne of Tarth. Lady Catelyn Stark commanded me to deliver Ser Jaime to King's Landing.", 'A girl, tall, red hair, very pretty. Her name is Sansa Stark, but she may be using a different name.', 'Maybe you were as good as people said once. Or maybe people just love to overpraise a famous name.', "We've met before I was Kingsguard to Renly Baratheon Before Renly was assassinated with bloodmagic", "That doesn't release me from an oath. I served Lady Catelyn. I serve her still. Who do you serve?", "Your family is in the North. Come with us. Don't die for pride when you can fight for your blood.", "I need your word. If I persuade him to abandon the castle, you'll grant us safe passage north.", "I pledged my life to their mother Catelyn Stark. I swore to her I'd bring her daughters home.", "He's not the Kingslayer. Sorry to disappoint you. If he was, I'd only be traveling his head.", "Just don't start expecting silk underclothes. Not working for your former lord any longer.", "Oh. Whilst in Lord Tyrion's service, did you ever do anything remotely related to combat?", "Once you're safely back amongst your own people, will you give me leave to go, my lady?", 'I will be one of your seven, pledge my life to yours, and keep you safe from all harm.', "Aren't you getting a bit old to be a squire? How did you end up squiring for the Imp?", 'My lady, I know this is a very busy time for you, but if I could just have a moment.', "I've made it this far in the world without a squire. I don't see why I need one now.", "It's at least thirty miles to the Eyrie from here. You're carrying the saddle bags.", 'We have never had a conversation last this long without you insulting me. Not once.', "I'm not talking about the Boltons. I need to get a message to her. To Sansa Stark.", "Yes, it's in the past It doesn't mean I forget Or forgive He admitted it, you know", 'My lady. My lady. Please pardon me for interrupting. My name is Brienne of Tarth.', "Look me in the eye and tell me that you think she'll be safe in King's Landing.", "You've harmed others, those you were sworn to protect, the weak, the innocent.", "You're a knight, Ser Jaime. I know there is honor in you. I've seen it myself.", "If you were a woman, you wouldn't resist? You'd let them do what they wanted?", 'Then why did you lie to him when he asked you how you learned about Riverrun?', "No one's seen Arya Stark since her father was beheaded. She's presumed dead.", "Oh, we didn't mean to interrupt. We were just looking for somewhere warm to-", "If this is true why didn't you tell anyone? Why didn't you tell Lord Stark?", "I've been removing my own armor for quite some time, thank you very much.", 'Did you hear that Podrick? Only about ten more miles to the Bloody Gate.', "He's going to fall. He's going to fall off his horse. Someone help him.", 'He was murdered by a shadow. A shadow with a face of Stannis Baratheon.', 'If we can keep a tight formation, we might be able to beat them back.', "I think these women would understand if I don't care what you think.", "Neither of us wanted to be there. Sometimes we don't have a choice.", 'The only one that needs protecting is the one that gets in her way.', "You wouldn't be screwing your face up like that if it was nothing.", 'I think we can all agree that ships take precedence over brothels.', "She commanded me to bring Jaime Lannister back to King's Landing.", 'As a reward for betraying Robb Stark and slaughtering his family.', "I'm not a knight. And I'm not a slaver, either. I don't own you.", "I saw what happened I saw Stannis' forces defeated in the field", "Because you'll allow him to lead the Tully forces safely north.", 'This goes beyond houses and honor and oaths. Talk to the queen.', 'I am releasing you from that oath. That means you could leave.', 'If you did it like I taught you then the horses would be here.', "The Tullys are rebels because they're fighting for their home?", "Seven blessings. I'm Brienne of Tarth, this is Podrick Payne.", 'Your Grace. And you should kneel when you approach the King.', 'No, this will do nicely, thank you. Kidney pie is wonderful.', "You gave it to me for a purpose. I've achieved that purpose.", 'I like your sword. Are we getting close to the bloody gate?', 'Riverrun cannot stand against the Lannisters and the Freys.', 'Your Grace, I ask the honor of a place in your Kingsguard.', "I don't give the orders. He must be important to someone.", 'Find the maester. We need to get a raven north to Sansa.', 'We both saw what just happened. We both saw that thing.', "Steal from the Tullys, it's their dungeons you rot in.", 'Lord Baelish, Lady Sansa, my name is Brienne of Tarth.', "She looked good She wasn't exactly dressed like a lady", 'I can go and find the Master of Arms for you, My Lady.', "If this is the Kingslayer, I think I'd know about it.", 'Apologies, Your Grace. I never did master the curtsy.', 'I swore to your mother I would bring you home to her.', 'I know. I wish I couldo ve been there to protect her.', "I can't knight you, but I can teach you how to fight.", 'In truth, he rescued me, Your Grace. More than once.', 'I swore to your mother by the Old Gods and the New -', 'I have a signed letter from your niece Sansa Stark.', 'Here fighting with us. Glad you survived Eastwatch.', 'I spent three days looking for her She disappeared', 'smirks and raises her sword to a fighting posture.', "I'm not a knight. That means you're not a squire.", "Not all of them. I know who's inside that castle.", 'Have they told you what they plan to do with me?', 'I know, but I swore a sacred vow to protect her.', "And that's what you're doing? Watching over her?", "I swore to their mother I'd protect those girls.", "Well, he's not here to complain about it, is he?", "I don't serve the Starks. I serve Lady Catelyn.", 'A complication does not release you from a vow.', 'No, thank you. I should try and get some sleep.', "You're not interesting enough to be offensive.", 'Your crimes are past forgiveness, Kingslayer.', "I'll find her. For Lady Catelyn. And for you.", 'Bloody ridiculous. Help me with these straps.', "I found Arya. She didn't want my protection.", "You can't use that, My Lady. It's too small.", 'What do you think will happen if you leave?', 'Did you ever cook anything for Lord Tyrion?', "Come with me Arya. I'll take you to safety.", 'Why should you have any say in her affairs?', "Doesn't matter. I know where they're going.", "I don't think you know many girls like her.", 'The rise, it should give us some advantage.', 'At once, Your Grace. Shall I return after?', 'I only held him that once as he was dying.', 'By putting one foot in front of the other.', "Didn't they teach you how to ride a horse?", "Do you think she's safe from Littlefinger?", 'Threatening my lady is an act of treason.', "Maybe one day we'll find out, Kingslayer.", "We're not doing it. He's an innocent man.", "And I'm a woman. I was still beating you.", "Not such a fascinating story, I'm afraid.", 'Lady Sansa, if we can have a word alone--', "Thank you. You've lived here a long time?", 'I am charged with bringing Ser Jaime to-', 'What exactly did you do for Lord Tyrion?', "Don't enter without an invitation, man.", "I don't serve your brother, Your Grace.", 'Podrick. Podrick! Where are the horses?', "We've all had to make difficult choices", "He's alright. Still has a lot to learn.", 'Have you ever cooked a rabbit before?', 'Please, my lady. If I could explain--', "I'm sorry I'm always snapping at you.", 'The battle might start at any moment.', 'Which way Pod? Which way did she go?', "By men who didn't see what happened.", "I don't like leaving you here alone.", "Don't go where your enemy leads you.", 'Jaime Lannister gave me this sword.', 'Someone who swore to keep her safe.', "I've sworn to protect you, my lady.", 'You have a keen military mind, Pod.', "You don't know me well, Your Grace.", 'Will you stay there long, my lady?', 'Your son returns at dawn, my lady?', 'I hope you gave them quick deaths.', "I'm not interested in foul rumors.", 'You were armed when we were taken.', 'Do you even know what a squire is?', "I don't care, I'm not your mother.", "Bunch? What's a bunch? 100? 6? 20?", 'It was a difficult choice, my lady', 'Stannis Just before I executed him', 'We can send the Blackfish a raven.', 'You will not provoke me to anger.', 'I was only trying to protect her.', "I don't even want to be a knight.", 'Do you take me for an idiot? In!', 'You think I care about my teeth?', 'Lady Sansa asked you a question.', "I am. It's, uh-it's good ground.", "Yes, well, I'm glad you're here.", 'You need trust to have a truce.', "I'm not paid by the Lannisters.", 'I have no wish to kill you Ser.', 'Arya! Arya! ARYA! Where is she?', 'As punishment. For both of you.', 'Why should I care how you die?', 'Your Grace. My king. My queen.', 'How did you kill a Kingsguard?', 'He always spoke highly of you.', "At least we'll die with honor.", "If you'll follow me, my lady.", 'Not your concern, Kingslayer.', "Why weren't you watching her?", 'You want to be a knight, Pod?', "How do you know it's Stannis?", 'As I have said, my name is- -', 'Nice sword. Very nice dagger.', "If you've quite finished up-", "It was after Renly's murder.", "I've come for the Blackfish.", 'You have more than she does.', 'Help! Help! The Kingslayer!', 'What about? Not kidney pie.', 'What happened at Winterfell', 'nods her head in agreement.', "I've never seen you fight.", "All right, we'll be going.", "We're looking for someone.", 'Sansa could be there, too.', 'Why would you assume that?', 'one last thing, Ser Jaime.', 'Who taught you to do that?', "I don't think that's wise.", "We don't. We go around. .", 'Did you know Lord Eddard?', 'In the shape of Stannis.', 'No, stealing is a crime.', 'What are you doing here?', 'I thought you were gone.', 'And? You made a promise.', "I'm no lady, Your Grace.", 'Did you remove the skin?', 'So what happened to her?', 'I thought you were dead.', 'It looked like Stannis.', 'I never knew my mother.']

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: ["In the name of Robert of the House Baratheon, the First of his Name, King of the Andals and the First Men, Lord of the Seven Kingdoms and Protector of the Realm, I charge you to bring the king's justice to the false knight Gregor Clegane and all those who shared in his crimes. I denounce him and attaint him. I strip him of all ranks and titles of all lands and holdings, and sentence him to death.", 'You think my life is some precious thing to me? That l would trade my honor for a few more years of... of what? You grew up with actors. You learned their craft and you learnt it well.
