But l grew up with soldiers. l learned how to die a long time ago.', "Harkon Umber, first of his name, born to lord Hother Umber and lady Amaryllis Umber in the 183rd year after Aegon's landing, at the last hearth. Blue of eye, brown of hair and fair complected, died in his 14th year of a wound sustained", 'Send a raven to Casterly Rock. Inform Tywin Lannister that he has been summoned to court to answer for the crimes of his bannermen. He will arrive within the fortnight, or be branded an enemy of the crown and a traitor to the realm.', 'Lord Orys Baratheon, black of hair.” “Axel Baratheon, black of hair.” “Lyonel Baratheon, black of hair.” “Steffon Baratheon, black of hair.” “Robert Baratheon, black of hair.” “Joffrey Baratheon… golden-haired.”', "You were born in the long summer. You've never known anything else. But now winter is truly coming. And in the winter, we must protect ourselves, look after one another. Sansa is your sister.", "I followed you into war - twice, without doubts, without second thoughts. But I will not follow you now. The Robert I grew up with didn't tremble at the shadow of an unborn child.", "There's great honor serving in the Night's Watch. The Starks have manned the Wall for thousands of years. And you are a Stark. You might not have my name, but you have my blood.", "I don't want to frighten you, but I won't lie to you either. We've come to a dangerous place. We cannot fight a war amongst ourselves. All right? Go on. It's yours.", "Is that what you tell yourself at night? You're a servant of justice? That you were avenging my father when you shoved your sword in Aerys Targaryen's back?", 'I cannot give you back your homes or restore your dead to life. But perhaps I can give you justice in the name of our king, Robert. Lord Beric Dondarrion.', 'Lord of the Seven Kingdoms and protector of the realm, I, Eddard of the House Stark, Lord of Winterfell and Warden of the North, sentence you to die.', "Then I bring it to Robert... And hope he's still the man I once knew. You watch yourself on the road, huh? That temper of yours is a dangerous thing.", "You found money for a champion's purse, you can find money to keep the peace. I'll also give you 20 of my household guards till the crowds have left.", "Give it to me. I know this maker's mark. This is Mikken's work. Where did you get this? This is no toy. Little ladies shouldn't play with swords.", 'Even a million Dothraki are no threat to the realm, as long as they remain on the other side of the Narrow Sea. They have no ships, Robert.', "Darling, listen to me. Sansa will be married to Joffrey someday. She cannot betray him. She must take his side even when he's wrong.", 'A blade with a name. And who were you hoping to skewer with Needle? Your sister? Do you know the first thing about sword fighting?', "Look at me. Get back to work, lad. If the day ever comes when that boy'd rather wield a sword than forge one, you send him to me.", "No. But someday he could be Lord of a holdfast or sit on the King's Council. Or he might raise castles like Brandon the Builder.", "When you're old enough, I'll make you a match with someone who's worthy of you, someone who's brave and gentle and strong -", "I will not dishonor Robert's last hours by shedding blood in his halls and dragging frightened children from their beds.", "I'm glad we never met on the field, Ser Barristan... as is my wife. I don't think the widow's life would suit her.", "My father once told me you were the best he'd ever seen. I never knew the man to be wrong about matters of combat.", "A knight. They strut around like roosters down here. Even the ones who've never seen an arrow coming their way.", 'You will train them yourselves. You will feed them yourselves. And if they die, you will bury them yourselves.', "The Narrow Sea still lies between us. I'll fear the Dothraki the day they teach their horses to run on water.", "I don't fight in tournaments because when I fight a man for real, I don't want him to know what I can do.", "Round up all the men we have and station them outside the girls' chambers. Who are your best two swords?", "The King called on me to serve him and the realm, and that's what I'll do until he tells me otherwise.", "Try not to stab your sister with it. If you're going to own a sword, you'd better know how to use it.", 'You will marry a high Lord and rule his castle. And your sons shall be knights and princes and lords.', 'Daenerys Targaryen has wed some Dothraki horselord. What of it? Should we send her a wedding gift?', "The Mad King is dead Rhaegar lies beneath the ground Why weren't you there to protect your prince?", 'As you command your Grace. With your leave, I will return to Winterfell and set matters straight.', 'And that lad... He was a squire until a few months ago. How could he afford a new suit of armor?', 'He broke the law, betrayed his family, fled our land. We commit murder on the word of this man?', 'You want me to serve the woman who murdered my king, who butchered my men, who crippled my son?', "I'm a Northman. I belong here with you, not down south in that rat's nest they call a capital.", "It's all right. What is the meaning of this? Why was my daughter not brought to me at once?", '40,000 gold dragons to the champion, 20,000 to the runner-up, 20,000 to the winning archer.', "I'm sure the tourney puts coins in many a pocket. Now... If there's nothing else, my Lords?", "I'll go ahead with my daughters. Get them ready. Do it yourself. Don't ask anyone for help.", "There's nothing to forgive. When Lord Arryn came to visit you, what would you talk about?", 'There will be no plans until I speak to Robert. Forgive me, my Lords. I had a long ride.', "Get the girls settled in. I'll be back in time for supper. And, Jory, you go with them.", "If the King got what he wanted all the time, we'd still be fighting a damned rebellion.", "No. Jory... Take the girls to their rooms. If it must be done, then I'll do it myself.", 'Make peace with the Lannisters, you say. With the people who tried to murder my boy..', 'You know I had half my guard out searching for you? You promised me this would stop.', 'Sansa was dragged before the King and Queen... And asked to call the Prince a liar.', 'Mormont? You bring us the whispers of a traitor half a world away and call it fact?', "A shame you didn't say a prayer for the butcher's son. Renly! You're looking well.", "I'll speak to him tomorrow. This tournament is an extravagance we cannot afford.", 'Jon was a man of peace. He was Hand for 17 years -- 17 good years. Why kill him?', "He will not cross. And if by chance he does, we'll throw him back into the sea.", "I've been in the capital a month. Why have you waited so long to tell me this?", "Hey,, hey, hey, hey. What are you doing with that on? [Pulls off ARYA's helm]", 'What do you want? Tell me. No riddles, no stories. Tell me, what do you want?', "The same dollmaker makes all of Princess Myrcella's toys. Don't you like it?", "You shall have the command. Assemble 100 men and ride to Ser Gregor's keep.", "This isn't a punishment. I want you back in Winterfell for your own safety.", 'And which one of you was a marksman at ten? Keep practicing, Bran. Go on.', 'nods yes, and WILL is positioned on the tree limb that serves as a block.', "The next time we see each other, we'll talk about your mother. I promise.", "The worst thing about your coronation... I'll never get to hit you again.", 'She has, Lord Baelish. I understand you knew my brother Brandon as well.', "Stannis Baratheon is Robert's true heir. The throne is his by rights.", 'Jaime has fled the city. Give me leave to bring him back to justice.', "Well… Look at me. You're a Stark of Winterfell. You know our words.", 'You want to assassinate a girl... Because the Spider heard a rumor?', 'I will not believe Jon Arryn allowed Robert to bankrupt the realm.', 'His Grace has had a change of heart concerning Daenerys Targaryen.', 'In the name of Robert of the House Baratheon, first of his name …', 'He was talking madness. Said the Walkers slaughtered his friends.', "The King's tournament. I assure you the Hand wants no part of it.", "Aye... But who holds the straws? You've done good work, Sisters.", 'She looks healthy enough to me. The girl shall want for nothing.', "I've made many mistakes in my life, but that wasn't one of them.", "There's not a man in the Seven Kingdoms would risk hurting you.", 'On her knees begging for me. Hm! Did you laugh with the others?', "He's coming this far North, there's only one thing he's after.", "She's fresh widowed, Cat. She doesn't know what she's saying.", 'The wolf is of the north. She deserves better than a butcher.', "When the King returns from his hunt, I'll tell him the truth.", 'Guarding the North for you, Your Grace. Winterfell is yours.', 'You have no business jousting. Leave that for the young men.', "Better a quick death. They won't last without their mother.", 'Go on, girls. Get your septa and start packing your things.', "l don't know what you want. l've given up trying to guess.", "Go to your room. We'll speak later. That's for you, love…", 'Ser Barristan is a good man, a loyal man. Do him no harm.', 'The White Walkers have been gone for thousands of years.', "You have five northern children. You're not an outsider.", 'Arya, open the door. May I come in? Whose sword is that?', "Littlefinger's right. I can't do anything without proof.", 'Commander! Take the Queen and her children into custody.', "If that's true, then slit my throat and be done with it.", 'The man who passes the sentence should swing the sword.', 'The madness of mercy. That she might save her children.', 'Are you telling me the Crown is three million in debt?', "And you're quite certain he died of a natural illness?", 'And good luck to him. I thought you were a better man.', 'Then how come Robert is king and not Tywin Lannister?', 'You watched my men being slaughtered and did nothing.', 'He was taken at my command to answer for his crimes.', "I'll, I'll do everything I can to honor your memory.", "Stannis is a commander. He's led men into war twice.", "The king takes what he wants. That's why he's king.", "I've heard it said that poison is a woman's weapon.", 'When Jon Arryn came to visit you, what did he want?', "But you can't get your hands on this one, can you?", "No, sweet girl. You didn't kill the butcher's boy.", 'Did he say anything to you during his final hours?', 'Lord Baelish, perhaps I was wrong to distrust you.', 'I was also trained to kill my enemies, Your Grace.', 'You will dishonor yourself forever if you do this.', "You'll get 50. Lord Baelish will see it paid for.", 'And what about Jaime Lannister? What about Jaime?', "He won't be a boy forever. And winter is coming.", "I've been hoping to talk to you about Jon Arryn.", 'These men, were they flying a sigil? … A banner.', "It's done, Your Grace. The Targaryens are gone.", 'Knighted for what? Why are you telling me this?', "The Queen can't kill me. Cat holds her brother.", 'Did Jon Arryn tell you what he wanted with it?', 'The throne passes to his brother Lord Stannis.', "Another visit? lt seems you're my last friend.", 'She was my sister. This is where she belongs.', 'Perhaps you chose the wrong man to duel with.', 'Does Ser Hugh have any family in the capital?', 'No man could have protected him from himself.', 'But do you understand why I had to kill him?', 'Yes, the king has honored me with his offer.', 'If Ser Hugh poisoned him, who paid Ser Hugh?', 'There are no mountain lions in these woods.', 'You served him well, when serving was safe.', 'What did Jon want the night before he died?', "Putting my name on it doesn't make it mine.", "What do you know of King Robert's bastards?", 'And what should I do with a hundred swords?', 'And which one of you was a marksman at ten?', 'Come here. Now what do you want with this?', "No, I'm not a dream. I'm here. Right here.", "Glad to see you're protecting the throne.", 'Very handsome armor. Not a scratch on it.', "You've chosen your opponents wisely then.", 'The seed is strong"? What does that mean?', 'And Jon Arryn tracked them all down. Why?', "The South doesn't seem to agree with you.", 'There is no other choice. He is the heir.', 'He needs to get his strength back first.', "I'm sending you both back to Winterfell.", "The butcher's boy... You rode him down?", "Then we're no better than the Mad King.", "You kill me, your brother's a dead man.", 'You promised Catelyn you would help me.', 'King of the Andals and the First Men …', 'You should have asked me 20 years ago.', 'I need to see the King first -- alone.', 'The boy I beheaded. Did you know him?', 'But you just stood there and watched.', "You're a funny man. A very funny man.", "Where is Ser Hugh? I'll speak to him.", 'What sort of doom does the King face?', "You're speaking of murdering a child.", 'Find them and meet me at the stables.', "If we don't act… there will be a war.", "You're describing Ser Gregor Clegane.", 'You will sail to dragonstone tonight.', 'Get the lads to saddle their horses.', 'Until we know who our enemies are...', 'The sooner this is over, the better.', "Thank you. I'll find my own way out.", 'What were you doing in the dungeons?', 'I know the truth Jon Arryn died for.', "Tell me we're not speaking of this.", 'Maybe you should have one invented.', 'Huh. Can you free me from this pit?', "It's your gods with all the rules.", "No, but I'm still better than you.", 's this your command... your Grace?', "It's a hard fall down these steps.", "He'd never worn this armor before.", 'Jory, take her safely to her room.', 'She did nothing I did not command.', "laughs] That's the essence of it.", "I've half a mind to go with you.", 'Back! Back to the inn. All back!', "If that's my job, then so be it.", "And who's going to hit you back?", "Ah, we'll find recruits for you.", "She's little more than a child.", "Stop it! That's enough of that.", "I've taken enough of your time.", 'Your squire... A Lannister boy?', 'The King has no true born sons.', 'I looked for you on the Trident', 'How could you let this happen?', 'War was easier than daughters.', "You're too fat for your armor.", "You're torturing the poor boy.", 'His squire? The Lannister boy?', 'Stannis is your older brother.', "I don't fight in tournaments.", 'Bessie. She was one of yours.', "Go on. We'll talk more later.", 'Do you have a shred of honor?', 'You understand why I did it?', "I'm not worthy of the honor.", 'And you served another King.', "I'd like to see him as well.", 'Yes. That will never happen.', 'What you suggest is treason.', "Tell Bran he's coming, too.", 'A madman sees what he sees.', "I hope I'll serve you well.", 'So why do you trust me now?', 'Based on whose information?', 'Your brother Or your lover?', 'Give him milk of the poppy.', "King Robert's bastard son.", 'The breastplate stretcher?', 'I will have no part in it.', 'trying to keep the peace -', 'My wife is in Winterfell.', 'What did Lord Arryn want?', "And they are all Jaime's.", 'Tell me something, Varys.', 'Tell me about Jon Arryn.', 'What are you doing here?', 'Who determines the draw?', 'Where did you hear this?', 'Your pardon, your Grace.', "I've had worse, my lady.", 'Has he done this before?', 'My son saw you with him.', "You've always hated him.", 'What about my daughters?']

Name: robb stark
Sentence: ['He once told me that being a lord is like being a father, except you have thousands of children and you worry about all of them. The farmers plowing the fields are yours to protect. The charwomen scrubbing the floors, yours to protect. The soldiers you order into battle. He told me he woke with fear in the morning and went to bed with fear in the night. I didn\'t believe him. I asked him, "How can a man be brave if he\'s afraid?" "That is the only time a man can be brave," he told me.', 'My ladies. All men should keep their word, kings most of all. I was pledged to marry one of you and I broke that vow. The fault is not with you. Any man would be lucky to have any one of you. I did what I did not to slight you, but because I loved another. I know these words cannot set right the wrong I have done to you and your house. I beg your forgiveness and pledge to do all I can to make amends so the Freys of the Crossing and the Starks of Winterfell may once again be friends.', "I offer your cousins peace if they meet my terms. First, your family must release my sisters. Second, my father's bones must be returned to us so he may rest beside his brother and sister in the crypts beneath Winterfell. And the remains of all those who died in his service must also be returned. Their families can honor them with proper funerals.", 'I wanted to draw the Mountain into the west, into our country where we could surround him and kill him. I wanted him to chase us, which he would have done because he is a mad without a strategic thought in his head. I could have that head on a spike by now. Instead, I have a mill.', "Winter could last five years. Once my bannermen are home again, sitting by the fire, surrounded by their families, warm and safe, they'll never ride south again. When I gathered my lords together, we had a purpose, a mission. Now we're like a band of bickering children.", "By the time Bolton's bastard Ramsay got to Winterfell, the Ironborn were gone. They massacred everyone and put the castle to the torch. And Bran and Rickon have not been found. They may have escaped. Or Theon may have taken them back to the Iron Islands as hostages.", 'If I left you with one of my bannermen, your father would know within a fortnight, and my bannerman would receive a raven with a message, "Release my son and you\'ll be rich beyond your dreams. Refuse and your house will be destroyed, root and stem.”', "Which of these lords do I trust more than you? If Renly sides with us, we'll outnumber them two to one. When they feel the jaws beginning to shut, they'll sue for peace. We'll get the girls back. Then we'll all go home for good.", "Aye. But the dead won't hear them. One victory does not make us conquerors. Did we free my father? Did we rescue my sisters from the queen? Did we free the North from those who want us on our knees? This war is far from over.", "You're held captive by a boy. Perhaps you'll be killed by a boy. . Stannis Baratheon sent ravens to all the high lords of Westeros. King Joffrey Baratheon is neither a true king nor a true Baratheon. . He's your bastard son.", "I need men to replace the Karstarks who marched home. There is only one person in this kingdom with that kind of army who hasn't already sided with the Lannisters. The man whose daughter I was supposed to marry- Walder Frey.", "How am I? I've had to arrest my mother. The Lannisters have my sisters. The man I considered my closest friend has seized my home and my brothers. I'm fighting a war and I don't know if I should march south or north.", "Neither Joffrey nor any of his men shall set foot in our lands again. If he disregards this command, he shall suffer the same fate as my father, only I don't need a servant to do my beheading for me.", "It's hard to keep all the rules straight. But if I remember my lessons, a woman of noble birth is always called a lady. Unless she's a queen or a princess. I could find someone who knows.", "Jaime Lannister has played you for a fool. You've weakened our position. You've brought discord into our camp. And you did it all behind my back. Make sure she's guarded day and night.", "Tell your son Bran and Rickon's safety is paramount. And Theon, I want him brought to me alive. I want to look him in the eye and ask him why. And then I'll take his head myself.", 'Third... Joffrey and the Queen Regent must renounce all claim to dominion of the North. From this time, till the end of time, we are a free and independent kingdom.', "You'd have us surrender, end all this bloodshed. I understand. The country would be at peace and life would be just under the righteous hand of good King Joffrey.", "My father would do whatever it took to secure our crossing. Whatever it took. lf l'm going to lead this army, l can't have other men doing my bargaining for me.", "I don't know. The good kind. Most kings grew up as princes. They spend their whole lives preparing for the crown. I was raised to be Lord of Winterfell.", "How do you feel? You still don't remember anything? I've seen you climb a thousand times. In the wind, in the rain... A thousand times. You never fall.", 'Get your supper. I want some time with him. One time she told me the sky is blue because we live inside the eye of a blue-eyed giant named Macumber.', "Your son killed him so the world wouldn't learn who fathered him. And you... you pushed my brother from a window because he saw you with the queen.", "That doesn't make Renly king. He's Robert's youngest brother. lf Bran can't be Lord of Winterfell before me, Renly can't be king before Stannis.", 'Any Ironborn with the exception of Theon Greyjoy. He betrayed our cause. He betrayed me. And we will hunt him down no matter where he runs.', "The Lannisters have been running from us since Oxcross. I'd love a fight. The men would love a fight. I don't think we're going to get one.", 'We are fighting for the North. Harrenhal is not in the North. It is his once the war is over and we have no further strategic need for it.', "These are my terms. If the Queen Regent and her son meet them, I'll give them peace. If not, I will litter the south with Lannister dead.", "If we take Tywin's castle from him, the lords of Westeros will realize he's not invincible. Take his home, take his gold, take his power.", "I have a war to fight. We can't win it without them. I have no time to haggle. You said you wanted to make amends for the Stone Mill.", "I can't force them to meet us in the field and I can't attack them where they're strongest, but I can attack them where they're not.", 'It was before they killed my father. I still thought I could march south and rescue him in time, but only if I crossed that bridge.', 'The Karstarks are gone. Almost half our forces. Tywin Lannister knows what he needs to do to make us unravel. Nothing. Only wait.', "Yes. And now I'm the one rebelling against the throne. Before me, it was father. You married one rebel and mothered another.", "Because I need you to negotiate with Renly Baratheon. He's rallied an army of 100,000. You know him. You know his family.", "You've acted with honor. I thank you for it. Lord Karstark, see that Ser Alton's pen is clean, and give him a hot supper.", "Rickon needs you. He's six. He doesn't know what's happening. He follows me around all day, clutching my leg, crying...", "I'm not fighting for justice if I don't serve justice to murderers in my ranks, no matter how highborn. He has to die.", 'Rickard Karstark, Lord of Karhold, here in sight of gods and men, I sentence you to die. Would you speak a final word?', 'Father rots in a dungeon. How long before they take his head? We need to cross the Trident and we need to do it now.', "It's tradition. Without the bedding ceremony, there's no real proof the lord and lady consummated their marriage.", 'She freed Jaime Lannister. The Lannisters robbed them of their sons and she robbed them of their justice.', 'Have the men build him a new pen. Put him in with the Kingslayer for now. Have your boy watch over them.', 'Now Winterfell is burned to the ground. The North is overrun with Ironborn and Bran and Rickon are gone.', "If every man were held accountable for the actions of every distant relative, Ser Alton, we'd all hang.", "And that is what would be in store for me with one of Walder Frey's daughters, what you and father had?", "Mother. Mother, this is Lady Talisa. She's been helping with the wounded. She's been very... helpful.", "How can I call myself king if I can't hold my own castle? How can I ask men to follow me if I can't-", 'Let the maester show you his stores. I want the wounded men to be treated well, all the wounded men.', 'Edmure is the best match a Frey has had in the history of their house. We should all get some sleep.', 'Send word to your son. Any Ironborn who surrender will be allowed to return safely to their homes.', "Because we'll never be safe until the Lannisters are defeated. And because I believe in justice.", "What can I do? Attack King's Landing? There's nothing he'd like better. He'd crush us in a day.", "I'll send Rodrik to watch over the boys, ‘cause tomorrow, you'll ride south to the Stormlands.", "Vengeance? Those boys didn't kill your sons. I saw Harrion die on the battlefield and Torrhen-", "I've won every battle, but I'm losing this war. If we don't do this and do it now, we're lost.", "The Lannisters hold prisoners of their own. I won't give them an excuse to abuse my sisters.", 'He was the best man I ever met. I know children always think that about their fathers, but', 'My father is dead. And the only parent I have left has no right to call anyone reckless.', "Do you think he'll sue for peace because we have his father's brother's great-grandsons?", 'You begged me not to send Theon to negotiate with his father and I ignored your advice.', "Go on, Tommy, shave him good. He's never met a girl he likes better than his own hair.", "I don't know. We'll go back to Winterfell. I have no desire to sit on the Iron Throne.", "How am I supposed to sit here planning a war when you're over there looking like that?", "He's not going to die, mother. Maester Luwin says the most dangerous time has passed.", "We'll travel to the funeral together. Lord Bolton will garrison here until we return.", 'If I trade the Kingslayer for two girls, my bannermen will string me up by my feet.', "I won't refuse. His Grace summons me to King's Landing, I'll go to King's Landing.", "It's all right. You heard him. If you refuse, our alliance with the Freys is dead.", "Oh, do you? It seems to me the father should have some say in his son's naming.", "They come into our home and try to murder my brother? If it's war they want...", 'To do either we need to cross the river and the only crossing is at The Twins.', "And Casterly Rock can't run away. I'm going to take their home away from them.", "Thank you for riding here so quickly. I know travel isn't easy in these times.", "I'm not your boy, Lannister. I'm Lord of Winterfell while my father is away.", "Oh, is he? You'll ride at daybreak, Ser Alton. That will be all for tonight.", "It's not about glory. Your instructions were to wait for him to come to you.", 'This one was only the watcher. Hang him last so he can watch the others die.', "I'll make the appointments. We'll talk about it first thing in the morning.", "I'm sending one of your cousins down to King's Landing with my peace terms.", "I'm sending one of your cousins down to King's Landing with my peace terms.", 'You would have. Right here today at this gathering if you had been patient.', "You're paying for my sins, Uncle. It's not fair or right. I'll remember it.", "If you don't put some clothes on, I can't promise I won't attack you again.", 'If you think the time is right, Lord Walder, by all means, let us bed them.', "You've done my brother a kindness. The hospitality of Winterfell is yours.", "lf we do it your way, Kingslayer, you'd win. We're not doing it your way.", 'Only the Lord of Winterfell can call in the bannermen and raise an army.', 'Is that all of them? It took five of you to murder two unarmed squires?', 'I have come to make my apologies, my lord, and to beg your forgiveness.', "How did you go from reciting Valyrian poetry to sawing off men's feet?", "You tended to their wounds. You brought them supper. Now they're dead.", 'By the time they knew what was happening, it had already happened.', "Perhaps you'd join me... If you've got time, of course, for, well-", "That didn't stop you from betraying me. And it won't save you now.", 'I am hers and she is mine from this day until the end of my days.', 'My Uncle Edmure has his forces garrisoned there. We need his men.', "Bite on it. It's better than biting your own tongue, believe me.", "Volantis? You're far from home. The boy was lucky you were here.", "You insult yourself, Kingslayer. You've been defeated by a boy.", "You surprised me, that's all. I didn't think I'd see you today.", 'And my enemies, as some of my bannermen are fond of mentioning.', 'He has every right to be. Please excuse us while we discuss it.', "You've said goodbye to Bran? He's not going to die. I know it.", 'Joffrey puts my father in chains, now he wants his ass kissed?', "I suppose it does seem strange from a foreigner's perspective.", "My father learned the truth. That's why you had him executed.", "Put this in your mouth and lie down. You don't want to watch.", 'My mother had nothing to do with this. This was your treason.', "l'll kill them all. Every one of them. l will kill them all.", "You don't have to call me ‘Your Grace' when no one's around.", 'We will do whatever we can to give Lord Frey what he needs.', "He's Grandfather's bannerman. We can't expect his support?", "Now you're arguing just to argue because you arranged it.", "There won't be a siege. The Mountain can't defend a ruin.", "We'll lose the war and die the way father died. Or worse.", "My mother's alone with Roose Bolton. I should rescue her.", 'Is this some kind of trick? Why do you want to help him?', 'No! You knew I would not allow it and you did it anyway.', 'Father, smith, warrior, mother ,maiden, crone, stranger.', 'My father understands mercy, when there is room for it.', 'You know my family name. You have me at a disadvantage.', "Any man of the Night's Watch is welcome at Winterfell.", 'Tywin Lannister has my sisters. Have I sued for peace?', "And it's not your duty, because it's not your House.", 'Have you not been speaking your mind, Lord Karstark?', 'Oh, I trust them with my life. Just not with yours.', "I couldn't really discuss troop movements with you.", "No. Forgive me. You're being kind. I have no right.", 'Willem and Martyn Lannister are fourteen years old.', 'Escort Lord Karstark to the dungeon. Hang the rest.', 'Of course. He deserves as much. I was in the wrong.', "Good. Next time I see you, you'll be all in black.", "Drop the knife. Let him go and I'll let you live.", "lt's a birthday message to his grand-niece Walda.", "It's more complicated than that! You know it is.", 'Would you make me a liar as well as a murderer?', "Have you lost your mind? What if you'd missed?", 'We will all be together again soon, I promise.', "My grandfather's funeral is not a distraction.", "Frey, I suppose. I don't know her first name.", 'Theon has my brothers. If we storm the castle', 'Find her a chamber that will serve as a cell.', 'There will be no talk. He will die for this.', "Be kind. She's finally starting to like you.", 'l see. Did you get a look at his daughters?', "We're not executing prisoners, Lord Bolton.", 'Send another forty with our fastest horses.', 'We thank you for your hospitality, my lord.', 'There are no direwolves south of the Wall.', 'When was the last time you left this room?', 'Tell Lord Tywin, Winter is coming for him.', "I understand you don't trust Lord Greyjoy.", 'We need our men more than Tywin needs his!', "So, Casterly Rock? I'm asking your advice.", 'I hear the prince is a right royal prick.', "That's not the kind of king I want to be.", 'My father outlawed flaying in the North.', 'Of course, a spy would deny being a spy.', "He didn't care much about gold or glory.", 'Let me guess which one is the good news.', 'Striking your king is an act of treason.', 'You want me to march on Casterly Rock?!', 'l sent 2,000 men to their graves today.', "He's a proud man and we've wounded him.", 'I love you. Do you hear me? I love you.', 'I need his ships. They say he has 200.', "Frey will wait. He knows we're coming.", "I'm glad someone's gotten used to it.", "Here. And we're here. King's Landing-", "Does she know her daughter's a queen?", "Perhaps I've made a terrible mistake.", "Fire. You stay here. I'll come back.", "He's more use to us alive than dead.", "You never told me where you're from.", "I don't want to marry the Frey girl.", "You know who isn't? Tywin Lannister.", "She won't be happy about that. And?", "I'd like to hear you play the harp.", "Did you ever think you'd marry one?", 'Lad, go run back and get the rest.', "Better at amputations, I'm afraid.", 'That will be a surprise, I expect.', "No, but he's starting to know me.", 'Have you lost faith in our cause?', 'Have my horse saddled and ready.', "That's what I tell my bannermen.", "It's better than three defeats.", 'If you need help finding these-', 'Is he there now? Of course not.', 'What are you telling him now?', 'I have no hatred for the lad.', 'If the gods give me strength.', 'First we have to win the war.', 'They were boys! Look at them.', "I'll ride to King's Landing.", 'What does he want in return?', 'Is there room for Ser Alton?', "You're Ser Alton Lannister?", "You can't go to Winterfell.", 'Give Lord Renly my regards.', "You don't think we can win?", 'What, now? Are you certain?', "You don't have the right -", 'Treason? Sansa wrote this?', "You'll die if she doesn't.", 'How many men did you lose?', 'If Walder Frey cooperates.', "You're talking about war.", 'Men who fought my father.', 'Men who fought my father.', "We're not torturing them.", 'The family he fights for.', 'Come with me to the Crag.', "What's your name, friend?", 'If you no longer believe-', 'I must go north at once.', 'He would have liked you.', "Tell me this isn't true.", 'What value was the mill?', 'Where did you find him?', 'Gaaa? Say hello for me.', "Angry? You're my queen.", 'You call me boy again.', 'Well? What did he say?', 'Renly is not the king.', 'They killed my father.', 'That would be a start.', 'It is important to me.', "We'll keep her alive.", 'How high did you get?', "Because it's obvious.", 'Why? Why would Theon-', 'And what did she say?', 'Put away your blade.', "Don't ever say that.", "I'd call you a liar.", 'Quite a pretty spot.', "I haven't forgotten."]

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: ["When you were an infant, , the Dornish trailer landed on Dragonstone. His goods were junk except for one wooden doll. He'd even sewn a dress on it in the colors of our House. No doubt he'd heard of your birth, and assumed new fathers were easy targets. I still remember how you smiled when I put that doll in your cradle, , and you pressed it to your cheek. . By the time we burnt the doll, it was too late. . I was told you would die. Or worse, the grayscale would go slow. . Let you grow just enough to know the world before taking it away from you. Everyone advised me to send you to the ruins of Valyria to live out your short life with the Stone men, before the sickness spread to the castle. I told them all to go to hell. . I called in every maester on this side of the world. Every healer, every apothecary. They stopped the disease and saved your life. Because you did not belong across the world with the bloody Stone men. . You are the Princess Shireen of House Baratheon. And you are my daughter.", "First, we ate the horses. We weren't riding anywhere, not with the castle surrounded. We couldn't feed them, so fine, the horses. Then the cats. Never liked cats. So fine. I do like dogs. Good animals. Loyal. But we ate them. Then the rats. The night before you slipped through, I thought my wife was dying. She couldn't speak anymore, she was so frail. And then you made it through the lines. Slipped right through in your little black sailboat with your onions.", "How many boys live in Westeros? How many girls? How many men? How many women?The darkness will devour them all, she says. The night that never ends. Unless I triumph. I never asked for this. No more than I asked to be king. We do not choose our destiny, but we must do our duty, no? Great or small, we must do our duty. What's one bastard boy against a kingdom?", "Robert told me to hold Storm's End, so I held it. Then he told me he was giving it to Renly, so I gave it up. Insult or no, I gave it up. Because Robert was my older brother, and he was the king and I've always done my duty. But now, I'm the rightful king by every law of Westeros. And when I sit the Iron Throne, you'll be my Hand.", "The flames lied. And I'm no better than a savage trusting in a fire god. I fought for your god in Blackwater Bay. I led my men to the gates of the seventh hell as their brothers burned alive, and for what? Attacked from behind by Tywin Lannister and the Tyrells. If you see so much in your flames, why didn't you warn me?", "I ordered Mance Rayder burnt at the stake. You prevented that order from being carried out. You showed mercy to Mance Rayder. A king's word is law. Perhaps you should ask Ser Davos how much mercy I show to lawbreakers. Show too much kindness, people won't fear you. If people don't fear you, they don't follow you.", "Find you some healthy horses and a few good men to guard you, I'm sending you back to Castle Black. Tell the Lord Commander to send food, supplies, fresh horses, in return when I take the throne I'll make sure the Night's Watch has all the men it requires. He can guard all 19 castles if he so wishes.", "They'd rather burn than fight for me, so be it. I leave their fate to you. You could execute them, that's the safest course. . Or you could see if this Tormund fellow is more willing to compromise than Mance ever was. I assume the brothers of the Night's Watch would rather see the wildlings dead.", "If Jon Snow returns with the wildlings. We can't wait that long. We have the advantage, more men, more horses, all fed and rested. But every day we wait, the odds shift in Bolton's favor. This could turn to winter at any moment. We have to act now. Give the order. We march at sunrise.", "Your father is Randyll Tarly. He defeated my brother at the Battle of Ashford. Only battle Robert ever lost. I told him he shouldn't go so far west so soon, but he never listened. Fine soldier, your father. You don't look like a soldier. But I'm told you killed a white walker.", "For the sake of the mother who bore us, I will give you this one night to reconsider. Strike your banners, come to me before dawn, and I will grant you your old seat in the Council. I'll even name you my heir until a son is born to me. Otherwise I shall destroy you.", 'He had a smaller fleet than the kings he faced and a smaller army, but he had three dragons. Dragons are magic, Ser Davos. My enemies have made my kingdom bleed. I will not forget that. I will not forgive that. I will punish them with any arms at my disposal.', "I saw a vision in the flames. A great battle in the snow. I saw it. And you saw whatever she gave birth to. I never believed, but when you see the truth, when it's right there in front of you as real as these iron bars, how can you deny her god is real?", 'Sometimes a person has to choose. Sometimes the world forces his hand. If a man knows what he is and remains true to himself, the choice is not choice at all. He must fulfill his destiny and become who he is meant to be. However much he may hate it.', "67. And when he dies, who's in command? A half-grown boy, the product of incest? Cersei Lannister, a queen whose people despise her? Jaime Lannister, a man best known for killing the king he was sworn to protect? When Tywin's gone, who do you back?", "When Eddard Stark learned the truth, he told only me. I'll not make the same mistake. Send copies of that letter to every corner of the Realm, from the Arbor to the Wall. The time has come to choose. Let no man claim ignorance as an excuse.", 'The usurper Joffrey Baratheon. I said those words when I tossed a leech into the fire. A leech filled with bastard blood. A bastard you set free. I am now faced with a great opportunity and I am powerless to take advantage of it.', "Who would steal the northern half of my kingdom. I've always served thieves according to their desserts, as you well know, Ser Davos. Joffrey, Renly, Robb Stark, they're all thieves. They'll bend the knee or I'll destroy them.", "No matter. I shall take back the North from the thieves who stole it. Tywin Lannister is dead. He can't protect them now. I shall mount Roose Bolton's head on a spike. But if I'm to take Winterfell I'll need more men.", "We were forgotten. Robert and Ned Stark, they were the heroes. The glorious rebels marching from battle to battle, liberating towns from the yoke of the Mad King, while I held Storm's End with five hundred men.", 'It is strange to find you beside my brother, Lady Stark. Your husband was a supporter of my claim. Lord Eddardo s integrity cost him his head. And you sit beside this pretender and chastise me.', "If I do not press my claim, my claim will be forgotten. I will not become a page in someone else's history book. I'm running out of time, Ser Davos. Which means you're running out of time. -", "And if Jon Snow refuses a boy with a scroll, what does the boy say? I didn't name you hand for your expertise in military matters, ride for Castle Black, don't come back empty handed.", "I'll have thousands of your men in chains by nightfall, I'll have nowhere to put them and nothing to feed them. I'm not here to slaughter beat dogs. Their fate depends on their king.", "As soon as I've consolidated my troops. We'll make short work of the Lannisters' fleet. Once Blackwater Bay is cleared, we'll deliver our troops to their doorstep and take the city.", "Winter is coming. Those arent just the Stark words, it's a fact. If we march back to Castle Black, we winter at Castle Black. And who can say how many years this winter will last.", "All my brother's bannermen have come to my side. Except the Tyrells, who fled like cowards. They won't be able to resist us now. Soon I shall be sitting on the Iron Throne.", 'Pleased to hear it. Some highborn fools call you Onion Knight and think they insult you. So you take the onion for your sigil, sew it on your coat, fly the onion flag.', "If they swear to follow me, I'll pardon them. We'll take Winterfell. Once the North is won, I'll declare them citizens of the realm. I'll give them land to live on.", "This is the right time, and I will risk everything. Because if I don't, we've lost. We march to victory or we march to defeat, but we go forward only forward,", "My enemies think they've destroyed me. They're laughing at me the way Renly laughed at me. I want Joffrey dead. I want Robb Stark dead. Make me another son.", 'Very well, Ser Davos Seaworth. I, Stannis of the House Baratheon, First of My Name, Rightful King of the Andals and the First Men, sentence you to die.', 'Trench here. Another one 300 yards from the castle wall. Hurry them along. And send out a foraging party immediately. The siege begins at sunrise.', "Put last night's guards in chains, either they fell asleep or they were conspiring with the enemy. Find out the truth and then hang them.", 'You have many enemies in Castle Black. Have you considered sending Alliser Thorne elsewhere? Give him command of Eastwatch-by-the-Sea.', "I know. My brother Robert went on often and loudly about how difficult it was to control them - even with your father's help.", "Mance Rayder, you've been called the King Beyond the Wall. Westeros only has one king. Bend the knee, I promise you mercy.", "Kneel before me. Lay your sword at my feet. Pledge me your service and you'll rise again as Jon Stark, Lord of Winterfell.", "Most of those lords should consider themselves lucky I don't hang them for treason. Hard truths cut both ways, Ser Davos.", "I didn't mean it as praise. Honor got your father killed. . But if your mindo s made up, I won't try to persuade you.", 'My little brother has a hundred thousand men according to the scouts. Men whose allegiance rightly belongs to me.', "I'm giving you a chance to avenge your family. To take back the castle where you grew up. To rule the North.", "What of it? We're at war. Why should I spare the son of some tavern slut Robert bedded one drunken night?", "Lady of Bear Island, and a child of 10. I asked her to commit her house to my cause, that's her response.", "Your bravery made him look weak. He'll punish you for it. I don't punish men for bravery. I reward them.", "Then why bathe him and dress him in fine clothes? If it needs to be done, do it. Don't torture the boy.", "I cannot defeat my brother in the field, and I can't take King's Landing without the men he stole.", "We set out for King's Landing without Lady Melisandre. And you lead the fleet into Blackwater Bay.", "No? Robert did. He gave Storm's End to Renly after the war. Renly never fought a day in his life.", "You see, Ser Davos? You've been saved by that fire god you like to mock. You're in his army now.", "I'll offer them their lives and their freedom if Mance kneels before me and swears his loyalty.", "I retreated from King's Landing, Ser Davos. If I retreat again, I become “The King Who Ran.”", "Make it Ser Jaime Lannister, the Kingslayer. Whatever else he is, the man's still a knight.", 'Fools love a fool. I grieve for him as well, for the boy he was, not the man he grew to be.', 'He shares no blood with me. He is a bastard born of incest. As was his brother before him.', 'You were a hero and a smuggler. A good act does not wash out the bad, nor a bad the good.', 'I came to free you. If you swear never to raise your hand to the Lady Melisandre again.', "The traitor who plunged a dagger into Robb Stark's heart. Don't you want to avenge him?", "Ser Davos is a traitor. He's rotting in a dungeon cell for his crime. Best forget him.", 'I know it. We march on Winterfell within the fortnight. Before the snows trap us here.', 'Faith? In a real war, the side with the greater number wins nine times out of ten.', "I thought I made it clear to you there'd be no need to speak to me on this matter.", 'The usurper Robb Stark. The usurper Balon Greyjoy. The usurper Joffrey Baratheon.', 'I know what it is. We have it in Dragonstone. Why would obsidian kill a walker?', "The Red Woman. No one must know what you do and we'll not speak of this again.", "I'm not talking about the damn Night's Watch. I'm talking about the wildlings.", 'Four fewer fingernails to clean. Never understood why you had to wear them.', 'My father used to tell me that boredom indicates a lack of inner resources.', "I hope you know what you're doing with these wildlings. I need those ships.", 'If you had to choose between Rhaenyra and Aegon, who would you have chosen?', 'Here? Half these watchmen are killers and rapists. No, they march with us.', 'The Iron Throne is mine by right. All those that deny that are my foes.', "House Haigh. They don't have enough men between them to raid a pantry.", "He wasn't my beloved brother. . I didn't love him, he didn't love me.", "She has a name. I trust you've not forgotten your smuggler's tricks.", '20 men rode into our camp without a single guard sounding the alarm?', "I never thought I'd have reason to doubt your loyalty. Was I wrong?", 'Nightfall. The sun drops fast this time of year. Hurry, Jon Snow.', 'We have to know how to fight them. . Keep reading, Samwell Tarly.', "You promise these things, but you don't know. None of us know.", "Oh, truth again. All right, what's the truth? The hard truth?", "I expect you'll be the first crabber's son to wear the badge.", 'Do you know who had this table carved and painted, Ser Davos?', 'Lady Stark, I had not thought to find you in the Stormlands.', "I'll not make peace with Renly while he calls himself King.", 'The Lady Melisandre told me that death marches on the Wall.', "I've trusted in your visions, in your prophecies for years.", "Where's your god now? Will he save you? Where is your god?", 'The usurper Robb Stark is dead. Betrayed by his bannerman.', 'I hate a good many things, but I suffer them all the same.', "I'm not so easily killed. Men have been trying for years.", "You don't understand. The Red Woman- the Lady Melisandre-", 'Send copies of that letter to every corner of the realm.', "Well if he does his job, he'll have his share. Leave us.", "Every man in Storm's End wanted to kiss you that night.", 'And do you know how Aegon Targaryen conquered Westeros?', 'In my experience, pirates prefer fighting unarmed men.', 'What is the life of one bastard boy against a kingdom?', 'Get the men into marching formation. On to Winterfell.', 'Jaime Lannister, the Kingslayer. Call him what he is.', 'You defend these men who insult you behind your back.', 'It is customary to kneel when surrendering to a king.', "And where were those lords when Storm's End starved?", "You're a literary man now. What do you make of that?", "You're as stubborn as your father. And as honorable.", 'I know Castle Black is no place for a child, but I -', "I've never known you to need to hear a thing twice.", "Came back with a bastard boy. Robert's bastard boy.", 'I ordered him to tear down his idols. He disobeyed.', "You're not abandoning me, you're obeying a command.", 'You think a few bolts of cloth will make you king?', "It won't be a choice this time. Do you trust him?", "I've said the words, damn you! I burnt the idols.", 'We shall see, Renly. Come the dawn, we shall see.', 'There must be another way. Leeches or something.', 'Take him to the dungeon and lock him in a cell.', "You told me your magic requires a king's blood.", 'I had hoped to speak to you alone, Your Grace.', "Selyse. I've broken a sacred vow. I've sinned.", 'What other way?! Tell us about this other way.', 'He likes you. Convince him to bend the knee...', 'Do you know this wretched girl Lyanna Mormont?', 'Stand and fight! Stand and fight, damn you!', 'You talk about war as if you understand it.', "She's my daughter. You will not strike her.", "Whoever said that didn't have many enemies.", 'The dance of dragons”? Why is that a dance?', "You don't even know what I'm talking about.", "There's no other way. She has King's blood.", 'You said you saw my victory in the flames.', "What do you think he'd have done with him?", 'Very well. . Have you considered my offer?', 'For the night is dark and full of terror.', "You refuse to tell me where you're going?", 'You have little regard for your own life.', "You're the Lord Commander. Your decision.", "Perhaps, but that wasn't Ned Stark's way.", 'Have the dead horses butchered for meat.', "Speak up. It can't be worse than mutiny.", "She says there's power in king's blood.", 'Sell swords, loyal to nothing but gold.', 'I want you to be a smuggler this time.', 'The dwarf has played his little trick.', "You don't belong in a place like this.", 'Do your knuckle bones bring you luck?', "She's my daughter. I want to see her.", "Serve fish, then. We're on an island.", 'You know who rules at Winterfell now?', "I've wronged you. I have shamed you.", "Lord Commander of the Night's Watch.", "We don't have Robert's bastard here.", "We're not returning to Castle Black.", "You've come to lecture me on truth?", "Then why'd he give him Storm's End?", 'I meant to come sooner. The battle-', 'And you, my Lady, what do you need?', "You've grown since I last saw you.", 'Bolton has women fighting for him.', 'How did it fare with your pirate?', 'Tell your lord to burn them then.', "It's not a story. It's the truth.", 'Your father was an honorable man.', 'Come with me and take this city!', 'Have you? Show me how you fight.', 'What do you mean to do with him?', "You're the king beyond the wall?", "No need, they're coming with us.", 'You claimed to speak for a god.', 'Very well. *to Davos* Take him.', 'And you, do you trust yourself?', "You've slaughtered many lambs?", "That's twice I've warned you.", "We've been here since midday.", 'Say the word and you will be.', "She shouldn't have said that.", 'I have a wife. I took a vow.', "Cleaner ways don't win wars.", "He won't be visiting, child.", 'What progress have you made?', 'Are you bored of us already?', "I'll hear no more about it.", 'When did you learn to read?', 'We must. To beat the snows.', 'How long will you be gone?', 'He did. He fought bravely.', 'Half Robert, half lowborn.', 'A good deal more than you.', "You admire him, don't you?", 'You can give me the North.', 'He can only play it once.', 'More than any man living.', 'No. What are you reading?', 'What did you say to him?', "That's not your concern.", 'I admire you, Ser Davos.', 'To the Mud Gate, go now!', 'They feeding you enough?', 'Why am I gonna need you?', "I'd like to speak alone.", "I don't know what I saw.", 'Have you lost your mind?', 'My family stays with me.', "Doesn't make much sense.", "He wasn't your brother.", "We don't have any gold.", 'We ride for Winterfell.', 'Watch yourself, Renly.', 'I murdered my brother.', 'I heard you were dead.', "I'm the one true king.", "Melisandre's returned.", "I've made my decision.", 'Who else might it be?', "You're abandoning me.", 'I believed that once.', 'Of course I remember.', "You're Samwell Tarly?", 'What do you believe?', 'Gold you loaned him.', 'Take these men away.', "I won't. I need you.", 'Why do you say that?', 'Go on, do your duty.', 'A lie. Take it out.', 'Get the ladders up!', 'The Golden Company?', "They're sellswords.", 'Prepare to form up.', "You don't deny it?", 'He was an infidel.', 'You know who I am?', "She's my daughter.", 'The boy must die.', 'Prepare to land.', "That's not true.", 'House Peasebury.', 'That amuses you?', "What's it about?", 'Does he listen?']

Name: catelyn stark
Sentence: ["Jon Snow. When my husband brought that baby home from the war, I couldn't bear to look at him. I didn't want to see those brown stranger's eyes staring up at me. So I prayed to the gods, take him away. Make him die. He got the pox. And I knew I was the worst woman who ever lived. A murderer. I'd condemned this poor, innocent child to a horrible death all because I was jealous of his mother. A woman he didn't even know. So I prayed to all seven gods, let the boy live. Let him live and I'll love him. I'll be a mother to him. I'll beg my husband to give him a true name, to call him Stark and be done with it, to make him one of us.", "Every time he would leave for the capital or fight in a campaign, I'd see him off. 'Wait for me, little Cat,' he'd say. 'Wait for me and I'll come back to you.' And I would sit at this window every day when the sun came up, waiting. I wonder how many times did Bran or Rickon stare across the moors of Winterfell waiting for me to return. I will never see them again.", "Your father didn't love me when we married. He hardly knew me or I him. Love didn't just happen to us. We built it slowly over the years, stone by stone, for you, for your brothers and sisters, for all of us. It's not as exciting as secret passion in the woods, but it is stronger. It lasts longer.", "Many years before that, one of the boys came down with the pox. Maester Luwin said if he made it through the night, he'd live. But it would be a very long night. So I sat with him all through the darkness. Listened to his ragged little breaths, his coughing, his whimpering.", "This man... Came into my house as a guest and there conspired to murder my son, a boy of 10. In the name of King Robert and the good Lords you serve, I call upon you to seize him and help me return him to Winterfell to await the king's justice.", 'Lord Walder! Lord Walder, enough! Let it end! Please! He is my son! My first son! Let him go and I swear that we will forget this! I swear it by the Old Gods and New! We will take no vengeance.', "Lysa's head would be on a spike right now if the wrong people had found that letter. Do you think she would risk her life, her son's life, if she wasn't certain her husband was murdered?", "And he lived. And I couldn't keep my promise. And everything that's happened since then all this horror that's come to my family it's all because I couldn't love a motherless child.", 'I vow that you shall always have a place in my home and at my table and that I shall ask no service of you that might bring you dishonor. I swear it by the Old Gods and the new.', "That's what men always say when honor calls. That's what you tell your families, tell yourselves. You do have a choice. And you've made it. I can't do it, Ned. I really can't.", "Lord Tyrion, you are accused of hiring a man to slay my son Bran in his bed, and of conspiring to murder my sister's husband; Lord Jon Arryn, the Hand of the King.", "Only long enough to tell Robb what I have seen. After that, I will leave for Winterfell. My two youngest need me. I've been away from them for far too long.", 'Listen to yourselves. If you were sons of mine, I would knock your heads together and lock you in a bedchamber until you remembered that you were brothers.', 'And you agreed to it. You gave him your word. Treat your oaths recklessly, and your people will do the same. If your father lived his life for one thing', 'They both have their health. Gods be good. [pause] The raven brought more news. The king rides for Winterfell. With the queen and all the rest of them.', "I don't want your gifts. A token of Tyrion Lannister's goodwill. He wants you to understand that this exchange of prisoners is offered in good faith.", "Bran and Rickon are captives in Winterfell. Sansa and Arya are captives in King's Landing. I have five children, and only one of them is free.", 'I was still Catelyn Tully the last time I stayed here. You, Ser... Is that the black bat of Harrenhal I see embroidered on your coat?', 'The red stallion was always a welcome sight at Riverrun. My father counts Jonas Bracken amongst his oldest and most loyal bannermen.', 'And when the fighting is done you will marry one of his daughters. Whichever you prefer. He has a number he thinks will be suitable.', "You want to leave Sansa in the Queen's hands? And Arya, I haven't heard a word about Arya. What are we fighting for if not for them?", 'Our two houses have always been close, which is why I am begging you to reconsider this battle. Negotiate a peace with your brother.', "17 years ago you rode off with Robert Baratheon. You came back a year later with another woman's son. And now you're leaving again.", 'You will strike me down? Have you forgotten me, ser? I am the widow of your liege, Lord Eddard Stark. I am the mother of your king!', "I don't know. But I would stake my life the Lannisters are involved. We already have reason to suspect their loyalty to the crown.", 'I understand your grief, my lord, better than most, I understand it. But in the name of my son, the King in the North, stand down.', "He spent half his life fighting Robert's wars. He owes him nothing. Your father and brother rode south once on a king's demand.", "He's gone, Brienne. You serve nothing and no one by following him into the earth. Renly's enemies are Robb's enemies as well.", "If reinforcements arrive from King's Landing, before we take the castle, we'll be caught between Tywin's army and the sea.", "I'm sure it's very grim, after Kings Landing. I remember how scared I was when Ned brought me up here for the first time.", "Killing Jaime Lannister would not buy life for your children, but returning him to King's Landing may buy life for mine.", "What I am about to tell you must remain between us. I don't think Bran fell from that tower. I think he was thrown.", "Someone tried to kill him twice. Why? Why murder an innocent child? Unless he saw something he wasn't meant to see.", "Petyr has promised to help us find the truth. He's like a little brother to me. He would never betray my trust.", "You have inherited your father's responsibilities. I'm afraid they come at a cost. You are promised to another.", "I've missed you, Uncle. Father missed you, too, from the day you left. Maybe he never said it in so many words-", 'There was a raven from Kings Landing. Jon Arryn is dead. A fever took him. I know he was like a father to you.', 'To ask you to open your gates, my lord, so my son and his bannermen may cross the Trident and be on their way.', 'The Freys have held the crossing for 600 years, and for 600 years they have never failed to exact their toll.', "I don't trust Lord Greyjoy because he is not trustworthy. Your father had to go to war to end his rebellion.", "She's fled the capital. She says Jon Arryn was murdered. By the Lannisters. She says the king is in danger.", "This was sent from the Eyrie. What's she doing at the Eyrie? She hasn't been back there since her wedding.", "It's nine years since I've set foot in the capital. And no one knew who I was the last time I came either.", "You can't help because a mother makes one for her children to protect them. Only a mother can make them.", "And all of them young and bold like your Knight of Flowers? It's a game to you, isn't it? I pity them.", "Keep shooting them down. We can't risk Lord Walder sending word of your movements to the Lannisters.", 'You will be taking on his son Olyvar as your personal squire. He expects a knighthood in good time.', 'You always look at your feet before you lie. Run and find your father. Tell him the king is close.', "They say a million rats live in the sewers of King's Landing. Shall we rally them to fight for us?", 'lf you could climb your own battlements, you would see that he has 20,000 men outside your walls.', "I do not sit on my son's war councils. And if I did, I would not share his strategies with you.", "Too large a party attracts unwanted attention. I don't want the Lannisters to know I'm coming.", 'My boy. They have your sisters. We have to get the girls back. And then we will kill them all.', "Oh, Ned forbade it. He said it wouldn't be right if he broke a man's jaw on our wedding night.", "On my honor as a Tully, on my honor as a Stark, let him go or I will cut your wife's throat!", "I'll say, ‘Listen, fat man, you are not taking my husband anywhere. He belongs to me now.'", 'And is Lady Whent a true and honest friend to my father... Lord Hoster Tully of Riverrun?', 'Of course they will. Jaime Lannister for two girls? Robb will never agree to those terms.', "I'm glad you were with him. I wish to the gods I had been. Did you make peace in the end?", 'Take me for a hostage but let Robb go! Robb, get up! Get up and walk out! Please! Please!', 'Less the 400 he will keep here to hold the crossing against any who would pursue you.', "I have prayed to the Seven for more than a month. Bran's life is in their hands now.", 'He complained about this marriage the entire ride from Riverrun and now look at him.', "I haven't seen Renly Baratheon since he was a boy. You have a hundred other lords -", "Because it won't last. Because they are the knights of summer and winter is coming.", 'But Stannis has a great army around him. His own guards are sworn to keep him safe.', "We need plenty of candles for Lord Tyrion's chamber. I'm told he reads all night.", 'l will kill you tonight, Ser. Pack your head in a box and send it to your sister.', "You're willing to risk our freedom and our lives for a chance at a prettier wife?", "That is what you want the world to believe, isn't it? That you don't fear death.", 'I trusted you. My husband trusted you. And you repaid our faith with treachery.', 'Because you are going to the deepest of the seven hells, if the gods are just.', 'And crippled mine. He will answer for his crimes, I promise you, but not here.', "Why not? Because she's not beautiful? Because she's not exotic and exciting?", 'You little worm! You take me for some back-alley Sally you can drag into a…', 'lt is not your sword l want. Give me my daughters back. Give me my husband.', "The Karstarks are Northmen. They won't forgive the killing of their lord.", 'My temper? Gods be good, you nearly killed poor Littlefinger yesterday.', 'lt is a great pleasure to see you again after so many years, my lord.', "It's time for me to go home. I haven't seen Bran or Rickon in months.", 'l have known Lord Walder since l was a girl. He would never harm me.', 'I mothered more than just rebels, a fact you seem to have forgotten.', 'All these years and I still feel like an outsider when I come here.', 'Your orders, which I just gave you, are to leave me alone with him.', "Instructed? I don't know who's providing your instructions, but...", 'Lord Walder has granted your crossing. His men are yours, as well.', 'Take him to the stockades. Bind him with every chain you can find!', "He'd have to leave home. He'd have to leave me. And so would you.", 'No. There must always be a Stark in Winterfell. I will go myself.', 'I know they did it, Ned. The Lannisters. In my bones, I know it.', 'And Arya will marry his son Waldron when they both come of age.', 'They murdered the last Hand. Now you want Ned to take the job.', 'After a fashion. I prayed for my son Bran to survive his fall.', "A person could almost be forgiven for forgetting we're at war.", 'My own mother died on the birthing bed when I was very young.', 'You are no knight. You have forsaken every vow you ever took.', 'Gods, but they grow fast. [Seeing BRAN on the wall] Brandon!', 'You will not support us then? Do I understand you correctly?', 'To me it just looked like... A shadow in the shape of a man.', "Renly's death was no fault of yours. You served him bravely.", 'Robb. How many men did we send in pursuit of the Kingslayer?', "Close the windows! I can't stand it! Please make them stop!", 'Shadowcats and hill tribes are the least of your concerns.', 'How much could he possibly drink? A man of his … stature.', 'It will be enough to know that justice was done, my lord.', 'By the mother. My son has no interest in the Iron Throne.', 'She is a truer knight than you will ever be, Kingslayer.', 'Will I be wearing manacles when I lay my father to rest?', "I hadn't seen him in years. I don't even know how many.", 'Lysa, you wrote me about the Lannisters, warning me t-', 'My son Bran. How did he come to fall from that tower?', "I'm as good as any of them. I should never have fled.", 'How dare you bring me here! Have you lost your mind?', 'This man is my prisoner. I will not have him harmed.', 'Is this your first time in the North, Your Grace?', 'Then he is the stupidest prince that ever lived.', "He only stops eating when it's time for a drink.", "How did you know I was coming to King's Landing?", "That's why there was no time. He is my prisoner.", "You've done so well. Your father would be proud.", 'Do you hear them out there? They want your head.', "He's getting a wedding. It was a king he wanted.", "King Renly. There's a king in every corner now.", 'I wish that you were free to follow your heart.', "We've got to leave. They'll hang you for this.", 'When the time comes, I will not hold you back.', 'Show them how it feels to lose what they love.', 'My son is fighting a war, not playing at one.', 'Maegyr? Forgive me, I do not know this name.', 'How many times have I told you? No climbing.', "Hush now. Your father hasn't even said yes.", "I don't trust a raven to carry these words.", 'I had not thought to be here, Lord Stannis.', 'I want you to promise me. No more climbing.', 'Lord Frey will take this delay as a slight.', "I won't forget this. You're a true friend.", 'Have you heard anything from Theon at all?', 'Ned. Ten is too young to see such things.', "Where's Arya? Sansa, where's your sister?", 'My sister will decide what he looks like.', 'If you fear for the safety of your son...', "You don't want Balon Greyjoy for an ally.", "You don't want Balon Greyjoy for an ally.", 'Lord of Winterfell and King in the North.', 'Promise me! Promise me, Bran! Promise me!', 'The late Lord Frey" my father calls him.', 'Lord Karstark, this man is our prisoner.', 'Walder Frey is a dangerous man to cross.', 'You fought bravely today, Lady Brienne.', "We should reach my son's camp tomorrow.", 'You strangled his son with your chains.', "You're afraid of her. And she knows it.", 'Ned! [poking her head out of a window]', 'Wise men do not make demands of kings.', 'Spare his life. Keep him as a hostage.', 'And that is why we have to stop them.', "l'm sure she will give you many sons.", "Robb. Robb! You've ruined your sword.", 'You think I keep secrets from my son?', "You can't avenge him if you're dead.", 'Take him away and put him in irons.', "And in return for my son's loyalty?", 'I know that seems important to you.', 'Promise me. Promise me! Promise me!', "What if he's wrong? Bran needs me.", "I would. We've done nothing wrong.", 'I told you, never trust a Greyjoy!', "Ser Jeremy. My father's bannerman.", 'I would have dressed, your Grace.', 'Do you know whose dagger this is?', 'We have proof. We have the blade.', 'l want to see him. Now! Leave us.', 'Why in the name of all the Gods -', 'Have you lost your mind? Get out!', 'Yes, you look positively forlorn.', 'Lord Walder is prickly by nature.', "I don't care about appointments!", 'What comes after is even harder.', 'I grieve for your sons, my lord.', 'I hope she makes you very happy.', 'I wonder if the old gods agree.', 'I am not a murderer, Lannister.', 'There was no time to send word.', 'ls there somewhere we can talk?', 'You swore an oath to my father.', 'How many times have I told you', 'How did you know I was coming?', 'Have you received any demands?', 'I wish I could see the girls.', "l'm sure there were reasons –", 'And the wording of this oath?', 'And you mean to do it anyway?', "Don't you drink, Lord Bolton?", 'Let me go and talk to Theon.', 'I need to be alone with him.', 'You are a man without honor.', 'You can always say no, Ned.', 'I have to take care of him.', 'I will ride at first light.', 'I did... often and loudly.', "I won't let him take you.", 'He is quite ill, my lord.', 'One was – Do you consent?', 'Not if you want to cross.', 'You mean to kill Stannis.', 'A debt that must be paid.', 'I want you to promise me', 'And why would I do that?', 'Because of men like you.', 'We share a common enemy.', "No, wait, it wasn't her!", 'Are you sure about this?', 'I am so sorry, my love.', 'Talk to Poole about it.', 'Why are you telling me?', 'He is not trustworthy!', 'In any case, candles.', 'Yes, and that is why-', 'I want you to leave.', 'Knight of House Frey', 'To whom do I speak?', 'That is what I ask.', 'You have Arya, too?', 'We have enough men?', 'Just for a moment.', 'I beg your pardon?', 'You are most kind.', "l agree. l'll go.", 'You betrayed Ned.', 'What do you want?', "D'you know what?", 'I hear the same.', 'Remove his hood.', 'The dagger found', 'Do you have to?', 'I am grateful..', "You've said it.", 'Five years ago.', 'Lady Talisa...?']

Name: ramsay bolton
Sentence: ["Thank you for returning Lady Bolton safely. Now, dismount and kneel before me, surrender your army and proclaim me the true Lord of Winterfell and Warden of the North. I will pardon you for deserting the Night's Watch. I will pardon these treasonous lords for betraying my house. Come, bastard, you don't have the men, you don't have the horses, and you don't have Winterfell. Why lead those pour souls into slaughter? There's no need for a battle. Get off your hose and kneel. I'm a man of mercy.", "Our scouts report that Stannis Baratheon rides for Winterfell. He's a respected commander. His troops are loyal and battle tested. He's hired thousands of foreign sell swords to bolster his army. But this storm was a stroke of luck for us northerners. Our people are used to fighting in frost. His army's out there now, suffering in the snow. One day I'll be Lord of Winterfell, and Warden of the North. You'll be my Lady and Wardeness.", "There, over and done with. Doesn't everyone feel better? I do. That was getting very tense. Whew. . You know what, my lady? What with him having murdered your brothers and the rest of your family gone Reek here is the nearest thing to living kin that you have left. Reek. You will give away the bride. Someone has to. What better person? Good? Good?", "I heard you two had reunited. A fitting place for it. . I like to imagine that the last time you spoke was in this very room. Are you still angry with him after he - what he did? Don't worry. The North remembers. I punished him for it. He's not ironborn anymore. Not Theon Greyjoy anymore. He's a new man. A new person, anyway. Aren't you, Reek?", "You've been wondering why you're here. Haven't you? Where you are. Who I am. Why I'm doing this to you. So guess. If you guess right, I'll tell you. By the old gods and the new, I swear it. You win the game if you can figure out who I am and why I'm torturing you and I win the game if you beg me to cut off your finger.", "She's a fine woman, your sister. I look forward to having her back in my bed. And you're all fine-looking men. My dogs are desperate to meet you. I haven't fed them for seven days. They're ravenous. I wonder which parts they'll try first. Your eyes? Your balls? We'll find out soon enough. In the morning, then, bastard.", "You're the kennel master's daughter. Who are you going to marry, the stable keeper's son? . You're mine. You're not going anywhere. Unless I have to listen to more of your jealousy. Jealousy bores me. You remember what happens to people who bore me. You're not going to bore me, are you, Myranda?", "I keep hearing stories about you, bastard. The way people in the North talk about you, you're the greatest swordsman who ever walked. Maybe you are that good. Maybe not. I don't know if I'd beat you. But I know that my army will beat yours. I have 6,000 men. You have, what, half that? Not even?", "Tough old bird. Everyone talks when I start beating them. But this one. Her heart gave out before I got to her face. We do breed them tough in the North. Bring my wife back to her chamber. It's far too cold out here for a lady. You should hold on to your candles. The nights are so long now.", "Bracken. Mmm, strong. As long as they're in the see. But when you take them out of the water, no bones. They collapse under their proud weight and slum into a heap of nothing. You'd think they'd know that. Unfortunately they're not very bright. What do you tell them?", "But you've already told me everything. Remember? Your daddy was mean to you. The Starks didn't appreciate you. One good bit, though. The Stark boys, they're still alive. Wouldn't that be a hunt to remember? You failed, but I'm a better hunter than you.", 'Unimportant. A cripple, a young boy. None of the northern lords have seen them. Dead most likely. Most of the Ironborn have fled the North. Now more will follow, thanks to you. Tell me what you see.', "My lady, we are all a family, we northerners. Our blood ties go back thousands of years. So I'd like to drink to our wedding. May our happiness spread from Moat Cailin to the Last Hearth.", "We don't need every house in the North. The Umbers, the Manderlys, and the Karstarks command more soldiers than all the other houses combined With their support, none could challenge us", "Castle Black isn't defended on the southern side And the few men left are barely men at all. Farm boys and thieves With a small force we could storm the castle, kill Jon Snow --", "Do you like games, little man? Let's play a game. Run to your brother. The sooner you make it to him, the sooner you get to see him. That's it. That's the game. Easy. Ready? Go.", "Good. Because I need you to do something for me. Something very important. There's a castle, you see. Some bad men hold this castle. I need your help to take this castle back.", "Lying to your husband on his wedding night, that would be a very bad way to start a marriage. We are man and wife now, we should be honest with each other, don't you think?", "Ah. Sansa. Hello, Sansa. Is this where I'll be staying now? No. Our time together is about to come to an end. That's all right. You can't kill me. I'm part of you now.", "You didn't really think I'd let them go did you? It's falling out of fashion. Fileting. Sad, but true. Traditions are important. Where are we without our history, eh?", "Oh, that's right, Reek. Robb Stark is dead. Sorry. I know he was like a brother to you. But my father put a knife through his heart. How do you feel about that?", "Stannis isn't from the North. You are, father. I think you're missing an opportunity to show the people of the North how House Bolton treats southern invaders.", 'Pledge your banners to House Bolton Swear loyalty to me as Warden of the North and we will fight together to destroy the bastard and all his wildling friends', "Because Reek has something to say to you. Don't you, Reek? . An apology. Apologize to Lady Sansa for what you did. Apologize for murdering her two brothers.", 'That we not sit and wait to let Stannis to decide what type of fight this is going to be. That we hit first, and hit hard, and leave a feast for the crows.', 'peels the skin of the apple and puts it on the table with the knife. OSHA looks at the knife. RAMSAY waves for OSHA to come to him. She walks towards him.', "When my father told me we were marrying I half expected a fat, bearded beast. Do you know how pleased I was when I saw you? You've made me very happy.", "And I meant it. When I was a bastard named Snow. But I'm a Bolton now. What I want is no longer the primary consideration. I'm furthering a dynasty.", "Bastards can rise high in the world. Like your half-brother Jon Snow. Born The Bastard of Winterfell, now the Lord Commander of the Night's Watch.", "People talk about phantom limbs. An amputee might have an itch where his foot used to be. So I've always wondered do eunuchs have a phantom cock?", 'The Starks have always ruled the North. If Bran and Rickon are alive, the country will rally to their side now that Robb Stark is gone.', "Lord Cerwyn refused to pay. Said the Warden of the North would always be a Stark, and he'd be damned if he kissed a traitor's boot.", 'peels an apple with a knife. The door opens. A guard ushers OSHA into the room. RAMSAY nods. The guard leaves and closes the door.', "The kennelmaster's daughter She smelled of dog I wasn't much older, but everybody was already afraid of me You certainly were", "Myranda wasn't, though What could I do to her that those hounds couldn't? She was fearless There was nothing she wouldn't do.", "Yes, Reek. Those creatures who came in the night, they wanted to take you away. And you didn't let them. You remained loyal.", "You think she's pretty, too. I'm looking forward to our wedding night. But don't worry, I'll have plenty of time for you.", "You don't look like a Theon Greyjoy anymore. That's a name for a lord. But you're not a lord, are you? You're just meat.", "That's right. Until you're rotting in the ground. Remember what you are and what you're not. Bring me Lord Kenning.", "You didn't know? Yes, he's done very well for himself. Ah. I near forgot why I asked you to join me. Come, my lady.", 'You honor me. I swear I will uphold your name and your tradition. I will be worthy of you, Father, I promise.', "Be that as it may, Rickon's not yours to sell anymore. He's mine. So what use could I possibly have for you?", "He's good. Very good. Tell me, will you let your little brother die because you're too proud to surrender?", 'Oh, no no no. You stay here Reek. You watch. Do I need to ask a second time? I hate asking a second time.', "Now how about your little finger? You don't use that for much, do you? No? Good. Let's start with that.", 'Maester Wolkan, send ravens to all the Northern houses Roose Bolton is dead Poisoned by our enemies', "Look at her, Reek. An apology doesn't mean anything if you're not looking the person in the eye.", 'He told me everything. All about the Stark boys. Who helped them escape, and how she did it.', "Your famous cock must be very precious to you. Would you say it's your most precious part?", "We've been flaying our enemies for a thousand years.
