The flayed man is on our banners.", 'When my father became Warden of the North, your house refused to pledge their banners', 'Your pain will be paid for a thousand times over. I wish you could be here to watch.', "Sorry. I shouldn't make jokes. My mother taught me not to throw stones at cripples.", "We have Winterfell. They don't have the men for a siege. All we have to do is wait.", "My position is quite clear. I'm your son until a better alternative comes along.", 'Karhold? How did you know that? Did you see any banners flying when we came in?', "Reek, how could you let me stand before my father unshaven? It's disrespectful.", "You've got bigger balls than he ever did. But with those big balls of yours...", "I have a team of men after them with some of my best hounds They won't get far", 'Everyone knows you love girls. I bet you always thought they loved you back.', 'Ramsay of House Bolton. Heir to the Dreadfort and Winterfell. Who gives her?', "Of course, you forgot to ask one question. You forgot to ask if I'm a liar.", "I'm going to marry her. That will involve looking at her from time to time.", 'The Starks have been gone for a long time, but you kept protecting Rickon.', "You say please again and you'll wish you hadn't. You first. Where are we?", 'I flayed him living, along with his wife and brother. Made his son watch.', "If you think this has a happy ending, you haven't been paying attention.", "You brought her down. That's what matters. A fine shot. Wasn't it, Reek?", "This isn't happening to you for a reason. Well, one reason- I enjoy it.", "You've known Sansa since she was a girl. Now watch her become a woman.", "Yes, father. And thank you, Lord Baelish. I'm forever in your debt. .", 'Are you sure? You do look very much like a lord. Formidable, proud.', "Good. I want you to be happy. My father said you're still a virgin.", "This is mercy. I'm not killing you. Just making a few alterations.", 'I had to work hard to get him talking. But he talked. They all do.', "You can't hold the North if you let these lesser lords insult us.", "Ride east. Follow the rising sun. Your sister's waiting for you.", 'Wa-? Wa-? Water? You want some water. I wish I had some for you.', 'Congratulations, Father I look forward to meeting my new brother', "Well? Should we see this cock everyone's always going on about?", 'We have to reward the hounds, love. They did all the hard work.', "Even if he doesn't, he's half Stark himself. Could be a threat.", "I need you to play a role. To pretend to be someone you're not.", 'Next time you think about naked girls, would you feel an itch?', "You reek. Reek! That's a good name for you. What's your name?", 'You can see that your presence has become a bit of a problem.', "Yes, yes, Reek. It's a bath. For you. Remove those rags. Now.", "I've reconsidered. I think that sounds like a wonderful idea.", "So let's play a game. Which body part do you need the least?", 'You smell particularly ripe this evening. Pour me some wine.', "What? No. Pork sausage. You think I'm some sort of savage?", 'If you make it out of the woods, you win! Run, Tansy, run!', "You mustn't keep secrets from me, Reek. Get on your knees.", "Well, the girls weren't lying. You had a good-sized cock.", 'Theon was our enemy. But Reek, Reek will never betray us.', 'I already asked. Lord Greyjoy refused. Savages have no-', 'Your Northern friend. Reek told me you wanted to leave.', "We know where she's going Her brother's at Castle Black", 'I trained him. He was a slow learner, but he learned.', 'Thank you for saying that It means a great deal to me', 'Good girls. Down, girls. Down. Well done. You, too.', 'Why would I? She had me, she died. And here we are.', 'Why? Why are you still a virgin? Afraid of dwarves?', 'Why? Winterfell is your home and I am your husband.', 'No, you have to run, remember? Those are the rules.', 'You made me acting Lord of the Dreadfort. I acted.', 'Reek, tell Father where are Bran and Rickon Stark?', 'She really is lovely. I hope I can make her happy.', "Why would I trust a man who won't honor tradition?", "I'll come for you tonight when the castle sleeps.", "You're a long way from home and winter is coming.", "If I'm not a Bolton, Father, what does it matter?", "I haven't been a lord very long. I was a bastard.", "They've cleaned you up nicely. You know who I am?", 'Traditionally a bannerman kneels before his lord', "You're a much better talker than Theon Greyjoy.", 'But my father taught me to aim for their head.', "You're right. Very strange. More wine, please.", "That she's pregnant. I mean how can you tell?", "I've been naturalized by a royal decree of--", 'Why have you come to Winterfell, Lord Umber?', "Then it appears we're at a bit of an impasse", "You suggested one on one combat, didn't you?", "If you can't ride, we don't stand a chance.", "Oh, sweet. Don't cry. It will be over soon.", 'I hear you took a hand from the Kingslayer.', "My beloved wife. I've missed you terribly.", "With the hounds. I'll have a look at him.", "I don't need an army. I need 20 good men.", 'Peeled a few bits. Removed a few others.', "Let's head back. My wife must be lonely.", "He's dead. Strangled by the Kingslayer.", "You're no good to me dead. We need you.", 'The britches, too, Reek. Take them off.', 'Our pact with the Lannisters protects -', 'This is good meat Feed it to the hounds', 'Do I look like a fucking Umber to you?', "I'm sorry. I'm sorry. Terrible timing.", 'And crisped them so no one would know.', 'This is turning into a lovely evening.', "I'll never hurt her. You have my word.", 'The Umbers are a famously loyal house', 'My father was poisoned by our enemies', 'Very good, Lord Theon. And who am I?', 'Reek, did you murder the Stark boys?', "Yes. A lord. You've seen my banners?", 'I believe we will. To our new home.', "Come, Reek, I'll be needing a bath.", 'The new Lord Cerwyn paid his taxes.', "It's an honor to meet you, my Lady.", 'Of course, but how did you find it?', 'She was 11 the first time I saw her', 'Are you sure you know what that is?', "We're not in the Iron Islands. Go.", 'But you made Myranda feel jealous.', "How do I know that's Rickon Stark?", 'Sit. Down! Down! Down! Down! Down!', 'I have a treat for you. A reward.', 'Do you have something to tell me?', 'Go on, Reek. A nice close shave.', 'Good. Now take off your clothes.', 'Send for Lady Walda and the baby', 'My beloved father, the Warden --', "So now you've come seeking help?", 'A girl, I hope I prefer redheads', 'Everything I told you is a lie.', "Of course I do. I'm not blind.", "Then I'll have a baby brother.", 'Moat Cailin is yours, Father.', "I'm Lord Bolton's eldest son.", 'My hounds will never harm me.', 'And I accept your surrender.', 'I prefer being an only child', "Looks like we're done here.", 'Of course Follow me, Mother', 'Does that worry you at all?', 'Please is not a body part.', 'But I was getting jealous.', 'Rip her! Rip her! Rip her!', "That's his new name, Reek.", 'Reek? I told you to watch.', 'Now, if you want to save —', 'Sorry. Were you sleeping?', 'So how did you manage it?', 'And what are you really?', 'Come back here. Myranda.', 'Are you pleased my lady?', 'Welcome home, Lord Stark', "You're not lying to me?", 'They obviously had help', 'You served the Starks?', 'Father. Welcome home.', 'how fast can you run?', 'Do you love me, Reek?', 'Moors, fields, hills.', 'Tell me what you see.', 'Getting her pregnant.', "You're a good talker.", "They're loyal beasts.", 'Your sister sent me.', 'Tansy! Tansy! Tansy!', 'Tansy, Tansy, Tansy!', 'How can you be sure?', 'What is your name?!', 'A pleasure, Mother.', 'Give him the razor.', 'Not so pretty now.', 'Give me your hand.', "And if it's a boy?", 'My beautiful wife.', "Their army's gone.", "What's your name?", 'Sorry about what?', "I'm afraid I am.", 'A little louder.', 'So was I, Father', 'I am Lord Bolton', 'I like them wild', 'Terrible guess.', 'Buried, burned?', 'Come, my lord.', 'Stinking meat.', 'There you are.', 'Theon Greyjoy.', 'I forgive you.', 'How did he die', 'May I hold him', 'Little brother', "It's time, go.", "You're right.", 'Yes. You win.', 'Tansy! Tansy!', "You're sure?", 'Sorry, what?', 'Ramsay Snow.', 'She saw you?', 'Wonderful. .', 'I like that.', 'Keep quiet.']

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: ["Some women like tall men. Some like short men. Some like hairy men. Some like bald men. Gentle men, rough men, ugly men, pretty men, pretty girls. Most women don't know what they like until they've tried it. And, sadly, so many of us get to try so little before we're old and gray. Tyrion may surprise you. From what I've heard, he's quite experienced.", "Ah, yes, I visited their hovels and I fed them soup and I made sure I was seen doing it. I never gave them what they really needed, though. I've had lots of time to think about how good I was at seeming good. All those stories I told myself about who I was and why I did the things I did. There were so many lies in those stories.", "Whenever I wanted to make a child with him, he-he had so many excuses, so many late-night war councils. He never wanted to try. Except one evening, after he'd had far too much wine to drink, he suggested something-something that sounded very painful and couldn't possibly result in children. Maybe the fault was with me.", "Hunger turns men into beasts. I'm glad House Tyrell has been able to help in this regard. They tell me 100 wagons arrive daily now from the Reach. Wheat, barley, apples. We've had a blessed harvest. And, of course, it's our duty to assist the capital in time of need.", "I love my brother. I will always love my brother. His soul is pure and perfect. His sins don't erase that purity, they only obscure it. He just needs to atone for them. We all do. Sooner or later, one way or another. The gods have a plan for us all.", 'We are so fortunate to enjoy this marvelous food and drink. Not all among us are so lucky. To thank the gods for bringing the recent war to a just end, King Joffrey has decreed that the leftovers from our feast be given to the poorest in his city.', "Forget about the bloody gods and listen to what I'm telling you. Cersei understands the consequences of her absence and she is absent anyway, which means she does not intend to suffer those consequences. The trial can wait. We all need to leave.", "Your enemies aren't happy about us. They want to tear us apart. And the best way to stop them is to put your baby in my belly. We can try again later. You decide how you want to do it, with me, with me and Loras, however else you like.", "I adore how she has always been so generous with me, so kind. And the horror she's had to injure. . Losing her husband, her eldest child and her father. It's no wonder she's so protective of you. She'll never let you out of her sight.", "That is sad. Though perhaps it's for the best. The whole notion of marriage seems to confuse you, so allow me to explain. My husband is my king, and my king is my husband. Here is your tent, Lord Baelish. Good night.", "Oh. After all that's happened... It sounds strange, I know, but I am... I haven't even given any thought to it, what comes next. It would be a great honor, of course. But I will have to speak to my father about it.", "It would be my pleasure. It took me weeks to learn my way around the camp. Twice I walked in on officers in stages of undress. And the moment I learn which tent is mine, we're on the move again.", "My son will be king Sons learn from their mothers. I plan to teach mine a great deal. And your son, if I'm not mistaken, your son might be the Lord of Casterly Rock and the North someday. What?", "Did you know that people in arranged marriages often never meet until their wedding day? Before we decide to spend our lives together, we ought to get to know one another. Don't you think?", "Lies come easily to you. Everyone knows that. But innocence, decency, concern? You're not very good at those, I'm afraid. Perhaps that's why your son was so eager to cast you aside for me.", 'With all my heart, Your Grace. I have come to love you from afar. Tales of your courage and wisdom have never been far from my ears. And those tales have taken root deep inside of me.', 'One of my husbands preferred the company of men and was stabbed through the heart. Another was happiest torturing animals and was poisoned at our wedding feast... I must be cursed.', "Living in a tower so high, it touches the clouds. Of course my grandmother couldn't wait to go home. The capital is not for everyone, I suppose. Does your mother like it here?", "They want me to help you. They want me told help tear you down. That's why he's letting me see you, I know it is. And if either of us give in to what they want, then they win.", "I remember the first time I saw you in the throne room. I'd never seen anyone who looked so unhappy. I want very much for you to be happy, Sansa, and so does my grandmother.", "He is. There's something about him. His way of looking at the world. It's not an easy thing admitting to yourself what you really are. It's taken me a while. He's helped me.", "You should be proud, too. Under King Joffrey's leadership, your fathers saved the city. They saved us all. From now on, we're going to take care of you. All of you.", "Loras's only hope is to confess his crimes and repent. If he does, the Faith will allow him to return to Highgarden. He'll have to renounce his name and title...", "You're the King of the Andals, the Lord of the Seven Kingdoms, the Protector of the Realm. And you let a band of fanatics imprison your brother by law.", 'And one day you walked through a graveyard and realized it was all for nothing and set out on the path to righteousness Book of the Stranger, verse 25', 'I said, "Darling, surely 4 times is enough, are you trying to set a new record?" . And he said, "Well, what is the record? I\'m sure we can break it."', "Smoothing what was jagged, so does a woman's love calm a man's brute nature. A wife salves her husbando s wounds, a mother sings her son to sleep.”", "Oh, forgive me, I haven't been at Court for long, I get so confused. What's the proper way to address you now? Queen Mother or Dowager Queen?", "No. I do beg your pardon. The subtleties of politics are often lost on me. Renly I don't believe he was interested in the company of women.", "No, I'm fine. I just want you all to myself. I want to know everything there is to know about King Tommen First of His Name.", "It can be our secret. Hmm? If we're going to be man and wife, we'll have a few secrets from her, I hope. So, Your Grace...", "When we marry, I become yours. Forever. It's getting late. I should go. May I come and visit you again? All right, then.", "Loras, isn't the queen's gown magnificent? The fabric, the embroidery, the metalwork. I've never seen anything like it.", 'The lowest among us are no different from the highest if you give them a chance and approach them with an open heart.', 'For year I pretended to love the poor, the afflicted. I had pity for them, but I never loved them. They disgusted me.', "Wouldn't that be glorious? . Shouldn't we rest a little while? Just to catch our breath, there's no rush, is there?", "I am touched by your concern, Your Grace. Luckily for us Tyrells, our blood runs quite warm. Doesn't it, Loras?", "Can we bring you anything to eat or drink? I wish we had some wine for you. It's a bit early in the day for us.", 'Perhaps I should just let Joffrey choose it for me. End up with a string of dead sparrow heads around my neck.', 'And what do knights swear to do? Protect the weak and uphold the good. Your father did that. Be proud of him.', 'You would have been happy at Highgarden. But women in our position must make the best of our circumstances.', 'Your Grace." Calling yourself king doesn\'t make you one. And if Renly wasn\'t a king, I wasn\'t a queen.', 'Ecstatic. I really am. Exhausted, to be honest, but what can I expect, he is half lion, half stag. .', "In any event, judging from the King's enthusiasm, the Queen Mother will be a Queen Grandmother soon.", "There's no need for us to play games. Save your lies for court. You're going to need a lot of them.", "He could get you started. I know he wouldn't mind. Or I can turn over and you can pretend I'm him.", 'Would you take me hunting sometime? Forgive me, Your Grace. I know a hunt is no place for a woman.', 'I imagine it must be so exciting to squeeze your finger here and watch something die over there.', "enters her brother's cell. The door closes and locks behind her. Loras is lying on the floor.", 'I am not tutored in warfare, but basic arithmetic favors the side with the greater numbers.', 'Bad men wanted to come into this city and do terrible things, but your father stopped them.', 'Come. Lady Sansa, it is my honor to present my grandmother the Lady Olenna of House Tyrell.', 'Come to me for whatever you need to feed them, clothe them, or house them. Directly to me.', "I understand. But it's not your fault, you know that, don't you? You mustn't feel guilty.", "What is it, then? He's rather good-looking even with the scar. Especially with the scar.", "I'll plant the seed as soon as Joffrey and I are married. It should grow quickly.", 'Clawing at his own throat, looking to his mother to make stop... it was horrible.', "It would be some consolation, wouldn't it? For all the horror that put him there.", "You can't do this, I am the queen! Tommen, Tommen! I am your queen, how dare you!", "The gods could have punished you and Father, but they didn't. They showed mercy.", "We'll be together again soon and everything will be better than it was before.", "It's so wonderful to have her watching over you. A lioness guiding her cub. .", "I absolutely adore him. You raised a gallant young man. I'm forever grateful.", 'Renly was brave and gentle, Grandmother. Father liked him and so did Loras.', "The wedding is in a fortnight, Grandmother. You can't say no to everything.", 'I am his/hers, and she/he is mine. From this day, until the end of my days.', "Can you imagine the celebrations? They'll ring the bells all day and night.", "She's jealous you're not hers anymore. Arresting my brother is her revenge.", 'Cersei is not here. Tommen is not here. Why do you think they are not here?', 'You are strong. You are the future of our house, the future of our family.', "You think so? I can't decide how I like it better. This way, or this way.", "It's all right. It really is. It's such a relief to let go of those lies.", "It can be. We're very complicated, you know. Pleasing us takes practice.", 'We both know who did. . You told me she was returning to Casterly Rock.', "I can't believe you're going. Leaving me alone here with these people.", 'Whenever you look at this knight, I want you to remember your father.', 'Oh, my sweet, sweet King. . Do you have any affection for me at all?', 'The climate is a bit more forgiving back in Highgarden, Your Grace.', "That's very thoughtful, Your Grace. I have everything I could want.", "I can't bear to think of my brother locked away in some grimy cell.", "You are very welcome here, Lady Stark. I'm so sorry for your loss.", 'Yes. I paid a visit to an orphanage the High Septon told me about.', 'The duty of any wife to any husband-to provide him with children.', 'No. Have they even agreed to the match? No one tells me anything.', "No, no, no. You're very sweet. The sweetest king who ever lived.", "I'm not a visitor, Your Grace. Word has itI'm to be your bride.", 'The Book of the Mother, Your Holiness. Chapter three, verse 12.', "You can't avenge him from the grave. Bring the horses. Please.", "Shh. Have you -- have you told them that? That you don't care?", "That's a relief. Because you know what happens when we marry?", 'A welcome one. A military encampment is no place for a lady.', "That's not true, my love. Brienne had nothing to do with it.", "I won't even know what to call you. Sister? Or Mother? Hmm.", "You are. And the king. . But you'll always be her baby-boy.", 'I am the queen. It is my duty to serve my husband the king.', "My love, come back to me. It's time for my father's toast.", "I'm afraid my brother is keeping the king waiting, Olyvar.", "Yes, I have. He's not quite what we thought he was, is he?", 'Your Grace, I tried to do my duty as a wife, that is all.', 'We may be faced with an alarming number of weddings soon.', 'But you should leave, Grandmother. Your place is at home.', "I'm to be his wife. I only want to know what that means.", "It's just...the desires that once drove me no longer do.", 'You marched against the High Sparrow, against the Faith.', 'Now, now, my love. My brother fought valiantly for you.', "In any event… you shouldn't keep your intended waiting.", 'As is your right. You must do whatever you need to do.', 'And only one to let you go. Because it will please me.', 'Why? I-I would not speak ill of the dead, Your Grace.', "We're going to be sisters soon. We should be friends.", 'Perhaps you might consider being a bit more discreet?', 'Forgive me. Sometimes the truth path is hard to find.', 'Septa Unella has been my true friend and counselor.', "It's such a relief to hear you say so, Your Grace.", 'You think I want that woman married to my brother?', 'Let me through. Let me through. Get out of my way.', "The place of a Kingsguard is by the king's side.", "That's very cruel. You don't strike me as cruel.", "I think we're going to be very happy, you and I.", 'Have you spoken to him at all, the High Sparrow?', "She's terrified, Grandmother. Just look at her.", "Far from the worst Lannister, wouldn't you say?", 'Of course. They play it so often here at court.', 'Go home. Find comfort in prayer and good works.', "It's beautiful. Will you show me how it works?", "I don't know, Your Grace Do you think I could?", 'I am the queen and I demand to see my brother', "My love, why don't we make the announcement?", 'Do you want my brother to come in and help?', "I'd go to my brother, my husband, my family", 'You seem quite interested in our marriage.', "A better dancer than a singer, I'm afraid.", 'He sits the throne like he was born to it.', 'I need to be with my family, Your Grace. .', 'Grandmother! What will Sansa think of us?', 'You mutilated him. You gave me your word.', 'Whatever you need to do. You are a king.', 'Please How is he? At least tell me that', "If it's the pain you're worried about-", 'My brother, can you tell me how he is?', 'Listen to me. You need to stay strong.', 'Yes, sweet girl. My mother taught me.', 'Lady Brienne. So good of you to come.', 'Thank you. I hope we see more of you.', 'My father would never let me before-', 'Seven blessings to you, Grandmother.', 'I have to send word to Grandmother.', 'helps LORAS to his knees. He cries.', "It's more your color. You take it.", "Hello. Aren't you a proper fellow?", 'Everyone knew about him and Renly.', 'As is your right. You are a king.', 'You wanted to see me, Your Grace?', 'Septa Unella reads it to me At me', 'Brienne of Tarth murdered Renly.', "It's the word that came to mind.", 'But I would have been the queen.', 'and live his life as a penitent.', "You've never married, have you?", 'Was your father a soldier, too?', 'Has Lord Tyrion mistreated you?', "We're late for dinner as it is.", "You think I'm mad. I sound mad.", 'The Mother watches over us all.', 'Wonderful. Wonderful. My hero.', "But he was the king's brother.", "I don't want to see you again.", 'And where is the queen mother?', 'You look radiant, Your Grace.', "Not as well as you, I'm sure.", "You don't know, Grandmother.", 'Remember, our little secret.', 'Why is my brother in a cell?', 'No. I want to be the queen.', 'Would you like to watch me?', 'Come on. Come walk with me.', "You don't want him, though.", 'He was my husband. My king.', 'We need to go home. Loras.', 'Get out you hateful bitch!', "I'd like to see my brother", "There's no time for this.", 'Well, he could have done.', "What? I don't understand.", 'I have nothing to confess', 'Faith is the way, Father.', 'We all need to leave now!', 'Has he been kind to you?', 'Joffrey is our king now.', "There's something wrong.", 'Thank you, Your Grace.', "And you've given none.", 'Cersei is behind this.', 'He was very handsome.', 'Your Grace, I feel...', "You can't stay here.", 'No. You were lovely.', 'So strange… Husband.', 'You call me forward?', 'I know you did this.', 'Grandmother, please.', 'Loras. Stay with me.', "You're such a dear.", 'You are very sweet.', 'So what did you do?', 'He can begin again.', 'Loras! Highgarden!', 'So am I the queen?', 'Long may he reign.', 'Mother! . Welcome.', 'Quality takes time', 'You are the king.', 'What was it like?', "What's your name?", 'And your mother?', "I'm very hungry.", 'Yes, I swear it.', 'I love to sail.', 'Do you promise?', "You don't know?", 'I am the queen.', 'Tommen! Tommen!', 'No, Your Grace.', 'My grandmother?', 'Let us through!', 'I have others.', 'May I? Please.', 'Look, the pie.', 'Very handsome.', "No, he wasn't.", 'Are you? When?', 'They are lies.', 'None of us are', 'As a free man.', 'Shall we pray?', 'Here, let me.', 'Lord Baelish.', "He's choking!", 'Loras. Loras.']

Name: joffrey lannister
Sentence: ["You're my lady. One day we'll be married in the throne room. Lords and ladies from all over the Seven Kingdoms will come, from the last hearth in the North, to the salt shore of the south. And you will be queen over all of them. I'll never disrespect you again. I'll never be cruel to you again. Do you understand me? You're my lady now, from this day, until my last day.", "My mother wishes me to let Lord Eddard join The Night's Watch. Stripped of all titles and powers, he would serve the realm in permanent exile. And My Lady Sansa has begged mercy for her father. But they have the soft hearts of women. So long as I am your King, treason shall never go unpunished. Ser Ilyn, bring me his head!", "Well fought. Well fought. Here you are. Champion's purse. Though you're not the champion yet, are you? A true champion defeats all the challengers. Surely there are others out there who still dare to challenge my reign. Uncle. How about you? I'm sure they have a spare costume.", "He speaks damn well with his sword though. Ser Ilyn Payne, the King's justice. The royal executioner. What is it, sweet lady? Does the hound frighten you? Away with you, dog. You're scaring my lady. I don't like to see you upset. The sun is finally shining. Come walk with me.", 'I, Joffrey of the House Baratheon, first of my name, the rightful King of the Andals and the First Men, Lord of the Seven Kingdoms and Protector of the Realm, do hereby proclaim my grandfather, Tywin Lannister, the savior of the city and the Hand of the King.', 'For your good service and ingenuity in uniting the Houses of Lannister and Tyrell, I declare that you shall be granted the castle of Harrenhal with all its attendant lands and incomes to be held by your sons and grandsons from this day until the end of time.', "Why should every lord command his own men? It's primitive, no better than the hill tribes. We should have a standing army of men loyal to the Crown, trained by experienced soldiers... Instead of a mob of peasants who've never held pikes in their lives.", "Everyone, silence! Clear the floor. There's been too much amusement here today. A royal wedding is not an amusement. A royal wedding is history. The time has come for all of us to contemplate our history. My lords... my ladies...", "Where's your respect for tradition, Uncle? Come, everyone. Pick her up and carry her to her wedding bed. Get rid of her gown. She won't be needing it any longer. Ladies, attend to my uncle. He's not heavy.", "She's an ideal match. With the Tyrells beside us, we'll crush the Northerners. Hang their lords, burn their strongholds, sow their fields with salt, and no one will think of rebelling for another century.", 'I, too, have heard tales of your beauty and grace, but the tales do not do you justice, my lady. It would be an honor to return your love, but I am promised to another. A king must keep his word.', 'Returning this room to its proper appearance. Say what you will about the Targaryens, they were conquerors. That is a seat for a conqueror. It needs a room to match it, not vines and flowers.', "Robb Stark is dead. And his bitch mother. Write back to Lord Frey. Thank him for his service and command him to send Robb Stark's head. I'm going to serve it to Sansa at my wedding feast.", "That's your Septa there. l'll tell you what, l'm going to give you a present. After l raise my armies and kill your traitor brother, l'm going to give you his head as well.", 'The gods are good. I am free to heed my heart. Ser Loras, I will gladly wed your sweet sister. You will be my queen and I will love you from this day until my last day.', 'Your house has come to our aid. The whole realm is in your debt, none more so than I. If your family would ask anything of me, ask it, and it shall be yours.', "I suppose it doesn't really matter which Lannister puts the baby into you. Maybe I'll pay you a visit tonight after my uncle passes out. How'd you like that?", "Oh, I want him to find out. You will bring her to his chambers when you're finished and show him what you've done, or the same thing will happen to you.", "The King does not ask; He commands. And my grandfather's stupidity in the field of battle is the reason Robb Stark has Uncle Jaime in the first place.", "Well, you've done it. You've married a Lannister. Soon you'll have a Lannister baby. It's a dream come true for you, isn't it? What a glorious day.", "My mother's always had a penchant for drama. Facts become less and less important to her as she grows older. Our lives were never truly in danger.", "Please, sit. Sit. I do apologize, my lady. Small council meetings. At what point does it become treason to waste the king's time?", "I'm not like him. I didn't fight off anything. It bit me and all I did was scream. And the two Stark girls saw it, both of them.", "Well, as Ser Loras said, Lady Margaery has done this sort of... charitable work before. I'm sure she knows what she's doing.", "Well, how does he expect me to toast without wine? Uncle, you can be my cup-bearer seeing as you're too cowardly to fight.", "Very amusing. lsn't it a funny song? Thank you for your rendition. l imagine it was even better received at that tavern.", "Better-looking bitches than you're used to, Uncle. My mother's been looking for you. We ride for King's Landing today.", "But my mother insists on keeping you alive. Stand. So we'll have to send your brother a message some other way. Meryn.", "I'd crush them. Seize Winterfell and install someone loyal to the realm as Warden of the North. Uncle Kevan, maybe.", "You'll be queen one day, it's only fitting that you should look the part. Will you forgive me for my rudeness?", 'So if I wanted to attend a council meeting, I would now have to climb all the stairs in the Tower of the Hand?', 'But how do we know these dragons are just curiosities and not the beasts that brought the whole world to heel?', "A butcher's boy who wants to be a Knight, eh? Pick up your sword, butcher's boy. Let's see how good you are.", "And you're not a Knight. Only a butcher's boy. That was my lady's sister you were hitting, do you know that?", 'My father won the real war. He killed Prince Rhaegar. He took the crown while you hid under Casterly Rock!', "Widow's Wail. I like that. Every time I use it, it'll be like cutting off Ned Stark's head all over again.", 'What you just did is punishable by death. You will never do it again. Never. . That will be all, Mother.', "She married Renly Baratheon because she was told to. That's what intelligent women do-what they're told.", "I'm asking if he fucked other women when he grew tired of you. How many bastards does he have running -", "You think one ought to speak kindly of a traitor merely because he's had a sword put through his heart?", "You've been holding the council meetings in the Tower of the Hand instead of the small council chamber.", "I'm leaving on a hunting trip. I just wanted to make sure you had everything you need before I left.", 'Fingers or your tongue? lf you got to keep one, which would it be? Or l could just cut your throat.', "Good. Good. How are you finding life in the capital? It must be quite a change after Renly's camp.", 'I give you. King Joffrey... Renly, Stannis, Robb Stark, Balon Greyjoy. The War of the Five Kings.', "And as soon as you've had your blood, l'll put a son in you. Mother says that shouldn't be long.", "It's a new design. Much easier to load. There's no crank. You use this lever to draw the string.", "We're at war. All our lives are in danger. I heard a disgusting lie about Uncle Jaime. And you.", "Your father's gone. As the father of the realm, it is my duty to give you away to your husband.", 'Do you like it? I just had it made. Probably one of the finest weapons in the Seven Kingdoms.', 'Ser Boros, Ser Mandon, stay with my uncle and represent the king on the field of battle.', "If my Uncle Stannis lands on the shores of King's Landing, I'll ride out to greet him.", 'Who threw that? I want the man who threw that. Find who did that and bring him to me!', 'My lady. I fear I have behaved monstrously the past few weeks. With your permission?', 'I would like to heed your wishes and the wishes of my people, but I took a holy vow.', "This one's your father. This one here. Look at it and see what happens to traitors.", 'Someone believes it. Father had other children? Besides me and Tommen and Myrcella?', 'Is there? For a 40-year-old knight with one hand? How can you protect me with that?', "Everyone is mine to torment. You'd do well to remember that, you little monster.", "My princess can drink as much as she wants. Don't worry... You're safe with me.", "I'd double their taxes and command them to supply 10,000 men to the royal army.", "Mother says l'm still to marry you. So you'll stay here, and obey. Look at him!", 'I heard a disgusting lie about uncle Jaime… and you. Father had other children?', "Your brother's turn will come. Then you can lick his blood off Hearteater, too.", 'Ser Meryn, help Ser Dontos celebrate my name day. See that he drinks his fill.', "There's only one ship. Where are the rest of them? Where are the rest of them?", 'Now that the war is won, we should all find time for wisdom. Thank you, Uncle.', 'We allow the northerners too much power. They consider themselves our equals.', "Will you obey now? Or do you need another lesson? l'll look for you in court.", "If I tell the Hound to cut you in half, he'll do it without a second thought.", "Did you hear My Lady, Ser Dontos? . From this day, , you'll be my new fool.", "I think they might. They're weak. They put too much value on their women. .", "You wouldn't? That's all right. Ser Meryn and Ser Boros will hold you down.", "They say Stannis never smiles. I'll give him a red smile from ear to ear.", "I broke Stannis on the Blackwater. Pity you weren't there to help, Uncle.", "l'm done for the day. l'll leave the rest of the matters to you, Mother.", "If you want Robb Stark to hear us, we're going to have to speak louder.", "I've been very busy. Many important matters require a king's attention.", "You sound like a little cat mewling for his mother. Princes don't cry.", 'What did my mother say exactly? Did she have urgent business with me?', "Yes, I did. I'm going to have it served to Sansa at my wedding feast.", "The boy means nothing to me. And I can't stand the wailing of women.", 'Yes it is! They all attacked me and she threw my sword in the river.', "You're the Master of Whisperers. You're supposed to know everything.", 'Your king rides forth to battle. You should see him off with a kiss.', "This is becoming one of the most boring conversations I've ever had.", "A shame. I'd knight the man that put an end to that deviant's life.", 'Yes, to celebrate my name day. Have two, have as much as you like.', 'No flowers. I said no flowers. All these are wrong. Bring others.', 'By my leave. They know I saved the city. They know I won the war.', "No, no, no. No, you're perfect the way you are. Serve me my wine.", "Two cups? . That's not much at all. . Please, have another cup.", "Mmm. I've considered making his perversion punishable by death.", "I'm your prince, not your lord, and I said pick up your sword.", "You'll kiss it again when I return and taste my uncle's blood.", 'Tell me about the Targaryen girl in the east and her dragons.', 'Such a great sword should have a name. What shall I call her?', "You can't talk to me like that. The king can do as he likes!", 'Hound, tell the Hand that his king has asked him a question.', 'The Stark forces are distracted. Now is the time to strike.', "Yes. I'd like a report on the meetings of my small council.", "Uncle. Where are you going? You're my cup-bearer, remember?", 'Tell me, which do you favor - your fingers or your tongue?', "You're here to answer for your brother's latest treasons.", 'And the bedside of a traitor? Is that a place for a lady?', 'Ser llyn, who better than you to carry out the sentence?', "Take him away. I'll have him killed tomorrow, the fool.", 'A handsome goblet, my lord. Or shall I call you Father?', "You're the one who put a sword through Renly Baratheon.", 'As long as it pleases me. Do you want to see the rest?', "A king doesn't discuss battle plans with stupid girls.", "I said harder. He'd want me to get his money's worth.", 'You no longer belong to him. Do you want to hold it?', 'Dog, I command you to go back out there and fight!', "Don't you think we ought to do something about it?", 'Someone forgot to write down all your great deeds.', 'Everyone. The queen would like to say a few words.', "A gold dragon to whoever knocks my fool's hat off.", 'What are you doing? I want these people executed!', "My new blade. Hearteater, I've named it. Kiss it.", 'What was your duty to this traitor as you saw it?', 'Yes, yes, one guard at the... the thing. Go on.', "I won't hurt him... Much. Filthy little bitch!", 'How many bastards does he have running around?', 'Killing you would send your brother a message.', 'l was. l gave him a clean death. Look at him.', "What kind of stupid peasant's superstition...", 'Her loss? Her father was a confessed traitor!', 'Shall I have them bring you a shawl, my lady?', 'I could have your tongue out for saying that.', 'Meryn, my lady is overdressed. Unburden her.', 'Walk with me. l want to show you something.', "With luck, she's dead in a ditch somewhere.", 'Not really relevant then, is it? Come, dog.', 'What are you doing? We need to attack them.', 'What is she doing? Who gave her permission?', 'Could you do it? Could you kill something?.', 'And the biggest was the size of a carriage.', 'If Stannis is fool enough to come near me.', 'I should be consulted about such things.', 'So you agree... The Starks are enemies?', "What did you say? Did you say I can't?", "Why isn't it here now? They're coming.", "They're coming. They're coming ashore.", 'What good will my sympathies do them?', "It's not a claim. The throne is mine.", 'Ser Lancel, tell her of this outrage.', 'Is this what you want, Lady Margaery?', "I've been here, ruling the kingdoms.", "Traitors! I'll have all their heads.", 'What did you say? What did you say?', 'What good is an empty cup? Fill it.', 'Your sister? And who are you, boy?', 'I already said it was well struck.', 'Leave her face. I like her pretty.', 'Lord Petyr Baelish, step forward.', 'I am the king! I will punish you.', 'With this kiss, I pledge my love.', 'Very good. Very good. Off you go.', "No. No, you'll wait here... un...", 'Is your little brother a prince?', 'Well, hurry up. This pie is dry.', 'Did you say something, my lady?', "I'll gut you, you little cunt!", 'Well struck… Well struck, Dog.', 'What work? . Why are you here?', 'Just kill them! Kill them all!', "That's a lovely gown, my lady.", 'No, he was a known degenerate.', 'Time for the bedding ceremony.', 'There will be if I command it.', 'Kneel. Kneel before your king.', 'What are you doing here, dog?', "But I haven't been counseled.", "I've got a lifetime for that.", 'Mm, good. Needs washing down.', 'Bloody flowers. On the king.', "I don't need to do anything.", 'Show him. Come on, show him.', "It's not meant as an honor.", 'What would you have me do?', 'And then you just aim and-', "Your Grace. l'm King now.", 'My lords. Shall we begin?', "You're talking to a king!", 'Congratulations, my lady.', "Then go! Don't touch me.", 'What makes you say this?', 'Do I have to marry her?', "For me. I'm their King.", 'We heard you were dead.', 'Kneel. I said... kneel!', 'My nameday has passed.', 'You failed to do this.', 'Busy getting captured.', 'Make it tighter here.', 'You look quite nice.', "You can't insult me.", 'Why have we stopped?', 'Better. Much better.', "It's not unheard of.", 'Ser Jaime Lannister.', "I'm telling mother!", 'Good. Tongue it is.', 'No. Her. Touch her.', 'There are too many.', 'The bolt goes here.', 'Bring me my goblet.', 'Did you like that?', "I'm punishing her.", 'Could you hit her?', 'My uncle sent you?', 'Let them have her!', 'They attacked me!', 'Sansa, come here.', 'Ser Loras Tyrell.', 'It did not spill.', "I don't want to.", 'And? What is it?', "I'm not asking.", 'There they are.', 'Are you drunk?', 'May I ask why?', "I'm not tired.", "I'm not tired!", "Please don't.", "It's nothing.", "You can't...", 'Yes, she is.', 'Send her in.', 'Grandfather.', 'So they say.', "Who's next?", 'Is it true?', "It's ugly.", "You can't-", 'Not to me.', 'Yes. I am.', 'Use this.']

Name: melisandre
Sentence: ["Was it me you fought on Blackwater Bay? Did I set your ships ablaze? I wasn't there when the wildfire killed our men by the thousands. I could have saved those men. You would have taken the city, Stannis would now sit upon his rightful throne, and you would stand beside him. But I wasn't there because you convinced your king to leave me behind. Do you hear them screaming? All those burning men in the water crying for their mothers, for their gods for help? Until the moment the Blackwater swallowed them.", "Most of these powders and potions are lies. Deceptions to make men think they witnessed our Lordo s power. Once they step into his light, they will see the lie for what it was-- a trick that lead them to the truth. A pinch of this powder in a bonfire will send a flaming column screaming towards the sky. And this one creates a black smoke that will make the bravest man piss himself with fear. And a drop of this in any man's wine will drive him wild with lust.", 'This war has just begun. It will last for years. Thousands will die at your command. You will betray the men serving you. You will betray your family. You will betray everything you once held dear. And it will all be worth it because you are the Son of Fire. You are the Warrior of Light. You will sweep aside this pretender and that one. You will be king.', "Your father chose your mother because the Lord of Light willed it. He willed it so you could be here right now with a power inside you you can't even begin to understand. And He brought me here to draw it from you and birth it into the world. We're both a part of His plan. He wants this for us. No, He demands this of us.", "I've been ready to die for many years. If the Lord was done with me, so be it, but he's not. You've seen the Night King, Jon Snow. You know the great war is still to come. You know the army of the dead will be upon us soon. And you know I can help you win that war.", "Doesn't matter, does it? It's the real thing or it's not. You only need a tongue to tell the difference. Go on, have some more. You still don't trust it. You think this is all a mistake and that you'll have to pay somehow for every bite you take.", "As Lord Commander of the Night's Watch he allowed the Wildlings south of the Wall to protect them from great danger. As King in the North he has united those Wildlings with the northern houses so together they may face their common enemy.", "According to whom? The Silent Sisters? With their stern looks, muzzled mouths, and dried-up cunts? What have their gods done for you? Hmm? When you pray to them, what's their answer? A god is real or he's not. You only need eyes to see.", "Come with us when we ride south. . None of us know the castle as well as you do. Its hidden tunnels, its weaknesses, its people. Winterfell was your home once. Don't you want to chase the rats out of it? .", 'When I looked into the flames this morning, the Lord spoke to me. He said, "Tonight, you will have your last good bath in a long while. Make it count." A joke. Not a very good one, I\'m afraid.', "In the ancient books, it's written that a warrior will draw a burning sword from the fire. And that sword shall be Lightbringer. Stannis Baratheon, warrior of light, your sword awaits you.", 'Man or woman, young or old, lord or peasant, our choices are the same. We choose light, or we choose darkness. We choose good, or we choose evil. We choose the true god or the false.', "The bastard of Robert of the House Baratheon, First of His Name, King of the Andals and the First Men. Why do you think the gold cloaks wanted you? There is power in a king's blood.", 'There is only one way. You must become king before the Long Night begins. Only you can lead the living against the dead. All your life has led us to this moment. To this decision.', "However harsh it is. However hard for us to understand. You don't need my help, but I will need yours soon. When we set sail, your daughter must be with us. The Lord needs her.", "I interpret his signs as well as I can. If the Lord didn't want me to bring you back, how did I bring you back? I have no power. Only what he gives me and he gave me you.", 'The Lord of Light made us male and female. Two parts of a greater whole. We are joining this power. Power to make life, power to make light, and power to cast shadows.', "She's sick. Weak. Shut away in the tower. And she disgusts you. And she's given you nothing. No sons. Only stillborns. Only death. . I will give you a son, my King.", 'You are. But there are others with your blood in their veins. You will sit on the Iron Throne, but first there must be sacrifices. The Lord of Light demands it.', 'Lies and fables. Septons speak of seven gods. There are but two... a god of light and love and joy and a god of darkness, evil, and fear. Eternally at war.', "But sometimes sacrifices must be made to ensure victory. I have shown you the power of king's blood. The Usurper Robb Stark. The Usurper Joffrey Baratheon.", "It's shocking, isn't it, the first time you encounter real wealth? When I was your age, I lived on one bowl of stew a day. And stew is a kind word for it.", "I see a darkness in you. And in that darkness, eyes staring back at me- brown eyes, blue eyes, green eyes. Eyes you'll shut forever. We will meet again.", "You don't need powders and potions, my queen. You don't need lies. You are strong enough to look into the Lordo s light and see his truth for yourself.", 'Free folk, there is only one true king, and his name is Stannis. Here stands the king of lies. Behold the fate of those who choose the darkness.', 'Shadows cannot live in the dark, Ser Davos. They are servants of light, the children of fire. And the brighter the flame, the darker they are.', 'Mine was a slave. So was I. Bought and sold, scourged and branded, until the Lord of Light reached down, took me in his hand and raised me up.', 'Summon Jon Snow. Let him stand before you and tell you things that have happened to him, the things that he has seen with his own eyes.', 'The year is now, my Lord. For you we offer up this girl, that you may cleanse her with your fire and that its light may lead our way.', 'This War of Five Kings means nothing. The true war lies to the north, my king. Death marches on the Wall. Only you can stop him.', "I don't know. Maybe you're only needed for this small part of his plan and nothing else. Maybe he brought you here to die again.", "Show the boy to his chambers. Have the maids draw him a bath and find him some decent clothes. I'll come visit you soon.", 'Queen Daeneys, I was a slave once, bought and sold, scourged and branded. It is an honor to meet the Breaker of Chains.', 'The High Priest gave you a mission. Turn King Robert away from his idols and towards the Lord of Light. What happened?', 'The Lord of Light has made good on his promise, my king. His fires have melted the snows away. The way ahead is clear.', 'I have seen myself walk along the battlements of Wintefell. I have seen the flayed men banners lowered to the ground.', 'Prophecies are dangerous things. I believe you have a role to play, as does another. The King in the North, Jon Snow.', "You are more than they can ever be. They're just foot soldiers in the great war. You will make kings rise and fall.", "I'm not. I'm talking about other women. Like me, Ser Davos. You want me. You want to see what's beneath this robe.", 'Death is coming for everyone and everything. A darkness that will swallow the dawn. And we can stop it, you and I.', "You have so many questions, don't you? So did I when I was a child. I was much like you. Only I wasn't a princess.", 'Neither of us is common folk anymore. I did not part on good terms with the King in the North, or his advisor.', 'And you will take it. The Lord has shown me Bolton banners burning. You will receive what is yours by right.', 'Lord of Light, cast your light upon us. Lord of Light, defend us. For the night is dark and full of terrors!', 'Lord of Light, cast your light upon us! Lord of Light, defend us! For the night is dark and full of terrors!', 'The Lord let you come back for a reason Stannis was not the prince who was promised, but someone has to be', "Once before you put your faith in Ser Davos and left me behind. I hope you won't make that mistake again.", 'Stannis does not need to beg this lord or that lord for support. The Lord of Light stands behind him.', 'I have seen the path to victory in the flames. At first, you must give yourself to the Lord of Light.', 'Accept this token of our faith, my lord and lead us from the darkness. Lord of Light show us the way!', "I met a man who came back from the dead, but the priest who did it -- It shouldn't have been possible", 'If the lamb sees the knife, she panics. Her panic seeps into her meat, darkens it, fouls the flavor.', "Do you feel my heart beating? This power in you, you resist it, and that's your mistake. Embrace it.", "You can blame Ser Davos. He didn't believe in the power of king's blood. He wanted a demonstration.", 'You quit, you mean. The heathen continue to slaughter each other and you continue to get drunk.', 'The night is dark and full of terrors, old man, but the fire burns them all away. Your Grace.', 'And our king is still no closer to the Iron Throne. A great gift requires a great sacrifice.', "No, no, no. Not that one. You don't even want to touch that one. Next to it. That's the one.", "You should kneel before your brother. He's the Lordo s chosen, born amidst salt and smoke.", "You've carried more unpleasant cargo in your time. Are you a good man, Ser Davos Seaworth?", 'You saw it yourself, my king, when you stared into the flames. A great battle in the snow.', "They're in a better place now, Princess. The fire cleansed them of the sins of the world.", 'Because of mistakes I made. Terrible mistakes. I would only be a distraction if I stayed.', 'No. But I suffered in other ways, sweet girl, believe me. What do you know of the gods?', "There's only one war. Life against death. Come. Let me show what you're fighting for. .", 'Afterwards, after they stabbed you, after you died, where did you go? What did you see?', 'Hear us now. Accept these tokens of our faith, my lord, and lead us from the darkness.', "If half an onion is black with rot, it's a rotten onion. A man is good or he is evil.", "Her father is the Lordo s chosen King. And her father's blood runs through her veins.", "Haven't you ever wondered where your strength came from? Your talent for fighting?", 'We are standing here because of him. Jon Snow is alive because the Lord willed it.', 'Take them and cast your light upon us. For the night is dark and full of terrors.', 'Everything I believed, the great victory I saw in the flames, all of it was a lie', 'You smell of fear, fear and piss and old bones. Do you want to stop me? Stop me.', 'After the long summer, darkness will fall heavy on the world. Stars will bleed.', 'The Long Night is coming. Only the prince who was promised can bring the dawn.', 'So did her father. So did her mother. Her own blood knew it was the only way.', 'I will never abandon you. You are the Son of Fire. I am sworn to serve you.', "I told you there's power in the blood of kings. And you have so much blood.", "There's only one god, Ser Davos, and he only protects those who serve him.", 'The Lord brought him back for a purpose. Now that purpose has been served.', 'Lord of Light, come to us in our darkness. We offer you these false Gods.', "Not yet. But even those who don't worship the Lord can serve his cause.", "There's no need to execute me, Ser Davos. I'll be dead before the dawn.", 'The king has taken for his sigil the fiery heart of the Lord of Light.', "Oh, good. I'm a knight myself, of sorts, a champion of light and life.", 'Women scream when they give birth. Afterward they are filled with joy.', 'Look to your sins, Lord Renly. The night is dark and full of terrors.', 'Lord of Light, protect us, for the night is dark and full of terrors.', 'Lord of Light protect us, for the night is dark and full of terrors!', 'Let me show you what you have inside you. Come fight death with me.', 'You saved one innocent. How many tens of thousands have you doomed?', "He's right. You need him. He has a part to play in the war to come.", "That's because most jokes are lies and you're devoted to the truth.", 'No, we have someone better, and your blood runs through her veins.', 'Could have been worse, Jon Snow. You had a family. You had feasts.', 'The army was trapped. The horses were dying. It was the only way.', 'I take no credit. I have faith and my faith has been rewarded.', "No. Don't be upset. Men never crave what they already have.", 'My time whispering in the ears of kings has come to an end.', "Your mercy saved the boy's life. You feel good about that?", "Will you quit the war just because you've lost a battle?", "There's only one hell, Princess. The one we live in now.", 'I tell him nothing! I pray for his commands and I obey.', "Don't despair, Ser Davos. What I told your son is true.", 'Could you bring me that vial over there? The blue one.', "I've done my part. I've brought ice and fire together.", 'I have to die in this strange country, just like you.', 'The Lord of Light shines through you, young warrior.', 'You were right all along The Lord never spoke to me', 'Never. The Lordo s fire lives within me, Jon Snow.', "Do you doubt me still? After all that you've seen?", 'I serve the Lord of Light. I do what he commands.', 'These armies are but toys for the Lord of Light.', 'The cold breath of winter will freeze the seas.', "You don't have the strength. It would kill you.", "Don't fight, don't fight. They won't take much.", 'Every mother should fear for her childo s soul.', 'I saw him in the flames, fighting at Winterfell', 'Keep looking. Do you see? Do you see, my king?', 'Those scars mean nothing to the Lord of Light.', 'I told him death by fire is the purest death.', 'How would you punish the infidels, Ser Davos?', 'How many times has the Lord brought him back?', "Because it is true. You're troubled my king.", "The dead don't need lovers. Only the living.", 'For the night is dark and full of terrors.', 'The Lord of Light only allows me glimpses.', 'We murdered him. Share the weight with me.', 'Have you ever slaughtered a lamb, my king?', 'I will return, dear spider. One last time.', 'Brown eyes... green eyes... and blue eyes.', "I don't know yet. The fires will show me.", 'And here we are. At the end of the world.', 'Did you watch the ceremony on the beach?', "It's only flesh. It needs what it needs.", "I've been fighting far longer than you.", 'There was a battle Stannis was defeated', "You've chosen the darkness, Ser Davos.", 'Your grace. The bastard of Winterfell.', 'And the dead shall rise in the North.', 'If you want to help him, leave him be', 'You know what I mean to do with him.', 'When I return, you will understand.', 'There is another way. A better way.', "You think I'm trying to poison you?", "It's all I knew when I was a child.", 'It will all be over soon, Princess.', 'What do we say to the God of Death?', 'Look into the fire, my king. Look.', 'Death by fire is the purest death.', 'Wildfire. I should have been here.', 'There are no mistakes. Not for us.', 'You must give... all of yourself.', 'Lord of Light, show us the way...', "He's the prince that was promised", 'No visions. No magic. Just life.', 'I am not your servant, Jon Snow.', 'I only do what my Lord commands!', 'Yet you have known other women.', 'You should not have this power.', 'Have you ever seen one like it?', 'Tell them to lift their swords.', "You've been to the other side.", 'I will do as Jon Snow commands', 'Are you afraid, Onion Knight?', 'Your fires burn low, my king.', 'And none have seen the blade.', "Where do you think it's from?", 'You march on Winterfell soon?', 'You only need faith, my King.', "Then we shouldn't tell him. .", 'There are some with his power', 'Were you sleeping, Princess?', 'You do know. Trust yourself.', "They can't bar our passage.", "There. Your father's house.", 'You could never disturb me.', 'You know nothing, Jon Snow.', 'We burned her at the stake.', 'You have someone He needs.', 'Come in, my queen. Please.', 'I understand how you feel.', "I didn't lie. I was wrong.", 'Do you speak their tongue?', 'He has no need for ships.', 'The former Lord Commander', 'Then we must be the ten.', 'l I did. I still see it.', 'I will after you tell me', 'But that is impossible.', 'I am called Melisandre.', 'Do you love your wife?', 'You are Thoros of Myr.', 'And it frightened you?', 'The king wants a word.', 'You have to trust me.', 'You interrupt nothing', 'I never had this gift', 'The Princess Shireen.', 'You must have faith.', 'I will pray for you.', "That's not possible.", "Your father's house.", 'Your blood is noble.', 'I trust in the Lord.', "I'm not your enemy.", 'We come as friends.', 'What are you asking', 'Until he found me.', "I'm not a soldier.", "The one we've got.", 'Here, taste this.', 'Are you a virgin?', 'To serve my Lord.', "I'll have to try.", 'Let me show you.', 'Valar morghulis.', 'Valar morghulis.', 'Do you miss it?', 'Lord Commander.', 'And I know you.', 'Take him away.', "No, it didn't.", 'And you will.', "I don't know.", "I don't know", 'Inside you.', 'Not always.', "Don't lose.", 'Not for me', 'I cannot.', 'Ser Davos', 'Ser Davos', 'Volantis.', 'My king.', 'Come in', 'Please', 'Feel.']

Name: sandor clegane
Sentence: ["You remember where the heart is? Fuck it. I'm ready. Go on, girl. Another name off your list. You kept promising me. I cut down your butcher's boy, the ginger. He was begging for mercy. Please sir, please don't kill me, please, please. Bled all over my horse. Saddle stunk of butcher's boy for weeks. And your sister, your pretty sister. I shouldo ve taken her. That night the Blackwater burned, I shouldo ve fucked her bloody. At least I'd have one happy memory! Do I have to beg you? Do it. Do it.", "Thought I stole one of his toys. I didn't steal it. I was just playing with it. The pain was bad. The smell was worse. But the worst thing was that it was my brother who did it. My father, who protected him... told everyone my bedding caught fire. You think you're on your own?", "Safety?! Where the fuck's that? Her aunt in the Eyrie's dead. Her mother's dead, her father's dead, her brother's dead. Winterfell's a pile of rubble. There's no safety, you dumb bitch. If you don't know that by now, you're the wrong one to watch over her.", "Unless there's a Maester hiding behind that rock, aye, I'm done. I'd skin you alive for wine. [Arya offers water.] Fuck water! Killed by a woman. I bet you liked that. Go on, go after her. She'll help you. Going out alone, you won't last a day out there.", 'Those outlaws you love so much never told you? The whole countryside is yapping about it. Your uncle is marrying one of the Frey girls. So quit trying to bash my skull in and we might just make it there in time for the wedding.', "Look at me. Stannis is a killer. The Lannisters are killers. Your father was a killer. Your brother is a killer. Your sons will be killers someday. The world is built by killers. So you'd better get used to looking at them.", "I'm as stupid as that hog you stuck back in the village, getting myself cut and stabbed and bitten. No reward is worth this much trouble. Wish I'd never laid eyes on you. You say your brother gave you that sword.", "Of course you are. You're almost there and you're afraid you won't make it. The closer you get, the worse the fear gets. No point in trying to hide behind that face. I know fear when I see it. Seen it a lot.", "Ha, you never knew my brother. He once killed a man for snoring. There's plenty worse than me. There's men who like to beat little girls, men who like to rape them. I saved your sister from some of them.", "I never touched the Targaryen babes. I never saw them, never smelled them, never heard them bawling. You want to cut my throat, get on with it! But don't call me murderer and pretend that you're not.", "The greatest swordsman who ever lived didn't have a sword? All right. You have a sword. Let's see what he taught you. Go on, do it for your Braavosi friend. Dead like all the rest of your friends.", "Shut up about it. Shut up about everything. Thanks to you, I'm a walking bag of silver anywhere the Lannisters hold sway. Which is everywhere between where we are now and where we're going.", 'So, who will it be? Should we find out if your fire god really loves you, priest? Or you, archer? What are you worth with a sword in your hand? Or is the little girl the bravest one here?', 'Ask her, if you ever see her again. Ask her who came back for her when the mob had her on her back. They would have taken her every which way and left her there with her throat cut open.', "Go ahead then. You might get away. Might even make it there on your own. They're just over the river. The closest you've been to family since Ilyn Payne snipped your daddy's neck.", "Oh, there's women in the ground. I put some there myself. So have you. You like fucking and drinking and singing. But killing, killing's the thing you love. You're just like me.", "No? Fancy sword you've got there. Where'd you get it? I've been looking at Lannister gold all my life. Go on, Brienne of fucking Tarth, tell me that's not Lannister gold.", "Horses aren't easy to come by. Even if they were, you think I'm gonna put you on your own horse? Watch the only thing of value I've got in the world ride away?", "You've got an aunt in the Vale. Your rich Aunt Lysa. After I sell you to her, maybe she'll have enough left over to buy you that pony you want so much.", "Hate's as good a thing as any to keep a person going. Better than most. We come across my brother, maybe we can both cross a name off our list.", 'Why do you care? Might book passage across the Narrow Sea. Fight as a sellsword. Second Sons, could be. Seems like a good fit for me.', "I understand that if any more words come pouring out of your cunt mouth, I'm gonna have to eat every fucking chicken in this room.", "There's plenty worse than me. I just understand the way things are. How many Starks they got to behead before you figure it out?", "Sulk all you want. The truth is, you're lucky. You don't want to be alone out here, girl. Someone worse than me would find you.", "You'll be glad of the hateful things I do someday when you're queen and I'm all that stands between you and your beloved king.", 'My brother gave me this. It was just like you said a while back. Pressed me to the fire like I was a nice juicy mutton chop.', "I wasn't the damn wine taster. Little shit deserved to die, but poison...poison's a woman's weapon. Men kill with steel.", "Or maybe that dragon will eat her. It doesn't matter. She's dead. And you'll be dead too if you don't get out of here.", "Doesn't matter. You're her blood. Family, honor, all that horseshit. It's all you lords and ladies ever talk about.", "He hasn't been very talkative these last 20 years. Since the mad King had his tongue ripped out with hot pincers.", "What'll you pay? I don't have much. But I have hidden a bit of silver from the bandits. Fair wages for fair work?", "I do know it. He's weak. He can't protect himself. They'll both be dead come winter. Dead men don't need silver.", "Fuck off! We can't beat them. Don't you see that, you stupid whore? We're fighting Death! They can't beat Death.", 'Do I frighten you so much, girl? Or is it him there making you shake? He frightens me too. Look at that face.', "Aye, he took us in. He's a good man and his daughter makes a nice stew. And they'll both be dead come winter.", "I'd tell him to shut the fuck up so I can get some sleep. Go on, get it over with, your list of doomed men.", 'The bloody Hound, Sandor Clegane. And his...traveling companion Arya Stark, niece of your lady Lysa Arryn.', "Think about it. She kills Cersei, the war's over. There won't be a siege. You might not even die tomorrow.", "You're still swineherds and tanners and masons. You think carrying a crooked spear makes you a soldier?", "A cowardo s weapon. I like to fight up close. I like to see a man's face when I put the steel in him.", "Stark deserters. Baratheon deserters. You lot aren't fighting in a war. You're running from it.", "Kill me and you're free. But if I live, I'll break both your hands. Go on, hit me. Hit me hard.", "Your friendo s dead and Meryn Trant's not 'cause Trant had armor and a big fucking sword.", "Of course it's about that, you twat. Why shouldn't it be? The dead are dead. You're not.", "Any of these flaming fucking arrows come near me, I'll strangle you with your own guts.", 'And we ask the Stranger not to kill us in our beds tonight for no damn reason at all.', "You're not a good listener. Valyrian steel-- I've always wanted some Valyrian steel.", "Untie these ropes and we'll find out. What are you doing leading a mob of peasants?", "Remember what happens to children who run. I'm your father and I'll do the talking.", "I thought it'd make me happy, but it doesn't. Not really. Nothing makes you happy.", 'Meryn Trant? The greatest swordsman who ever lived killed by Meryn fucking Trant?', 'The little birdo s bleeding. Someone take her back to her cage. See to that cut.', "Spare me. You can't tell me Lord Eddard Stark of Winterfell never killed a man.", "Fuck Joffrey. Fuck the queen. That's the Red Fork. I'm taking you to the Twins.", 'Believe me, girl, I want you there as soon as I can. Get my gold, be on my way.', "And you thought you were going to collect it? Didn't think very hard, did you?", "This day's really not working out the way you planned. He on your little list?", "No, not you. You're a real killer. With your water dancing, and your needle.", 'Is that what he told you? He lied. Killing is the sweetest thing there is.', "I wasn't at the Mummer's Ford. Dump your dead children at some other door.", "So you're sad because you didn't get to kill Joffrey yourself. Is that it?", 'Your uncle left your nameday present and asked me to see that you got it.', "Because your mother and brother will be there and they'll pay me for you.", 'Five horses, five men. More than I feel like killing on an empty stomach.', "You can still smell the burning bodies, and that's where your head is at.", "You think you wanted revenge a long time? I've been after it all my life.", 'The girl is right. What a man sows on his name day, he reaps all year.', 'Dancing? Maybe you ought to put on a dress. Who taught you that shite?', "You check every five minutes like you're afraid they're gonna move.", "laughs* I'd pay good money to see that. *grunts and rubs his neck*", 'Then I should have killed you. Not my place to question princes.', "Next time you're going to do something like that, tell me first.", "They will if you nance around like that. That's no way to fight.", "You're paid by the Lannisters. You're here for the bounty on me.", "Any man dies with a clean sword, I'll rape his fucking corpse.", "Just point out the next map shop you see and I'll buy you one.", "Guess that's what the king does when you tell him to fuck off.", 'Do you take me for my brother? Is being born Clegane a crime?', "I don't care if he ate your friend. We're not going in there.", 'Go home, girl. The fire will get her, or one of the Dothraki.', "Ned Stark is dead. King Robert is dead. My brother's alive.", "Looks like their god likes me more than your butcher's boy.", 'Braavos. Greasy-haired little bastard, I bet. They all are.', 'If you mean to murder me, then bloody well get on with it.', "I was Joffrey's sworn shield. The boy attacked the prince.", "Come try it, archer. I'll shove those arrows up your ass.", 'Any boy whore with a sword could beat three Meryn Trants.', "Someplace that isn't burning. North, might be. Could be.", 'I could ask the same of you. What are you doing up here?', 'What in seven hells are you doing with the Stark bitch?', "You're a talker. Listening to talkers makes me thirsty.", 'Save yourself some pain, girl. Give him what he wants.', "Let's go. Stannis is sending us fresh meat. You, too.", "You think you're good with that bow, you little twat?", "That's where the heart is. That's how you kill a man.", "You're all right now, little bird. You're all right.", "Brave? A dog doesn't need courage to chase off rats.", 'Call that a fight? Slaughtering livestock more like.', "Kick all you like, wolf girl. Won't do you no good.", 'Fuck the Kingsguard. Fuck the city. Fuck the king.', "The Blackwater? Where do you think I'm taking you?", "Yeah, that's you. That's what you've always been.", 'Her captor. Bringing her to her aunt for ransom.', "You're still here? [Coughs] Big bitch saved you.", 'I can take you with me. Take you to Winterfell.', "You're very kind. Someday it'll get you killed.", "I bet his hair is greasier than Joffrey's cunt.", 'The names of every fucking person in Westeros?', "You heard the girl! She's not coming with you.", "I lost half my men. The Blackwater's on fire.", "Ah. And hungry. Think I'll take two chickens.", "Well, we won't have to walk too much further.", 'Looks like every other shit inn on the road.', 'The Prince will remember that, little lord.', "I'll keep you safe. Do you want to go home?", "Beric Dondarrion? You've seen better days.", 'Here I am. Bring me one of those chickens.', 'Aye, nothing in the world beats that look.', "Piss on that! You're nothing but thieves.", "A bad way to go. Haven't you had enough?", 'Needle? Of course you named your sword.', 'You got to do all seven of the fuckers?', 'How can a man not keep ale in his home?', "It's all I care about. And look at me.", 'You look like a bunch of swineherds.', "Is that the first man you've killed?", "If I'm standing on it, it's my land.", "Guest right don't mean much anymore.", "It's not hunting if you pay for it.", 'No, it gives me joy to kill people.', 'Kill me. Kill me! Kill me! Kill me!', "Your Lord Imp's going to miss you.", 'The king has asked you a question.', "No, little bird, I won't hurt you.", "Don't worry, they're still there.", "She's all right. I've had better.", 'Look at me! You wanna be like me?', 'He can die just fine on his own.', 'Thoros? The fuck you doing here?', "It doesn't sound like it's over.", "I'm not going to King's Landing.", 'I asked if you wanted something.', "I didn't pick you for a hunter.", 'And they want the same for you.', 'You come with me, you die here.', 'Fuck the water. Bring me wine.', 'The lady is starting to panic.', 'What are you... get back here.', "You'll be needing that again.", "Not here for long. I'm going.", 'The little lady wants a pony.', "I'll still take that chicken.", "You think you're a hard man?", "I'll give you one try, girl.", 'Got salt pork for the feast.', 'Where did you get the knife?', "That's not gonna get better.", "You're fighting for ghosts.", "A man's got to have a code.", "Aye, that's what I'm doing.", 'You found god? Is that it?', 'More than anyone you know.', 'Who do you think sent me?', 'Someone bring me a drink.', 'That give you some ideas?', 'Near Fairmarket, I think.', 'Fair wages for fair work.', 'Rat cunts. Fucking whore.', 'He ran... Not very fast.', "Do as you're bid, child.", 'Look inside, Your Grace.', 'Best part of the animal.', "What the fuck's a Lommy?", "No need. The war's over.", "I didn't do it for you.", "Dead rats don't squeak.", 'Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa.', "No, I don't have a map.", 'Get your horse saddled.', 'Aye, he was a bleeder.', 'Go ahead, talk to him.', "Got pig's feet, too .", 'The hell you doing?', 'The fuck you doing?', 'You want something?', 'Hello, big brother.', 'Would you shut up?', 'What, ways to die?', 'Rough night, Imp?', 'What do you want?', "What's your name?", "I'm not a knight.", 'Eat shit, dwarf.', "I'm not a thief.", 'You paid for it?', 'You got any ale?', 'Who were "they"?', "You're learning.", "It's a fleabite.", "Aye, she'll pay.", "I'm sure you do.", 'I want my gold.', "We've gotta go!", "It's too late.", 'Lots of cunts.', 'Get back here.', 'Fuck the king.', 'Could be food.', 'Only smaller.', 'Was? He dead?', 'Need a hand?', 'Not a penny.', 'Why Braavos?', 'Fucking die!', "I'm no Ser.", 'Here, girl.', 'None taken.', 'Someone is.', 'I doubt it.', 'Your Grace.', 'Like what?', 'Fall back!', 'That him?', 'Got what?', "I wasn't.", 'That so?', 'So do I.', 'No fire.', 'No fire!', 'Come on!', 'Who by?', 'Go on.', 'Girl.', 'Good.', 'Move.', 'Far.', 'How?', 'No.', 'Oh.']
